Abadlali beStars badlale umdlalo ungadibananga noxa bebedlalela enkundleni yabo ngoba iWits ibidlala umdlalo okhawulezayo futhi isebenzisa iibhola eziphezulu ezithi gqi emacaleni. UGavin Hunt ugoduka exolile emva kokuzuza impumelelo ngoba iqela lakhe lifumana ithuba lokuqinisa iinzame zalo zokukhusela iTelkom Knockout ephunyelelwe liqela lakhe kwisizini egqithileyo ebinzima kakhulu kwiBidvest Wits. 
  
Free Stars: Sangare, Mahamutsa, Phungwayo, Tema, Dlamini, Maruping, Makhaula, Jantjie, Bhengu, Mobbie, Tchilimbou. 
Amalalela: Kwizera, Keita, Mbhele, Masina, Gandze, Rodgers, Moseamedi. 
Bidvest Wits: Keet, Hlatshwayo, Nonyane, Johannes, Monare, Murray, Hotto, Mkhwanazi, Alexander, Domingo, Macuphu. 
Amalalela: Mhlongo, Mere, Pelembe, Motupa, Ritchie, Dzvukamanja, Majoro.

headline: Wonke umntu useBubeleni eBhayi!
text:
I-EBUBELENI ilindele uchatha kubathandi bomculo abaza kuzimasa lo mnyhadala kulo nyaka. 
Kulo nyaka wesithandathu, iEbubeleni Music Festival ingazinyaswa ngamashumi amabini amawaka [ 20 000 ] abantu xa kuthelekiswa nenginginya eyayizimase esi siganeko kunyaka ophelileyo. 
Oku kuthethwe ngumququzeleli walo mnyhadala oqhutyelwa eBhayi minyaka le, uMark Mahambehlala, ngethuba edlan’ iindlebe nephephandaba I’solezwe. 
“Abantu abatsalwa bubume beemvumi eziseqongeni kuphela, kodwa bazakube bedibana nezihlobo zabo abazigqibela kudala,” utshilo. 
UMahambehlala umemelela abantu ukuba bagilane ukuya kuqwela kuloo matikiti okugqibela aseleyo. 
“Akuyi kuthengiswa matikiti emnyango, kwaye ambalwa ashiyekileyo eComputicket sithetha nje.” 
Lo mnyhadala  kulo nyaka uza kuqhutyelwa eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. 
Phakathi kweemvumi ezizakudyusha eqongeni kuquka uCaiphus Semenya, Letta Mbulu, Sands, Amanda Black, Sjava, AKA, Mafikizolo, Lady Zamar noSamthing Soweto. 
Ababhexeshi ngolu suku ngu-K.Ci August noMafa Bavuma boMhlobo Wenene fm. 
Lo mnyhadala ungoMgqibelo umhla we-30 kweyoMnga 2017. Amasango avulwa ngentsimbi yeshumi elinesibini emin’ emaqanda de kuse. 
Amatikiti aqala kwi-R250, ele-cooler box yi-R50, ze abo bakhetha ukubeka iimoto zabo ngaphakathi ebaleni bathenge itikiti le-R50 nabo. 
UKHUPHISWANO! 
Ukuba useBhayi, unomdla wokuya kwi-Ebubeleni Music Festival, eli lithuba lokuzifumanela itikiti elinye (general ticket) kumatikiti amane esiphisa ngawo. 
Ngena kwi-inbox kaFacebook wethu: Ilisolezwe okanye kuTwitter: @ilisolezwe, usixelele igama lemvumi oyithandayo ezakube ikulo mnyhadala nengoma yayo oyithandayo.  
Ukhuphiswano luyavala ngentsimbi yesine kulo Mgqibelo we-23 kweyoMnga.  
Ophumeleleyo uyakwaziswa kwakumaqonga wethu wezonxibelelwano.  Ungaphoswa!

headline: Ubhubhe engahoywanga kwisibhedlele saseGcuwa
text:
Lugcuma yintlungu nomvandedwa usapho lukaNolusindiso Mndende (68) wakuGatyana, owathi waphathwa gadalala zizibhedlele ezibini zeli phondo de wabhubha.  
Ingxelo yosapho ithi le nkosikazi ibaleke isibhedlele saseGcuwa isiya kwisibhedlele saseFrere eMonti ngenxa yembali ende yokungaphatheki kakuhle kwisibhedlele saseGcuwa. 
 Umzukulwana walo mama ongakwazi kulala emva kokubona uninakhulu engcungcuthekiswa ngabongikazi eFrere naseGcuwa uBulelwa Ladlokova, 
 uthi akanakuze axole yinkohlakalo ayiboniswe zezi zibhedlele.  
“Siqeshe imoto ngamawaka amabini anamakhulu amahlanu eerandi (R2500) ukusuka kuGatyana ukuya kugqirha wabucala eMonti wasigqithisela eFrere, saxelelwa ukuba akukho ndawo masiphindele eGcuwa, egula umakhulu,” uthethe watsho uLadlokova. 
Uthi bafike ngentsimbi yeshumi ngomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kweyeDwarha, bengafumani ncedo kwisibhedlele saseFrere.  
“Emva kwemini saxelelwa ukuba akukho ndawo yokulalisa umakhulu, silinde imini yonke besithi bazama icebo lokuba aye kwi X-Ray, ugqirha wasinika incwadi ebhale ukuba asifuni kuya kwisibhedlele saseGcuwa, emva kokulinda sahamba ezinzulwini zobusuku ukuya eGcuwa singancedwanga eFrere,” ekhathazekile utshilo uLadlokova. 
Uthi incwadi abayinikwa eFrere ibonisa ukuba bebengafuni kuya kwisibhedlele saseGcuwa, nto leyo yabangela intshutshiso esuka kubongikazi baseGcuwa. 
 “Umakhulu wagcinwa kwindawo yabantu abenzakeleyo ukusukela ngoko, kusithwa ilift ayisebenzi ukuze akwazi ukuya kwigumbi lokulala, ndandimphipha ngokwam, abongikazi bebuza ukuba uzakuthwani xa emkhulu kangaka,” ucacise watsho uLadlokova.  
Le ntwazana yenze lo msebenzi wokonga uninakhulu ukusukela ngomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kwinyanga yeDwarha ukuya kumhla wamashumi amabini anesithathu, umhla awabhubha ngawo.  
“Abongikazi baseGcuwa bebendikhumbuza rhoqo ngezi ntsuku zontathu ukuba besingafuni kuza kwesi sibhedlele, bendijula ngezinto zokucoca umakhulu, ndimcoce ndincediswa ngoonogada, baqale ukusondela kuye ngalo mhla wokubhubha kwakhe bendixelela ukuba uyabhubha,” ucacise watsho uLadlokova.  
Ngenxa yale mpatho kwezi zibhedlele akukho sigulo sichaziweyo esibangele ukubhubha kwalo mama ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesithathu kweyeDwarha. 
“Ngoncedo lwesithethi sesebe lezempilo eMpuma Koloni uSizwe Kupelo, ndakwazi ukuthetha namagosa esebe ayetsale umnxeba ekwiziko lengxaki zeli sebe, emva kokuba yena wathumela umntu ekuthwa nguNtlube ukuba anditsalele umnxeba,” utsho uLadlokova. 
 Umphathi wesi sibhedlele saseGcuwa uWezile Tshali ufune ithuba elaneleyo lokuba enze uphando ngezityholo zokungahoywa kwalo mguli kwisibhedlele saseGcuwa.  
Othethe egameni lesebe lezeMpilo eMpuma Koloni, uSizwe Kupelo, ubongoze uLadlokova ukuba alandele iindlela ezisemthethweni zokufaka isikhalazo.  
“Makafake isikhalazo ngokusemthethweni malunga nendlela athe waphatheka ngayo phaya kweza zibhedlele, ukuze kuthathwe amanyathelo asemthethweni,” uthethe watsho uKupelo. 
Yimali ekwibhiliyoni ezilishumi elinesixhenxe yomdliwo elijongene nayo isebe lezempilo eMpuma Koloni ngenxa yokungakwazi kwenza umsebenzi wokukhathalela abaguli.  
Kumatyala akwikhulu elimashumi amahlanu anesihlanu, isebe lezempilo liphumelele amatyala amane kuphela.

headline: Phumla ngoxolo Phanini, Bhakaniya elimnyama!
text:
Siyisonga kakubi inyanga yoomama ngesithonga sokudlula emhlabeni kukaNokulunga Nopinki “Phanini” Nazo. Ngomhla weshumi kule nyanga yeThupha, sothuswe sisaziso esikhutshwe likhaya lakhe kwikhasi lakhe likaFacebook esithi uswelekile. Kwiintsuku ezintathu phambi koko, ebekhe wathi qatha engqondweni yam ngoba ebenqabile kuFacebook. Futhi ndazibuza ukuba kutheni wanqaba kodwa ndathi mhlawumbi uzixakekele njengamntu wonke ojongene nobomi obunzima eMzantsi Afrika kwezi ntsuku. Into ebibangela ndimcinge kukuba ikhona into awayendithembise ngayo kwinyanga ephelileyo. 
Ndambona ethegwe kwinto eyayibhalwe kuFacebook ngomntana omnyama, ofunda kwisikolo sabelungu eMonti, owayebalasele emdlalweni weHockey. Sasivene ke ukuba uza kundidibanisa nala mntana ukuze mna ndibhale ibhali ngaye kwiphepha labantu, I’solezwe lesiXhosa. Zange ndicinge ukuba namhlanje kwakube kusithiwa uNopinki akasekho emhlabeni. Anditsho kuba ndingazi ukuba ukufa yinto efika njengesela. Ndithe mandenze imiqolo embalwa ngoNopinki kuba ebeyitshomi wam. Ndadibna naye kuFacebook ndisasebenza eGoli phambi kokuqalwa kwephepha lesiXhosa ngo-2015. Yibhola into eyandisondeza kuye noxa ndandingamazi nokuba ngowaphi. 
UNopinki ebengumlandeli we-Orlando Pirates opheleleyo. Ebengapheleli ekuthetheni ngayo nokuncithana nabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs, ebehamba kooGoli, kooGqeberha –  naphi na apho kudlala iPirates. EbeliBhakaniya elinkone nozwane. Emva kwethutyana ndiqeshwe kwiphepha lesiXhosa (I’solezwe lesiXhosa), ndaye ndacela yena andazise kubalandeli bebhola eMpuma Koloni. Injongo yam yayikukwazi iphephandaba kubalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo. Wayenza lo nto uPhanini. Nguye owandazisa kubalandeli bePirates, iChiefs neSundowns endabakhupha ephepheni. Undincedisile emsebenzini wam kakhulu noxa yena wayengakuqondi ukubaluleka kwento awandenzela yona. 
Ebengalandeli ibhola ekhatywayo nje kuphela uPinklady, ebelandela neminye imidlalo. Ukugqibelana kwam naye, sasiyokwamkela AmaBhokobhoko kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya saseMonti emva kokuphumelela kwawo itumente yehlabathi ekupheleni kuka-2019. Wayehamba netshomi yakhe uZoliswa “Makhambule” Galo. Kwakumnandi kakhulu ngalo mini yembali ndade ndohlukana nabo. UNopinki ubekwe kwikhaya lakhe lokugqibela kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. Xa ndiphetha, ndifuna ukuthi kubi ukulahlekelwa komntu oluncedo eluntwini njengawe Phanini, umlandeli wezemidlalo obezimisele kakhulu. Kodwa ngoba ukufa yinto eyadalwayo, siyakwamkela ukuthathwa kwakho nguThixo. Uphumle ngoxolo ke Phanini, Bhakaniya elimnyama. Sohlala sikukhumbula kwezemidlalo.

headline: Unethemba lokuya phambili kwiSuper Rugby uMarais
text:
Lichasele okwethamsanqa kwiBulls ithemba lokudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo weSuper Rugby. Amathemba eli qela alele kwindlela azakuthi aqhube ngayo amaqela aphezulu. 
Ingaba ithamsanqa lizakuba kwicala leBulls kule mpelaveki xa iqubisana neCheetahs kule mpelaveki siya kuyo? Lo mbuzo awukabinayo impendulo ukuza kuthi ga ngoku kodwa ngoMgqibelo kuzakuhlwa sele licaca icala. Nangona ingekacaci ukuba iBulls zizakuya na kwimidlalo yeeplayoffs. Elona qela lizakube liphantsi koxinizelelo ngamandla lelaseThekwini iiSharks, kufuneka liqale ngokubetha iSunwolves ukuqinisekisa indawo yalo kumjikelo olandelayo. 
Kwimpelaveki edlulileyo iBulls ibonakalisile ukuba izakulwa kwaye inxanelwe impumelelo kumdlalo ebethe kuwo iSunwolves ngo’50-3. Isekhona nentlantsana yethemba kweli qela lasePitoli yokuba lingakwazi ukuya kwimidlalo eyandulela amagqibela kankqoyi. 
Amanqaku amahlanu afunyenwe yiBulls athetha ukuba ngoku eli qela lishiywa ngamanqaku amabini ngabafana bakaGary Gold. 
“Ngethamsanqa siwafumene amanqaku amahlanu kula mdlalo. Ndithethile nabadlali ekuqaleni kwale veki ukuba kufuneka siphumelele kuqala, emva koko sikhangele inqaku le- bhonasi sikwazile ukuzifumana zombini ezo nto,” utshilo uNollis Marais. 
“Indlela ebesihlasela ngayo intle, ingakumbi kwisiqingatha sokuqala. Kwisiqingatha sesibiniasiqhubanga  kakuhle, siyinike ithuba lokudlala iSunwolves. Besikhusela endaweni yokubheka phambili. oku sizakulungisa kolandelayo.”

headline: UPitso Mosima uchaza isizathu esibethise iSundowns
text:
Iinzame zeMamelodi Sundowns zokukhusela indebe yeCaf Champions League ziwe phantsi izolo. Amasandawana abethwe yiWyadad Casablanca ngo’3-2 kumapenela emva komdlalo obunzima weChampions League kwibala ekuthiwa yiPrince Moulay Abdellah Stadium izolo ebusuku. ICasablanca iwuphumelele umdlalo wayizolo ngo’1-0, lo nto yathathe ukuthi iCasablanca iyalingana neSundowns ephumelele ngo’1-0 umdlalo wokuqala eLucas Moripe Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo. Kuye kwanyanzeleka umdlalo uye kumapenela – kulapho iDowns ibethwe khona. 
Ukubethwa kweMamelodi Sundowns kuthetha ukuthi ayizukwazi ukuyikhusela indebe yeCaf Champions League eyiphumelele okokuqala kunyaka ophelileyo (ngo-2016). Konke okwenzekileyo akwenzekanga ingazamana iSundowns – kodwa umqeqeshi wayo ukhala ngomncedisi kasompempe njengonobangela wokubethwa kweqela lakhe izolo. “Ndicinga ukuba sabethwa ePitoli ngoba kwathiwa silalele izihlandlo ezithathu zonke. Usompempe ukhale ngoba silalele kwabe kungenjalo. Ngesifake amagowuli amathathu njengokuba sasenzile kwiZamalek. Imbi kakhulu into eyenzeka ebholeni,” utshilo uPitso Mosimane. 
Phambi kokunduluka kwabo abadlali beDowns ekuqaleni kwale veki, bebesazi kakuhle okokuba kufuneka badlalele ukuphumelela umdlalo endaweni yokukhusela abakufumene kumdlalo weveki ephelileyo ngoba ukudlalela kude nekhaya akululanga. “Ndicinga ukuba sidlalela kakuhle emdlalweni. Besizokudlala apha, hayi ukuhlala emva – ngelishwa ke amapenela aphunyelelwa nokuba ngubani. Sidlale ngokuzimisela apha ngoba besingoyiki ukubethwa kwaye bebephantsi koxinizelelo. Bebengakwazi nangoku ukukhupha ibhola emhlabeni wabo – kodwa badlale kakuhle kwisiqingatha sokuqala,” utshilo uPitso emva komdlalo.

headline: Makazole Mapimpi: Uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks
text:
UMakazole Mapimpi ngomnye wabadlali ababonakalisileyo ukubanesakhono kwezi sizini zimbini zidlulileyo.  
Lo mdlali wenza ezibukwayo kwiSouthern Kings nakwiCheetahs ngokulandelelana. Kunyaka ophelileyo, uMapimpi unkqonkqoze kumaBhokobhoko emva kokudlala umbhoxo ophucukileyo.  
Ukudlala kwakhe kakuhle uMapimpi kumvulele ithuba kwiSharks emtyikityileyo. 
Nangona kucaca icala nje xa elinikiwe ithuba kwiSharks, uMapimpi udlale imidlalo emine.  
Ulele emgceni kwimidlalo emithathu kwelithoba edlalwe liqela lakhe kwiSuper Rugby. Lo mdlali uthi uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks.  
“Uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks. Sikhuphisana ngendawo enye sibaninzi,” utshilo. 
Le ndedeba ithi inoloyiko lokuba ukungadlali qho kunganciphisa amathuba wayo okudlalela iqela loMzantsi Afrika lombhoxo.  
“Kunyaka ophelileyo ndidlale kwiqela leSA A – kodwa ukungadlali rhoqo kuza kuwanciphisa amathuba okuba ndibizwe kwakhona,” itshilo le nzalelwane yaseTsholomnqa. 
UMapimpi, 27, ukholelwa kwelokuba le mingeni ajongene nayo iza kumenza abe ngumdlali ongcono.  
“Asikaqhelani kakuhle nomqeqeshi weSharks. Yenye into endiqonda ibangela ukuba ndingadlali qho. Imicelimngeni iyamkhulisa umntu, nam ke ndiyakholelwa ukuba iza kundikhulisa,” utshilo uMapimpi. 
Eli tyendyana aliyilibali inkxaso eliyifumana kubalandeli bombhoxo. “Ndiyayibulela inkxaso yabo abalandeli,” uvale ngatshoyo uMapimpi. 
Imidlalo equka amaqela aseMzantsi Afrika kwitumente yeSuper Rugby kule mpelaveki: ILions indendwela iHurricanes e-AAMI Park ngemizuzu engamashumi amabini anesihlanu phambi kweyeshumi kusasa.  
IStomers singquzulana neBulls eNewlands, ngemizuzu emihlanu emva kwentsimbi yesithathu emva kwemini.  
ISharks ziqubisana neeHighlanders, eThekwini, ngemizuzu emihlanu emva kwentsimbi yesixhenxe malanga. Yonke le midlalo iza kudlala ngoMgqibelo umhla wesihlanu kwekaCanzibe.

headline: Uzifumana phi iinkqubo zakho zikamabonakude ngeli xesha lebhola?
text:
INDEBE yeHlabathi yebhola ekhatywayo ( 2018 FIFA World Cup ) iyaqala namhlanje uLwesine umhla we14 kweyeSilimela 2018 kwilizwe laseRussia. Oku kuthetha ukuba iinkqubo zesiqhelo zeSABC1 ziza kuphazamiseka ngenxa yale tumente. 
ISkeem Saam, iGenerations kwakunye noUzalo kuza kunyanzeleka zithuthele kwiSABC2 neSABC3 ngethuba lokuqhuba kolu khuphiswano de kube ngumhla we15 kweyeKhala. Amaxesha esiqhelo wona awatshintshwanga. 
SKEEM SAAM – Sithuthela kwiSABC2 ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesithandathu ukususela ngomso uLwesihlanu umhla we15 kweyeSilimela. 
GENERATIONS: THE LEGACY – Ithuthela kwiSABC3 ngentsimbi yesibhozo ukususela namhlanje uLwesine umhla we14 kweyeSilimela. 
UZALO – Luza kudlala kwiSABC2 ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesibhozo ukususela ngomso umhla we15 kweyeSilimela. 
IGenerations iza kufuduka kuqala ngenxa yosasazo lomsitho wokuvula iNdebe yeHlabathi namhlanje uLwesine. 
Lo msitho wokuvula uza kusasazwa ngqo kwiSABC1 ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga, nto eza kwenza kuchaphazeleke iinkqubo zesiqhelo. Umsitho wokuvula uya kulandelwa ngumdla wokuqala phakathi kweRussia neSaudi Arabia ukuqala ngentsimbi yesihlanu. 
Ubume beenkqubo ngomhla we14 kweyeSilimela: 
15:00 Umsitho wokuvula 
16:00 Build-Up 
17:00 Umdlalo uyaqala

headline: Ezimnyama zimenye Amakhosi phambi kwendimbane yabalandeli bebhola eFNB Stadium namhlanje
text:
Ezimnyama zimenye Amakhosi phambi kwendimbane yabalandeli bebhola emdlalweni weCarling Black Label obuvutha bhe eFNB Stadium ngenjikalanga yanamhlanje. Emdlalweni ewudlale kakuhle kakhulu, i-Orlando Pirates ibethe iKaizer Chiefs ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni (2-0). Amgowuli amahle afakwe ngu-Augustine Mulenga noThembinkosi Lorch kwisiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo. Amabhakaniya asilawule isiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo ngokupheleleyo – kodwa iChiefs yona idlale isiqingatha sesibini ngcono. UJuctice Chabalala, uHappy Jele, uMthokozisi Dube no-Innocent Maela badlale kakuhle emva – kodwa kubekho ukuhexa phaya naphaya emdlalweni wabo phantsi koxinizelelo kwisigaba sesibini. UDaniel Cardoso, uEric Mathoho noLorenzo Gordinho ngabona badlali abebexakekile emdlalweni ngenxa kaLorch, uMulenga noVincent Pule abebephuma izithuba befunt’ ebilapha. Abalandeli bePirates baza kuvula isizini bonwabileyo emva kokuba iqela labo libethe iChiefs emdlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup ka-2019 obunamathuba macala omabini. 
Umdlalo utake iintlantsi zisuka. Omabini amaqela adlale ibhola entle futhi kubonakala ukuba afuna ukufaka amagowuli. Unozinti wePirates, uWayne Sandilands, uvale ibhola emzuzwini wokuqala womdlalo. Khange kube kudala, EzikaMagebhula zihlasele ngamandla zisebenzisa uThembinkosi Lorch no-Augustine Mulenga – kodwa iinzame zabo abo badlali ziphazanyiswe ngu-Eric Mathoho. Umdlali wasemva weChiefs, uDaniel Cardoso, ukhabe ibhola ngobuchule esendaweni entle – kodwa ibanjiwe nguSandilands. Khange kube kudala, uMulenga wabhakuzelise umnatha ngebhola entle emva kwempazamo eyenziwe nguBruce Bvuma noGordinho emva. ULazarous Kambole uphose ithuba elihle ebhokisini emva kokunikelwa ibhola entle nguRamahlwe Mphahlele – odlalelwe kakuhle nguDumisani Zuma noKhama Billiat. UThembinkosi Lorch ubhalisile ebhodini igowuli lesibini elihle ethe qelele. Emva kokonzakala kukaMphahlele, uReeve Frosler ungenile endaweni yakhe. 
Abalandeli bePirates bafake uFortune Makaringe endaweni kaLorch obeyiphethe mbengwana iChiefs kwisigaba sokuqala. Kanti wona Amakhosi afake uKabelo Mahlasela endaweni kaSiphelele Ntshangase. Amaqela omabini athathe umdlalo awunyusela kwinqanaba eliphezulu. ULeonardo Castro wonzakele efika ebaleni emva kokungqutya nguJustice Chabalala. Phambi kokuphuma kwakhe, uKhama Billiat ukhabe imbumbulu yebhola etyhilizwe ngeminwe yesandla uSandilands odlalela kakuhle kakhulu kwizigaba zomdlalo zozibini. Abuye ngamandla Amakhosi emva kokwenza iinguqu eziliqela. UNurkovic noManyama bafike bashukumisa umdlalo – kodwa uChabalala noHappy Jele bacime yonke loo ntlantsi. UGabadinho Mhango, ongene kwisigaba sesibini, ukhe walifumana ithuba – kodwa akakwazi ukulisebenzisa. Endaweni yokunikela ugxa wakhe, uMakaringe ukhethe ukuzikhabela ibhola ephume ecaleni. Iphumelele iPirates ngo’2-0 
  
Kaizer Chiefs: Bruce Bvuma, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Daniel Cardoso, Eric Mathoho, Lorenzo Gordinho, George Maluleka, Siphelele Ntshangase, Khama Billiat, Dumisani Zuma, Bernard Parker, Lazarous Kambole. 
Orlando Pirates: Wayne Sandilands, Mthokozisi Dube, Happy Jele, Justice Chabalala, Innocent Maela, Ben Motshwari, Thembinkosi Lorch, Vincent Pule, Luvuyo Memela, Augustine Mulenga, Justin Shonga.

headline: “Sifumene abadlali abatsha nabazimisele ukuyinceda iChippa United”
text:
East London –  Njengokuba isiqalo sesizini entsha sisondela, phantse onke amaqela adlala kwiPSL asemaphethelweni amalungiselelo awo. UDan “Dance” Malesela, obuyele kwiChippa United njengomqeqeshi ekupheleni kwesizini egqithileyo, kulindeleke avavanye abadlali bakhe abatsha xa iqela lakhe lidibana neFree State Stars kumdlalo wesibini weMaizer Cup ngentsimbi yeshumi elinambini emini ngomso eJames Motlatsei Stadium. IiChilli Boys ziyinxalenye yeMaize Cup kulo nyaka equka amanye amaqela aquka iKaizer Chiefs neBuya Msuthu edlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League. Iqela likaDance lingafumana uvavanyo olufudumeleyo mhlawumbi neChiefs ukuba omabini la maqela akwazile ukuphumelela imidlalo yawo yokuqala. 
Kutshanje abaphathi beChippa United babonise ugxudululu lwabadlali abalishumi elinesine bonke esihlangalaleni kwinkomfa yamajelo endaba eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. Abadlali abatsha bayathembisa – kodwa bangena ezindaweni yeziqwayi zabadlali ezithengiselwe amanye amaqela yiChippa United. amagama wabadlali ngaba: Boikanyo Komane, Daine Klate, Jabulani Shongwe, Kabelo Seakanyeng, Lucky Setelele, Ludwe Mpakumpaku, Ntshuxeko Ndlovu, Ntwenhle Zondo, Ruzaigh Gamildien, Tebogo Makobela, Tebogo Tloloane, Thabo Ntethe, Thatayaone Kgamanyane, noZusakhe Sali. IChippa inethemba lokuba aba badlali bakuthi bayincede ifumane indawo kwiTop 8 kwisizini entsha okanye kubekho indebe eyifumanyo. Abadlali abathengisiweyo baquka uPaseka Mako, uLinda Mntambo, u-Abel Mabaso (bonke baye kwi-Orlando Pirates), uBuyani Sali, uBantu Mzwakali, uGift Motupa noBrighton Mhlongo bona bathathwe yiBidvest Wits. 
UDan Malesela ubamkele ngezandla ezishushu abadlali abatsha watsho esithi ucela abantu baseMpuma Koloni ukuba balixhase iqela lakhe ngokupheleleyo ukuze likwazi ukuphumeza iinjongo zalo. “Sonelisekile ngumgangatho wabadlali esibafumeneyo phambi kwesizini entsha. Ndifuna ukubulela inkxaso esiyifumene kusihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, nabaphathi beqela bonke. Sifumene abadlali abasebatsha nabazimiseleyo ukuyinceda iChippa United kwiminqweno yayo yesizini. Siyazi kumele sizimisele ukuze sibonwabise abalandeli bethu kwilizwe lonke. Asinokuwenza sodwa loo msebenzi. Sicela inkxaso kuni balandeli,” utshilo uMalesela owagxotha emva kwemidlalo emithathu qha ekuqaleni kwesini egqithileyo.

headline: Uzakuthweswa isidanga sobugqirha uRamaphosa
text:
Usekela mongameli weli uCyril Ramaphosa uzakunikwa isidanga sobugqirha kwezomthetho ngomso yiyunivesithi yaseVenda.  
Ibhunga elilawula eli ziko livumelene ngamxhelo mnye ngokunika uRamaphosa esi sidanga ngenxa yenxaxheba yakhe ngethuba kwakusungulwa umgaqosiseko weli.  
URamaphosa ukhe wasebenza nje ngengqonyela yala yunivesithi ukusukela ngonyaka ka-1997 ukuya ku-2009.  
Ngexesha lakhe kula yunivesithi ukwasetyenziswe nje ngobuso bela ziko nalapho wathi waqokelela imali ekwibhiliyoni yeerandi (R1-Billion) eyathi yasetyenziswa ukuvuselela iziseko zelaziko. 
URamaphosa ufunde isidanga somthetho kwiyunivesithi yoMzantsi Afrika emva kokuba wayegxothwe kwiyunivesithi yaseTurfloop nesele ibizwa ngokuba yiYunivesithi yaseMntla (University of the North).  
Lo kaRamaphosa wayelilungu eliphambili kumbutho wabafundi iSouth African Students Organisation (SASO) ngeloxesha. La yunivesithi kulindeleke ukuba iqhube uthweso zidanga lokugqibela kulo nyaka.

headline: UDan “Dance” Malesela uzakuhlala kwiChippa United
text:
Emva kokuphela kwesizini yePSL ka’’2016/17, abalandeli bebhola eMpuma Koloni baye bazibuza umbuzo: ingaba uzakuhlala na uDan Malesela kwiChippa United?  
IChippa United isinde cebeshu ezembeni kwisizini edlulileyo emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kwimidlalo yePSL kwizigaba zozibini zesizini.  
Ukungaqhubi kwayo kakuhle kwakhokelela ekunqunyanyisweni kukaDan Malesela ngabaphathi beChippa United. 
 Indawo yakhe yathathwa nguMbuyiselo Sambu – isekela mqeqeshi – kodwa kwathi lakubethwa iqela kwimidlalo emithathu ilandelelana, wabuyiswa uMalesela. Ekubuyeni kwakhe iiChilli Boys zabetha iSuperSport United ngo’3-0 eBhayi, zaze zabambene neFree State Stars ngeqanda kumdlalo wokugqibela. 
Ngokwengxelo yephephandaba laseGoli, izikhulu zeChippa United zigqibe kwelokuba ahlale umqeqeshi emva kokuyisindisa ezembeni.  
“Umqeqeshi uneminyaka emithathu yesivumelwano neqela, kwisizini ezayo uyabuya. Ungumqeqeshi wethu. Sesithethile naye ngemiba emininzi equka indlela yokukhangela abadlali abatsha,” utshilo uLukhanyo Mzinzi. 
Ukugqwidiza kweChippa ekuzeni kuphela kwesizini kudale unxunguphalo kakhulu kubalandeli bebhola eMpuma Koloni – kodwa baye bakhululeka emva kokulwa kwayo kwimidlalo yokugqibela.  
Nangona bekukho elo xhala – kodwa iChippa yenze inkqubela kwiNedbank Cup nakwiMTN 8 okokuqala ukusukela ngo’2010 eyafika ngaye kwiPSL. Kulindeleke abadlali babuyele enkomeni kwinyanga yeKhala. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za

headline: George Dearnaley: Ukuyibamba ixesha elide iChiefs ibe yinto enkulu kuthi
text:
Umlawuli weThe Magic FC ubaqhwabele izandla abadlali bakhe emva kokusokolisa iqela elikhulu emdlalweni weNedbank kutshanje. UGeorge Dearnaley uthw ubuyela eKapa ezingomba isifuba ngenxa yomsebenzi omhle owenziwe liqela lakhe noxa (ekugqibeleni) liye labethwa ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni (3-0) yiKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni weNedbank Cup obumhle eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngeCawe edlulileyo. Kuye kwanyanzeleka umdlalo uye kwixesha elongezelelweyo emva kokuphela (kwawo) kungekho qela elibhalisileyo ebhodini. Amakhosi ancedwe yipenela efakwe nguDaniel Cardoso emva kokuwiswa kukaKhama Billiat ebhokisini sekuphele ikhulu lonke lemizuzu emdlalweni. Amanye amagowuli amabini afakwe nguPhilani Zulu noBilliat. 
Noxa iChiefs ikwazile ukudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo weNedbank Cup – kodwa iThe Magic, edlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League, iya kuhlala ikhunjulwa njengelinye lamaqela adlala kakuhle futhi elasokolisa iChiefs. UDearnaley uvuyisene neChiefs watsho eqhwabela izandla abadlali bakhe emva komsebenzi oncomekayo abawenzileyo. “Mandithi huntshu kwiChiefs kuqala. Impumelelo ibiyifanele ngoba yiyo ebinamathuba acacileyo nekwaphose amathuba amaninzi kwimizuzu engamashumi alithoba. Sigoduka nebali elithi iqela lethu (The Magic FC) elingenayo imali nezixhobo ezifanelekileyo likwazile ukusokolisa iqela elikhulu eMzantsi Afrika imizuzu elikhulu enesihlanu. Kuthi yinto enkulu kakhulu leyo kwaye belikhona nethuba lokuyiwisa iChiefs – eyona nto ebinqwenelwa ngabantu abaninzi ngaphandle kwabalandeli beChiefs kuphela,” utshilo uDearnaley emva komdlalo. 
Umlawuli weMagic uthe bebesazi ukuba kwixesha lokuphumla; yiChiefs ebinethuba lokuphumelela umdlalo ngoba abadlali bakhe bebediniwe. “Sonwabile kakhulu ngoba abadlali bethu bebezinikele emdlalweni. Umahluko phakathi kweqela elidlala kwiMotsepe League nelidlala kwiPSL ibe kukulungela umdlalo kuphela. Besisazi ukuba kuza kubanzima kuthi xa kusiyiwa kwixesha lokuphumla. UThando Mngomeni ukhumbuze abantu abaninzi into awayeyiyo ngethuba esadlala kwiPSL, uTshepiso Tlhapi, omdala naye, udlale kakuhle. Ukubambana (ukuyisokolisa) neChiefs ixesha elide yinto enkulu kuthi. Abadlali bethu bebediniwe – kodwa ndingatsho ukuba iziphumo zomdlali azichazi ncakasana okwenzekileyo emdlalweni,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uDearnaley emva komdlalo.

headline: Libuyela enkundleni idabi leDA noMotsoeneng
text:
LIBUYELA enkundleni idabi phakathi kweDA noSABC ngelinqanda ukuqeshwa kukaHlaudi Motsoeneng njengegosa eliyintloko elibambeleyo kweli ziko losasazo lesizwe. Oku kulandela isigqibo sebhodi yakwaSABC ebonakalise ukunganiki ngqalelo kwisigqibo senkundla yezibheno ekhabe isicelo sikaMotsoeneng sokubhena isigwebo senkundla ephakamileyo yeNtshona Koloni.  
Le nkundla yagweba ngelithi ukuqeshwa kukaMotsoeneng njengegosa eliyintloo kwaSABC akukho mthethweni. Emva kokuphanza kweenzame zikaMotsoeneng, ibhodi yakwaSABC ibhalele kumphathiswa wezonxibelelwano kweli uFaith Muthambi ngelifuna inkxaso yakhe kwingqesho kaMotsoeneng njengebambela kwesi sikhundla kufanele ukuba uyasityeshela. 
Ilungu leDA ePalamente uJames Selfe uthe, “Inyathelo likaSABC yindelelo kwiinkundla zomthetho, kwaye lisishiya singenayo enye indlela ngaphandle kokuphinda sibuyele ezinkundleni.” Lo mbutho sele ubhalele kumagqwetha awo uwayalela ukuba alungise amaphepha ozakuwafaka enkundleni. USelfe uthe isigqibo sale bhodi sinyahasha amagunya omthetho kweli. 
Ukanti i-ofisi kamongameli weli uJacob Zuma ngoLwesihlanu ivakalise ukusihlonipha isigqibo seenkundla kumba ochaphazela lo kaMotsoeneng. Isithethi sikamongameli Zuma uGqirha Bongani Ngqulunga ubalule intlanganiso phakathi kukarhulumente neejaji zeli nekwavunyelwana kuyo ukuba urhulumente azihloniphe izigwebo nezithintelo eziwiswe ziinkundla zomthetho. NoMkhuseli Woluntu uThuli Madonsela ubhalele kuMuthambi ukuba asikhabe isicelo sebhodi yakwaSABC malunga noMotsoaneng.

headline: Intshatsheli ifuna into ebonakalayo ngemali yeComrades!
text:
Mva kokufinca umgama ongamashumi asibhozo anesithandathu eekhilomitha (86km) weComrades Marathon, uEdward Mothibi, uyindoda eyonwabileyo kakhulu. UMothobi ebephakathi kwamawakawaka eembaleki zehlabathi ezithathe inxaxheba kwiComrades Marathon – olona gqatso lweembaleki olude kwihlabathi – ekuseni ngeCawe egqithileyo. Umdyarho uqale eThekwini wayokuthi xhaxhe eMgungundlovi. Le mbaleki yaseMntla Ntshona ibhale iincwadi zembali ngokutsha ngokuphumelela iComrades okokuqala njengembaleki emva kokubamba indawo yesine kunyaka ophelileyo. Okwenza ukutshatshela kukaMothibi kube yinto enkulu kukuba ushiye umpondo-zihlanjiwe, uBongumusa Mthembu, ogqugqisileyo kwimidyarho emikhulu eMzantsi Afrika – iComrades neTwo Oceans Marathon. 
Khange akwazi ukuzibamba uMothibi ngenxa yemincili. Ngokuphuma phambili kwiComrades Marathon, uMothibi ifake engxoweni isiqingatha sesigidi (R500 000) namakhulu amabini amawaka erandi (R200 000) kuba eyimbaleki yaseMzantsi Afrika eqale yafika eScottsville Racecourse, eMgungundlovu. Ukufumana isityhwentywe semali kuthetha ukuthi uMothibi ufumene ithuba lokuguqula ubomi bakhe. Khange azifihlele iintatheli emva komdyarho okokuba yena ufuna ukuzenzela into ebonakalayo ngemali yeComrades ngoba ikhono lokubaleka lifutshane. “Abantu basekhaya kubavuyise kakhulu ukuphumelela kwam. Kunyaka ophelileyo ndaye ndathenga indlu. Ndizimisele ukuyibhatala ndiyigqibe ngemali yeComrades ngoba sonke siyazi ukubaleka ngumsebenzi ophelayo,” utshilo uMothibi weNedbank Running Club. 
Ibinguwashiywa nowashiywa phakathi kukaMothibi noMthembu ngethuba ukuya entanjeni – kodwa uMothibi uthi ugqibe kwelokuba ancekelele kunzima. Lo nto imsebenzele ngoba ukwazile ukumshiya ngamendu uMthembi emva kokugqitha iLittle Pollys. Ndithe xa ndibona ukuba uMthembu uvula umsanta, ndiye ndathi kuphelile ngam – kodwa ndiye ndathi mandingaphel’amandla. Ndithe ndiyabona umsantsa uvalekile ndabe ndisenamandla. Ndinyuka eqhineni, ndikhumbule okokuba kwakuthiwe kulapho kufuneka umntu anyuse isantya khona ngoba sube sekukufutshane entanjeni,” utshilo uMothibi. Kamanenekazi, kuphumelele uGerda Steyn.

headline: Iphulo lokunceda abantwana baseRhini
text:
Liqhutywe ngempumelelo iphulo lokunceda abantwana baseRhini elibizwa ngokuba yiTAG A CHILD THIS WINTER.  
Eli phulo liqale kwiinyanga nje ezimbini ezidlulileyo kulo nyaka sikuwo, kwaye sele lincede ngezilamba abantwana abangathathi ntweni baseRhini abangapha kwekhulu. 
Umsunguli weli phulo uAshia Nkontsa ebambisene Nompumezo Makinana uthi, ngokubona kwabo imeko yabantwana abatsala nzima kumakhaya abo kube kukho nabo bathatha entweni babe bekwisikolo esinye akukho mnandi.  
Uthi ukubona imeko yabanye babantwana abafundela kuyo kumagumbi angenazifestile, iminyango kwanombane beqhaqhazela yingqele kuko okwabachukumisayo. 
“Siye saqalisa ukufuna uncedo kuluntu apho besiqokelela izilamba siqokelela abo bafundi bangenako. Uluntu luzile neempahla abangasazisebenzisiyo bethenga nakwivenkile ezifikelelayo bethengela abantwana. Sakwazi nokufikelela kweli nani sasinalo besijonge lona.”utshilo uNkontsa 
Uthi ngethuba beyokunikeza ngezi zilamba kubantwana esikolweni zange banikeze nje kuphela ngeempahla, baye babanika namazwi enkuthazo bamamela bebanika ithuba nangezinto abanqwenela ukuba zizo ekukhuleni kwabo. 
“Ibeyindima echukumisayo ke leyo ukumamela bona ingakumbi ukubona intwazana evele yalila ngethuba sibomeleza, kwachukumiseka nootitshala babo. Eli ayizukubaliphulo elinye lizakuqhubekeka ukunceda abo basokolayo.” 
abongile.ginya@inl.co.za

headline: Kufuneka aqale ekuqaleni umqeqeshi weChippa United
text:
Nangona iChippa United ingakwazi ukuphumelela imidlalo ebaleni – kodwa ayinantanga kwicala lokutshintshatshintsha abaqeqeshi.  
Ekuqaleni kwale veki, uNorman Mapeza, waziswe njengomqeqeshi wayo omtsha. Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba uMnu.  
Siviwe Mpengesi esuse esikhundleni uDuran Francis obebambele emidlalweni emibini qha. Kwiiveki ezimbalwa, uMpengesi unike uphum’aphele uClinton Larsen emva kwemidlalo emihlanu.  
UMapeza kuthiwa utyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho seminyaka emithathu engumqeqeshi.  
Kwiminyaka yangaphambili, uMapeza uzenzele igama ebholeni kumaqela afana ne-Ajax Cape Town, iCAPS United FC neFC Platinum – kodwa ukutshintsha izinto kwiChippa United yinto wonke ubani olandela ibhola ekhatywayo afuna ukuyibona. 
UMpengesi uvakalise uvuyo lwakhe ngethuba esazisa umqeqeshi wakhe omtsha. 
 “Siyakuvuyela ukuba nomqeqeshi ofana noMapeza ngoba ungumqeqeshi ohlonitshwayo ngoogxa bakhe ebholeni ekhatywayo.  
Uza namava esicinga ukuba aya kukhuthaza abadlali,” ucatshulwe ngaloo mazwi uMpengesi ngamajelo eendaba.  
OkaMapeza uthatha iqela elitsala nzima futhi elinabadlali abaphazamisekileyo ezingqondweni ngenxa yokutshintshwa kwabaqeqeshi okungenasiphelo.  
IChippa ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesihlanu kwiPSL kwaye isakhangela impumelelo yayo emva kokudlala imidlalo esibhozo.  
Ebusuku bangoLwesibini kule veki, uMbuyiselo Sambu obelibambela mqeqeshi, ugoduke ephoxekile emva kokuba iChippa ibethwe ngo’1-0 yiBidvest Wits emdlalweni obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium. 
USambu uzobe umfanekiso weqela elinabadlali abangazithembanga ngenxa yezinto ezenzeka eqeleni.  
Lo nto ithetha ukuthi uMapeza uza kusokola ngoba kufuneka aqale phantsi kodwa ke unexesha ngoba imidlalo isathe nqumama. 
 “Asiwuqalanga kakuhle umdlalo ngoba ukuzithemba kwabadlali kuphantsi.  
Iqela lidlale ngcono kwisiqingatha sesibini, kude kwakho nemingqandandana yamathuba.  
Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba silungisa ubume beengqondo zabadlali ngoba igowuli elingeneyo emdlalweni libangelwe kukulahleka kwengqiqo yabo sekuphela ixesha,” utshilo uSambu.

headline: UMHLOLOKAZI OLIDLOLOKAZI : NguThixo onesitshixo sesibeleko
text:
UKUQUBISANA noxhatshazo lwabasemzini, ubulolo, uqalo olutsha kwaneengxaki zempilo – zezinye zezinto ofunda ngazo kwincwadi kaUnathi Mkabile ethi UMHLOLOKAZI OLIDLOLOKAZI – THE BARREN WIDOW. 
UMkabile ngumhlolokazi wemvumi yeGospile engasekhoyo uMfundis’ uNkomfa Mkabile. 
Incwadi yalo mhlolokazi , ibalisa ngoxhatshazo athi amanina alufumane xa ethe ala ukuphila ngendlela efunwa luluntu. 
“Le ncwadi iza nethemba kwaye iphilisa abo bahambe le ndlela sele ndiyihambile,” kutsho uMkabile encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Le nkosikazi ithi le ncwadi iza kukhulula loo makhosikazi anzinyelwe kukufumana abantwana ukuze angazivi engengomanina ngokupheleleyo. 
“Abahlolokazi nabo baza kufunda ngoko bahlangabezene nako kwaye bafumane amandla kule ncwadi,” kutsho uMkabile. 
UMkabile uthi kususela oko washiywa ngumyeni wakhe, uMfundis’ uNkomfa, kunzima ukuqhubekeka nobomi. 
“Ndiye ndajongelwa phantsi, ndathukwa kwaye ndisisigculelo kwizigqubu zentlebendwane kuba ndingazali. 
” Abantu bandijajile. Bendibeka amabala. Bendixelela indlela ekufanele ndibuphile ngayo ubomi bam. Ndakungenzi ngendlela yabo, bandiphatha ngathi andingomntu. 
“Bekukho amaxesha ndibakholelwe. Oko kuye kwangcono ngethuba ndiqokelela iingceba zam ezophukileyo, ndazidibanisa ngokuzithanda nokuzithemba,” kutsho lo mhlolokazi. 
Uthi ngethuba egalela umhlaba kwibhokisi yomyeni wakhe, inxenye yobomi bakhe yasala kweloo ngcwaba, enqwenela ukungcwatywa naye. 
” Ndandindindisholo, ndilahlekile kwaye ndisentlungwini. Ndaziva ndilahliwe kwaye ndingathandwa. Ndandinqwenela ngathi ndingangcwatywa naye,” kutsho uMkabile. 
Uyavuma ukuba uyifumene inkxaso nentuthuzelo kusapho nezihlobo. 
“Kodwa inxeba lalinzulu. Ndaye ndabhitya, ndingatyi. Ndandihlala ndilila – ndihlala phambi komabonakude iiyure ngeeyure ndingasuki. Ndivalela ngaphandle abantu abaninzi babezama ukuzisondeza kum.” 
UMam’ uMkabile uthi ngamanye amaxesha wayeziva enomsindo kumyeni wakhe ngokumshiya. 
” Kwakuneentsuku endandizifumana ndinomsindo kuNkomfa ngokundishiya. 
Izinto esasizicwangcise kunye zazitshatyalaliswe kukusweleka kwakhe. Andinakube ndibe nabantwana bakhe. Andikwazi kuba nabantwana. Oku kwandenza ndilijonge ngelinye iliso ilizwe. Kwafuneka ndibuqale ekuqaleni ubomi,” kubalisa lo mbhali woMhlolokazi Olidlolokazi. 
UMkabile uthi ukuthandaza nokwabelana ngebali lakhe nabo badlule kubunzima obufana nobakhe kwamnceda kakhulu.” 
“Andinazo iimpendulo kwiingxaki zakho zonke. Kodwa zithande, kuba usesona sipho uThixo akuphe sona,” kutsho uMkabile. 
“Akuyiyo le nto bathi abantu uyiyo, kodwa uyile nto athi uThixo uyiyo. 
Phakama  ngaphaya kwezithuko, intlungu nokuphoxeka. NguThixo yedwa onesitshixo sesibeleko. Nokuba uyakwazi ukuba nabantwana okanye akukwazi, kodwa usenguye umama,” kuvala uMkabile. 
Incwadi kaUnathi Mkabile ifumaneka ngokutsalela kule nombolo: 0604223964

UMHLOLOKAZI OLIDLOLOKAZI 
Instagram: 
THE BARREN WIDOW

headline: AmaBhokobhoko anomdlal’ onzima, eGqeberha!
text:
AmaBhokobhoko azichithile iintente zawo eKapa emva kokubetha amaNgesi ngempelaveki egqithileyo ayokuzigxumeka eGqeberha – apho aqale khona amalungiselelo weCastle Lager Rugby Championship. Oku kwenzeka kakuhle emva kokuba uMzantsi Afrika uziqaqambise ngokubetha iBritish & Irish Lions ngo’19-16 emdlalweni obunzima eCape Town Stadium. UMorne Steyn noChelsin Kolbe babe ngamaqhawe emva kokukhulula AmaBhokobhoko abethe kowonna mdlalo obalulekileyo. Agoduke ephaca kwakhona amaNgesi – kodwa enawo umdlalo awuphumeleleyo phambi kokubethwa kwemibini. Ngoku iqela likaJacques Nienaber, ozingomba isifuba emva kokuzuza indebe yakhe yokuqala exhuzula imikhala, liza kudibana namane amaqela alushica afana neNew Zealand, iArgentina ne-Australia emidlalweni yeRugby Champioship. 
Abadlali abafana noRG Snyman, uDuane Vermuelen, uRosko Specman, uJaden Hendrikse noJohan Grobbelaar basenkampini yeSpringbok nabo. Ethetha ngokubetha amaNgesi nangokulindeleke kwiqela lakhe xa lidibana ne-Argentina emdlalweni wovavanyo wokuqala ngoMgqibelo, uNienaber uthethe wenjenje: “Siyazingca ngokuphumelela iCastle Lager Lions Series – kodwa ngoku sinomnye umsebenzi osimeleyo. Yonke into esiyenzayo enkampini yethu kufuneka iqinise umsebenzi esiza kuwenza ngoMgqibelo. Sinemidlalo ebalulekileyo eNelson Mandela Bay phambi kokuntingela kwelase-Australia – apho siza kudlala umlenze wesibini. Okubalulekileyo kuthi ngoku kukuthatha apho siyeke khona emidlalweni egqithileyo. 
Songeze abanye abadlali ngoba sikhangela indlela yokuqinisa indlela esidlala ngayo sikwazi nokuphumza abanye abadlali,” utshilo uNienaber. Kanti naye uKapteni weSpringbok, uSiya Kolisi, uliqhwabele izandla iqela elibethe amaNgesi watsho ebalula kakhulu indima eyenziwe nguLukhanyo Am, uWillie le Roux noChelsin Kolbe. “UChelsin ngumdlali owasebenzisa kakuhle amathuba awafumanayo. Siyazingca kakhulu ngomsebenzi wakhe. Kodwa kufuneka sibancome nabantu abaze nebhola uLukhanyo noWillie. Ndibaqhwabela izandla oogxa bam ngoba benze umsebenzi omhle ngexesha elinzima emdlalweni. Okuhle ngeqela esinalo kukuba wonke umntu usebenza ngokuzimisela,” utshilo uKolisi.

headline: Imbali kwiHighlands Park ngokungena kwiMTN 8
text:
Kwenzeke imbali kule veki ebholeni ekhatywayo eMzantsi Afrika ngethuba iHighlands Park ingena kwisigaba sokugqibela seMTN 8 emva kokubetha iPolokwane City ngo’4-3 kumapenela emdlalweni obubanjelwe eMakhulong Stadium.  
Kokokuqala iHighlands Park ifumana ithuba lokulwela indebe kwiPSL ukusukela oko yathi yanyuselwa kunyaka ophelileyo. 
 Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, ukuqeqeshwa ngumqeqeshi onamava ebholeni njengomntu ofana no-Owen Da Gama,  
kuyincedile iHighlands Park nakubeni ukuqokelela kwayo abadlali abanesakhono, abazimiseleyo nabanamava ingezozinto ezinokusengelwa phantsi.  
Endleleni yeHighlands eya emdlalweni wokugqibela wolona khuphiswano olunomtsalane, iMTN 8, iguqise phantsi amaqela ahlonitshwayo njengeCape Town City ngo2-0, yalandelisa ngeOrlando Pirates ngo’1-0 phambi kwePolokwane City egolozileyo emdlalweni emibini ephele kungafakwanga igowuli kuyo. 
UDa Gama, obemincile ngethuba kukhatywa amapenela, uzamkele iziphumo zomdlalo kodwa wavuma ngelithi iqela lakhe lisokole.  
Ngoku iHighlands Park iza kuzama ukuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo emdlalweni weAbsa Premiership eza kudibana kuwo neBaroka FC ngentsimbi yesithathu ngeCawe ePeter Mokaba Stadium.  
Emidlalweni emine eyidlalileyo iHighlands Park, idlale ntanganye kwemibini, iphumelele kanye phambi kokubethwa komnye.  
Yona iBaroka idlale imidlalo emihlanu. Ibethwe kabini, yadlala ntanganye kwemibini yaze yaphumelela komnye umdlalo. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoMgqibelo: Polokwane City vs SuperSport United @Old Peter Mokhaba Stadium, 15:00;  
Stellenbosch vs Black Leopards @Athlone Stadium, 15:00; Chippa United vs Bloemfontein Celtic @Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 15:00; 
 Mamelodi Sundowns vs Maritzburg United @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 18:00;  
Bidvest Wits vs Orlando Pirates@Moses Mabhida Stadium, 20:15 
NgeCawe: Cape Town City vs Golden Arrows@Cape Town Stadium, 15:00;  
Baroka FC vs Highlands Park@Peter Mokaba Stadium, 15:00

headline: UKambole uyihlangule iChiefs ixinaniselwe liqela laseNtshona Koloni
text:
Amakhosi aye anyanzeleka amkele umnqongo wenqaku emva kokuba engakwazanga ukuyoyisa iStellenbosch elwileyo emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ophele ngo’1-1 e-Orlando Stadium. Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu, iqela laseNtshona Koloni ilelona lihlaselayo. USiphelele Ntshangase, onikwe ithuba elimnqabeleyo lokuqala umdlalo namhlanje, ebebotshwe noWillard Katsande esiswini – emva kufakwe uSiyabonga Ngezane endaweni ka-Eric Mathoho obengekho ngenxa yamakhadi amaninzi. ULee Langeveldt ngunozinti wokuqala osebenzileyo emdlalweni emva kokubamba ibhola ebikhatywe nguReeve Frosler. Kuye kwanyanzeleka umqeqeshi weChiefs enze utshintsho olukhawulezileyo emva kokuba uLeonardo Catsro eye wonzakala emdlalweni usaqala. Indawo yakhe ithathwe nguSamir Nurkovic ongazukudlala kwiveki ezayo emva kokufumana ikhadi elityheli namhlanje. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iStellenbosch iphala phambili ngegowuli elihle elifakwe nguLeletu Skelem ngentloko emva kokufumana ibhola ku-Ashley Du Preez oshiye amadoda weChiefs elele phantsi. Ihlasele iChiefs macala onke – kodwa abadlali beStellenbosch bebethe qwa emva begadwe nguLangeveldt. Ekuqaleni kwesigaba sesibini, uMiddendorp ufake uLazarous Kambole, uKgotso Moleko noDumisani Zuma, ekhupha uNtshangase, uKhama Billiat noSiphesihle Ntiya-Ntiya. Umdlalo uye watshintsha ngokwenene. UKambole uye wayihlangula iChiefs ngegowuli emzuzwini wamashumi amahlanu anesibhozo kwisigaba sesibini. Amakhosi asilawule ngokupheleleyo isigaba sesibini somdlalo – kodwa into ayivinjwe yiStellenbosch ligowuli engeliqinisekise impumelelo yawo. Nangona kunjalo, Amakhosi asephezulu, ashiya iMamelodi Sundowns ngamanqaku amathandathu.

headline: NWELEZELANGA-The Star Child:  Ingantoni le ncwadi?
text:
Kwakukho isinyanya esifuna ukuzalwa, sizokugqithisa umyalezo kubantu abaphilayo abasemhlabeni.  
Kweliny’ icala kukho umama ongafumani bantwana uNokwakha, owenyukayo waya entabeni eyokuthandaza kuQamata ukuba afumane abantwana. 
Ukuzalwa kwalo mntwana, kwakusaziwa ziingwevu ekuhlaleni, kodwa iyinto efihlakeleyo emabalini abaliswayo. Abantu abasebenza ngobumnyama okanye abathakathi, nabo babesazi ukuba kukho umntwana onje ozayo, befuna ukuyinqanda loo nto, kuba besazi uzokuthini. Basebenzisana nomama oncedisa ukubelekisa abo bakhulelweyo, ngelithi umntwana omhlophe ngokugqithisileyo (albino) uyabulawa kuba sisiqalekiso.  
Uthe akuzalwa umntwana, wazalwa eyi-Albino. Umama ongumbelekisi waxelela umama womntwana ukuba, ukuzala umntwana okwesi simo sisiqalekiso. Baye bavumelana ukuba bamphose emanzini, benjenjalo ngokwenene, bajika emva kwesi senzo bagoduka. 
 Kwelinye icala ngezantsi kwalo mlambo kwakukho mama uthile, owayeyokuthandaza, ethandazela imvula, wayesele eneentsuku ezisithoba ezilile, engafaki kutya emlonyeni, efuna izityalo zakhe zifumane imvula. 
 Iye yanetha imvula, wadibana nomntwana lowo edada kuloo manzi, wamthabatha wagoduka naye.  
Uqala apho umdla webali elibizwa ‘’Nwelezelanga-The Star Child’’. Ipapashwe ngabakwa Jacana Media, kwaye sele isunguliwe kwiidolophu ezifana neTlokwe kunye neRhawuti. Elinye icala kule ncwadi, libonisa uNwelezelanga ephila kolwa sapho lumchole lwamkhulisa, kwelinye icala sibonisa okuqhubeke kumama owazala umntwana nalowo wayembelekisa.  
Ngokunjalo sive okuzakuqhubeka xa kudibana ezi ntsapho zimbini, icala lomama owabeleka umntwana, nelo lalowo wakhulisa umntwana. Leyo yincwadi ebhalwe sisandla sika-Unathi Magubeni equlethe izahluko ezingama-20.  
Xa simbuza ngengcamango yeli bali uthe: “Kunzima ukutsho lisuka phi, ndingathi sisiphiwo. Eli libali belifuna ukubaliswa, lelexesha elo siphila kulo. Lisuka kubantu abangaphezulu kum okanye izinyanya,” utshilo.  
UMagubeni uzalelwe eN.U.2 eMdantsane nalapho enze khona amabanga aphantsi naphezulu. Wenze izifundo zeManagement Technology kwiYunivesithi yaseCape Peninsula Technology. 
 Ebalisa ngothando lwakhe lokubhala, uMagubeni uthe: “Ndaqala ngexesha lokubhalelana iileta, ndaze ndangena ekubhaleni imibongo neyayiman’ukupapashwa.” Imisebenzi kaMagubeni yemibhalo yemibongo sithetha nje ikumathala amaninzi kweli jikelele. 
 UMagubeni, nokwaligqirha, uthi ukubhala kwakuyinto emkhathazayo, neyayimtshisa ixesha elininzi. Incwadi yakhe yokuqala yango-2010 nguShades of Black, nathi ayizange iqhube kakuhle. Incwadi ebhalwe ngo2015 uNwelezelanga-The Star Child akhange kube lula ukuyipapasha. “Azange ndityhafe ukulwela ukuba mayipapashwe nangona kwakunzinyana nje.”  
UMagubeni ukholelwa ekubeni abantu bangayitolika ngeendlela zabo ezohlukeneyo le ncwadi. UNwelezelanga usungulwe ngomhla we-28 kuTshazimpuzi 2016, kwaye iyafumaneka kwiivenkile ezithengisa iincwadi.  
Incwadi ifumaneka ngolwimi lwesiNgesi, ecacisa ngoku: “UChinua Achebe wathi, ‘yasibona esi siNgesi basifundisa sona, sakwenza izinto ezingazange zabonwa ngaso, sakubalisa amabali angazange abaliswe ngaso.” Uthi ababhali abaziingcali zolwimi lwesiXhosa bamkelekile ukuyiguqulela esiXhoseni.  
Abo bafuna uku-odola le ncwadi, bangathumela imbalelwano ye-email ku: sales@jacana.co.za

headline: OwaseMthatha ufumen’ ithuba kwiGenerations
text:
EMVA kokubukelwa nguMbongeni Ngema edlala kumdlalo weqonga iSarafina eKapa, oko kwaba sisiqalo somdla wokulingisa kwityendyana laseMthatha, uSivuyile Titi.  
Ukususela ngoko, uTiti, 26, onkaba iseXhongorha kwaMbozwana, wafuna ukuzibonakalisa nangakumbi kwicala lokulingisa.  
Emva kokuxelela uNgema ukuba ufuna ukulingisa kwimidlalo kamabonakude, wagqiba kwelokufudukela eRhawutini, apho afike wabhalisa igama lakhe ngokudlala iindinyana ezincinane kwimidlalo emikhulu efana ne-7de Laan, The Queen nakwiThe Imposter. 
 Kwezi ntsukwana zizayo siza kubona uTiti edlala indinyana engephi kwiGenerations – The Legacy, ekudala enqwenela ukudlala kuyo. I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole noTiti exakekile elungiselela ukuya kwiseti yeGenerations, nalapho avakalise ukuba ufile yimincili.  
“Kudala ndinomnqweno wokuba phaya kwiGenerations, ndithandazela ibe yindima enkulu. Ndinemincili, andazi nokuba ndithini!” kuvakalisa uTiti, watsho esithi ubulela usapho lwakhe ngokumxhasa. “ 
Ndibulela inkxaso kusapho lwaMaMpinga, ooDlamini, ooTolo nooMbanjwa,” kutsho uTiti enovuyo.  
Uthi nangona le ndima ayifumene kwiGenerations ingenkulu kuyaphi kodwa ibonakala inkulu kuye. Kulo mdlalo uthi uza kuba ngomnye wabafundi abafunda noNontle noMelokuhle kwaye babonakala bexakekile besenza iprojekthi yesikolo. 
 “Kudala ndayinqwenela le nto ndisakhula,” kutsho uTiti.  
Uthi ubulela nakwi-M Agency eyabona isakhono kuye. Kulindeleke abonakale kwiveki yesibini kuJuni kwiGenerations.  
IGenerations-The Legacy idlala ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesihlanu ngentsimbi yesibhozo ngokuhlwa kwiSABC1.

headline: Yintoni imfihlelo kaShalulile oxakileyo kwiDStv Premiership?
text:
Abadlali basemva kumaqela ohlukeneyo kwiDStv Premiership abalali buhlayo xa beza kudlala neMamelodi Sundowns ngenxa kaPeter Shalulile – ofaka amagowuli ngendlela emangalisayo. UShalulile, 27, ufike kwiSundowns ekuqaleni kwesizini eqhubekayo emva kokuthengwa kwiHighlands Park ngenxa yeliso lamagowuli analo. Ngoku uthe chatha kwiDowns. Akoneli nje ekuwafakeni amagowuli, ukwaluncedo kwabanye abadlali ebaleni. 
Kule sizini, le ndedeba yaseNamibia seyibhakuzelise umnatha izihlandlo ezisixhenxe kwiDStv Premiership kuphela. Ngenxa yokusebenza kakuhle, uShalulile uthiwe jize ngewonga lomdlali wenyanga ekuqaleni kwale veki. Oku kwenzeka emva kokuba uShalulile efake igowuli elincede iSundowns ebethe iTP Mazembe ngo’2-1 kokwayo emdlalweni weCaf Champions League kwiveki egqithileyo. Umbuzo: yintoni imfihlelo kaShalulile? 
“Xa ndithetha inyaniso, ayikokuzilolonga neqela nje kuphela – nam ndisebenza ngokuzimisela ngamaxesha onke,” utshilo uShalulile. “Apho ndisuka khona, nalapha kwiSundowns; mna ndiyashiyeka ejimini emva kokuba iqela ligqibile kuba ndifuna ukuzilola. Soze ndiyiyeke lo nto ngoba yiyo endenze ndabukhali kanje.” 
Nangona esebenza ngokukhuthala uShakulile – kodwa ukungqongwa ngabadlali abasemgangathweni ophezulu kunegalelo kwindlela aqhubangayo. “Ndisemtsha kwiDowns. Ndisafunda futhi ndisoloko ndizixelela ukuba mandilivuze iqela ngokundinika ithuba. Into endikhuthazayo kukuba ndingqongwe ngabadlali abandikhuthazayo nabandithembayo,” utshilo uShalulile. 
Umqeqeshi waMaZulu, uBenni McCarthy, umncomile kakhulu uShalulile. “Ndiyavuyisana noPeter. Ukufanele ukuwongwa ngoba ungumdlali odlala kakuhle kakhulu. Qhubela phambili usenza njalo, ndiyayithanda indlela osebenza ngayo,” utshilo uMcCarthy, naye obeyokwamkela iwonga lomqeqeshi wenyanga emva kokuvusa AmaZulu adlale imidlalo esixhenxe engabethwanga. 
Yena uTapelo Xoki waMaZulu ufumene iwonga legowuli lenyanga. IDowns iza kuqubisana neStellenbosch namhlanje emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngentsimbi yokuqala. Phakathi evekini, iqela likaMngqithi livuthulule iPolokwane City ngo’4-0 emdlalweni weNedbank Cup.

headline: I-SABC 3 ikhangela abasasazi ababini !
text:
INKAMPANI evelisa imisebenzi yobugcisa ezinze eKapa i-Insync Productions, ikhangela abasasazi ababini abazakwenza inkqubo entsha yezobuchwepheshe.  
Aba basasazi bakhangelwayo, kufuneka babephakathi kwe-19 nama-25 yeminyaka ubudala. Le nkqubo izakusasazelwa abo basafikisayo kwiSABC3. OKUKHANGELWAYO: Kufuneka ube nolwazi olungqamene nezobuchwepheshe, kwaye azi ngokudingwa ngabo baselula kwezobuchwepheshe nalapho banokufumana khona ezo zinto bazidingayo.  
Ukuba uyakwazi ukukhuthaza, utsale umdla, ucele umngeni kwaye unxulumane nabo, lo msebenzi ngowakho. Kufuneka ubenolwazi ngezobuchwepheshe. Le nkqubo ikhangela amagatyana ngokunjalo namagqiyazana aseKapa.  
Ukuba ungathanda ukufaka isicelo – ungathumela iinkcukacha ezi fana nezi: -iCV ekhatshwa yimigcana yenkuthazo (motivation), -Ivideo clip engekho ngaphezulu kwemizuzwana engama-90 (90 seconds), echazayo ukuba kutheni kufuneka kukhethwe wena.  
Konke oko ungakuthumela kule dilesi yemeyile: info@insyncproductions.co.za:

headline: Iphi iKliniki eMagodla?
text:
Sicela uncedo. Sinengxaki ebuhlungu. Kula lali yakwaMagodla asinayo ikliniki kudala kusithiwa iza kwakhiwa.  Kwezinye iilali iikliniki zikhona, le yethu kunzima.  
Oomakhulu bethu abakwazi kufumana iipilisi zabo zezigulo ngokuba  sikude neekliniki, funeka ukhwele nokuba awunamali, sihambe sithukwa kwezi kliniki ngokuba kukude eNgqamakwe.  
Sibethwa nayimali yokukhwela, xa usiya eNgqamakhwe funeka ubene mali engange 70 randi.  Iphi ke lo mali? Ndicela bethuna khe nisibonelele.  
Andiswa Nukwa eNgqamakwe.

headline: Isigidi seekhondom siyafuneka ngokuhlwa
text:
NGOBUSUKU banamhlanje abantu abakumazwe alishumi elinesithandathu akumazantsi eAfrika, bangabelana ngesondo ngaphandle kokusebenzisa ikhondom ngenxa yokuba rhoqo ngobusuku, abantu bala mazwe banqongotshelelwe ziikhondom ezikwisigidi. 
La mazwe yiBotswana, Angola, Comoros, Democratic Republic of Congo, eSwatini, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania, Zambia neZimbabwe. 
Ukunqongophala kweekhondom kubangela ukunwenwa kwesifo sikagawulayo kwanezifo ezosulela kwabo babelana ngesondo ngaphandle kwezikhuseli. 
Oku kuthethwe nguKingsley Tloubatla wakwaNulatex SA, inkampani yabantu abamnyama eyenza iimveliso zezempilo eziquka iikhondom. 
Kwiveki ephelileyo, uNulatex SA ubhengeze ukuba uza kutyala iR79 million ngeenjongo zokudala imisebenzi engamakhulu amathathu kwiSiza soPhuhliso lwezoShishino eMonti (East London Industrial Development Zone). 
Kwesi siza, ngokokutsho kukaTloubatla, iNulatex iza kuvelisa iikhondom ezikwizigidi ezingamakhulu amathathu ngonyaka. 
UTloubatla uthi iNulatex izakwenza iikhondom zohlobo lweMax izithumele kwisebe lezempilo kuwo onke amaphondo eli kwanakwiAfrika iphela. Iikhondom zohlobo lweMax, zingene endaweni kaChoice, kwaye ziza ngeziqholo ezine – eseStrawberry, Grape, Banana kwaneyoqobo. 
“Abantu baseMzantsi Afrika basebenzisa iikhondom ezikwibhiliyoni (one billion) ngonyaka. Abantu baseAfrika basebenzisa iikhondom ezikwiibhiliyoni ezingamashumi amabini ngonyaka,” utshilo uTloubatla. 
“Eyona nto sizimisele ukuyizuza kukuqinisekisa ukuba ulutsha lwethu, ingakumbi abo bakwiminyaka ekumashumi amabini ukuya phezulu, abachaphazeleki sisifo sikagawulayo. 
“Enye into ebalulekileyo kuthi njengelizwe, kukuqinisekisa ngempilo ende kootata nakoomama bayoma kumashumi asixhenxe eminyaka nangaphaya. Masikwehlise ukwanda kwesifo sikagawulayo kuba kunefuthe kuqoqosho lwethu,” utshilo uTloubatla. 
UTloubatla uthi iNulatex yinkampani yabantu abamnyama, ebone ukuba mayingene kwicandelo lezempilo ngenxa yokuqaphela ukuba kunqongophele iinguqu kweli candelo. 
Lo kaTloubatla uthi ubuninzi beekhondom ezisetyenziswa kweli loMzantsi Afrika zenziwa kumazwe angaphandle. 
 Uthi kwankqu namachiza okuthibaza ubunganga bentsholongwane kagawulayo, enziwa kumazwe angaphandle. 
“Xa sithetha ngeekhondom, uMzantsi Afrika unkqenkqeza phambili ekuzisebenziseni – kodwa abantu abaninzi abayazi le nto.” 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za

headline: UMpengesi uyifuna kwiTop 8 iChippa
text:
Emva kokuthi khebevu emakhaya ngenxa yeeholide zokuphela konyaka, abadlali bamaqela adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League babuyela emsebenzini kule veki.  
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, lelinye lamaqela azakwakhelwa umkhanyo kakhulu ngabantu emva kokugqwidiza kwisizini ka-2016/17. Kodwa kule sizini izinto zibonakala zingcono nangoba zisekhona iindawana ezifuna ukuqhoshwa. 
 Usihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, ufuna iqela lakhe libe phakathi kwamaqela akwiTop 8 ekupheleni kwesizini futhi lizibekele indawo nakwiCaf. 
Oku kuphume kuMpengesi ngethuba esamkela izitshovu-tshovu zabadlali abane anethemba lokuba bakuthi bancedise ekuqinisekiseni ukuba injongo zalo ziyaphumelela.  
IiChilli Boys zamkele uNkosinathi Mthiyane, uThabo Rakhale, uMxolisi Machupu noLinda Mntambo. Ezinye iindaba ezimnandi kokubuya kukaRoger Sikhakhane ozakusebenza njengomncedisi kaTeboho Moloi. 
UMthiyane ngumdlali odlala ephikweni othembekileyo, wathathwa yi-Orlando Pirates kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo emva kokugqwesa kwiChippa.  
URakhale ngumdlali onesiphiwo esingumangaliso ephikweni xa kuhlaselwa. Uzakusebenza noTeboho Moloi obesebenze naye kwiPirates ngaphambili. 
 UMachupu noMntambo basuka kwiJomo Cosmos, kulindeleke ukuba bancedise kakhulu phaya phambili kwicala lamagowuli.  
Aba badlali bongeza kwabanye abadlali abaninzi abatyikitywe leli qela phambi kokuqala kwale sizini – kodwa uMpengesi uthi ukufika kwaba badlali kubonisa ukuzimisela kwabo.  
“Ukutyikitya kwethu abadlali abane kubonisa mhlophe ukuzimisela kwethu ngokuqinisa indawo yethu kwiTop 8 nokunxanelwa kwethu ukudlala imidlalo yeCaf. Indlela adlala ngayo uRakhale ihambelana ncam neChippa. Siyamamkela noMthiyane. Eli lithuba lakhe lokuvuselela ikhono lakhe lokudlala ibhola kwaye iyayazi inkqubo yeChippa,” utshilo uMpengesi. 
IChippa United izakungquzulana naMaZulu kumdlalo wePSL ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe eKing Zwelithini Stadium.  
Njengokuba iChippa ifuna amanqaku amathathu, wona AmaZulu azakube ekhangela indlela yokuziphindezela kwiChippa emva kokubethwa ekuqaleni kwesizini eBhayi.  
AmaZulu azinze kwindawo yeshumi elinanye, impumelelo ingawabeka endaweni engcono kakhulu. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoLwesihlanu: Ajax Cape Town vs Maritzburg United @Cape Town Stadium 20:00; Bidvest Wits vs Free State Stars @Bidvest Stadium 20:00 
NgoMgqibelo: Polokwane City vs Mamelodi Sundowns @Peter Mokaba Stadium 15:30; SuperSport United vs Kaizer Chiefs @Lucas Moripe Stadium 18:00; Platinum Stars vs Cape Town City @Royal Bafokeng Stadium 20:15; Orlando Pirates vs Baroka FC @Orlando Stadium 20:15 
NgeCawe: AmaZulu FC vs Chippa United @King Zwelithini Stadium 15:30; Bloemfontein Celtic vs Golden Arrows @Dr Molemela Stadium 15:30

headline: Abahlohli baseRhodes bathi phantsi ngobundlobongela bamapolisa kubafundi
text:
Iqela labahlohli elizibiza ngokuba yiConcerned Staff kwiYunivesithi iRhodes likhokele uqhankqalazo olungenabundlobongela namhlanje ukubonisa inkcaso yalo kubundlobongela bamapolisa ngakubafundi abaqhankqalazayo. 
  
Umhloli wobuntatheli nolilungu leli qela, uBrian Garman uthi olu qhankqalazo beluzama ukubonisa ukuba uyakwazi ukuqhankqalaza yaye uvakalise ilizwi lakho ngaphandle kobundlobongela ngakwicala lamapolisa okanye abaqhankqalazi.  
  
“Sizama ukufumana indawo enobunono nekuthuleke kuyo ukuze abantu babuyele kule ndawo bekusenzeka kuyo ubundlobongela. Siyayibanga kwakhona le ndawo njengendawo yabafundi baseRhodes nendawo yokwenza uqhankqalazo olusemthethweni,” utshilo uGarman.  
  
Eli qela lithi liyazixhasa iintshukumo zemfundo yasimahla, bekwathi urhulumente akenzi ngokwaneleyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba unikezela ngemfundo ephakamileyo yasimahla.  
  
Abafundi nabasebenzi ebebeyinxalenye yolu qhankqalazo bebephakamise iiposta ezidlulisa umyalezo othi amapolisa mawayeke ukulwa nabafundi. Kukwabekwe iiposta ikhampasi yonke ukuvakalisa izimvo zabantu malunga nendima yeentshukumo zemfundo yasimahla kweli ziko.  
  
Iqela leConcerned Staff lithi alifuni ukuphinda libone abafundi bedutyulwa yaye bephathwa ngobundlobongela ngamapolisa.

headline: ITexus ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo eMdantsane!
text:
Nangona iveki ephelileyo ibi yeyokuphumla kwabanye abantu – kodwa iinkokeli zoMdantsane Local Football Association bezixakekiswe luphuhliso lwabadlali abasakhasayo.  
Amaqela ebhola ekhatywayo anabadlali abadala ababalelwa kumashumi amane akhuphisene kwitumente ebiququzelelwe ngulo mbutho olawula ibhola eMdantsane.  
Le tumente ebixhaswa yiBuffalo City Municipality, ibiquka nehlokondiba lamaqela abadlali abaneminyaka engaphantsi kweshumi elinesithathu, ishumi elinesihlanu neshumi elinesixhenxe. 
Owona mdlalo obujongwe kakhulu ubuphakathi kweGreen Lovers neTexus.  
La maqela mabini athe azibonakalisa kule tumente ukuba ngawona anamandla kwibhola yaseMdantsane. Ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto ezenzekileyo kule tumente kukuba abadlali beelokishi ngokwahlukana kwazo bafumene ithuba lokuzivavanya nokuqaqambisa izakhono zabo.  
Umdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi ubumhle futhi abadlali bamaqela omabini badlale ngokuzimisela. ITexus ibonisile ukuba ifuna ukuphumelela zisuka ngokuthi ifake amagowuli amabini kwisiqingatha sokuqala emdlalweni. 
Loo magowuli anike iTexus ithemba lokugoduka nendebe. Amagowuli alandele emva komdlalo omhle odlalwe ziziquququ zeTexus phantse sonke isiqingatha sokuqala.  
Emva kokufumana iingcebiso ngexesha lokuphumla, iGreen Lovers ibuye ngamandla kwisigaba sesibini. Abadlali baqale ngokudlala umdlalo odibeneyo besebenzisa izakhono zabo namendu.  
Uxinizelelo olufakwe yiLovers kwisigaba sesibini lulo olwenze yafumana amagowuli amabini ngokukhawuleza kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo.  
Lo nto inyanzele umdlalo ukuba uye kumapenela apho iTexus iphumelele ngo’4-3, yaba ithwaliswa isithsaba sobuntshatsheli ekupheleni kwemini. 
Nangona kungekho lula ukuqokelela ulutsha kule mihla – kodwa abaququzeleli bale tumente bonelisekile yindlela abaqhube ngayo. Amaqela aphumeleleyo ngokohlukana kwamanqanaba azuze iindebe, iimbasa nemali. 
Le tumente ibiliqonga elihle lokuqaqambisa izakhono zabadlali bebhola ekhatywayo.

headline: Ubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo bucudisa inkqubela yesizwe
text:
Oyena nobangela wokunwena kwamatyotyombe, intswela-ngqesho kwanokukhulu kwenani leenkedama bubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo, kuba la matyala mabini acudisa inkqubela-phambili yelizwe.  
  
Oku kuvakaliswe ngumtshutshisi wombuso ophezulu kwigunya-bantu lezotshutshiso eMpuma Koloni uAdvocate Thenjwa Sellem. “Xa iinkokeli zethu bezinokohlukana nokuzibandakanya nobuqhetseba kwakunye nobuqhophololo, iingxaki ezijamelene nabantu bakuthi bezinokuncipha ngendlela engummangaliso,” utshilo uSellem.  
  
USellem ebethetha eSteve Biko Centre eGinsberg eQonce ngoLwesihlanu apho urhulumente wephondo ebeqaphela usuku lwehlabathi lokuchasana nobuqhophololo (International Anti-Corruption Day).  
  
Lo msitho ubukwazinyaswe yiNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle, abanye babaphiswa bakhe, iintloko zamasebe aseMpuma Koloni, uMkomishinala wamapolisa ephondo uLieutenant General Liziwe Ntshinga, kwaneenkokeli zamacandelo athwaliswe uxanduva lokuthintela nokuphanda ubuqhophololo.  
  
USellem uthi eyona ndlela ivamileyo yokwenza ubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo eMpuma Koloni kuxa kukhutshwa iithenda. “Yeyona ndawo sifumanisa ukuba ubuqhetseba nobuqhopholo benzeka kakhulu kuyo.  
Enye indawo yile yeenkampani ezithoba amaxabiso eethenda kuba zifuna imali karhulumente ngondlela-mnyama,” utshilo uSellem.  
  
Ethetha kulo msitho uMasualle uthi ubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo ngumbulalazwe. “Ubuqhetseba nobuqhopholo benza kubenzima ukusiwa kweenkonzo eluntwini, kuba imali ebifanele ukuba iya eluntwini iphelela kumagosa anorhwaphilizo,” utshilo uMasualle.

headline: Lithuba elihle leGhana lokugodusa uLuis Suarez ephaca
text:
Usuku lwangomso lubaluleke kakhulu kwizwekazi le-Afrika ngenxa yamazwe amabini aza kulwela ukuhlala kwitumente yehlabathi. Loo mazwe yiGhana neCameroon. Okwenza umdla ngakumbi kukuba iGhana iza kufumana ithuba lokuziphindisa kwi-Uruguay eyayohlutha intlaka emlonyeni kwitumente yehlabathi ngo-2010 eMzantsi Afrika. ULuis Suarez wabamba ibhola ngesandla isiya emnatheni kanti uGyan (Asamoah) uza kuphosa ipenela eyanikwa iGhana. Umqeqeshi weGhana, u-Otto Addo, uthi akanawo umdla wempindezelo yokwenzeka ngo-2010 ngaphezulu kokuphumelela umdlalo. AmaGhana asecicini lokudlulela kwisigaba esilandelayo – kodwa kufuneka abethe iUruguay kuqala. 
Ekuqaleni kwale veki, iGhana ibethe iSouth Korea ngo’3-2 emdlalweni obutaka iintlantsi e-Education City Stadium. Amagowuli wayo afakwe nguMohammed Kudus (amabini) noMohammed Salisu. “Umdlalo uza kuba nzima – kodwa ndiqinisekile ukuba singaphumelelo. Impindezelo asinto esengqondweni yam. La nto seyinethuba elide kakhulu ngoku. Ndiyakholelwa ukuba singafumana iintsikelelo ukuba asizikhathazi ngempindezelo kwizinto ezinjeya. Ineefolosi ezibukhali iUruguay, lo nto iza kwenza umdlalo ube nzima kakhulu. Kufuneka sizimisele ukuze siyibethe,” utshilo uAddo, ofanayo nozama ukumpompa ivili eligqabhukileyo. 
Noxa AmaGhana ejongene ngomdlalo onzima futhi obalulekileyo – kodwa okubalulekileyo kukuba aya emdlalweni ukuzithemba kuphezulu. Naye uDiego Alonso, oqeqesha iUruguay, uyichaze njengento engasabalulekanga into eyenzeka eMzantsi Afrika ngo-2010. Iqela lakhe lisecicini lokugoduka ngaphandle kokuphumelela umdlalo eQatar. “Ngumdlalo owahlukileyo kumacala omabini lo sijongene nawo. Omabini amaqela akhangela indlela yokudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo. Usuku lwangomso lubalulekile – kodwa lahlukile kokwenzeka eminyakeni elishumi elinambini edlulileyo. Kufuneka sidlale njengamakroti ukuze siphumelele,” utshilo uAlonso.

headline: Abadlali abane bayayishiya i-7de Laan!
text:
ABADLALI bomdlalo we-Afrikaans kwiSABC 2 i-7de Laan, bathe gqolo ukuwufulathela lo mdlalo kamabonakude. Abalinganiswa abafana no-Felicity, Pulane, Sifiso kunye noKim, bazakunyamalala kumabonakude wakho naseluntwini laseHillside kungekudala.  
UMelanie du Bois uyohlukana nokulinganisa indawo yomthungi weempahla uFelicity Daniels Croukamp, emva kweshumi elinesihlanu leminyaka ekulo mdlalo, indawo yakhe izakusithela ngenyanga yeDwarha kulo mdlalo oveliswa yiDanie Odendaal Productions.  
Omnye oshiyayo nguMasego Sehoole odlala indawo kaPulane, uCorne’ Crous odlala indawo kaKim kunye no- Anelisa Phewa odlala indawo kaSifiso. Isivumelwano sengqesho sikaMelanie du Bois, uCorne’ Crous nesikaMasego Sehoole azivuselelwanga ngulo mdlalo, ngelixa uAnelisa Phewa ezibeke phantsi iintambo. 
 Ukulahla kwaba badlali be-7de Laan kulandela isibhengezo sakutsha nje sokuba uDiaan Lawrenson odlala uPaula, uJo da Silva odlala uGita kunye noChristo Davids odlala * -Errol, nabo bashenxile kulo mdlalo.  
UMelanie du Bois okwinkqubo yoqhawulo-mtshato weminyaka eli-14 nomyeni wakhe uReginald Botha, uzakube esenza iziqendu zakhe zokugqibela kwi-7de Laan ngoLwesihlanu.

headline: Ziyambhedela ngamandla uDineo Ranaka!
text:
UDineo Ranaka, ongumsasazi kanomathotholo kwakunye nomabonakude, ulahlelwe ngaphandle yinkampani yakhe yezopapasho.  
Le nkampani, igqibe kwelokuba iqhawule ubudlelwane naye emva kwempendulo yakhe kumfundi kaGrade 12 ozibiza uMiss Mnisi kuTwitter, nethe yadala ingxushushu-ngxushu.  
Le ntwazana icele uRanaka amphe isipho selokhwe yomdaniso weMatriki.  
Ephendula kwesi sicelo, uRanaka uthe: “Umdaniso weMatriki kufuneka ibe yinto yokugqibela ozikhathaza ngayo. Injongo ayikokujongeka usisityebi, kodwa ubesiso isityebi.” 
 Nangona nje eye wafumana ukuxwaxwa kwiTwitter, uRanaka walile ukwehla okanye ukuxolisa ngempendulo yakhe kuMiss Mnisi. 
 INdabezinhle PR & Communications ikhuphe ingxelo ende ecacisa ukuba bafikelele njani kwisigqibo sokuqhawula umtshato noRanaka.  
Ngokutsho kwengxelo ekhutshwe ngomele inkampani yopapasho noqhagamshelwano, umlawuli (MD), uGugulam Ndabezitha, bahambe noRanaka ukuya kwikhaya likaMnisi eMpumalanga, ngethemba lokunikezela ngoncedo lwezezimali kule ntwazana nomhlobo wakhe uDimpho, ukuze bafunde.  
Le ngxelo ifundeka ngolu hlobo:

headline: Akukho sifo sehagu kwelaseMpuma Koloni
text:
“Musani ukunikisa ngeehagu zenu kuloo masela, aziyonyani iingxelo zokuba isebe lethu liqokelela iihagu ngenxa yesifo esibulala iihagu.” 
 Le yingxelo ekhutshwe lisebe lezolimo nophuhliso lamaphandle eMpuma Koloni ngomlomo wesithethi sela sebe uMvusiwekhaya Sicwetsha. Le ngxelo ihambisa ithi, kukho oqhimgqoshe abajikeleza kwiindawo zeli phondo beqokelela iihagu ngobusela.  
“Aba bantu bathi baphuma apha kuthi esebeni baqokelela ezi hagu ngelithi kukho isifo esibulala iihagu, ayiyonyani leyo, abantu mabangavumi ukulahlekiswa,” uthethe oko uSicwetsha. Uthi aba Bantu benza lo mkhuba kwingingqi yomasipala waseMbhashe neengingqi ezingqongileyo ngeenjongo zobusela. 
 “Akukho sifo seehagu sikhoyo apha eMpuma Koloni nakwilizwe loMzantsi Afrika ngokubanzi ngoko abantu mabayeke ukuvuma ukuxokiswa ngabantu abafuna ukuzityebisa,” utsho uSicwetsha. 
USicwetsha ulumnkisa amafama eehagu kunye nabafuyi ngokubanzi ukuba balindele kwisebe lezolimo nophuhliso lamaphandle ngeengxaki ezilolu hlobo. Isifo seehagu sibangele ukuba abantu beli phondo balahlekelwe ziihagu zabo ezathi zabulawa kamva emva kokuba zifunyenwe zinesifo. “Nabani ofunyenwe ehamba ethetha le nto ebantwini makwaziswe amapolisa akufutshane okanye amagosa ethu akufutshane kulo ndawo, umthetho udlale indima yawo,” utsho uSicwetsha. Umemelela uluntu ukuba lohlukane nokunikisa ngeehagu zalo kubantu abathi basuka kwela sebe kuba akukho nto injalo iqhubekayo. 
“Aba Bantu basebenzisa eli thuba lokuba sijikeleza sisenza ubalo lamafama apha eMpuma Koloni, ngoku balahlekisa abantu bethu bebaqhatha kuba befuna ukuba iihagu zabo,” ucacise watsho uSicwetsha. 
Ngonyaka ka2005 eli leMpuma Koloni lalahlekelwa ziihagu ezikumakhulu amabini namashumi amane anesihlanu amawaka ngokwengxelo yeSouth African Prevention of Cruelty Against Animal. Iihagu zeli leMpuma Koloni zazingavunyelwa ukuba ziphume ngaphandle kweli phondo ngenxa yesi sifo kuba zazithintelwa ukuba zingosuleli iihagu zezinye iindawo.  
Abafuyi beehagu banikwa imali endaweni yeehagu zabo ezathi zabulawa ngelizama ukunwenwa kweso sifo.

headline: Mbenge: Ndiza kumbetha angazazi uKatembo
text:
Ubuyela eqongeni lamanqindi kwakhona uThulani “Tulz Evolution” Mbenge ngokukhulu ukuzithemba kwaye uthembisa ngokwenza ezibukwayo emlweni ongempelanyanga.  
Emva kokuthi khebevu iinyanga ezingaphaya kwesithandathu engalwi, uMbenge uxa kuxikixana noMardochee Kuvesa Katembo emlweni oza kube useHotele yaseVaal kwiphondo laseGauteng ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesibhozo kule nyanga.  
Oku kudizwe kwiveki ephelileyo eJohannesburg Stadium – apho ezi mbethimanqindi zimbini beziphaxulana ngamazwi kwindabano yazo nonondaba.  
Umlo kaMbenge noKatembo uyinxalenye yetumente yamanqindi ekubhiyozelwa ngayo inkululeko yoMzantsi Afrika yinkampani yabathelekisi ekuthiwa yiTLB Promotions.  
Indedeba yakwaMbenge yagqibela ukulwa kunyaka ophelileyo emlweni eyabethwa kuwo ngamanqaku nguSebastian Formella kwelaseJamani emva kwemijikelo elishumi elinambini. Wakwamkela ukuphulukana nentshinga yakhe uMbenge – kodwa ngoku ufuna isiqalo esitsha ngokubetha uKatembo. 
La madoda mabini aza kube esilwela intshinga ye-ABU welterweight. Nangona enethuba elide engasalwi, uTulz uthi ukulungele ngokupheleleyo ukulwa ngoba ukuzilolonga yinto ebeyixabise kakhulu noxa bekungekho mlo ebewulungiselela.  
“Ndiyalivuyela ithuba endilifumanayo ngoba kudala ndililangazelela. Bendisaphumle emva kokubethwa eJamani – kodwa ndikulungele ukulwa futhi ndikulambele. Nokuba kungathiwa masilwe ngomso; ngeke ndithi hayi ngoba ndihlala ndikulungele,” utshilo uTulz waseMpuma Koloni ohlala eGoli. Abamaziyo bamchaza uKatembo njengendoda elikhalipha futhi ekwaziyo ukuphosa amanqindi ayingozi.  
Nakubeni kunjalo, uThulani uthi akanalo uvalo ngoba kudala esemanqindini.  
“Ndike ndambukela esilwa. Yindoda ewaziyo amanqindi yena – kodwa andinalo tu uvalo. Uyimbethimanqindi ekhaliphileyo – kodwa ndiza kumbetha angazazi nokuba ubethwe ngubani. Lifikile ixesha lokuba ndigqame nam. Ndikulungele ukudibana nale ndoda; ndiyathemba nayo ukulungele ukulwa nam,” uvale ngalo mazwi uTulz.

headline: Ingoma kaJunia ilibali elingobomi bakhe
text:
Waqala ukubonisa umdla emculweni eselula kakhulu ngokweminyaka, ecula ecaweni, ekwabetha nepiyano kwimicimbi yekhaya. 
Akufika esikolweni, waye wazibonakalisa kumatheko omculo  apho wayecula khona, elinganisa iimvumi  ezifana noR. Kelly, uMario noUsher. 
Ngenxa yefuthe ezi mvumi ezaba nalo kuye, ngoku waziwa ngelo lizwi lintyiloza kamnandi, kwaneengoma zakhe ezincamis’ umxhelo. 
Emva kokuzibandakanya neqela lomculo leHip-Hop elibizwa iTeenagers, akazange aphinde ajonge mva.  Uye wajikeleza eMonti, enyuka esehla neli qela.  Akuphumelela iMatriki laqala laziwa igama likaJunia Zenzile kuba imbiza abekade eyipheka kule minyaka yonke yaye yavuthwa. 
Kunyaka wokuqala eyunivesithi waye wakhupha ingoma yakhe yokuqala ngqa ebizwa ‘’Only Me’’. 
“Eyona ngoma engabhadlanga endakhe ndayibhala,” uZenzile ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa efile yintsini. 
Le nzalelwane yelali yaseLovers Twist, eNgqushwa, yakhe yazama ithamsanqa nakwiimvavanyo zenkqubo yokhuphiswano lomculo kamabonakude iIdols Season 10 ezazibanjelwe ePlayhouse eThekwini. 
“Ndicinga ndakufumana endandikufuna apho, ukuvela kumabonakude, emva koko ndabuyela ekhaya ndaqala nokushicilela umculo, futhi ndakhula nkalwana zonke, ”  uZenzile ebalisa ehleka. 
Ngo2018 wakhupha ingoma ethi “Ebomini Bam.” 
KuLwesihlanu odlulileyo, umhla weshumi kule yoMsintsi, uZenzile ukhuphe ingoma entsha kraca ethi ‘Iphupho Lam’. 
Le ngoma, esele ifumaneka kwiivenkile zonxibelelwano lomnatha, iyincwadi uZenzile ayibhalele umama wakhe ongasekhoyo. 
Le ngoma yenye yeengoma ezikwicwecwana lakhe lohlobo lwe-EP alungiselela ukulikhupha ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo.   Uthi ‘Iphupho Lam’ yingoma engumthandazo nesishwankathelo sebali lobomi bakhe. 
“Siziimvumi sibhala nangantoni esicinga ukubhala ngayo. Kuxhomekeka kokuvayo ngoloo suku okanye okusengqondweni yakho. Ndandidakumbile ngolwa suku ndibhala le ngoma,” kutsho le mvumi, ephulukene nomama wayo ngo2017. 
“[Kule ngoma] Ndithandaza kuMdali ukuba yanga angandisikelela ukuze nomama onwabe apho akhoyo. Akakhange afumane thuba lokundibona ndiphumelela,” kutsho uZenzile, okwathi ukholelwa ukuba umama wakhe umjongile, enethemba lokuba uza kuba ngumntu ongcono ebomini unyana wakhe. 
UZenzile ukhwele kumaqonga omculo afana neBCM Carnival, iBuyel’ Ekhaya neMotsepe Foundation Concert. 
Uthi abantu baza kukhuthazeka kule ngoma, kwaye babe nokuyazi ngcono imvumi ngapha kwengoma. 
“Bazi nokuba ungubani waphi, ungayiyo loo nto unqwenela ukuba yiyo nokuba iimeko zithini,” utshilo. 
Le ngoma sele idlala kwizikhululo ezifana neTruFM noMhlobo Wenene. 
Onqwenela incoko noJunia angakroba kumakhasi onxibelelwano ku @juniamyworld

headline: Umasipala awuyofama, kutsho uBobani
text:
“INelson Mandela Bay asiyofama yamntu, ngoko ke asizukuphehluzeliswa ngu[Athol] Trollip ongazimiselanga kumamela ilizwi lomnye umntu.” 
 
Oku kuthethwe nguMongameli Bobani, uSekela Sodolophu waseNelson Mandela Bay, kulandela ukugxothwa kwakhe nguSodophu uTrollip kuxanduva lokongomela icandelo lezempilo kulo masipala. 
 
Ukugxothwa kukaBobani kuza emva kokungavisisani noTrollip, nangona nje babetyikitye isivumelwano sokusebenzisana kulandela ukuseka urhulumente wenkazathi emva kweziphumo zonyulo loomasipala nyakenye. 
 
Umbutho iDA ukwinkazathi neUDM, ekhokelwa nguBobani kulo masipala, kwakunye nombutho iCope neACDP. Ukuba iUDM ingasiqhawula esi sivumelwano, oku kungathetha ukuba iDA ayikho selulawulweni okanye ifune inkazathi kwimibutho efana ne-EFF, AIC, Patriotic Alliance neUnited Front. 
 
Ethetha nephephandaba I’solezwe uBobani uthe: “Into endingasoze ndiyamkele yile yokuphathwa nguTrollip ingathi ndisefama. Futhi soze ndivume xa uTrollip edelela umbutho wethu iUDM. Uyalibala ukuba enguSodolophu nje uncedwe sithi, kuba khange awuphumelele ngokuphandle la masipala.” 
 
UTrollip uthi isigqibo sokugxotha uBobani, njengelungu elongamele icandelo lezempilo, asiyonto ethatyathwe lula. “Ndibeneengxaki noBobani ukusukela ngenyanga yoMnga. Sizibhalile iincwadi, sicela ukuba umbutho iUDM uzame ukuthetha noBobani kodwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo.” 
 
“Kunyanzeleke ukuba ndithathe esi sigqibo kuba ndibona ukuba akukho nto yenziwayo ngoBobani,” utshilo uTrollip. 
 
UBobani usasibambile isikhundla sokuba nguSekela Sodolophu, kwaye kukho amarhe okuba angaphulukana naso ukuba iDA ingafumana inkxaso yokumsusa kwamanye amaqela kwindibano yebhunga elindeleke ukuba ibanjwe ngoLwesibini.

headline: Iliso lethu silibeke kwiNdebe yeHlabathi, utsho uNeymar Jr
text:
Xa kudlala iBrazil, abantu basoloko bebeka amehlo wabo kuNeymar Jr. Ayothusi lo nto ngoba ungumdlali onesiphiwo esingummangaliso sokudlala ibhola, sokuufaka amagowuli futhi uyabancedisa abadlali adlala nabo ebaleni. Uzenzele imbali emdlalweni ogqithileyo ngethuba efumana igowuli ngepenela. Ngoku yena noPele noRonaldo – ngabadlali ekuphela kwabo abafake amagowuli kwiitumente ezintathu zehlabathi eBrazil. Noxa uPele noRonaldo bakhe bayiphakamisa indebe yehlabathi, yena uNeyimar usayizingela. Njengokuba eneminyaka engamashumi amathathu, ukhangela yona ukuze imbali yakhe njengomdlali ophambili eBrazil igcwale futhi afaniswe nabanye. Emva kokuba iBrazil ibethe iSouth Korea ngo’4-1 ekuqaleni kwale veki, uNeymar uxelele iFifa.com ukuba iliso labo balibeke kwitumente yehlabathi. 
Ukuthethe oku phambi komnye umdlalo obalulekileyo ophakathi kweBrazil neCroatia emalanga namhlanje e-Education City Stadium. “Kubaluleke kakhulu kuthi ukugqithela kumjikelo olandelayo kolu khuphiswano,” utshilo uNeymar Jn, othethe kwiFifa.com phambi komdlalo onzima. “Iphupha lethu kukuphumelela iNdebe yeHlabathi – kodwa kubalulekile kuthi ukuqubisana nomdlalo ubemnye ngexesha. Umdlalo esiwudlale neKorea Republic ibingowesine. Ngoku sishiyekelwe yemithathu. Sizilungiselele ngokupheleleyo kwaye iliso lethu silibeke kwiNdebe yeHlabathi,” utshilo uNeymar. Emva kokonzakala emdlalweni wokuqala iBrazil eyabetha kuwo iSerbia ngo’2-0, uNeymar unexhala lokuphinda angayigqibi itumente yehlabathi ngenxa yokonzakala. 
“Kwandoyikisa ukonzakala emdlalweni wokuqala ngoba isizini yam ibintle kakhulu. Akumnandanga ukonzakala ngolwa hlobo. Ndikhale ubusuku bonke la mini – kodwa kuye kwalunga ekugqibeleni emva kokulala ebusuku kakhulu nokuvuka ekuseni noogqirha bendinyanga. Ukuba yonke into ingaphela siphumelela, kungakuhle kakhulu kum,” utshilo uNeymar, onamagowuli alishumi elinesihlanu emidlalweni engamashumi amabini kwiPeris Saint-German yaseFrance. Emva kokuba iBrazil ibethe iSouth Korea, abadlali beBrazil baphakamisa iphekepheke elibhalwe igama likaPele likhatshwa ngumyalezo othi: “Kunzima ukuthetha ngokwenzeka kuPele. Simnqwenelela impilo entle kodwa kwaye sinethemba lokuba impumelelo iza kumnika amandla.”

headline: Aphindela etshatshalazeni amaqela alwela iMTN 8!
text:
Amaqela amane alwela indebe yeMTN 8 aphindela etshatshalazeni kwilinge lawo lokuzibekela indawo kumdlalo wokugqibela.  
Iqela likaBenni McCarthy, iCape Town City, linethuba elihle lokuphumelela emva kokuba libethe iMamelodi Sundowns ngo’1-0 kumdlalo obuseCape Town Stadium.  
Kanti wona Amakhosi abambene neSuperSport United ngo’2-2 kumdlalo obunzima kakhulu eLucas Moripe Stadium.  
Ngempelaveki, omane la maqela azakulwa kubemdaka iisali kwilinge lawo lokugqibela lokulwela ukuzibekela indawo kumdlalo wokugqibela.  
IKaizer Chiefs yamkela iSuperSport United kumdlalo okulindeleke ube nzima kakhulu ngo’20:00 eFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo.  
Yona iSundowns yamkela iCity kumdlalo ozakube useLucas Moripe Stadium. 
UMcCarthy uya ePitoli encumile ngoba iqela lakhe lihamba phambili – kodwa uyayaqonda ingozi elingagaxeleka kuyo iqela lakhe kwiDowns ukuba liyekelele umxakatho.  
Amakhwenkwe kaPitso Mosimane aza kufuna ukubuyisa isidima sawo emva kokukhutshwa kwiCaf Champions League yiHoroya kule veki.  
Nakubeni iqela lakhe labethwa kumdlalo wokuqala – kodwa uPitso usenalo ithemba lokuguqula izinto kumdlalo wesibini. 
 “Sinemidlalo exineneyo – kodwa ke siyazama ukumelana nayo yonke. Sisenalo ithuba lokwenza ngcono ePitoli. Ndizibonile izinto ezinje nesiphelo sazo – kodwa ibisisiqendu sokuqala esi,” watsho uPitso. 
UKaitano Tembo uyincomile indlela edlale ngayo iSuperSport United kumdlalo ogqithileyo kwaye uyabazi nobunzima ajamelene nabo njengomqeqeshi osemtsha kwanokuba iqela lakhe liziintshatsheli ezikhuselayo.  
Kwelinye icala, uGiovanni Soolinas, uphantsi koxinizelelo ngoba abalandeli bakhe bafuna indebe.  
IChiefs inethuba lokuya kumdlalo olandelayo ukuba umdlalo uphela kungekho gowuli emdlalweni.  
“Umdlalo ogqithileyo ubumhle. Sizimisele ukudlala kakuhle nakumdlalo wesibini. Inye indlela yokuphumelela indebe: kukufaka amagowuli emnatheni ngaphezulu kuneqela odlala nalo,” utshilo uSolinas kule veki. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za

headline: Amatyendyana aseMthatha agqobhoza kwimarike yabamhlophe
text:
BANCINCI, bafunda uGrade 12 kodwa sele bengoosomashishini abangene kwimarike engafane icingwe ngoosomashishini abasakhasayo abamnyama. 
Lowo nguThando Phantsi noKhanya Mngqibisa beAqua TK Mineral Water, eshishina phantsi kweemfefe zeAqua TK Trading Enterprise.  
UPhantsi (17) noMngibisa (16) benza uGrade 12 eSt Johns College eMthatha. Igama elithi Aqua TK lithathwa kwigama likaThando noKhanya. 
Emva kophando olunzulu la matyendyana agqiba kwelokuqala ishishini lamanzi acocekileyo athengiswa ngeebhotile zeplastiki.  
Olu hlobo loshishino londele kakhulu kwinkampani ezinkulu zabamhlophe kodwa esi sibini sithi sizimisele ukuyitshintsha yonke le meko. 
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, la matyendyana athi onelisekile yindlela oluqhuba ngayo ishishini labo ukusukela oko beqale kunyaka ophelileyo. 
Ethetha nephephandaba I’solezwe uMngqibisa uthi bafumanisa ukuba ushishino lamanzi acocekileyo akwiibhotile lukhula ngendlela engummangaliso.  
“Saye saphinda sabona ukuba abantu abamnyama asiloshishino balujonge kakhulu olu. Yiyo le nto sagqiba kwelokungena kolu hlobo loshishino,” utshilo uMngqibisa. 
UMngqibisa uthi amanzi acocekileyo yimpilo kwaye uthi oku yinto abafuna ukuyibethelela kubantu abamnyama. 
UMngqibisa uthi amanzi abo avela phantsi komhlaba emva koko bawacoce. Kulo msebenzi baqashe abantu abathandathu ngokusisigxina ze ishumi elinesibhozo libephantsi kwengqesho yesingxungxo. 
Esi sibini siza kuqhuba neshishini lalo nasemva kokuphumelela uGrade 12. UMngqibisa uzakuhlala eMpuma Koloni ukukhulisa imarike logama uPhantsi ezakuba seRhawutini ngeenjongo zokuvula isebe elitsha kweliya phondo. 
Ngonyaka ka2019, uMngqibisa noPhantsi banqwenela ukuba imveliso yabo ibekwiMpuma Koloni iphela.  
Okwangoku iivenkile abathengisa imveliso yabo kuzo eMthatha nguJimmy Spar, Food Lovers, Superspar/Spargs noJimmy Pork and Chicken. 
Ngethuba iANC yaseMpuma Koloni ibibhiyozela iminyaka elikhulu elinesihlanu yasekwayo kumsitho obubanjelwe eMthatha, uMngqibisa noPhantsi bathe baxhasa ngeebhotile zamanzi ezingamakhulu amahlanu ukunceda ukuthoba unxano kuloongqatsini yelanga.

headline: UNomeva uyokuzama ubom obutsha
text:
Enye yeembethi manqindi ezitshontsh’ entla eMzantsi Afrika intingele kwilizwe laseMelika ekuqaleni kwale veki – apho inethemba lobomi obungcono.
