UXolisani ‘Nomeva’ Ndongeni – oyinzalelwane yakwaBhaca, ugqibe kwelokuba alinikele umva ilizwe lakhe emva kokuba zingamhambelanga kakuhle izinto.  
UNomeva yintshatsheli ye-IBO Lightweight emva kokubetha uJuan Garcia waseMexico – kodwa ingxaki anayo akayifumani imilo – eyona nto ibalulekileyo kwimbethi manqindi. 
Le ndedeba yakwaBhaca iphantsi kwenkampani esakhasayo iMecca and Events Promotions. Phambi kokuhamba, uNdongeni ubenethamsanqa lokufumana inkxaso kwiMatthews Phosa Foundation emncedisileyo kwindlela eya eLas Vegas – apho kulindeleke abephantsi kweliso elibukhali likaLuis Tapia.  
Emva kokuphumelela imidlalo engamashumi amabini anesibini phantsi, uNomeva unethemba lokufumana imilo eliqela nobomi obubhetele.  
Zonke izinto azifunayo kuzawunyanzeleka azisebenzele nzima – kodwa uqinisekile ngenkxaso ngoba uzakulolongwa kwindawo kaFloyd Mayweather owaziwayo jikelele kwihlabathi.  
Ethetha neentatheli phambi kokunduluka kwakhe, uNomeva uthethe wenjenje: “Utata wam uthe kum, xa ndifika endaweni, nam kufuneka ndenze into eyenziwayo. Kodwa engandilungeliyo ndingayenzi. Yilo nto endizakuyenza. Endikwaziyo ukuyeza, ndizakuyenza futhi ndizithembile kakhulu.” 
Le mbethi-manqindi yenye yeembethi-manqindi ezibalaseleyo kweli lizwe – kodwa ithwaxwe kakhulu lilishwa kulo mdlalo.  
Sekuqengqeleke iminyaka eliqela ngoku engafumani imali esisigidi sonke emva kokuphumelela iPremier Boxing League. Kuzo zonke ezo zinto akanikezelanga. Ngoku uzimisele ukulisebenzisa ithuba alifumeneyo. 
 “Andisafuni ukuthetha ngezinto ezidlulileyo, ndijonge phambili mna. Zininzi izinto ezindehleleyo emanqindini. Ndifuna ukuphumelela imilo eMelika, ukuzakhela igama ndizenzele nobomi obungcono. Ukusebenzela kwinkampu kaMayweather kuthetha ukuthi kufuneka ndizimisele futhi ndiya endaweni engcono,” uvale ngalo mazwi uNomeva. 
Phambi kokuhamba kwakhe lo kaNomeva uye wathiwa jize ngomgrugra wemoto entsha yinkampani yakwaSASSTEC angunozakuzaku wayo.  
“Ndineqela endisebenza nalo eliqinisekisa okokuba ndifumana yonke into endiyifunayo,” utshilo uNomeva.

headline: Axhamlile amanina amaphandle akwezoshishino
text:
Amanina akwezoshishino emaphandleni nathe afumana izixhobo zonke zokusebenza ngezandla eziquka iimatshini zokuthunga, amalaphu kwakunye nematshini yokubhaka kwisebe elijongene nolimo kwakunye nophuhliso lwamaphandle, umphathiswa weli sebe uMlibo Qoboshiyane uthe, ngezi zixhobo zitsha bazinikezele ngazo kwaba bantu kuzakuthi kutshintshe iimpilo zabo, kwaye babenobomi obungcono kunabo bebenabo ngaphambili.  
Ezinye zezixhobo kwezo zithe zadluliswa nguQhoboshiyane kula manina kwanakulutsha lwasemaphandleni, kungabalulwa ucingo lokubiyela izityalo zabo nezixhobo zokwenza iJem yokuqaba esonkeni.  
Oku bekubanjelwe kwisikolo solimo kuTsolo kulwesihlaniu esisuka kuye. Ngeenzame zeli sebe zokulwa nendlala egqubayo, nentswela ngqesho, eli sebe laye laqala ezi nkqubo, iinjongo zayo ikukuphuhlisa uluntu lwasemaphandleni olujongene nale miceli mngeni, kwaye ngokuzisa ezi zixhobo kukuba bakwazi ukuzenzela, kwaye bakwazi ukufumana into ezokubancumisa ekupheleni kosuku, oko kudizwe nguQhoboshiyane.  
UNokwanele Ngantweni nongumnikazi weshishini iKwakho Coop, nothe wafumana iimatshini zokuthunga ezintathu uthe, oku kuzakumnceda ekuphuhliseni ishishini lakhe lokuthunga.  
“Oku kwakundenza ndithunge iimpahla eziliqela kunezo bendizithunga ndizokwazi ukuthengisela abantu bam, kwaye oko kwakundenza ndikwazi nokubeka ukutya etafileni kubantwana bam,”  
Omnye wabathe baxhamla nguAsanda Makhasi wakuTsolo ongumthungi naye, uthe, usokole gqitha ukuthunga engenazixhobo ezinokuthi zimele ishishini lakhe, ebenawo umatshini kodwa ubusoyisakala.  
UMvusiwekhaya Sicwetsha nothethela eli sebe uthi, oku kuziinzame zokuphuhlisa amanina asemaphandleni ekubeni akwazi ukuzimela angalali engasanganto kwiintsapho zawo.

headline: Imiceli mngeni yobumfama
text:
OBONA bunzima bajongene nabo abantu abakhubazekileyo, zizenyeliso abazifumana kubantu bokuhlala kuquka namalungu eentsapho zabo. 
oko kudizwe nguTobeka Tyesi ongumsebenzi eKonwaba Training Institute (KTI) nowaphulukana nokubona eselula ngokweminyaka emva kokungenwa ngumhlaba emehlweni, engekaqali nasesikolweni. 
UTyesi ukudize oku ngethuba iKonwaba Training Institute ibibambe umngcelele wabantu abazimfama obizwa ngokuba yiBig Walk nothathe iiyure ezimbini ukusuka kwibhulorho iSteve Biko ukuya kwiholo yesixeko saseMonti ngempelaveki. 
“Imiceli-mngeni ikhona xa unje ngam. Okokuqala ligama abantu abakubiza ngalo, okwesibini luhlobo abantu abakuphatha ngalo kwanohlobo abakubona ngalo.  
 Andibagxeki kuba le nto yokuphatheka kanje iqala emakhaya kwiintsapho zethu kuba benenkolelo yokuba xa uthe wazalwa ukule meko ingafani neyabanye kuye kuthwe lilishwa ukuba nomntwana onjalo,” utsho uTyesi. 
“Abanye baye bathi ukuba ubone umntu okhubazekileyo xa uzihambela uzakuba nentlahla. Zizinto esijongana nazo ezo imihla nezolo, nezenza ukuba sisive sohlukile kunabanye abantu “uqhube watsho. 
Uthi xa ukulemeko ufana naye wonke umntu. UTyesi uthi nokuba utshatile imiceli mngeni yakho iyafana neyeminye imitshato, yabo bangena siphaku. 
UNandipha Bhali oyingqonyela yeKTI uthi, njengokuba le iyinyanga yabantu abakhubazekileyo iKTI igqibe, ekubeni ivise kamnandi eli qela libizwa ngokuba ngama “Qhawe emveli.” 
“Sikholelwa ukuba bangamaqhawe ngokwenene kuba bakwazile ukuzilwela, bakwazile ukuphakama. Abanye kwaba bayafunda abanye bayaziphangelela abazisizeli,” utshilo uBhali. Ukwathe, 
“Sifuna ukufundisa uluntu ekuhlaleni malunga nabantu abakhubazekileyo kuba siyaqaphela amaxesha amaninzi abakhathalelekanga kwindawo zethu zokuhlala.  
Sizakuvula nesikolo esizakujongana ncakasana nabakhubazekileyo.”

headline: Kuvulwa ityala elitsha ngokudyarhazwa kwemali kaMandela
text:
ISITHETHI seDemocratic Alliance kuzwelonke uRefiloe Nt’sekhe ngoMvulo uzakuvula ityala kumapolisa aseFleet Street eMonti, elivulela umlawuli-jikelele kurhulumente waseMpuma Koloni uMarion Mbina-Mthembu okhankanywe kaliqela kwingxelo yoMkhuseli woLuntu ngelithi nguye unobangela wokudyarhazwa kwemali eyayihlelelwe ukujongana nomngcwabo kaNelson Mandela ngo2013. 
UMbina-Mthembu wayeyintloko yesebe lezezimali ephondweni ngelo xesha. 
NgoMvulo, uMkhuseli woLuntu uAdvocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane ubhengeze ingxelo kulandela imali ekwizigidi ezithandathu zeerandi ezachithwa nguMasipala iBuffalo City ngethuba lokubhubha kukaMandela ngonyaka ka2013. 
Ngokukonke, yimali engangezigidi ezikumakhulu amathathu eerandi (R300 million) eyaphunyezwa ngurhulumente waseMpuma Koloni, phantsi kwentende yeArhente yezoPhuhliso yaseMpuma Koloni (ECDC), ukuze ijongane nomsebenzi wokuququzelela ukubhubha kukaMandela apha ephondweni. 
Endaweni yokuba isebenze eyona nto iphunyezelwe yona le mali, amagosa karhulumente aseMpuma Koloni ayehlisa ngomlenze enye yale mali. 
UMkhwebane uthi inyathelo lokuphunyezwa kwale mali lwalungekho semthethweni, watsho esithi izenzo zikaMbina-Mthembu nazo zazingekho semthethweni futhi zizimpawu zolawulo olunobubhutyubhutyu. 
UNt’sekhe uthi eli tyala bazakulivula eFleet Street balivula phantsi kwesolotya lokuthintelwa nokusitshulwa ngeengcambu kwezehlo zobuqhophololo (Prevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities Act). 
UNt’sekhe ukwathe bafuna ukunika amapolisa ingxelo kaMkhwebane ukuqinisa kwityala eliqhubekayo eliphandwa ziiHawks ngokumayelana nalo mbandela. 
Malunga nale mali kaMandela, iiHawks zabamba owayesakuba nguSodolophu waseBuffalo City uZukiswa Ncitha, obesakuba lisekela likaSodolophu uThemba Tinta, uNobhala onqunyanyisiweyo weANC eBCM uPhumlani Mkolo, uceba weANC uSindiswa Gomba, obesakuba ngusomlomo waseBCM uLuleka Simon-Ndzele, owayeligosa laseBCM uOndela Mahlangu, oosomashishini uZintle Nkuhlu, Viwe Vazi, Nosiphiwo Mati kwakunye noDean Fanoe. 
Ityala labo lisephambi kwenkundla kamantyi waseMonti. 
Kusenjalo iANC eMpuma Koloni ibizele phambi kwayo iNkulumbuso yaseMpuma Koloni uPhumulo Masualle kwakunye noosodolophu abathathu ukuze baphefumle ngale ngxelo kaMkhwebane. Aba sodolophu nguNomakhosazana Meth wase-OR Tambo, uXola Pakati waseBuffalo City noDumani Zozo waseKing Sabata Dalindyebo. 
Bebizwa nje kungenxa yokuba uMkhwebane ukwakhankanye umasipala waseNelson Mandela Bay, King Sabata Dalindyebo nase-OR Tambo, esithi nabo bachitha imali ngokungekho semthethweni ngethuba lemisitho yokulungiselela ukungcwatywa kukaMandela. USolophu waseNelson Mandela Bay uAthol Trollip akabizwanga kuba asingomthunywa weANC. 
Lo kaMkhwebane ukwathe inyathelo lokufakwa kwemali engange-R250 000 kwibhanki kaNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle, owayengumphathiswa wezezimali ephondweni ngelo xesha, lalingekho semthethweni. 
Indibano yeANC ekhweba uMasualle naba sodolophu kulindeleke ukuba ibanjelwe eCalata House eQonce ngoMvulo.

headline: UKelly, iJaziel noButho bashukumis’ iGqeberha
text:
IBA nombono uKelly Khumalo, iJaziel Brothers noButho Vuthela kwiqonga elinye. 
Kuza kubanjalo ke eGqeberha xa ezi mvumi zikhuphisana ngengoma kwiHealing Gospel & Afro Soul Explosion eSun Boardwalk kwimpelaveki ezayo yomhla we4 kweyeSilimela 2022. 
Lo mcimbi uwuphathelwa yiMahambehlala  njengenxalenye yeekhonsathi ezisingise kuMnyhadala wonyaka nonyaka iEbubeleni. 
“Kule minyaka mibini edlulileyo sihleli emakhaya, kungekho ntshukumo zolonwabo ngenxa yeCovid-19, kwenze ubomi nzima,” kutsho uThembi Mahambehlala onguManejala weeNtengiso noMpapashi eMahambehlala eCommunications. 
Uthi oku kwenze abezolonwabo bakholelwe kakhulu ekuguqeni ngedolo. 
“Badumisa uThixo ngendlela abayaziyo, ingoma nokugida. Baza kubulela uBawo ngemiphefumlo ethe yasinda,” kutsho uMahambehlala. 
Abaququzeleli bale khonsathi bathi phantse wonke umntu uchaphazelekile yiCovid-19 ngeendlela ezohlukeneyo, kungoko iMpuma Koloni kufuneka ilibale ngesezolo, iqale uqalo olutsha. 
Le khonsathi ineenjongo zokumanyanisa, ukuphilisa nokuqinisa abantu nanjengoko bezama ukubuyisela uzinzo ebomini babo. 
Le khonsathi ngeyesibini kuthotho lweekhonsathi ezisingise kuMnyhadala woMculo iEbubeleni. 
“Injongo kukudala iqonga, ukuphuhlisa nokwenzela ingeniso iimvumi ezisakhulayo namashishini akwiNelson Mandela Bay,” kutsho uMahambehlala. 
Abathandi bomculo kaKelly Khumalo, iJaziel Brothers, uButho Vuthela neqela laseGqeberha, iLegato SA, bayacelwa ukuba baphume bonke ukuza kuzozinwabisa ngobu busuku. 
Amatikiti afumaneka ngeR300 ePick’n Pay, kwaBoxer nakwa-www.webtickets.co.za. Iingcango zivula ngentsimbi yesixhenxe.

headline: UBongi ugqwesile ngokufunda iindaba
text:
IHOLO iThe Empire Conference and Events Venue eParktown, eRhawutini, ibizele ime ngeembambo ngabazithembileyo emva komboko kwanaphambi komboko kanomathotholo belindele ukuva ukuba baza kuzifumana kusinina ezo ndondo bebethenjiswe ngazo. 
Lo msitho weSA Radio Awards ubungena kunyaka weshumi elinesibini uqhuba. Owalo nyaka ububhexeshwa yindumasi yeqhula uLoyiso Madinga. 
Bangama91 ababhengezwe njengabaphumeleleyo kumacandelo angama30 oonomathotholo abaquka abeKhampasi, Commercial, abasekuHlaleni nabeNkonzo yoSasazo lukaWonkewonke (PBS), kananjalo bebekhona noonomathotholo abasasaza ngeintanethi nangepodcast. 
Umfundi weendaba kwisikhululo solutsha seSABC esizinze eGqeberha, iTruFM, uBongi Baliti-Mantakana, ngomnye oye waziqaqambisa phakathi kwabaphumeleleyo ngobu busuku. 
UBaliti-Mantakana ubuye nembasa yomfundi weendaba otshatsheleyo. 
“ Ukuthi ndiyavuya kuncinane, ndichulumancile kakhulu. Emva kokuzama amatyeli aliqela ndide ndayiwela ibhlorho,” kutsho lo nondaba engawuval’ umlomo kukuvuya, esithi yona imbasa beyilindele kuba bikokwesithathu echongwa kweli bakala. 
“ Ibikhona into ethi mandincekelele kuba ndingumntu onokholo,” kutsho uBaliti-Mantakana. 
Le nzalelwane yasePort Alfred ithi ukunikwa imbasa kuthetha lukhulu, ikwakholelwa ukuba oku kubonisa ukwenza kakuhle. 
“Kwaye ukufakwa kukhuphiswano noogxa bam endibaxabisileyo, nendibonela kubo kokona kukhuthazayo ukuba ndiphakathi endleleni eyiyo,” woleke watsho. 
UBaliti-Mantakana uneshumi elinesihlanu ekunomathotholo. Uqale ngokusebenzela izikhululo zasekuhlaleni ezifana neNkqubela FM, Bay FM neEHfm 
“Bendinqwanqwadwa ngumakhwekhwetha uFikile Lubisi. Sele kuyiminyaka elishumi ndisenzela iSABC.” 
Uthi ukhule ejonge kubantu abafana noMam’ uNoxolo Grootboom, Linda Gqomfa noThandile Cekisani. 
“ Ndandidla ngokubalinganisa xa befunda,” kubalisa lo nondaba. 
Uthi okona kumonwabisayo ngomsebenzi wakhe luxinzelelo lokubamaphikana ulungiselela intsimbi elandelayo. 
“ Uninzi lwabantu aluqondi ukuba luninzi ulungiselelo oluphambi kwesiqendu ngasinye seendaba. Uyadidiyela, uhlele amanqaku aza kulungela abaphulaphuli ngokubaluleka kwawo, uhlele izandi, kwaye ke kufuneka uqonde ngokwenzekayo kwilizwe jikelele nakwihlabathi,” kutsho lo mama wabantwana ababini. 
UBaliti-Mantakana ukwaziwa nangokusebenza nemvumikazi uBerita kwicwecwe elithi Songs in the Key of Love nelathi  lafumana imbasa yeSAMA. Kwelo cwecwe uBaliti-Mantakana ubhale ingoma ethandwayo iNdicel’ikiss noJikizinto phakathi kwezinye.

headline: Obedlalela iChiefs uya kwiPirates
text:
Kulindeleke anxibe isikipa seBucs obefudula engumdlali weKaizer Chiefs.  
Umdlali wasesiswini, uHendrick Ekstein, kuthiwa uya kwiPirates emva kokulahlwa yiChiefs phambi kokuvalwa kwesizini ephelileyo.  
Kuke kwakho ukungavani phakathi kukaHendrick neChiefs ngenxa yemali ebekuthiwa uyayifuna phambi kokutyikitya isivumelwano esitsha kodwa ekugqibeleni wakhululwa emva kokuvakala kweengxelo ezithi uya kwiPirates.

headline: AbeANC baphulukene nolawulo lwesininzi koomasipala ababini eMpuma Koloni
text:
KOOMASIPALA ababini baseMpuma Koloni ebifudula ibalawula, iKoukamma neDr Beyers Naude, iANC iphulukene nolawulo lwesininzi kwaba masipala. 
Ukubalwa kweevoti kwaba masipala kugqityiwe. 
Ngo2016 iANC yaphumelela iKoukamma ngomyinge we-50.9%. Kolu lonyulo iANC iyakwazanga ukuphumelela ngesininzi kulo masipala ozinze eKareedouw. 
Emva kobalo, iANC ifumene u-46.3%, iDA 27.5% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-10.9%. 
Ukanti eDr Beyers Naude, umasipala ozinze eRhafu, iANC ifumene u-46.8%, iDA 39.6% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-4.2%. 
Ngo2016, iANC yaphumelela iDr Beyers Naude ngomyinge we-51.1%.

headline: Kuthe huu kwabafumene izindlu eDimbaza
text:
IKrisimesi ifike msinya kubaxhamli abaquka uninzi lwamaxhegwazana aseDimbaza afumene izindlu zawo ezintsha. La makhosikazi alale encumile ngethuba urhulumente wephondo enikezela ngezindlu ezingamakhulu amabini kwilali yaseMadakeni eDimbaza. Ezi zindlu zakhiwe liSebe lokuHlaliswa koLuntu. 
INkulubaphathiswa yeMpuma Koloni, uLubabalo Oscar Mabuyane, uthethe ngendlela ukwakhiwa kwezi zindlu okuchaphazela ngayo ubomi babantu abasesichengeni. 
“Ukuba sibeka ulwabiwomali lokwakha izindlu, ezo zindlu kufanele zakhiwe. Abantu abahlelelekileyo mabafumane izindlu, ezi zindlu azikho ngathi singurhulumente, zimalunga nesidima sabantu bakuthi, isidima sabantu abadala,” itshilo iNkulubaphathiswa. 
UMabuyane uthi kusalindeleke ezinye izindlu ezingaphezu kwekhulu elinamashumi alithoba anesibhozo (198) kwaWadi 36. Uyiqhwabele izandla intsebenziswano phakathi kukamasipala norhulumente wephondo, esithi iphungula umthwalo xa kukho intsebenziswano. 
“Into esingayifuniyo yimisebenzi engagqitywayo ngoonokontraka abashiya iindawo zokwakha bengawenzanga umsebenzi wabo, noonokontraka abangabhatalwanga ngexesha. Urhulumente xa ebaqashile onookontraka kufuneka ababhatale ngexesha ngokuba ukuba akababhatali ngexesha abazokusebenza,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
UMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa koLuntu eMpuma Koloni, uSiphokazi Mani-Lusithi uthe: “Singurhulumente ingakumbi iSebe lokuHlaliswa koLuntu sidibana namagosa nezinye iintlangano ezincedisana nathi ekwakheleni abantu iindawo  ezikhuselekileyo. Kuba kaloku sifuna ukunqanda into yoonokontraka abashiya izindlu zingagqitywanga, kubelula kurhulumente ukuthatha ikontraka yakhe xa sibona ukuba isakhono asikho kunokontraka.” 
UMani-Lusithi uqhubeke ethetha ngeenzame zabo bonke ababandakanyekayo. “Lo mzekelo sinawo namhlanje kukubonakalisa ukuba xa sisebenzisana singakha kwaye sihambise iinkonzo ebantwini bakuthi ngokukhawulezileyo. Sinazo iintlanganiso noomasipala ukujonga into yokuba le mingeni iphambi kwethu siyisusa njani,” utshilo. 
Ixhegokazi elingelinye labaxhamli abafumene izindlu,  uNombuyiselo Zondani uthe: “Namhlanje ndiyabulela, indlu yesamente zange ndiyihlale mna. Ndiyanibulela, noonokontraka ndiyababulela, ndiyambulela norhulumente obabhatalayo. Ndibulela nokusebenzisana kakuhle ukuba benze le ndlu ndihlala kuyo. Ndizolala kuyo namhlanje kude kuphele ubomi.” 
Ukunikezelwa kwezindlu kwandulela ukutyhilwa komfanekiso oqingqiweyo kaMfundisi Canon James Calata eQoboqobo. Lo mfundisi wadlala indima kumzabalazo. Wayengumfundisintsapho owajika waba ngumfundisi noNobhala Jikelele weANC ngeminyaka yoo1940. 
UMfundisi uCalata ukwaqambe iingoma zenkululeko kunye namaculo ecawa asaculwa kwinkonzo yamaTshetshi.  INkulubaphathiswa uMabuyane uthe lo mfanekiso uyinxalenye yelifa lethu. Uthe ngaphandle kwamafa nenkcubeko akukho khenketho.

headline: Umtshini wamagowuli ufikile kwiJuventus
text:
Ukuba izinto zingahamba ngendlela athethe ngayo, abalandeli bebhola kwilizwe laseItaly mabalindele izinto ezibhetele.  
URonaldo uthengwe yiJuventus kwiveki ephelileyo ngemali engaphaya kwebhiliyoni ngokwemali yoMzantsi Afrika.  
Ngokweengxelo eziphume eMadrid, lo mdlali zange abone ngasonye nomongameli weReal Madrid ngemiba eyoyamene nemali. Ekuqaleni kwale veki, uCR7 ugalelekile kwiJuventus – apho amkelwe ngezandla ezishushu.  
URonaldo (33) uthe uyalibulela ithuba alinikiweyo yiJuventus watsho esithi abadlali abaninzi abakule minyaka akuyo – baphelela eChina naseQatar. 
“Ndingatsho ukuba iJuventus lelinye lamaqela aphambili kwihlabathi. Ukuza apha kwam yinto endiyicingileyo kakuhle – kodwa ndingatsho ukuba ibisisigqibo esilula kakhulu kum ukuba kwiqela elikhulu eItaly. Eli linyathelo elibalulekileyo kakhulu kwikhono lam. Ndiyalibulela kakhulu ithuba endilinikwa yiJuventus. Ndiyavuya ngoba yiyo endifunileyo kwaye ndinethemba lokuyithatha ndiyibeke endaweni ephezulu. Andizanga zokudlala apha; ndifuna ukushiya umzila,” utshilo uRonaldo kwikhasi lomnatha, uTwitter. 
URonaldo ebeyinxalenye yeqela lesizwe lasePortugal ekhutshwe yiUruguay kwiNdebe yeHlabathi ebi banjelwe eRussia kutshanje. 
 Nakubeni iinzame zingakwazanga ukunceda iPortugal – kodwa indebe yehlabathi ivalwe ephakathi kwabadlali abafake amagowuli amaninzi. Ukuba izinto zimhambele kakuhle, iJuventus ingenza izimanga kwiChampions League ngoba uRonaldo uyafana nje nomtshini okhupha amagowuli.  
Ushiya efake amagowuli angaphaya kwamakhulu amane, iindebe ezimbini zeLa Liga nezine zeChampions League.  
Kanti wenza indima ebonakalayo kwimpumelelo eyazuzwa yiPortugal kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo kwindebe yaseYurophu. 
URonaldo uthe zikhona izinto ezimnyanzele ukuba athathe isigqibo.  
“Ndiphile qete. Yiyo lo nto ndiziqhenya ngokuba lapha. Mna andifani nabanye abadlali abacinga ukuba kuphelile ngabo xa befika kwiminyaka endikuyo. Ubukho bam apha buyandikhuthaza kakhulu kwaye ndifuna impumelelo,” utshilo uRonaldo.

headline: Kuzakucaca inkunzi phakathi kweDowns neChiefs
text:
IMamelodi Sundowns izakudibana neKaizer Chiefs kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi weTelkom Knockout.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba bebethe iSupersport United ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye kumdlalo ububanjelwe eLucas Moripe ngokuhlwa ngoMgqibelo. 
Amagowuli afakwe nguLeornado Castro,  uThabo Nthethe kunye noBongani Zungu, ngawo ase iqela likaMosimane kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi. 
Isiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo besilawulwa yiSundowns. Eli qela belidlala umdlalo okhawulezayo kakhulu, kwaye bebefaka uxinizelelo kakhulu kubadlali bangasemva beSupersport United.  
Kwimizuzu nje embalwa emva koku, abafana bakaMosimane bafumene igowuli lokuvula ngelixa uCastro efaka emnatheni ibhola kaThemba Zwane. 
UDolly nobewuqhuba kakhulu ngokwakhe lo mdlalo ukhe wazivavanyela uRonwen Williams naye. 
Emva komzamo omninzi weSundowns uNthethe ufake igowuli lesibini leSundowns, emva kwebhola ethunyelwe nguDolly ngenqina lasekhohlo. 
UZungu uye wakwazi ukugqibezela umsebenzi wabo ngomzuzu wamashumi asibhozo, uqhaqhe abadlali abambalwa beSupersport bangemva phambi kokuba afake ibhola ngaphaya koWilliams. UMosemane uthethe ngolu hlobo emva kwalo mdlalo: “Bekunzinyana ngethuba usandula kuqala umdlalo, bendinexhala ngoDove Wome kuba ebehlupha amadlali base- sizikithini ngasemva, kwaye iphantse yaba ngumceli mngeni le nto.” 
UMosimane utshilo ukuba akukho  nesidingo sokuba baqhayise kodwa uyavuya yimpumelelo yabo.

headline: UDJ Sbu ubuya nomculo kunye nesiselo!
text:
ABALANDELI bakaDJ S’bu bazakuncuma bakuva ukuba lo somashishini nomsasazi wodumo akawulahlanga umculo. 
US’bu, nowaduma kakhulu ngengoma ethi “Le ngoma” awayenza nemvumikazi yaseMpuma Koloni uZahara, udize kwiTimesLive ukuba ubil’ esoma ngalo mzuzu esebenza emculweni. “Umsebenzi wam omtsha kanomathotholo, undinika ithuba lokusebenza kwakhona kwishishini lam. Igama lam ndalakha ngomculo,” utshilo. 
Kwinxalenye yokubuya kwakhe unezicwangciso zokukhupha ukracaza wecwecwe ngenyanga yoMsintsi/Septemba. 
Usebenze noZahara kwenye yeengoma kwaye ukwasebenzise neemvumi ezifana noSimphiwe Dana. US’bu, kukwavakala ukuba usebenza kwisiselo se-vodka eyeyakhe, ngokunjalo namanzi asebhotileni, nekulindeleke ukuba konke oko akukhuphe ungaphelanga unyaka.  
Uthe, “Ivodka ibizwa iLoko Flame. Okwangoku sisakrobisa nje, sigqibile ukusebenza kuhlobo lwayo kwaye ngoku sisebenza kwimo yokwenziwa kwebhotile. Ngokuqinisekileyo izakuphuma ungaphelanga lo nyaka.”

headline: Kujongwe ngabomvu iziphumo zovoto eGonubie namhlanje
text:
Kuzele qhu kwisikolo saseMzamowethu nakwiholo yoluntu eGonubie ngabahlali beyokufaka u-X wabo nanjengoko namhlanje ilusuku lonyulo lovalo sikhewu kwaWadi 27. 
Abahlali bathi eyona nto bayinqwenelayo lutshintsho kuphela kwindawo yabo kwaneemeko abaphila phantsi kwazo. 
Abalandeli bombutho ophikisayo iDA bathuthwa ziiteksi ukuya kwizikhululo zokuvota. 
Inkokheli yeDA kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni uNqaba Bhanga, encokola nephaphandaba kwitafile yeDA eGonubie, udize ukuba  bazokuyithatha le wadi ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo. 
Logama usihlalo weANC kula mmandla uBantu Gobho,  esithi nabo bengumbutho olawulayo izakubuyela kubo kwakhona le wadi. 
Nangona kunjalo, imvano engekhoyo kwanomlo ogqubayo phakathi kwamalungu eANC ewodwa iyabonakala kuba abanye bahleli kwelabo icala nabanye bakwelabo icala. 
Abahamba nenkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle babodwa logama abalandela  obengunobhala wephondo uOscar Mabuyane bebodwa nabo. Oku ngevani kulandela emva kokuba abahlali bekhala ngokuba iphondo libanike ngenkani  uceba abangamfuniyo uBoy Boy Kalani, logama bona abahlali bebefuna uceba wabo ibenguVuyisile Hokisi. 
Umgqatswa ophuma kwiDA nguVusi Jako.  
Uluntu ngokuhlwa namhlanje lulindele iziphumo malunga nolu lonyulo lubanjiweyo.

headline: UGold Diggers uyalandela!
text:
Phantse ibelelo xesha belikade lilindiwe lokuba sazi ukuba ngubani ongubani kumdlalo omtsha-tsha ka-e.tv uGold Diggers. 
Lo mdlalo usizobela umfanekiso ngqondweni wosapho lakwa-Gumede. Ukhangele kwicala lothando, imali, iingxabano zosapho nobudlelwane obungezoqoqosho kwicandelo lomgodi. 
Nqwa nomdlalo osele uzakusongwa ka-Ashes to Ashes , nawo lo ubalisa ngobomi, kwaye uqulethe iziqendu ezilikhulu mashumi amahlanu anesihlanu (155). 
UGold Diggers kulindeleke athabathe indawo kumabonakude ukusukela ngomhla weshumi ku-Agasti, kodwa uzakuqala afudumeze indawo yakhe ngoLwesihlanu ophambi koko. 
Kulindeleke adlale ukusukela ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesihlanu naye. 
Ngoku, masikhe sikukrobise kwiimbuso ezizakudlala kulo mdlalo: 
Ngubani ongubani? 
UPatrick Gumede udlalwa nguMbongeni Ngema 
Eselula, uPatrick wayesazi mhlophe ukuba uzakuba ngumsebenzi wase migodini. 
Uyise wayengesosinhanha, kodwa wayenomhlaba ophangaleleyo, neenkomo eziliqela nezamnceda walobola uRuth. 
Umtshato kaRuth noPatrick wawufana nomtshato olungiselelweyo kodwa onganyanzelwanga. Kodwa emva kokuzimanya no-Patrick, uRuth wayengenakushiya okanye awuthengise umhlaba kayise eMashekeni. 
Indima ka-Ruth ilinganiswa ngu-Clementine Mosimane. 
URuth ukhulele eMpumalanga. Uyise wayenamakhosikazi amabini: Omnye ingowase Lesotho ngelixa unina kaRuth yena waye ingowase Mpumalanga. URuth waye yintombi yabo nomntwana wabo ekuphela kwakhe. 
Ukutshata kwakhe noPatrick yayikukufezekiswa kwephupha lakhe, kodwa phupha elo lajika layincindi yekhala emva kokuba uPatrick wacela ukuthabatha umfazi wesibini. 
Igqiza elipheleleyo kuGold Diggers liquka uMay Gumede odlalwa nguTina Jaxa, uBigboy Gumede odlalwa nguMxolisi “Zulu-Boy” Majozi, uRonald Gumede odlalwa ngu-Thabo Malema, uLucky Gumede odlalwa nguMpho Sibeko, * -Olwethu Gumede onguZimkhitha Nyoka, uHlengiwe Gumede onguFikile Mthwalo, uGideon odlalwa nguPeter Mashigo kunye no-Nandipha odlalwa ngu-Keneilwe Matidze.

headline: Inkosikazi itofe amadoda eyithe ntsho ngamehlo
text:
Inkosikazi enamashumi amane anesine ubudala yaseNgobozana eLusikisiki ikhalazela ukutofwa ezimpundu kwisibhedlele sale dolophu ithiwe ntsho ngamehlo zizigulana ezingamadoda. 
Oku kwenzeke kwisibhedlele iSt Elizabeth eLusikisiki.  
Ixhoba eli alifunanga kuchazwa ngagama ngelokukhusela isidima salo. 
Le nkosikazi ithi yaya eSt Elizabeth emva kokuphathwa ziintlungu. 
“Xa sele ndingaphakathi kumagumbi onyango ndothuswa kukuba kuthwe mandijikele kwelinye icala kuba ndizokutofwa, xa ndijikela kukho izigulana ezingootata. Ndibe nombuzo kumongikazi lo uthi mandijikele wokuba ndizotofa ndawoni. 
“Umnqa kukuba umongikazi wathi ndiza kutofwa ezimpundu watsho esithi mandinyuse ilokhwe ndiveze iimpundu atofe,” kutsho le nkosikazi. 
“Zange ndibe saqhubeka ndibuza kuba into endandiyifuna kukuphila kuphele iintlungu kodwa ngaphakathi ndandingayithandi eyokutofwa phambi kwamadoda. Ndandizibuza ukuba ziphi iindawo ezikhethekileyo zokutofa; ibe nguwe nomongikazi kuphela,” kutsho ixhoba. 
Uthi ubunzima kukuba wayenxibe ilokhwe kwabanzima nokuba ahlikihle isitofu esi xa egqiba ukutofa. 
Ukanti isithethi seSebe lezeMpilo kweli leMpuma Koloni uSizwe Kupelo uthi oko kwenzekileyo akwamkelekanga kwaye akuvumelekanga kwaphela. 
“Izibhedlele zethu zinamagumbi abucala ekubonelwa kuwo izigulana apho ibasisigulane nomongikazi kuphela hayi owesithathu umntu. Oku kuhambelana nokuqinisekisa isidima kwizigulana zethu,” utshilo uKupelo.

headline: Banewayilese yabo eNgcobo
text:
YIMINCILI kubantu boMasipala weSithili iChris Hani nanjengoko beza kuphulaphula unomathotholo wabo. 
Lo nomathotholo, obizwa njengokuba yiEngcobo FM, uza kuphehlelelwa ngokusesikweni ngomhla wesithoba kule nyanga yoMsintsi. 
Ngokutsho kukaLusi Tan onguMastishi wesi sikhululo sasekuhlaleni sitsha, uluhlu lweenkqubo ze-Engcobo FM ziza kubhengezwa emsithweni ngomhla wokuvula. 
Kule mpelaveki, uLwesihlanu umhla we27 kule yeThupha, esi sikhululo siza kubamba iiodishini zokukhangela abasasazi. Ezi odishini zokukhangela ulutsha olunesakhono sokusasaza ziza kubanjelwa kwizakhiwo zeNgcobo FM ezikwa232                          kumgaqo iPower Station. 
“Nabani na ominyaka iyi18 ukonyuka wamkelekile. Sifuna abasasazi, abafundi beendaba, iintatheli kwanabasasazi bezemidlalo. Esi sikhululo sifumaneka lula edolophini Engcobo. Iinkcukacha zikhona kuFacebook wesikhululo Engcobo FM,” uMphathi-Sikhululo uLusi Tan uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
UTan uthi iEngcobo FM iza kusasaza iinkqubo ezintlobontlobo. 
Uthi esi sikhululo sesiqalile ukuvakala ku-96.6 kususela ngomhla wama28 kweyeKhala, sidlala umculo omnandi ngelokuvavanya amaz’omoya. 
“IEngcobo FM iyafumaneka na-online. Yiya nje kuPlay Store udawunlowude iApp uphulaphule,” kwazisa uMastishi. 
Esi sikhululo asifumaneki kuMasipala weDr AB Xuma kuphela, sikwavakala nakwiidolophu ezifana neGcuwa, Dutywa naseMthatha. 
UTan uthi esi sikhululo siza kusasazela abaphulaphuli baso ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. 
IEngcobo FM ibhaliswe ngo2015, yaze yafumana ilayisenisi yokusasaza kwaICASA ngo2017. 
“Ziqale ngoko izicwangciso zomsebenzi. IEngcobo FM iye yafumana inkxasomali kwaMDDA kunyaka ophelileyo, saqala ke nesicwangciso sokwakha esi sikhululo sikanomathotholo emva koko,” kutsho uTan. 
UMphathi wesi sikhululo sosasazo uqhayisa ngamava akwiminyaka engama26 ekwezosasazo. 
“Ndisebenze eMetro FM naseY-FM, kwaye ndisebenze neqela elaqala iUCR FM, ngoko ndiza namava aluqilima wokwakha esi sikhululo,” kutsho uTan, okwanawo namava kwezeentengiso. 
Uthembise abantu baseNgcobo ngosasazo olukwizinga eliphezulu, imixholo enik’ umdla, umculo neenkqubo ezakhayo.

headline: ‘Sifuna ukuba sisikolo sokuqala eMpuma Koloni’
text:
Abantwana besikolo saseBhayi, iNdzondelelo Secondary School, baza kufumana ithuba elinqabileyo ebomini babo xa isikolo sabo sidibana nezinye izikolo kukhuphiswano ekuthiwa yiCOPA Coca-Cola emidlalweni eza kube iseThekwini kwinyanga ezayo.  
INdzondelelo ziintshatsheli zeMpuma Koloni ezivunyiweyo emva kokuba ibethe izikolo eziliqela emidlalweni yephondo ebibanjelwe eMdantsane.  
Into edume ngayo iCOPA Coca-Cola kukunika abantwana bezikolo abangaphantsi kweminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu ithuba lokudlala ibhola ekhatywayo kwaye yaziwa nangokuvumbulula italente ezindaweni ezihlelelekileyo. 
 EMpuma Koloni kugqugqise iNdzondelelo ebethe iWittebergen Secondary School ngo’3-0 emdlalweni wokugqibela eOrlando Stadium, eMdantsane.  
Umqeqeshi wesikolo esiphumeleleyo, uMnu. uDumisani Thyse, uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa okokuba abantwana bachulumancile kakhulu emva kokuzuza indebe. 
“Sivuya kakhulu ngoba isikolo sethu siphumelele okokuqala kwimidlalo yeCoca-Cola. Kusivuyisa kakhulu ukuba ziintshatsheli zeCOPA Coca-Cola apha eMpuma Koloni. Abantwana bethu bachulumance kakhulu nabo. Kaloku le nto yenzekileyo iza kubanika ithuba lokubonwa ngabacholacholi betalente phaya eThekwini. Lo nto ithi umntwana angabonwa nayiSuperSport United eza kuthumela abantu bayo phaya. Ukuchongwa kwakhe umntwana kungenza azibone edlala ezindaweni ezingcono,” utshilo uThyse obevakala onwabile. Nakubeni isikolo sakhe sisiya KwaZulu-Natal, uThyse uthe isikolo sakhe siza kulwela ukuphumelela.  
“Asiyi nje phaya. Siza kudlala ngokuzimisela nyhani. Amalungiselelo wethu mahle kakhulu ngoba abantwana bethu badlalela amaqela aphantsi kukaSafa apha eBhayi. Siyokulwa eThekwini, asihambi nje. Sifuna ukuba sisikolo sokuqala eMpuma Koloni esiphumelele kwizwelonke,” utshilo.

headline: Isizwe sathengiswa ngoosopolitiki
text:
Bona abaseMzantsi Afrika oosopolitiki bathengise isizwe kwiingxoxo ezazisandulela inkululeko ukuqalela kwiminyaka yoo1990 ukuya ku1996, unyaka wokusayinwa komgaqo-siseko (Constitution Act 108 of 1996). Abo bangakwaziyo ukufunda isiNgesi ze bangakhathazeki kuba inyaniso yona iza kuvela, kuba zininzi iincwadi ezidiza le ntlungu yokuthengiswa kwesizwe. 
Namhlanje kwenzeka kanye loo nto kweli lizwe lethu, kodwa apha kuthi le meko ithabathe unyawo kuba sibenelishwa: 
1. Lokuphathwa ngamasela azicingela wona nooDuduzane bawo (kleptocracy). 
2. Baphinda bathi silambe sinjalo, bakhulula amanye amazwe elizweni jikelele ukuba azokushishina kwilizwe lethu ngaphandle kwemvume yethu.  
Kanye njengamakhoboka ayehamba angabuyeli emakhaya, ingathi nalapha eMzantsi Afrika alikho ithemba lokuba singaze sibuyele kwankqu kulaa meko yaseJiphethe yeempimpi zooMatanzima namabhulu. Umhla nezolo soloko kuvakala amabali eenkokeli zopolitiko nabaqeshwa bakarhulumente abafake izandla kuVimba Wesizwe bazithaphulele izigidi kuVimba. Xa besenza le mikhonyovu bayalibala ngezigidi zamakhaya apho ikati izalela eziko, ivuke indoda yomzi ingazi nokuba iya phi na, kanti iyokuhlangana namanye amahlwempu ezitalatweni zezwe lethu, kuba kule mihla, imali yesizwe isezipokotweni zabacinezeli abamnyama. Ndiseza kunichazela ngombhodamo owawusenzeka eMpuma Koloni ukubuya kwama “delakufa” elubhacweni, mhla bafumanisa ukuba zikhona iincwadi zikarhulumente zokuthenga. Inene i’cadre’ elingazange lityebe ngaloo mihla lelingaphilanga entloko. Babodwa naba benze izibhambathiso nezityebi zamabhulu ngokwezoqoqosho baphetha beba zizityebi kwisityikityiki sentswelo yabantu abangenakamva liqaqambileyo. 
Bona ke oosopolitiki banobuchule bokucwangcisa izithembiso xa kusondele ixesha lokuvota. Sebeqalisile abafana noMalema ukugaya abantu abaza kubavotela, kodwa kwabona kuleEFF (Economic Foreigners’ Friends) bathengisa isizwe kumagrigamba phantsi kwentetho ebubuxoki ethi “Africa for Africans”.  
Xa ubuxoki obu buphindaphindwa ukuthethwa, bude bufane nenyaniso.Zekhe nisibuzele kuMalema noCyril Ramaphosa, njengokuba abafana nabo bezimisele ukulwela amalungelo amagrigamba okushishina kwilizwe lethu nje, ingaba bakhona abeSuthu abashishinayo e-Indiya? 
 Ingaba akhona na amaXhosa anezirhoxo neevenkile ePakistan? Ingaba bakhona na abaPedi abanezirhoxo eBangladesh naseZimbabwe? 
Apha ngezantsi ndiza kubonisa ukuthi ezinye izizwe e-Afrika azilungiseleli abantu bamanye amazwe ngokwenza abavoti bawo idini. 
Kodwa eMzantsi Afrika abezopolitiko kuquka iANC neEFF bavana phantsi kwebhanile yokuthengisa abantu bethu kwizizwe zamagrigamba, baze bathi xa sikhalaza bamemelele bewathethelela phantsi kwegama * ”Xenophobia”. Abukho ubuxoki obudlula elo gama lika”Xenophobia” apha eMzantsi Afrika.Asoze umntu omnyama acaphukele okanye oyike omnye umntu omnyama ngokwenkcazelo yesichazimagama. Ndinifungisa amathile, ukuba oosopolitiki bebengasithengisanga isizwe, bendingasoze ndibe nesibindi sokubhala incwadi elumkisa isizwe kooHlohlesakhe.  
Enye intlungu eyongezelelayo kukuba xa bethelekiswa nexesha lamabhulu engcinezelo, la masebe karhulumente kwawona awawuchani kakuhle nomsebenzi.  
Bantu bakuthi ndinixelela ukunganixokisi, emva kwala mbhodamo wokubuya kwama”delakufa” elubhacweni, wonke umntu efuna ukuzenza bhetele ngomnye khona ukuze athenjwe asebenze, apho indoda ibibekwa njengentloko yesebe ingazanga yaphangela kurhulumente, ukruthakruthwano olwaluqhuba apho lwenza ukuba umgangatho uhle kakhulu eburhulumenteni. 
Umzekelo, laa ngxaki yaseSidimeni ibingasoze yehle kumbuso weempimpi. Nala madelakufa enza impazamo ngokungalandeli imiyalelo kaO.R Tambo awayeyinika amajoni oMkhonto Wesizwe. Zifundeleni ngokwenu hleze nicinge ukuba ndiyaxoka. Andizukuyitolikela esiXhoseni, abangasichaniyo isingesi baya kuncedwa ngabasichanayo. Wathi uPresident Tambo: 
“Comrades, you might think it is very difficult to wage a liberation struggle. Wait until you are in power. By then, you will realise that it is actually more difficult to keep the power than to wage a liberation war. People would be expecting a lot of services from you. You would have to satisfy the various demands of the masses of our people. In the process, be prepared to learn from other people’s revolutions.Learn from the enemy alsoThe enemy is not necessarily doing everything wronglyYou may take his right tactics and use them to your advantageAt the same time, avoid repeating the enemy’s mistakes.” 
– OLIVER TAMBO, ANC President in exile from 1960 -1990, addressing MK guerrillas in Southern Angola, in 1977. 
Oko kucaca ngomgangatho ophantsi weenkonzo kuwo onke amasebe oburhulumente.  
Nkqu kwisebe lobupolisa umgangatho uye usihla ngokuhla eMzantsi Afrika. 
Umzekelo, ukuba ufumene ingozi yemoto eMthatha, nokuba ugilwe ngala manxila angenazimpepho zokuqhuba, musa ukufana ucinge ukuba uza kuncedakala, kufuneka uthathe umphefumlo wakho uhambe uye esibhedlele ukuba usaphila, kuba asoze afike amapolisa.  
Akukhathaliseki nokuba uye wanethemba ngokufika kwamapolisa endlela (traffic cops) akukho zawo kuba eMzantsi Afrika kwabakho ububhanxa bomthetho othi kufuneka ibe ngamapolisa kuphela athatha ii “measurements” nezinye iinkcukacha.Enye yeengxaki ezagubungela uMzantsi Afrika yintlaninge yabacebisi ababevela kwiinkalo zonke bebizana “comrade” kodwa bengazi nto. 
Naleyo imeko mhlawumbi ndingongeza esinye isiqendu ukucacisa.Omnye umhlobo wam wagilwa ngamanxila yaphela imoto yakhe eMthatha, lafika ipolisa lezendlela lafumanisa ukuthi omnye umqhubi lo unxile bhakada engenayo ne’licence’. 
Elo polisa lendlela lema apho lafana nonopopi.Ukuba unokuzama ukuphanda isizathu esibangela ukuba uhle ngolu hlobo umgangatho weenkonzo zoburhulumente ngexesha lenkululeko, uya kufumanisa ukuthi isizathu esiphambili sinye – eMzantsi Afrika akusekho mali yeenkonzo zoburhulumente. Siyathanda asithandi, kweli xesha kulawulo lwaseMzantsi Afrika-ayikho imali yeenkonzo zoburhulumente, lungasoze luphele noqhankqalazo lweenkonzo kweli lizwe, ngaphandle kokuba kungenzeka umangaliso oqala ngokubuyiselwa kwamagrigamba kumazwe awo. 
Kodwa ke andithethi ukuthi mababanjwe ngesixhanti bakhonjwe komawabo.Ikhona indlela ephucukileyo yokwenza oko ngokusemthethweni.Kona yinyani emsulwa ukuba abantu abasokolayo bona basentlungwini exube nomsindo, kodwa ke umsindo awusoze uncede. 
Kodwa ke ngoku ndisaqala ezantsi koosodolophu. Kwiziqendu ezilandelayo ndiyeza kungcatsho lwesizwe neminye imibandela ngezikhulu zopolitiko kwipalamente yesizwe.  
Yena uRamaphosa ebekade elele kule minyaka, ngoku uzenza mhle ngokungathi ubakhathalele abantwana bethu abazula esithubeni. Ndinganixelela ngokungafihlisiyo nokusemthethweni ukuthi, ukuba oosodolophu nooceba babo bebesikhathalele isizwe, ngekungagcwalanga abantu bamanye amazwe abashishina kwiindawo zoobawo. 
 Ayingomona ingeyiyo nezenofobhiya ngaphezulu xa abantu behlupheka yile nkqubo. Sukube iyi “economic homeostasis” endiyichazayo kwisiqendu esilandelayo.

headline: UMakaab ucacisa ngekamva likaJali!
text:
Umdlali-siswini weBafana Bafana, * -Andile Jali, ufunwa ngapha nangapha.  
Kwisithuba seenyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo isivumelwano sengqesho sikaJali neKV Oostende yaseBelgium sizakuphelelwa.  
Iqela lakhe linawo umnqweno wokusivuselela isivumelwano sakhe – kanti nalapha eMzantsi Afrika kuthiwa iKaizer Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns zinomdlali kulo mdlali.  
Umanejala wakhe, uMike Makaab, uxelele Isolezwe ukuba uJali ngeke abuyele eMzantsi Afrika kwangoku. 
“UJali uzakuhlala kwiqela lakhe kude kuphele isivumelwano sakhe. Siyaxoxa ne-Oostende okwangoku. Bazimisele ngokumgcina kwela qela – kusekho into engacacanga. UMark Cook ophethe ela qela uyalithengisa. Xa kunjalo ke kubakhona ukuxinga kwezinto ngokutyikitywa kwezivumelwano,” utshilo uMakaab. 
UJali waya eYurophu esuka kwi-Orlando Pirates ngo-2014. Nangona kukho ukungacaci kwezinto kwiqela lakhe – kodwa yena uyayifumana imidlalo kwaye likhona nethuba lokuthathwa ngamaqela aseYurophu.

headline: UMalunga ukulungele ukubamba iintambo
text:
IMPUMELELO kwi-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu ayixhomekekanga kumntu omnye, yintsebenziswano phakathi kwabasebenzi beliziko.  
Oku kuthethwe ngusekela Mkhuseli Woluntu kweli uAdvocate Kevin Malunga.  
UMalunga ukuluhlu lwabayi-59 ababhengezwe yiPalamente kugqatso lokungena ezihlangwini zoMkhuseli Woluntu oshiyayo * -Advocate Thuli Madonsela.  
UMadonsela uzakusishiya esi sikhundla ngo-Okthobha emva kweminyaka esixhenxe yexesha le-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu.  
UMalunga uthi ukulungele ukuqhubekeka apho ashiye khona uMadonsela xa elinikwa elo thuba. “Ndineminyaka emithathu enesiqingatha ndikweli ziko, ndisebenze njengebambela loMkhuseli Woluntu izihlandlo ezingamashumi amathathu, ndihambe kwiindawo ngeendawo zasekuhlaleni kweli, ndaya nakwamanye amazwe ndimele eli ziko. Ndikhokele amaqela ophando, ndikwangusihlalo kwamanye wamasebe ethu.” 
 Ukwathe, ukusebenza njengoMkhuseli Woluntu ayingomsebenzi nje kuye, kukunika inkonzo kwisizwe ngeliqinisekisa urhulumento olululo, ukulwa nobuqhophololo, nokubona uluntu luxhamla kwiinkonzo elingazifumaniyo ngenxa yobuqhophololo.  
Uthe ukuba utyunjiwe uzakuqhubekeka nomsebenzi awuqhelileyo nokumilisela iimbono zakhe ngeli ziko. “Ngumnqweno wam ukuba sakhe kwisiseko sentembeko esiyinikwa luluntu,” utshilo okaMalunga.  
Ukwathe unenjongo yokuvula i-ofisi yesithathu yoMkhuseli Woluntu eMpuma Koloni. “Okwangoku sine ofisi eseBhisho neseMthatha, injongo yethu kukuvula eyesithathu eBhayi. Ndinqwenela nokuba siqinise ii-ofisi ezijikelezayo ezifikelela koomasipala abaliqela kweli.” 
 Uthe uninzi lwezikhalazo zoluntu zisuka koomasipala, uluntu lukhalazela ukuqhwalela kweenkonzo, izindlu zesibonelelo ezingekho mgangathweni nokuqeshana ngokwazana.  
UMalunga uqhube wathi, “Eyona ngxaki inkulu kukungalandelwa kwemithetho yenkqubo zokuthenga zaseburhulumenteni. Enye yezinto esizakugxila kuzo kukuxhobisa abaphandi kule ofisi ngemithetho elawula intengo yaseburhulumenteni,” utshilo okaMalunga.  
Wenze umzekelo ngezikhalazo ezijoliswe kumasebe aseburhulumenteni kweli phondo ngezityholo zokusebenzisa gwenxa intengo yaseburhulumenteni kumalungiselelo omngcwabo kaNelson Mandela.  
“Ihlazo lebholo lokutyiwa kwemali kumalungiselelo omngcwabo kaMandela kubonakalisa ukuba kukho abajonge ukutya xa besenza intengo yaseburhulumenteni,” ucacise ngelo.  
Ukwathe i-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu mayingajongwa njengotshaba likarhulumente. “Asilwi tshaba norhulumente, silungisa iimpazamo zikarhulumente. Siphanda izikhalazo, sisebenzise ubungqina obuphambi kwethu,” uqhube watsho.  
Ukwathe abo banamathandabuzo ngakuye mabajonge isimo sakhe ngakubuqhophololo, “Andizange ndakhusela mntu ofunyaniswe enobuqhophololo,” utshilo okaMalunga.

headline: UKhonco wongeze intshinga ye-IBO
text:
Amava kunokwenzeka kuthi kanti yenye yezinto ezibethe uSiyabonga Siyo kumlo obuphakathi kwakhe noSimphiwe Khonco ebusuku ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo. UKhonco ulwe kakuhle kula mlo waze wayintshatsheli entsha ye-IBO minimum weight emva kokubetha uSiyo ngamanqaku. 
Zisuka nje kulo mlo la matyendyana aphuma kweli phondo leMpuma Koloni athe axhimfana kwanzima futhi ezibonakalisa amandla anawo omabini. Kodwa uKhonco nguye oye wathi kratya ngenxa yamava kakhulu kwaye amanqindi akhe ebenyanzelisa uSiyo azikhusele ixesha elininzi. 
Imijikelo emininzi ebeyilawula uKhonco, kwaye intswahla ibisenziwa ngabalandeli ibibonakalisa ukuba uphumelele. 
USiyo ukwazile ukuziphendulela kwimijikelo emithathu apho bekubonakala ukuba isekhona intlantsi. 
UKhonco kodwa ukwazile ukuwulawula umlo kwaye neqonga ebelisebenzisa kakuhle kakhulu.  
Lo ngumlo wokuqala abethwe kuwo uSiyo kwimilo yakhe ayilwileyo elishumi elinanye. Nangona ekugqibeleni ephumelele uKhonco, wona umlo ubungelulanga nakuye. Yiyo lo nto umlo utsale ixesha elide. 
Komnye umlo uKevin Lerena ubethe uRoberto Bolonti ngamanqaku kumlo wentshinga yeCruiserweight onemijikelo elishumi. 
Zonke iijaji kulo mlo ziwunike uLerena ngokwamanqaku kuba oko ebewulawula umlo ukusuka ekuqaleni. Amanqindi akhe asuka kwisandla sasekhohlo ebefika ahlale ebusweni kuBolonti. 
Komnye umlo wodidi olungezantsi * -Ayanda Nkosi ubethe uJoshua Studdard ngamanqaku xa bebesilwela intshinga yejunior featherweight. 
chris.gilili@inl.co.za

headline: Amaqela ezopolitiko aphefumla kwintetho kaMasualle
text:
Amaqela ezopolitiko aphefumle ngentetho yobume bephondo ethe yenziwa yiNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle kwiveki ephelileyo. USithandiwe Velaphi uncokole neenkokeli zala maqela esiva izimvo zazo. 
Thando Mpulu weUDM: 
Bendingalindelanga ukuba athethe into entsha kuba sisembindini wexesha elimiselweyo leminyaka emihlanu. Siyi-UDM siyakwamkelwa ukubekelwa ecaleni kwemali ekwizigidi ezingamashumi amabini eerandi (R20m) ukuphuhlisa abantu abatsha kwezolimo.  
Kodwa zikhona izinto esiqonda ukuba izishiye ngaphandle iNkulumbuso.  
Xa siqwalasela umba wophuhliso lwamaphandle, sifumanisa ukuba iNkulumbuso iwubethe ngoyaba lo mba, uthethe nje ngezolimo kodwa akanaba banzi.  
Kwakhona, lo rhulumente wephondo ulahlekelwa zibhiliyoni zeerandi kumabango wabantu abafuna imbuyekezo yemali kwisebe lezempilo, kodwa iNkulumbuso yakhetha ukutya tyum. 
Bobby Stevenson weDA: 
INkulumbuso itsho amatyeli kwintetho yayo ukuba iMpuma Koloni iphantsi kolawulo oluluqilima. Ukuba icinga njalo, makube iphila kwihlabathi layo yodwa. 
Izinga lentswelo-ngqesho eMpuma Koloni lithe gqolo ngokukhula. Kwezemfundo, apho urhulumente wephondo achitha isiqingatha semali, iNkulumbuso ayikhange ithethe nto ingumhlahla-ndlela.  
Bendicinga ukuba uyakubhengeza iinkqubo zokuphucula ezemfundo ngokuthi iinqununu zityikitye isivumelwano sokusebenza nesebe lezemfundo.  
INkulumbuso ithetha ngoncedo kubantu abatsha kodwa ilibala eyona nto ibalulekileyo, eyokuba ulutsha lufikelele kumnatha wonxibelelwano (WiFi) ukuze luthabathe inxaxheba kwezoqoqosho. INkulumbuso ithetha ngeprojekthi yezamanzi eMzimvubu, kodwa ayitsho ukuba uqala nini umsebenzi. 
Siyabulela Peter we-EFF: 
Thina sidanile kuba besicinga ukuba iNkulumbuso izakuwuchaphazela umbandela wobuqhophololo, kodwa udlule nje engakhange anabe.  
Futhi besicinga ukuba uzakuthetha ngezinga elibi lokuphumelela kwabo bafunda uGrade 12. INkulumbuso isixelela ngothotho lootitshala abarhoxayo emsebenzini, kodwa ayitsho ukuba izakulungiswa njani le meko.  
Njengenkokeli, iNkulumbuso ayifanelanga kusixelela ngeengxaki kuphela koko isixelele ngomkhombandlela kwingxaki leyo. Siyiqhwabela izandla into yokwenziwa kwenxweme lokuloba eSajonisi. 
Oscar Mabuyane weANC: 
Siyayamkela intetho yeNkulumbuso. Le ntetho iyasibonisa ukuba umzamo omhle siyawuzama, kodwa ugqatso asikalufezi. Iyasimema ke iNkulumbuso ukuba sisebenzisane nayo sonke ukuze sithathe eli phondo silise phambili. 
 Sisembindini weminyaka emihlanu emiselweyo, kubalulekile ukuba izinto ebesithe siza kuzenza zibe kanti ziyenzeka. 
 INkulumbuso iyinikile ingxelo ngeprojekthi yamanzi eMzimvubu kwanolwakhiwo lwendlela eWild Coast. Sonwabe kakhulu yingxelo yeNkulumbuso.

headline: iBaroka yohluthwe intlaka emlonyeni yiHighlands Park
text:
Emva kokukhokela kwisigaba sokuqala, iBaroka FC yohluthwe intlaka emlonyeni yiHighlands Park emdlalweni obinika umdla kakhulu eMakhulong Stadium. Amakhwenkwe ka-Owen Da Gama aphumelele ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni we-Absa Premier Soccer League ngale njikalanga yanamhlanje. Ukuphumelela kweHighlands ziindaba ezimnandi kuDa Gama ngoba iqela lakhe libethelele indawo yalo phakathi kwamaqela akwiTop 10 kwiPSL. 
Impazamo eyenziwe ngabadlali beHighlands ikhokelele ekufakweni kwegoli yiBaroka. Kwangoko ikhawuleze yafuna ukuyilungisa impazamo – kodwa kube nzima ngoba abadlali beBaroka bebezimisele nabo futhi befuna igowuli lesibini. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iBaroka ihamba phambili. Izinto zitshintshile kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. USello Motsepe wenze umsebenzi ophucukileyo kokuvalela ibhola emnatheni. Khange kube kudala, umdlali othenjwe kakhulu uMothobi Mvala ufake igowuli lesibini. 
Ude waphela umdlalo iBaroka ingakwazanga ukufumana igowuli lokulinganisa. UBevan Fransman uchongwe njengoyena mdlali oqaqambileyo emdlalweni emva kokwenza umsebenzi omhle emva. Ukubethwa kwayo iBaroka kuthetha ukuthi iphakathi kwamaqela alwela ukusinda ezembeni. Kwelinye icala iPolokwane City ibethe iGolden Arrows ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni emdlalweni wanamhlanje.

headline: I-TruFM iyabulela ngoFezz kumasipala waseMnquma!
text: Abaququzeleli bokhuphiswano lwetalente yeTruFM (iTru Talent Search), bagqithise uphawo lombulelo kwiinkokheli zoMasipala waseMnquma, ngendima ebalulekileyo edlalwe ngulo masipala ngokuncedisa ekubhaqweni kwetalente kaFezile ”Fezz Jnr” Makhohliso wala mmandla. UFezz Jnr, yaba nguye ophumelele ibhaso eliphezulu kwiTru Talent Search yonyaka ophelileyo. UFezz Jnr, wazalwa waze wakhulela kwilokishi yaseMsobomvu eGcuwa, kwaye ngenxa yolu khuphiswano lwesi sikhululo noMasipala waseMnquma, sele ekhuphe ingoma yakhe ye-Afro-Soul. Le ngoma ethi “Imizamo”, sele idlalwa koonomathotholo abaphezulu kuzwelonke, kwaye uFezz Jnr bekhe wavela nakwinkqubo ye-SABC 1 -iLive kwinyanga ephelileyo. Kule ngoma, eli gatyana licula nemvumi eyaziwayo neyinzalelwane yaseNgqushwa, uDumza Maswana. Ngenxa yenkxaso-mali kwizinto ezifana nothutho, uqeqesho kunye nendawo yokuhlala ayifumene eMnquma, uFezz wakwazi ukuzilolonga, de wabhengezwa njengophumelele ukhuphiswano lonyaka ophelileyo emva kokuncumisa iijaji ngelizwi lakhe elimnandi. Kungoku nje, uFezz uhlala eRhawutini ukuze azenzele igama emculweni njengeemvumi ezifana noNathi Mankayi. UMasipala waseMnquma waxhasa le mvumi incinane ngokuhambelana nephulo lakhe lophuhliso kubahlali bala masipala ngokwezentlalo, ezoqoqosho njalo njalo. Fezz Jnr uculele looholo ibizaliswe ngabebezimase intlanganiso yebhunga, nebikwaqaphela ukuphela kwexesha looceba bala masipala. Lo mhlangano ububanjelwe eMsobomvu Community Hall eGcuwa kule veki.

headline: Intwazana ena6 ibhale incwadi
text:
INTWAZANA eminyaka emithandathu ubudala ikunye notata wayo baphehlelela iincwadi zabo kule veki. 
Ezi ncwadi zibhalwe ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. 
Incwadi kaOwethu, 6, ebizwa ‘Molweni igama lam ndinguOwethu’ yincwadi equlethe amabalana amafutshane angezilwanyana kuquka nabantu. 
Encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uMadoda Ndlakuse, ongumbhali notata kuOwethu uthi amabali akwincwadi kaOwethu anoburharha kwaye aneziphelo ezingaqhelekanga. Izilwanyana ezikule ncwadi zenza izinto ezivame ukwenziwa ngabantu. 
UNdlakuse uthi uOwethu, ofunda uGrade 1 eGqeberha, apho ahlala khona nabazali bakhe, ebeye athathe iifowuni zabazali bakhe, azivalele egumbini azirekhode ebalisa amabali. 
“Ebeye athi qho xa eza kubalisa ‘Mholweni igama lam nguOwethu’, waza unina wagqiba ukuba nencwadi le ibe negama elingumbuliso aziwa ngawo uOwethu. 
“Amabali kaOwethu akushiya uqonda ukuba unomdla wokuba angaqhubekeka angapheli,” kubalisa uNdlakuse. 
UOwethu uphehlelela le ncwadi phakathi kwezo zikayise ezimbini. 
Iincwadi zikaNdlakuse ethi ‘Ndiza kutshat’ uBeyonce enamabalana amafutshane naleyo ethi ‘Izitshanguba zentlalo’ eyingqokelela yemibongo, ziphehlelelwa kule Cawa yomhla we12 kweyoMsintsi. 
UNdlakuse, okwasebenza kwaNal’ ibali njengomququzeleli wamaphulo okufunda, ukubhala nokubalisa eMpuma Koloni, yinzalelwane yaseMdantsane. 
Waqala ukushicilela incwadi ngo2016 ngencwadi yabantwana ethi ‘Umtshato wentlanzi nenkuku.’ 
Ebutsheni balo nyaka, uNdlakuse ubhale waze washicilela iincwadi ezimbini ethi “Mhla latsha iBhayi” enamabalana amafutshane nengqokelela yemibongo ebizwa “Iingcinga zendoda”. 
UNdlakuse uthi ukubhala ngesiXhosa kumenza akhululeke kwaye esazi ukuba nokuba kuthiwa isiXhosa siyasithela kubaniniso, yena ukho ukusivuselela. 
“Ukubhala ngolwimi lwakho kwenza umntu ofundayo azithembe kunjalo nje azixabise kwaye akhanyelwe lula yimfundiso ozama ukuyigqithisa. 
“Kundenza ndibe negalelo ekwakheni iingqondi eziqiqayo nezizikis’ ukucinga zisakusikwa yinimba ngenxa yombongo okanye umlinganiswa othile kwiincwadi zam. Okunye njengomntu osebenze kwizikolo eziliqela ephondweni, eqeqesha ootitshala kumba wokufundela ukuzonwabisa, ekhuthaza amaqela okufunda njalo njalo, ndibonile indlela uluncwadi olubhalwe ngolwimi lwethu olunqabe nolunqongophele ngalo,” kutsho lo mbhali. 
“Ndiyibonile indlela amathala eencwadi asilela ngayo ekugcineni iincwadi zesiXhosa. Konke oku kuye kwandityhala ukuba nam ndibe negalelo hayi nje kuphela ebantwaneni abathanda ukufunda kodwa nakubazali okanye kubantu basekuhlaleni ngokubanzi. 
“Ndiphawule ukuba abantwana nolutsha lufunda kakuhle kakhulu xa iincwadi zibhalwe ngumntu nje ofana nabo oqhelekileyo. Ndithetha ngomntu abanako ukumbona qho elokishini okanye elalini. Iincwadi zam ke ndingatsho ukuba ziye zakho ngenxa yothando endinalo lokufunda mna kuqala kwandisemncinci, ndiphinde ke ngoku ndibengunobalisa, ” kubalisa uNdlakuse owafundela isidanga seDiploma kwiEarly Childhood Development eRhodes. 
UNdlakuse uza kuziphehlelela kuFacebook wakhe ezi ncwadi. 
Uza kukhatshwa nguMalusi Ntoyaphi noMzoli Mavimbela abangababhali.

headline: Kugquba umoya omhle kwinkampu yePirates
text:
Zidla zigoduka ngoku! onke amaqela adlala kwiAbsa Premier Soccer League alwela, eqokelela okulingene wona emidlalweni yokugqibela njengokuba kusongwa isizini ka2018/19. Emva kokuba iOrlando Pirates iphumelele imidlalo emithathu eyibeke phezulu kwiPSL, umqeqeshi wayo, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, uvumile okokuba wonke umntu wonwabile enkampini. IPirates ibe liqela lokuqala elifumene amashumi amahlanu amanqaku kule sizini emva kokubetha iFree State Stars ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) kwiveki ephelileyo. Ngoku Ezimnyama zithe ngcu phezulu kwiPSL, zishiya iMamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits ngamanqaku amathandathu. Ukuphumelela kweBucs imidlalo ilandelelana kubuyise ukuzithemba ebadlalini kwaye kukho nethemba lokuphumelela indebe yePSL nangona kusekho iSundowns elugqatsweni emane ixakekiswa yimidlalo yeCaf Champions League. 
“Ndonwabile kakhulu ngoba okwenzekayo yeyona ndlela esikhula ngayo siziziqu namaqela kwibhola ekhatywayo. Iyamangalisa into eyenzekayo ebholeni. Sasiqhuba kakuhle nakwisizini egqithileyo kwade kwafika umdlalo esabethwa kuwo yiCape Town City. Enye yezinto esizijongileyo kukubuyela kwiChampions League. Enye into eyenzekayo sakuyibona ngelo xesha. Into esezingqondweni zethu ngoku yiMaritzburg United,” utshilo uMicho. AmaBhakaniya kufuneka ayiphumelele yonke imidlalo elandelayo ngoba iDowns ifuthela emagxeni kuwo. Nomdlali wasemva, uInnocent Maela, ungqinile okokuba kugquba umoya omhle kwinkampu yePirates emva kokuqhuba kakuhle emidlalweni edlulileyo. “Ewe, sonke sonwabile  kodwa abadlali abadala kwiPirates bathe masingavuyi kakhulu. Eyona nto bayigxininisileyo kuthi kukumamela abaqeqeshi bethu. Kukufutshane entanjeni kodwa iliso lethu lisemdlalweni olandelayo,” utshilo uMaela emva komdlalo.

headline: UMadela ukhule ethanda iMamelodi Sundowns
text:
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nendedeba ethanda kakhulu ibhola ekhatywayo neMamelodi Sundowns. Isibalisele ngendlela eyaqala ngayo ukulandela iDowns. 
Pedro Mapelo: Molo Bhuti, unjani? 
Umlandeli: Kuhle, unjani wena Bhuti? 
PM: Ndiphilile nam. Siyakwamkela kweli phephandaba. Gqaba gqaba ngawe! 
Umlandeli: Ndiyabulela kakhulu. Igama lam ndinguLovers Madela. Ngokokuhlala ndilapha kwelaseKapa kwindawo yasePhilippi. 
PM: Ooh! Khawutsho, ukuthanda iMamelodi Sundowns uqale nini? 
Lovers Madela: Yooh, ndaqala ndisemncinci kakhulu. Inoba ndandineshumi leminyaka ukuqala kwam, ndisakhula phaya eNgqamakhwe. Zange kube nzima kum ngoba ndandingumdlali webhola ekhatywayo. Ndandiyibukela kakhulu iSundowns kumabonakude, ndaphela ndiyithanda. Ngezo mini yayidlala ibhola entle kakhulu. Kangangokuba notitshala wam esikolweni wayethanda ukuthi ndidlala ibhola yeSundowns xa ndisebaleni. 
PM: Emva kokugqugqisa kweDowns izwekazi le-Afrika yonke, uziva njani? 
LM: Bhuti, ndisavuya nangoku. Emva kokufumana la ndebe, ndathatha zonke izikipa zam zeSundowns ndayokuzifaka la nkwenkwezi yeentshatsheli. La mpumelelo yasipha amandla singabalandeli okuqhubela phambili nokuyixhasa. Ndiyaqinisekisa nangoku ukuba andiphoswa nangomnye umdlalo, nasemsebenzini ndiyaziwa. 
PM: Yeyiphi eyona nto ongasose uyilibale ngeqela lakho? 
LM: Ndikhumbula iSundowns ibetha elinye iqela ngo’24-0, soze ndiyilibale lo nto ngoba zange yenziwa naleliphi na iqela ngaphandle kwayo. Ewe, ndiyayibona le yeChamps League – kodwa leya ihamba phambili. 
PM: Ngubani umdlali omthandayo kwiDowns kuba kutheni? 
LM: NguHlompho Kekana. Ngoyena mdlali-siswini otshatsheleyo apha eMzantsi Afrika. Ndikhumbula efaka ibhola awayikhaba ekude kuSenzo Meyiwa.

headline: iChippa United iphise ngomdlalo kwakhona emizuzwini yokugqibela
text:
Iphinde yalahla amanye amanqaku iChippa United sele esesandleni. Namhlanje ibethwe yiMarumo Gallants FC ngamagowuli amathathu kwamabini emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obubanjelwe eSisa Dukashe Stadium. Okwenzeka ukubethwa kweChippa United kwaba krakra kubalandeli bayo kukuba ibikhokela ngo’2-1 ngokufanayo nakwiveki ephelileyo ewudlale neRoyal AM. Umdlalo ubumhle futhi unamagowuli kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo. Iqela likaDan Malesela lihambe phambili ngegowuli elifakwe sisiquququ esaziwayo, uNdabayithethwa Ndlondlo. Kuye kwanyanzeleka amakhwenkwe kaKurt Lentjies anyuse umxakatho ngoba iMarumo Gallants ibifuna igowuli lokuvala kwa kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. 
UBienvenu Eva Nga ufake igowuli lokulinganisa leChippa United emva kokunikelwa ibhola entle nguPeter Maloisane. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla amaqela enamagowuli alinganayo ebhodini. Iqela laseMpuma Koloni lingene kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo lifuna ukufaka igowuli lakugqiba lisonge umdlalo. ULentjies ufake uTebogo Makobela noMaloisane Mokhele kwiindawo ezishuywe nguThabiso Lebitso noThokozani Sekotlong. Injongo yomqeqeshi ibikukubeka uxinizelelo kubadlali beGallants FC ukuze iChippa United ifumane igowuli lempumelelo. 
Ikhokele iGallants ngegowuli elifakwe nguNdlondlo osuse ibhola echaphazeni. Uphinde wabuya uEva Nga negowuli lesibini – kodwa ngelishwa uJoseph Molangoane ufake igowuli lesithathu kwatsho kwaphela ngeChippa United. Ukungaphumeleli kweChippa imidlalo emibini eyidlalele ekhaya kuyifake engxakini kakhulu ngoba ngoku isekele amaqela asemsileni. UMalesela, ogxothwe amatyeli aliqela nguChippa Mpengesi, ukuvuyele kakhulu ukuthatha amanqaku amathathu eMdantsane. Kungenzeka uMpengesi aqeshe omnye umqeqeshi onokwazi ukuhlangula iChippa United esinde ezembeni nakwisizini egqithileyo. 
Chippa United: Kazapua, Hanamub, Pietersen, Maloisane, Bienvenu, Sekotlong, Mdlinzo, Zulu, Lebitso, Sandile, Luthuli. 
Amalalela: Watenga, Seabi, Mokhele, Ngele, Makobela, September, Mbenyane, Sangare, Pfumbidzai. 
Marumo Gallants: Arubi, Mvelase, Gumede, Mabotja, Nonyane, Timm, Dion, Otladisa, Ngema, Ndlondlo, Molangoane.

headline: Isigidi asivotanga eMpuma Koloni
text:
Bangaphaya kwesigidi abantu ababhalisele unyulo eMpuma Koloni, nabathabathe isigqibo sokungavoti kunyulo obelubanjwe kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Abantu abe bebhalisele ukuvota eMpuma Koloni bebengaphaya kwezigidi ezithathu (3 363 161). Kwabo bantu kuvote abadlule kancinane kwizigidi ezibini (2 001 262), into ethetha ukuba bangaphaya kwesigidi (1 361 899) abantu abathe abathabatha nxaxheba kulonyulo. 
Kweli nani (2 001 262), abantu abangaphaya kwamawaka angamashumi amabini anesixhenxe (27 081), bathe bazimosha iivoti zabo (spoilt ballots). 
Noxa nje oku kunokuba kubangelwe yimozulu, amaqela ezopolitiko abengenele unyulo kweli phondo ashiyeke exhalabile. 
USihlalo weANC eMpuma Koloni uOscar Mabuyane uthi noxa nje imvula, ebikhatshwa yintwana yengqele, ithe yafaka ifuthe – bakwaqaphele ukuba zikhona ezinye zeengxaki ezibangele ukuba abantu bangayi kulonyulo. 
“Ewe imozulu ibe nefuthe ekungaphumini kwabantu, nto leyo ke esingenakuze sibe nolawulo kuyo kuba yekaMdali. 
“Kodwa ngaxeshanye, sikuqaphele ukuqhankqalaza kwabantu kuba bengonelisekanga ziinkonzo. Sisifundo eso kuthi, kwaye oko kufuneka sikulungise kwiintsuku ezilikhulu singenile kulawulo lwephondo,” utsho uMabuyane. 
UMabuyane uthi lo rhulumente mtsha uza kungena elulawulweni, kufuneka usondele ngamandla eluntwini. 
“Kufuneka sisondele ebantwini siphulaphule iingxaki zabo. Kuyafuneka siwuqwalasele nomba wabantu abangenamdla kuvoto, sijonge unobangela woko. Abantu kufuneka bakwazi ukubaluleka kwentabathonxaxheba kumba wokukhuliswa kwedemokhrasi,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
Yena uNobhala weAzapo eMpuma Koloni uChris Swepu uthe: “Umthamo wabantu abathe baya kulonyulo awonelisi, abanye mhlawumbi babethwe yimozulu kodwa siyacinga ukuba bakhona abo bathe abaya ngenxa yokuphoxwa ngumbutho olawulayo.” 
“Yingxaki leyo, kuba le nto ithetha ukuba iANC iseza kuqhuba iselulawulweni xa abantu bengekaphakami bayokuvota,” utsho uSwepu. 
I’solezwe lesiXhosa libuze kuFacebook kule veki ngezizathu zokuba abanye babantu baseMpuma Koloni bangayi kulonyulo. 
UMncediseni Mkula uthe: “Zange ndivote mna kuba xa sele iwinile iANC kubizwa ii(* )lay queens kwimibhiyozo” 
UMzubanzi Mente uthe: “Mna andivotanga ngenxa yeminyaka. Ndingapha ko-35, oko xa kuvela izithuba [kuthwa ndimdala] ndikruquke nje yilo nto.” 
UOlwethu Evano Yamba uthe: “Ndingomnye waba bangavotanga ndibhalisile, bekubanda eMonti.” 
UChosen Mabongo uthi: “Uvoto maluthathe iintsuku ezimbini njengobhaliso.” 
Ukanti ngokwezihlalo kwiNdlu yoWiso Mthetho eBhisho, iANC ifumene izihlalo ezingamashumi amane anesine (44), iDA yafumana ezilishumi, iEFF yafumana ezihlanu, iUDM yafumana ezibini logama iATM kwaneFreedom Front Plus zifumene isihlalo esinye, umbutho ngamnye.

headline: Uchul’ ukunyathela unobuhle waseGcuwa
text:
USinazo Mbekeni (18) waseMdantsane kwaNU 9 yintwazana evunyiweyo ngokucondoba eqongeni  kwicandelo loonobuhle eMnquma eGcuwa. 
Oku kulandela emva kokuba ephumelele uMiss Butterworth kumsitho woonobuhle obubanjelwe eGcuwa ngoMgqibelo. 
Iijaji zivumelene ngazwinye ukuba intwazana yakwaMbekeni yeyona ikwazileyo ukuhamba iqonga ukodlula iintwazana ibikhuphisana nazo ebezingaphaya  kweshumi elinesine. 
UBuhle, ukumila kakuhle kwakunye nokuhamba iqonga ngaphandle koloyiko, zizinto ezithe zanempumelelo kweli nenekazi laseMdantsane. UMbekeni ufunda kwiYunivesithi iWalter Sisulu kwikhampasi eseBika eGcuwa, nto leyo emnike ithuba lokuba akwazi ukungenela kwabanoobuhle baseMnquma. Ukanti wenza izifundo zezolawulo kule yunivesithi kwaye sele ephumelele iwonga lokuba nguMiss SASCO waphinda waphuma kwindawo yesibini kuMiss Freshet, nangona ebeqala ngqa ukungenela koonobuhle kulo nyaka. 
Emva kokuba ephumelele uMiss Butterworth uthe khange ayicinge into yokuba angaphumelela njengoko ingumntu obeqala ukuzibandakanya noonobuhle kulo nyaka. 
“Nangona bendiyiqala kulo nyaka into yoonobuhle kodwa ndibenenyhweba yokuphumelela uMiss SASCO ndaphinda ndaphuma kwindawo yesibini kuMiss Freshet,” uqhube watsho. Uthi lo nto imchulumancise kakhulu njengoko ebeqala ukungenela oonobuhle kulo nyaka, kwaye imenze wazithemba ngexesha engenela kuMiss Butterworth. 
Impumelelo yakhe uyibona njengento emkhuthazayo kweli candelo ukuba aqhubele phambili kulo. Ukanti kwicala labafana, uLwando Futshane waseZizamele kwilokishi esecaleni kwaseGcuwa, ibenguye ophume phambili wanguMr Butterworth. 
UFutshane ebengaqali ukuphumelela koonobuhle kuba kwiminyaka embalwa edlulileyo ukhe wanguMr Khanya FM. 
Abaphumeleleyo bafumene ivawutsha eziqala kwi-R1 000 ukwehla kwaye bazakuzisebenzisa kwiivenkile ezahlukeneyo kwidolophu yaseGcuwa. 
Abaququzeleli bathi kunyaka ozayo bazimisele ukuba ukhule lo msitho nangakumbi ingakumbi kwicala lamabhaso kwakunye nabaxhasi bawo.

headline: Ukhubazekile umongikazi owahlaselwa ligeza esibhedlele
text:
UBOMI nekamva lokunceda uluntu kuSesethu Sarah Ndabani (36) babuqhakazile, engumongikazi onamaphupha okuxandisa olo lwazi wayelufumene eLilitha Nursing College. 
Kodwa ngoku uNdabani uhleli kowabo ezingxixa ngeepilisi zokuthomalalisa uxinzelelo kulandela ukuhlaselwa, ngonyaka ka2012, yindoda egula ngengqondo kwisibhedlele awayesebenza kuso iHoly Cross eFlagstaff. Olu hlaselo lwamshiya uNdabani ephuke impumlo, nto leyo yabangela ukopha okungummangaliso. 
Esi sehlo samshiya enoloyiko uNdabani, kwaye sithe sangunobangela wokuphazamiseka kwindlela yokucinga nokwenza izinto. 
Endaweni yokufumana inkxaso kwisibhedlele saseHoly Cross, uNdabani wacetyiswa ukuba makarhoxe emsebenzini emva kokuba esi sibhedlele simxelele ukuba sifumana ubunzima ekumthumeleni kwenye indawo. 
UNdabani wayenedyudyu ukuphinda aphangele eHoly Cross emva kokulaliswa iinyanga kwisibhedlele iTownhill eMgungundlovu KwaZulu Natal. Wabona ukuba makalithathe eli cetyana leHoly Cross lokuba makarhoxe emsebenzini ukuze afune umsebenzi kwenye indawo. 
“Ndafaka isicelo somsebenzi kwisibhedlele iGreytown [KwaZulu Natal] ze ndafumana kwicandelo lokubelekisa. Akuzange kuphele iveki ndisebenza apho ndavele ndaphaphazela, ndinoxinizelelo, ndisoyika futhi ndiyilibala into endiyenzayo. Kulapho umphathi wam wazama ukundifunela amancedo ze ndaphinda ndathunyelwa eTownhill, apho ugqirha wam wandidiza njengomntu ongenakukwazi ukuphinda aphangele,” utshilo uNdabani kwimbalelwano ayibhalele I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
UNdabani, otshatileyo enabantwana abathathu, uthi ngumyeni wakhe obesehla esenyuka esebenzisa iimali zakhe ukumfunela amancedo. 
“Ukukhubazeka kwam akuzange kuthathelwe ingqalelo lisebe lezempilo, endaweni kubuyise iinzingo kum apho kunyanzeleke ukuba ndisebenzise iimali zam endaweni yokuncediswa lisebe,” utshilo uNdabani. 
“Ixesha lam elininzi ndilichitha ebhedini kuba ndiyoyika ukuphuma phandle ngenxa yokuphaphazela.” 
Imbuyekezo yemali awaqala ukuyihlawulwa emva kwembalelwano esuka kwiSebe lezabaSebenzi, uNdabani uthi sele yayekwa ukuhlawulwa imshiya lo nto ekwimeko embi yezezimali. 
Indoda kaNdabani, uIsaac Thembelihle Ngcongo, uthi udanile yindlela othe wasingathwa ngayo umbandela wenkosikazi yakhe. UNgcongo uthi isibhedlele saseHoly Cross asizange sibonakalise nkathalo kwantlandlolo kwinyewe yenkosikazi yakhe.

headline: Bonke basingise kwisixeko seeNgcwele!
text:
IINDAWO zokuhlala kwisixeko seeNgcwele sele zibugcwala ngoku nanjengoko abathandi bobugcisa kwilizwe jikelele begaleleka kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni ukuza kuba yinxalenye yomNyhadala wobuGcisa kaZwelonke (Grahamstown National Arts Festival). 
 UMasipala waseMakana, nogushe iRhini neziphaluka, kwakunye neendawo zokutya nokuhlala kula mmandla, oko zilal’ obungehliyo zisenza imisebenzi yokulungiselela le mibhiyozo yobugcisa boMzantsi Afrika.  
Bazokuthi begaleleka nje ngoLwesine abathandi balo mnyhadala, le dolophana izakube ixhonywe amapheke-pheke emibhalo eeposta, ngelixa wona ama-esile ezakube ededela izithuthi. 
 Lo mnyhadala uthabatha iintsuku ezili-11, uzakube ubonisa imisebenzi yobugcisa engaphezulu kwama-600. Sele ethengiswe aphela amatikiti wezinye zeekhonsathi zomculo, kuquka eyemvumi ye-Afro Pop uRingo Madlingozi nomculo weRap * -AKA 
. UTony Lankester oyingqonyela yalo mnyhadala, uthi lo mnyhadala wobugcisa ugalele engxoweni isixa esikwizigidi ezingama-340 seerandi kuqoqosho lweMpuma Koloni.  
“Eli galelo livakala ngamandla kwicandelo lezokhenketho (iihotele, imizi yokundwendwela, iindawo zentselo, ezokutyela, iinkampani ezibolekisa ngeemoto, iinkampani zophapho, abakhenkethisi, oonoteksi`njalo njalo). “Amakhulu-khulu wabantu afumana izingxungxo ngexesha lalo mnyhadala, kwaye amashishini amaninzi eRhini eli xesha alibona njengexesha leKrisimesi kuwo, kunezo nyanga zithe cwaka.”  
Uthi iimpelaveki zalo mnyhadala zezona ziba manxada-nxada, nanjengoko kugaleleka abantu abaninzi abasuka ngaseBhayi naseMonti.  
Ukanti abo bahlala kulo mmandla bandwendwela iintsuku ezimbini ukuya kwezintathu. Le dolophu yaseRhini ineendawo eziliqela zokuhlala, ukusuka kwiindawo zokutya nokulala (B&Bs), izikolo kunye neehostele ezikwi yunivesithi.  
“Ngenxa yokuduma kwalo mnyhadala, ingangumngeni ukufumana indawo. Kweli thuba, sicebisa ukuba aqhagamshelane nee-arhente zeendawo zokuhlala (estate agent) ezikule dolophu, nezineendawo eziliqela ezifumanekayo.  
Ukanti uSusan Waugh, ongumlawuli weMakana Tourism uthe, “IRhini neendawo eziyingqongileyo inento yonke kumntu wonke – ukusuka kukutya okuthandayo, iindawo zokuhlala ezikumgangatho we- 4 star, iihotele, igame reserve zabucala nee-backpackers.”  
“Kukho neendawo kwizikolo nakwiYunivesithi yaseRhodes. Kukhona neendawo ezintente kulo magorha angoyikiyo,” utshilo. Nelokishi yaseJoza iba manxada-nxada kulo mnyhadala, nanjengokuba ibambisene neFingo Festival eyonwabisayo, ize ibambe neengxoxo ezitshisayo.”  
UWaugh uphinde wathi indawo iyafumaneka nakwiidolophana ezikufutshane ezifana neButhurst, Port Alfred kunye neKenton-on-Sea. Click here to Reply or Forward

headline: UBlackSpade uza kuhlonipha amaXhosa ngomculo
text:
IINYEMBEZI, ingoma esandul’ ukukhutshwa nguBlackSpade ekunye noTeeTee, ibalisa ngeenyembezi ezibangelwe yintlungu yasemphefumlweni, ilahleko kwaneenyembezi eziqhutywa luvuyo. 
UTeeTee udume ngengoma ethandwayo ethi ‘Relationship’. 
Le ngoma, ephume kwinyanga kaDisemba, sele ifumaneka kuzo zonke iivenkile zeintanethi kwaye idlalwa kumabonakude nakoonomathotholo abaliqela. 
Le yenye yeengoma ezimnandi zomjuxuzo ezenziwa nguDJ BlackSpade. 
Ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngale ngoma, uDJ BlackSpade uthi yenziwe kanye ngethuba esiva kabuhlungu ngenxa yokushiywa ngumama wakhe, kwaye nalowo ulilizwi kule ngoma uTeeTee ngaxeshanye eshiywe ngowakhe umama. 
“Ikwayingoma ebalisa ngeenyembezi zovuyo kodwa nezo zokubandezeleka,” kubalisa uDJ BlackSpade. 
UBlackSpade, onkaba ikwilali yakuDoti eDutywa, ogama lakhe lokuzalwa inguSabelo Gaqazele, ikwanguye owaxuba kamnandi ingoma kaElaine ethi You’re The One. 
Le DJ, 37, yaqala ukubonisa umdla emculweni iseneminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu. 
“Ngethuba ndineminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe ndisenza iMatriki eIdutywa School of Excellence – ndaye ndathengelwa izixhobo zomculo (sound system) ngumninisikolo,” kubalisa uBlackSpade. 
Ngenxa yothando lomculo, uDJ BlackSpade waye wangena kwisikolo sokufunda banzi ngomculo iGallo Music Production, kodwa waphinda waphuma engagqibanga apho ngenxa yeemeko zokuswela imali. 
UDJ BlackSpade, waziwa nanjengomnini wendawo yentselo nomjuxuzo iBlackspade Club eyayiseQuigney eMonti. 
UDJ BlackSpade udize ukuba ukususela ngoku ukuya phambili uza kugxila kwiingoma eziqaqambisa ulwimi lwesiXhosa. 
Usebenze neeDJ eziliqela ezaziwayo kumaqonga ohlukeneyo. 
“Ndifuna ukugxila kwiingoma zesiXhosa, ndibonge iziduko namaqhawe akwaXhosa afana noMandela, ooBiko, ooHani nafana nomam’ uNoxolo Grootboom,” kudiza uDJ BlackSpade. 
Ukanti sibhala nje, uBlackSpade umatasatasa neDa Hustler Album Tour nalapho azisa ngecwecwe lakhe elitsha iDa Hustler kwiindawo ezohlukeneyo. 
Kweli cwecwe kukho iingoma ezifana noEmonti kwakunye nethi Abalele. Kwezi ngoma usebenze noNombila, uTeeTee kwakunye noSlogan. 
Ukanti ingoma yakhe entsha ethi Iimpendulo, nathi ithetha nomsebenzi wezinyanya, kulindeleke iphume ekuzeni kuphela konyaka. 
UBlackSpade, osele ezinze eRhawutini emva kokucelwa nguJub-Jub ukuba ayokusebenza naye, ukhuthaze abatsha abanomdla wokungena emculweni ngelithi baye esikolweni. 
“Mabaye esikolweni, bafumane iziqinisekiso nakwezinye izakhono. Umntu makawenze umculo njengento ayithandayo esazi ukuba asiyi kubeka isonka etafileni ngawo sonke.” 
UBlackSpade uthi uzibona enguDJ Black Coffee wangomso, enyathela amazwe ngamazwe. 
Umculo wakhe uyafumaneka kuzo zonke iivenkile zeintanethi, kungenjalo uthumele imbalelwano kumakhasi akhe onxibelelwano @Blackspade.

headline: Xa bekutheni?
text:
UMDLALO weqonga onjongo zawo ikukukhalimela uxhatshazo olusekelezelwe kwisini  [GBV] uya kuMnyhadala wezoBugcisa kaZwelonke eMakhanda. 
Lo mdlalo weqonga othi “Xa Bekutheni?” ujonge uxhatshazo kumanina, amadoda kwakunye nabantwana. 
Umbhali wawo, uYanga Mabetshe, uxelele I’solezwe ukuba lo mdlalo uthetha ngeGBV kwiinkalo ezohlukeneyo. 
“Uthetha ngeGBV kwiinkalo ezohlukeneyo, ukusuka kumabala okudlalela abantwana, emakhaya nekusingqongileyo,” kutsho uMabetshe. 
“Lo mxholo weGBV ubalisa ibali likaVusi noBuhle abakhulele kwilokishi enye, kwiintsapho ezohlukeneyo, baze bazifumana befunda kwidolophu enye, kwiikholeji ezohlukeneyo. Nanjengokuba bekhula bobabini bazifumana bejamene neziganeko zeGBV de yabe iyabachaphazela nasesikolweni,” kubalisa uMabetshe. 
Lo mdlalo weqonga ubhalwe nguMabetshe encediswa nguMalibongwe Madyo. 
Abadlali kuwo nguAnathi Phandle, Chuma Mazibu, Zoliswa Mfiniso, Somikazi Tshalanga, Bathandwa Quvile, Buhle Jack noNelisiwe Jonas. 
Owubekeleyo kwiqonga laseMakhanda kulindeleke abone iimeko zeziganeko zoxhatshazo ukususela ebuntwaneni ukuya ebutsheni. 
UMabetshe uthi eli bali liyachukumisa kwaye libonisa ukuba kutheni umba weGBV ingumba obuthathaka nonzima ekubeni utshatyalaliswe luluntu oluntsundu, ingakumbi emakhaya, ezikolweni nakwihlabathi jikelele. 
Ngo2018, uMabetshe ukhwele kwiqonga loMnyhadala woBugcisa waseMakhanda ngomdlalo wakhe othi iSandi Segubu, waze ngo2019 walandela ngothi Maxhoba Village. 
Kulo nyaka emva kweminyaka emibini yokunqumama eqongeni ngenxa yeCovid-19, abantu baza kubukela umdlalo wakhe othi Xa Bekutheni kwakunye noJust Different. 
UMabetshe uthi uJust Different libali elifundisa ngesimo seAutism. 
“Kuwo sisebenza noJR Nkosi ongumdlali wepiyano ophila nesimo seAutism. Eli libali elingobomi bakhe bokwenene.” 
UNkosi waphumelela iOvation Award kulo Mnyhadala ngo2019. 
UMabetshe, okwayititshala engaphangeliyo ngumfundi wesidanga sebakala leeMasters kwiNzululwazi ngezoLuntu (Social Science). 
UMabetshe uncede iYunivesithi yaseFort Hare ivelise iiprojekthi zeDrama neQonga. 
Ukwangomnye owasungula iStart Art Creatives ehlohla izifundo zeDrama neQonga kumaziko emfundo aseMonti afana neUFH, WSU, iikholeji kwanezikolo.

headline: ULeonardo Castro useza kuhlala eminye iminyaka eNaturena!
text:
Ifolosi yaseColombia, uLeonardo Castro, iseza kuhlala eminye iminyaka eNaturena emva kokuba etyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho esitsha namhlanje. Amakhosi akhuphe isibhengezo kumakhasi onxibelelwano esithi uCastro uza kuhlala iminyaka emibini kwiKaizer Chiefs. Isigqibo sikaCastro silandela iingxelo ebezisithi kunokwenzeka ayifulathele iChiefs. Namhlanje angcwatyiwe amaqashiso ngaye kwaye zithe xibilili izibilini kubalandeli beChiefs. “SiyiChiefs noLeonardo Castro sivumelene ngokwandisa isivumelwano sakhe sengqesho ngeminye iminyaka emibini. Lo nto ithi uza kuhlala kude ibe ngunyaka ka-2022,” itshilo ingxelo ekutshwe yiChiefs kwikhasi lomnathi – uFacebook. 
UCastro,31, ngomnye wabadlali axhathise ngabo u-Ernst Middendorp kwiChiefs nangona ekhe akamsebenzisa kwisizini egqithileyo. Lo nto iye yabangela kwakho iingxelo ezithi uCastro ufuna ukubuyela kwiMamelodi Sundowns – apho wayesuka khona. “Ndiyabulela kakhulu kuwe Mnu. Kaizer Motaung nakwiqela lonke. Ndiyavuya njengokuba ndiseza kunxiba isikipha esimnyama nagolide. Yinto ebalulekileyo kum leyo ngoba akukabikho ndebe endiyifumeneyo kweli qela. Ukuhamba ndingayivumenanga ibiza kuba yinto embi kakhulu kum. Ndinqwenela ukuzuza indebe kweli qela. Kodwa ndiqinisekile, iqela esinalo ngoku linawo amandla okuyenza lo nto,” utshilo uCastro. 
Amakhosi aneminyaka emihlanu egcweleyo kungasangeni ndebe eNaturena. Ukufika kwabadlali abasemgangathweni ophezulu njengoLeonardo Castro noKhama Billiat kwakubonwa njengento eyakugweba indlala – kodwa kusenzima nangoku. Likhona kekambe ithemba kule isizini ngoba iChiefs yiyo ehleli phezulu kwiPSL. “Ndiyakuvuyela ukuhlala apha eMzantsi Afrika kwaye nentsapho yam usamkele isigqibo endisenzileyo,” uvale ngalo mazwi uCastro. Ukuhlala kukaCastro kuziindaba ezimnandi ngoba iChiefs yile ingavumelekanga ukuthenga abadlali emva kokugwetywa yiFifa ngenxa yokutyikitya umdlali waseMadagascar ngendlela engahambisani nomthetho wayo ngokugcweleyo.

headline: URamaphosa ukhalimela ukubulawa kwamapolisa
text:
Usekela mongameli weli uCyril Ramaphosa ukugxeke kabukhali ukubulawa kwamapolisa okuqhubeka kweli, ngethuba ebethetha kwisikhumbuzo samapolisa abhubhele emsebenzini ePitoli izolo. Amapolisa oMzantsi Afrika aqhuba esi sikhumbuzo minyaka le ngenjongo zokukhumbula loomapolisa athe awa ngethuba esembenzini. “Bonke abantu ababulala amapolisa mababanjwe bagwetywe ngokufanelekileyo, kuba ukubulala ipolisa kukulwa norhulumente uqobo,”uthethe watsho uRamaphosa. Usekela mongameli uthethe kulomsitho egameni likamongameli uJacob Zuma obekulindeleke ukuba enze intetho ephambili kulomsitho. 
 Intsapho zamapolisa eziphuma kwilizwe ngokubanzi bezikho ukuzimasa nokhumbula onyana nentombi zabo.”Uluntu loMzantsi Afrika maluncedise amapolisa ukubamba abantu abahlele ukubulala amapolisa welizwe lethu, amapolisa akhusela abantu,” utshilo uRamaphosa. Eli lizwe lelinye lamazwe anengxaki yokubulawa kwamapolisa ngethuba esemsebenzini. Amapolisa akhunjulwe apha ngalawo abhubhe phakathi kwenyanga ka Epreli wonyaka ophelileyo ukuza ku Matshi walonyaka, itshilo ingxelo. Ngamashumi asixhenxe anesibini amapolisa abhubhe eMzantsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo,kuwo angamashumi amane abhubhe ejijisana nolwaphulo mthetho, itsho ingxelo.

headline: ISITHEMBISO kwiMzansi Magic!
text:
Kukho amahum-hum wokuba kuza kuqala umdlalo omtsha kwiMzansi Magic obizwa Isithembiso ngoMvulo, 3 kuTshazimpuzi ngo-19h30. 
Lo mdlalo uzakungena kwindawo kaGreed & Desire xa esongwa ngoLwesine, 30 kweyoKwindla. 
Akukacaci okuqulethwe ngulo mdlalo, kodwa abeMzansi Magic bathi iSithembiso ngumboniso ogxile kwizithembiso zobuncinane – ukufezekiswa nokophulwa kwezo zithembiso, izithembiso zobomi obungcono, ikamva eliqaqambileyo njalo njalo. 
Lo mdlalo uveliswa yiBomb evelisa umdlalo kamabonakude IsiBaya. 
Ngoobani abaphumelele kwii-Audition zokukhangela abadlali balo mdlalo? Yithi nca kwiphephandaba lakho I’solezwe kuba sakuphakela konke!

headline: Mphahlele : Ndandisoyika phambi komdlalo
text:
Umdlali wasemva omtsha weKaizer Chiefs, uRamahlwe Mphahlele, ufumene ithuba lokuqala lokudlala kowona mdlalo mkhulu kwizwekazi le Afrika kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Lithuba elilangazelelwa ngabadlali abaninzi kwibhola yelizwe loMzantsi Afrika – kodwa lithe xa lifika kuMphahlele waphathwa luloyiko. Amakhosi ne-Orlando Pirates adlale isiqendu sesithandathu seCarling Black Label Cup kwiveki ephelileyo eFNB Stadium, eNasrec – apho iqela laseNaturena libuye nempumelelo yamagowuli amabini eqandeni [2-0] afakwe nguLewis Macha no-Eric Mathoho.  
Nanjengoko lomdlalo weCarling Black Label ulawulwa ngabalandeli, uRamahlwe Mphahlele, uye wangumdlali wokuqala ovotelwe ngabalandeli kwisiqingatha sesibini. 
Khange ibe yinto elula kuye ukujongana okokuqala nabalandeli abangaphaya kwamashumi asibhozo anesithandathu amawaka abezalise iFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo. “Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, umdlalo ubumkhulu kakhulu. Kaloku umdlalo ophakathi kweChiefs nePirates ngomnye wemidlalo emikhulu kwizwekazi le Afrika liphela.  
Ndathi xa ndibona igama lam, ndathi eli lixesha lokuba ndive ukudlala kwidabi laseSoweto. Ndandivuya kakhulu – kodwa kwangaxeshanye ndandinalo uloyiko ngaphakathi,” utshilo uMphahlele kwincoko yakhe neSABC. 
Njengomdlali ekudala edlala ibhola ekhatywayo, uMphahlele, uyiqhelile imidlalo emikhulu – kodwa lo umdlalo ube yinto entsha kuye. “Ewe, ndidlalile neChiefs nePirates ngaphambili – kodwa lo ubunomahluko. Ndisakhula bendiqhele ukuwubukela kumabonakude umdlalo ophakathi kwala maqela mabini. Kumdnandi ukudlala omnye wemidlalo emikhulu e-Afrika,” utshilo uMphahlele. 
Njengokuba Amakhosi evale isizini yePremier League ka’2015/16 engafumananga nto, lo mdlali ngomnye wabadlali abathengiweyo ekulindeleke babuyise isidina seli qela kwisizini entsha. 
Njengomdlali obedlalela iMamelodi Sundowns, iintshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer League kwisizini ephelileyo, uRamahlwe Mphahlele, uvumile ukuba ukuyishiya khange ibe sisigqibo esibelula.  
Ukuphumelela iCarling Black Label yeyona ndlela igqibeleleyo yesiqalo salo mdlali neqela lilonke nje ngokubanzi.

headline: iPirates ithwaxe iThwihli Thwahla yaphuma ngomva kwiMTN8 namhlanje
text:
Konwatyiwe ngabalandeli be-Orlando Pirates kobu busuku emva kokuba iqela labo lizuze impumelelo ebalulekileyo. IPirates iza kubuyela kwaNyamayipheli umsila uphezulu emva kokuba ithwaxe iRoyal AM ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye emdlalweni weMTN8 obuvutha bhe eChatsworth Stadium namhlanje. Khange kuphele nemizuzu emihlanu umdlalo uqalile, iPirates ibikhokela ngegowuli elifakwe nguVincent Pule. Ukufakwa kwegowuli kwiThwihli Thwahla kuyihluphezile. Amakhwenkwe kaDan Malesela noKhabo Zondo adibanise iibhola aya phambili edabini ekhangela igowuli lokulinganisa. Ibhola ebikhatywe nguMotebang Sera weRoyal AM khange yenze demesha kwiPirates. 
Ethubeni, iphinde yafumana elinye ithuba lokufaka igowuli lesibini iPirates – kodwa ngelishwa layo, uZakhe Lepasa woyiswe kukusebenzisa ibhola ebeyidlalelwe nguEva Nga. Siphelile isiqingatha siphelile ingakwazanga ukuphendula iRoyal AM nangani ibinawo amathuba okufumana igowuli. Emva kwesigaba sokuqala ebisithisa, iRoyal Am iqale isigaba sesibini inomfutho omkhulu. Bekucaca ukuba amakhwenkwe angxolisiwe ngethuba esekhifini. UMalesela ukhuphe uLesvin Stoffels noLantshene Phalane, iindawo zabo zithathwe nguMfundo Thikazi noJabulani Ncobeni. Injongo yeRoyal AM ibicacile ukuba ifuna ukubeka uxinizelelo kubadlali bePirates ifumane igowuli lokulinganisa nelempumelelo. 
Endaweni yoko, iPirates ibhalise igowuli lesibini ngebhola efakwe nguMonyane. Emizuzwini emibini kwenziwe iinguqu yiRoyal AM, uThikizani ubhakuzelise umnatha ngebhola ebetheke kwiPirates yabiyela ebaleni. Idibene naye emhlabeni kaRichards Ofori oyibukele izingenela ezipalini zakhe. Abadlali bePirates emva badlale kakuhle kakhulu bekhokelwa nguSibisi noMaela. Noxa iqela likaMamkhize lidlale kakuhle kakhulu kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo – kodwa into ebembi ngalo kukuba alikwazanga ukusebenzisa amathuba avelileyo emdlalweni wanamhlanje. Belibethwa okwesibini yiPirates ebikhe yalibetha emdlalweni weDStv Premiership kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Royal AM: Ngcobo, Mogaila, Nascimento, Maganyi, Matlaba, Mahlasela, Phalane, Kobedi, Sera, De jong, Stoffels.
