Amagowuli amabini afakwe yifolosi etshisa bhee, uCuthbert Malajila, elinye lifakwe ngu-Anthony Laffor – elokubika le-Ajax Cape Town lifakwe nguMario Booysen, umdlali weDowns ngempazamo. 
Kule midlalo bekucaca nje ukuba kudlala iqela elinabadlali abakumgangatho ophezulu, abanomdlalo odibeneyo kwaye abazimisele ukwenza ezibukwayo kwisizini entsha eza kuvulwa ngokusesikweni kwinyanga ezayo. 
 Nangona uRoger De Sa ebefake abadlali abatsha, uninzi lwabo abasakhangela indawo kwiqela lakhe – yena iPitso Mosimane, umqeqeshi weSundowns ebefake iqela lakhe elomeleleyo kodwa bekukho nomdlali omtsha uMogakolodi Ngele kunye noBonginkosi Ntuli obedlalela AmaZulu athotyiselwe kwisizini edlulileyo. 
Kwimidlalo yokuqala iDowns ibethe lula i-University of Pretoria ngo’2-0, neqela laseKapa, i-Ajax, idlule kwiJomo Cosmos esuka kwaNational First Division ngamagowuli afanayo. 
Izinto zimhambela kakuhle mpela uPitso Mosimane, kangangokuba kwiveki ephelileyo iqela lakhe belityelele eZambia apho badlale namaqela afana neZasco United, Power Dynamos kunye neZenaco – kwaye kuyo yonke lo midlalo baqhube kakuhle kakhulu. 
Ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2014/15, uPitso, watyityimbisela umnwe iKaizer Chiefs, iintshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer League, ngelithi bangonwabi kuba uza kuyithatha kule sizini iza kuvulwa.  
Lo nto ingenzeka kuba akukho badlali baninzi bamkileyo, okunye okubalulekileyo kukuba ngoku abadlali beDowns abaninzi maneminyaka emibini nangaphezulu bedlala bonke.  
Iyodwa nje lo nto iza kuwenza lula umsebenzi wakhe umqeqeshi nakuba kusafuneka bevale indawo ka-Alje Schut phaya emva.

headline: Inkqubo yomculo kamabonakude ikhangela umsasazi
text:
IQONGA lePay TV iStarSat, likugqogqo lokukhangela oyena msasazi onokuba bubuso nombhexeshi wenkqubo yomculo entsha ezaba kwijelo lomculo (uChannel 322).  
Yinkqubo yeengoma ezingamashumi amabini (Top 20 Countdown), ngoko bakhangela amanxila engoma nanolwazi oluphangaleleyo ngomculo wesingqi sase-Afrika.  
Umsasazi ophumeleleyo uzakubhexesha le nkqubo, enze udliwano-ndlebe kananjalo ancokole neemvumi, aze ancedise ekuveliseni le nkqubo. SINGENELE NJANI? 
 Kufuneka wenze ividiyo apho uzichazayo ukuba ungubani, kwanengoma yakho oyithandayo yalapha ekhaya ngokungathi uyayisasaza njengevidiyo yomculo kwijelo lomculo loMzantsi Afrika.  
Ukuthumela iVidiyo leyo – kwakufuneka uthande (Like) ikhasi leTwitter le-StarSat okanye ikhasi likaFacebook, uze ubathumelele kwelinye lalo makhasi ividiyo leyo yakho. OMAWUKWAZI Umsasazi ophumelelayo uzakukhethwa ligqiza labagwebi eliquka: Umdidiyeli uTracey Martin, umdidiyeli ophezulu uZak Dakile kwakunye nomsasazi weDrive Time eJozi FM uMpho Putini. Isigqibo esithatyathiweyo sakubhengezwa ngeveki yokuqala yenyanga yeThupha 2016. 
Ukuphekwa kwenkqubo kwakuqala kwiveki yesibini okanye yesithathu yeThupha, kwaye inkqubo iyakuqala ngeyoMsintsi ka2016.

headline: Aphelile amathemba wokuya kwindebe yehlabathi
text:
Emva kokubethwa koMzantsi Afrika, ngoku atshabalele amathemba okuya kwawo kwindebe yehlabathi kunyaka ozayo. ISenegal ibethe uMzantsi Afrika ngo’2-0 kumdlalo ohlakulela indebe yebehlabathi obusePeter Mokaba Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. Ukubethwa kweBafana Bafana kuthetha ukuthi aphelile amathemba okuya eRussia – eyona nto bekunyanzelekile uyiphephe xa idlala neSenegal. Ngoku iqela lesizwe liya eSenegal ungxwelerhekile. Inye into eyenzileyo iSenegal kwisigaba sesibini: kukuqinisekisa ukuba ikhusela amagowuli wayo ewafumene kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla umdlalo sele iwuthathele ngakuwo umdlalo iSenegal emva kokufumana amagowuli amabini. Kwimizuzu emihlanu yokuqala yomdlalweni akukho nto engako eyenzekile ngaphandle kweempawu zokufundana. UStuart Baxter uqale ngoMorgan Gould noClayton Daniels abadlalela iSuperSport United emva emaphikweni kubambe uThamsanqa Mkhize noSfiso Hlanti. UKhune ixhimfe ibhola ebize kakubi kumzuzu wethoba ebigotywe ekhohlo. UDiafra Sakho ungcangcazelise umnatha kumzuzu weshumi elinanye kokufumana ibhola ebisuka ekunene. UKhune ushiywe oneke izandla emva kokugqagqaniselwa kwabadlali beBafana Bafana emva zizitshovutshovu zeSenegal.   
UThemba Zwane, uSibusiso Vilakazi noPercy Tau benze ezibukwayo besabelana ngebhola kakuhle – kodwa iinzame zabo zinqandwe ngunozinti weSenegal – uKhadim Ndiaye. Kunzuzu wamashumi amabini anesibhozo ibhola kaLebogang Manyama ibethe epalini. UMkhize uwugwaze ekhaya umkhonto ngempazamo, ngalo ndlela yaba iSenegal ihamba phambili ngo’2-0. UNdiaye uphinde wavala ibhola embi kaManyama phambi kokuphela kwesigaba sokuqala somdlalo. UMzantsi Afrika uwulawule umdlalo kwisigaba sokuqala futhi unawo amathuba abenika ithemba – kodwa iSenegal yenze eyona nto ibalulekileyo emdlalweni: ukufaka amagowuli emnatheni. 
Uphinde wazama kwakhona uMzantsi Afrika kwisigaba sesibini uphantsi koxinizelelo. Intle ibhola ebidlalwa ngamakhwenkwe kaStuart Baxter, kumzuzu wamashumi amahlanu anesithandathu uVilakazi utsale imbumbulu yebhola – kodwa uNdiaye uyibambe ngaphandle kokusokola lo bhola. UBaxter ukhuphe uManyama, endaweni yakhe wafaka u-Andile Jali, kwangena noSiphiwe Tshabalala endaweni kaZwane odlale kakuhle kakhulu kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Ebekhona amathuba abawadalileyo abadlali boMzantsi Afrika kwisigaba sesibini – kodwa ngelishwa labo abakwazanga ukugqobhoza kwiSenegal kwade kwase kugqibeleni. Izuze amanqaku apheleleyo iSenegal kulo mdlalo emva kokubetha uMzantsi Afrika.

headline: Bafunge bamunca iintupha kumngcwabo kaSomlomo
text:
Amalungu eANC achasene nobuqhophololo afunge amunca iintupha ngethuba kungcwatywa uSomlomo womasipala iRaymond Mhlaba eBhofolo ngoMgqibelo, esithi azakuqhuba abenyuvulela ubuqhophololo – nto leyo abathi ibangele ukubhubha kukaThozama Njobe. 
UNjobe (46) ubhubhe ngomhla weshumi elinesixhenxe kule nyanga emva kokudutyulwa ngeembumbulu ezilishumi elinesithandathu ngaphandle kwekhaya lakhe kwilokishi iNew Town eBhofolo. 
Izithethi ebezizimase umngcwabo wakhe kwibala lezemidlalo iZwelitsha, kufuphi nedolophu yaseBhofolo, zimchaze uNjobe ngengetshantliziyo leANC ebelichasene nobuqhophololo futhi lingonqeni ukuthetha phandle xa likholelwa ukuba kukho undonakele kulo mbutho. 
Phakathi kweenkokeli ebezizimase lo mngcwabo kuquka ilungu lekomiti ephezulu kwiANC – uFikile Xasa, obesakuba ngunondyebo kulo mbutho – uMathews Phosa, unobhala weANC ephondweni – uOscar Mabuyane, uSomlomo wePalamente yephondo – uNoxolo Kiviet, ukubala nje abambalwa. 
UXasa usebenzise iqonga ebelinikiwe ukothulela umnqwazi igalelo likaNjobe esithi ebengumzekelo wenkokeli eyaziyo into ebiyithunyiwe ngumbutho. UXasa uthi amagingxigingxi akhoyo ngoku kwiANC azakusombululeka emva kwenkomfa yenyanga yoMnga kulo nyaka. 
Intombi kaNjobe, uNosisi, utyibele umama wakhe esithi ebengumntu onothando futhi ofuna inkqubela ekwakhuthaza ukuzithanda nokuzimela ebantwaneni bakhe. 
 UMabuyane ubongoze amapolisa ukuba enze konke okusemandleni ukunqakula ababulali bakaNjobe. 
Umhlobo kaNjobe, uMandla Makeleni, okwasebenza kwibhunga likamasipala waseRaymond Mhlaba, uthi abazukuyeka ukulwa nobuqhophololo kulo masipala. 
“Lo mntu udubule uqabane uNjobe ngeembumbulu ezilishumi elinesithandathu, makayothenga ezinye azokusidubula nathi kuba sizakuqhubeka nokuchasana nobuqhophololo,” utshilo uMakeleni. 
UPhosa uthi kuyaxhalabisa ukubulawa kooceba, ekwakhalimela ukunganyamezelani kwiinkokeli zalo mbutho.

headline: Izikolo azizuphinda zakhiwe ngesamente
text:
ISebe lezeMfundo eMpuma Koloni nakundlunkulu lithathe isigqibo sokuba izikolo ezakhiwe ngezitena zesamente azizuphinda zakhiwe apha ephondweni.  
Oku kuvakaliswe nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo eMpuma Koloni uFundile Gade. UMphathiswa uGade ukuvakalise oku kwilali yaseLuhewini eNgcobo xeshikweni enikezela ngesikolo esitsha esiyiNtlelelengwane Primary School, ngoLwesihlanu umhla wesithandathu kweyoMsintsi. 
 ISebe lezeMfundo lichithe izigidi ezingamashumi amabini anesine zeerandi ekwakhiweni kwesi sikolo saseNtlelelengwane.  
Ngokutsho kukaMphathiswa uGade bafikelele kwesi sigqibo emva kokuba bathe bakroba zonke iinkalo malunga nale nyewe. 
 “ISebe lezeMfundo liqaphele into yokuba lichitha izigidi ngezigidi zeerandi ekwakhiweni kwezikolo. Ngamanye amaxesha eziz ikolo ziye zivalwe ngenxa yokunqongophala kwabantwana abafunda kuzo. Xa sivaliwe esi sikolo kuye kunyanzeleke ukuba abantwana bathuthwe basiwe kwesinye isikolo. Isikolo esivaliweyo sishiyeka singenanto yokwenza, kutsho ukuthi loo nto urhulumente imali yakhe imke namanzi. Le nto ibangele ukuba sithathe esi sigqibo sokuba singaphindi sakhe izikolo ngezitena zesamente,” utsho uGade.  
UMphathiswa uGade uyibeke elubala ukuba izikolo ziza kwakhiwa ngento eza kuthi ikwazi ukususwa xa abantwana bemkile kweso sikolo.  
“Xa wakhe ngesamente awukwazi ukusincothula isikolo usise apho sifuneka khona. Kanti ngoku siza kuzakha ngento ekwaziyo ukuncothuka ze kuthi xa sijamelene nemeko yokunqongophala kwamanani abantwana sikwazi usisusa apho sisise apho abantwana bakhoyo. Imeko yezoqoqosho ichaphazela izinto ezininzi. Jonga ngoku apha eMzantsi Afrika sinengxaki yokungazinzi kwezoqoqosho, loo nto inefuthe nakwezinye izinto. Abantu bathatha abantwana babo bayofunda kwizikolo ezikwiindawo abasebenza kuzo kuba bebaleka ukuthenga ukutya kaninzi. Umntu uye aqonde ukuba akakwazi ukuthenga ukutya akuse ekhaya ze aphinde athenge ukutya okuza kutyiwa nguye edolophini apho asebenza khona. Loo nto izichaphazele izikolo zethu,” utsho uGade.  
Ngokutsho kweSebe lezeMfundo eli cebo baza nalo lokwakha izikolo liza kuthi lincede isebe ukuba lichithe imali encinci xa lisakha izikolo kunezo zakhiwe ngesamente.

headline: Amagcisa aya ngeentliziyo eMakhanda!
text:
KUZA kunyanzeleka kukhale ibhungane kulo nyaka kwizitalato eziqhele impithizelo yeziyolo eMakhanda ngexesha lasebusika. 
Oku kusemva kokuqhambuka kwentsholongwane yeKhorona, efike yachaphazela okuninzi nokunyanzeleke kuhlehliswe. 
Abavelisi balo Mnyhadala kaZwelonke wezobuGcisa, bathi kuba besazi igalelo eliza nalo mnyhadala eluntwini, ingakumbi amagcisa, bathathe isigqibo sokuqhuba nezinye zeenkqubo zawo ngonxibelelwano lobuxhakaxhaka bale mihla. 
“Singulo Mnyhadala wezobuGcisa besisexhaleni, sicinga, sixoxa ngesinokwenza ukuqubisana nale khorona ivimba ihlabathi umnyhadala waminyaka yonke. 
“ Ngenxa yokuvalwa kwamatheko amakhulu, asikwazi ukuvumela abantu abangaphezu kwekhulu bahlanganisane,” kutsho abaqulunqi beNational Arts Festival. 
“Ngenxa yokuvalwa kokuhambahamba kwanokusetyenziswa kwezithuthi zikawonkewonke, amagcisa ethu neendwendwe, abakwazi ukufikelela eMakhanda, nathi asikwazi ukufikelela kubo. 
“ Asikwazi kubanegalelo kusasazeko lwale ntsholongwane kwaye siyakuqonda kakuhle ukuba eli lixesha lokuzichwethela bucala eluntwini,” kutsho abaqulunqi balo Mnyhadala. 
“Emva kokucingisisa, siphulaphula, sifunda, sixambulisana kwaye sithetha, size necebo, sithathe isigqibo esingazange sasenza ngaphambili. Ukusukela ngowe25 kaJune ukuya kwi5 kaJuly 2020, iNational Arts Festival iza kube iqhuba kubuxhakaxhaka bomnatha iintsuku ezilishumi elinanye.” 
Abaqulunqi bathi oku kuthetha ukuba lo mnyhadala uza kuqhuba uxhasa amagcisa nobugcisa nakunyaka ka2020, ngokubonisa umsebenzi wawo kwezomnatha. 
“ Ngale ndlela singakwazi ukwabelana ngefuthe nethemba nabo bakube besavaleleke emakhayeni abo. Sibaphe ithuba lokunxulumana ngelixa sicelwa ukuba masiqelelane omnye komnye,” kwazisa abaqulunqi. 
Abaqulunqi bathi bayazi ukuba amagcisa axhomekeke kwiminyhadala efana neNational Arts Festival yaseMakhanda ukwenza ingeniso ngokuthengisa amatikiti, ukubonisa ngomsebenzi wabo ukuze ube ngundabamlonyeni ehlabathini, kwaye anxulumane nabalandeli babo. 
Abavelisi balo Mnyhadala endaweni yokuwuhlehlisa, bathi injongo yabo kukudalela amagcisa amathuba amatsha noluntu ukuze lubhiyozelele ubugcisa, ngokunjalo nokudala iqonga lokwabelana ngomsebenzi kumagcisa. 
Izigidi zabantu eMzantsi Afrika kule nyanga ziye zaqelelaniswa omnye komnye. 
Abantu bazibone bengakwazi ukuya ezinkonzweni, ezikolweni, emisebenzini, okanye banxulumane ngaphandle kosapho lwabo. 
Ezi zezinye zendlela zokuphepha kokusasazeka kwentsholongwane yeCOVID-19. 
Abavelisi beNAF bathi baqonde mabenze esi sigqibo kwangoku. 
“Sineentsuku ezingaphezu kwekhulu ezishiyekileyo phambi kokuba sifike kusuku lokuvula. Eneneni asinokukwazi ukulinda amagcisa alungiselele umnyhadala onokuqhuba okanye ungaqhubi. Asinokucela abaxhasi bethu benze izicwangciso zabo, bafune iindawo zokuhlala nezithuthi, kwaye asinakufuna abanikezelinkonzo bethu bahlale belinde ilize, “ kutsho abaqulunqi beNAF. 
Embalini yeNational Arts Festival, iza kube iqala ukuqhutywa olu hlobo. 
Abaqulunqi balebele ngokuthi lo iza kuba ngunyaka onzima kuluntu lwaseMakhanda neMpuma Koloni nanjengoko iCOVID-19 ichaphazele uzinzo kuqoqosho. 
Abaqulunqi ngoku bathi basafakan’ imilomo nabaxhasi nabatyali balo Mnyhadala abafana norhulumente wephondo, iStandard Bank, iSebe lezobuGcisa neNkcubeko, uDistell noMultichoice ukuze kucwangciswe kakuhle. 
“Sakuthetha ngqo namagcisa kwakunye nabarhwebi ababhalisele ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo Mnyhadala ka2020.”

headline: Imibutho yepolitiki ibhiyozela amaLungelo oLuntu eKapa
text:
Bezixakekile yimisitho eyahlukeneyo yokuqaphela usuku lwamalungelo oluntu izitalato zaseKapa nalapho imibutho eyahlukeneyo yezopolitiko ibidibene.  
Umbutho weDemocratic Alliance okhokelwe libambela nkokheli kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni, uBonginkosi Madikizela, ubudibene kwingingqi yaseSite C eKhayelitsha.  
Kulapho okaMadikizela athethe ngomcimbi wokuba umsantsa phakathi kwezinhanha nabangathathi ntweni ufanele ukuvalwa.  
Ukwathe ingaba alunantsingiselo olu suku ukuba akunakuqinisekiswa ukungaphindwa kwempazamo zangaphambili kubuyiselwe nesidima soluntu. 
KwaseKhayelitsha njalo, inkokheli yombutho i-Economic Freedom Fighters uFloyd Shivambu, udibene namalungu alo mbutho okwingingqi yaseIlitha Park. 
UShivambu uthe ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika lifanele ukusebenzisa olu suku ukuqwalasela ingunqu ezathi zenzeka sukela kwintlekele yaseSharpville. 
Kwilokishi yakwaLanga, umbutho wePan Africanist Congress wenze owaso isikhumbuzo solu suku lwamalungelo oluntu, nalapho kwasweleka abantu abathathu konzakala abaninzi kula lokishi phantsi kwesandla samapolisa.  
Inkokheli yalo mbutho uLuthando Mbinda, uthi udushe olwenzeka kula lokishi alunakuze lulityalwe nangona sele kusondele iminyaka engamashumi amathandathu lwenzeka.  
Lo kaMbinda ukwathe iPAC izakwenza konke okusemandleni ukuphucula indawo zabantu abangathathi ntweni. 
Ngonyaka ka1960, amalungu ePAC athi aququzelela umngcelele wokuphikisana nomthetho wamapasi kwilokishi ezohlukeneyo. 
Ngethuba lalo mngcelele kwaye kwabakho ungquzulwano phakathi kwabaqhankqalazi kwanamapolisa, nalapho kwabhubha abantu abathathu konzakala abaninzi.  
Lo mbutho ubanga kakhulu olu suku nanjengoko imingcelele yathi yaququzelelwa yinkokheli yawo engasekhoyo uRobert Sobukwe. 
– isibhalo@inl.co.za

headline: Kuphethe uSandiso Mpengesi ngoku kwiChippa United!
text:
USandiso Mpengesi uxelele iintatheli ukuba lifikile ixesha lokuba aziwe ngabantu ukuba ungumntu okhoyo. Ukutsho oku ngethuba iChippa United isazisa abadlali bayo abatsha elalini yaseNgcobo kwiveki ephelileyo – apho uyise, uMnu. Siviwe Mpengesi, ebevula indlu entle ayakhele utata owatshelwa yindlu. Ngumlawuli omtsha weChippa United ukusukela ngoku uSandiso Mpengesi. Ungena endaweni kaKhumbulani Konco okhululweyo emva kokuhlala isithuba esingaphantsi kwesizini eGqeberha. USandiso, 24, uthe akazumpetya ingalo uyise – kodwa okwakhe kukuqinisekisa ukuba izinto ziyaphucuka kwiChippa United. 
“Kudala ndisebenza notata – kodwa ke bendingabonakali. Izinto asele ejamelene nazo utata nam ndiyazazi. Umahluko ngoku kukuba ndiyaziwa ngabantu,” utshilo uSandiso. Liyanda inani labantu abatsha abanikwa izikhundla eziphezulu ngooyise kumaqela adlala kwiDStv Premiership. Yayikade ikwiChiefs, iPirates, Leopards nakwiCosmos. Kodwa ngoku iyabonakala kwiSundowns, Royal AM nakwiChippa United. Yintoni abanokuyilindela kuye abantu? “Okwam kukuxhasa into eyenziwa nguTata. Andifuni kugqamisa igama lam – kodwa ngenye imini, ndifuna ukuthi: ndandiyinxalenye yokuguquka kwezinto kwiChippa. Utata ucinga ukuba lixesha elilungileyo lokuba ndibe sisandla sakhe sasekunene ndisebenza nabanye abalawuli. 
Akukho nto endiza kuyiguqula – kodwa ndifuna nje ukuphucula indlela yethu yokwenza izinto,” utshilo uSandiso ekulindeleke kubonakale isandla sakhe kwisizini eza kuqala ngomhla wesihlanu kwinyanga ezayo. Emva kokuvula indlu ayiphe umntu omdala kwiveki kaNelson Mandela, uMpengesi ubhengeze amagama wabadlali abatsha. Uluhlu lwabadlali abatsha lukhokelwe nguJustice Chabalala, uSipho Chaine, uTrevor Mathiane, uBrooklyn Poggenpoel, uSirgio Kammies, Azola Ntsabo, Aviwe Mqokozo, uKhanyisile Mayo, uDiego Appollis, uShaquile Abrahams, uSiseko Manona, uYurrig Conwood, uZanoxolo Mduli, Abdi Banda, Elmo Kambindu noNkosikhona Dube.

headline: Kuza kutsho iGqom kwiGcuwa neziphaluka
text:
IGqom Experience iphinde yabuya ngovudu kulo nyaka eGcuwa. Abathandi bomculo baza konwabela iiDJ eziliqela ezifana noNunuza, DJ Ligwa, Ubiza Wethu, uDJ Zuks nabanye. 
IGqom Experience iqalwe nguSibuyile Dunga waseColosa eDutywa ngo2014, eyenzela kwindawo yaseLuthulini naseDukuduku kwalapho eDutywa. 
“Yathi yakuvala indawo yaseLuthulini, ndayithatha ndayisa KwaKiro eGcuwa,” kutsho umseki weGqom Experience. 
Lo ngumnyaka wesibhozo kususela oko yaqalwa. UDunga uthi akudlali Gqom kuphela kwiGqom Experience nanjengoko zikhona nezinye iintlobo zomculo. 
Uthi eli iba lithuba lokukhulisa namashishini amancinane asekuhlaleni kuba anikwa ithuba lokuzithengisa. 
“IGqom Experience inika wonke umntu ithuba. Ibanika iqonga lokuzithengisa mahala.” 
UDunga uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba unobangela wokuqala esi siganeko solonwabo wabona ukuba akukho qonga lokuzibonakalisa kwabo balo mculo. 
“IGqom iqalwe ziiprodyusa ezisokolayo zisebenzisa amagumbi azo okulala njengendawo yokushicilela, bengenaqonga lokuzibonakalisa. Ndandifuna iqapheleke, ndaqinisekisa ke  ukuba nyaka nonyaka kuneDJ yeentlobo ezohlukeneyo zomculo,” kutsho uDunga. 
Uthi iGqom Experience iye yakhula ngokwenani labazimasayo   kususela oko yaqalwa. Ibikhe yathi xha kwiminyaka edlulileyo ngenxa yeCovid-19. 
Amatikiti aqala kuR50 , ze iVIP ibe yiR250.

headline: I-EC Bees ilwela ithuba kwiNedbank
text:
Iqela lebhola ekhatywayo elidlala kwiABC Motsepe League iEC Bees isondele ekubeni iphinde ibeyinxalenye yamaqela angamashumi amathathu anesibini azakukhuphisana kwiNedbank Cup kunyaka ozayo. 
IBees nehleli kwindawo yesithathu kwiligi izakuqubisana neqela elizakuphumelela kwiSAB League. Lo mdlalo izakuba nguwo ozakohlula amadoda emakhwenkweni xa la maqela equbisana. Iqela eliphumeleleyo lizakuba yinxalenye yamaqela ayi-32 abazakulwela indebe yeNedbank. 
IBees ijike kumlenze wokuqala kolu khuphiswano kwinyanga yoKwindla kulo nyaka emva kokubethwa liqela laseLimpopo iMagesi FC, kumdlalo owawubanjelwe eABSA Stadium, eMonti. 
Amagqibela kankqoyi emidlalo yokuzibekela indawo kwiNedbank Cup  yonyaka ozayo kumaqela eMotsepe League adlalelwe kumabala aseKomani kwimpelaveki edlulileyo. 
Iziphumo: 
Tornado 1 – 0 Lion City 
EC Bees 2 – 1 Matatiele Professionals 
Umdlalo wokugqibela: 
Tornado 3 (8) – 3 (9) EC 
-Zenande Maqubela

headline: Imbalela eAmathole iyakupheliswa ngeR944 million
text:
AMADAMA nezadunge zomile, abantu bayambuyaza, imfuyo iyafa, izityalo zitsha lilanga. 
Le yindlela ubani angayichaza ngayo imeko yembalela egquba kuMasipala weSithili waseAmathole. 
Lo masipala waseAmathole wenziwa ngoomasipala basekuhlaleni iNgqushwa, Mnquma, Mbhashe, Great Kei, Amahlathi neRaymond Mhlaba. 
Kutshanje lo masipala ubhengeze ukuba iBhofolo iza kuzibona ingenalo nethontsi lamanzi kuba ubanga ngelithi awusakwazi kudontsa amanzi asuka kumlambo iKat. 
Kwimbalelwano lo masipala uthe usenzile isicelo sokuncediswa kwiSebe lezaManzi kodwa amanzi bekusenzima ukuba afikelele koompompi baseBhofolo. 
NaseGcuwa liculo elinye, idama laseGcuwa lome kroqo. Umasipala uthi uzamile ukomba amanzi aphantsi komhlaba, iBorehole, kufuphi neli dama laseGcuwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo. 
EDutywa edolophini, ingxaki ithande ukuqatsela. Abantu bakha amanzi kwizadunge ezimdaka, ezigcwele inkunkuma nto leyo ebeka emngciphekweni iimpilo zabo. 
Uceba weUDM eMbhashe, uNkosinathi Ndlodaka, uthi imeko imbi kakhulu eDutywa.  
“Imbi into esedolophini eDutywa. Abantu basemngciphekweni wokosulelwa zizifo ngenxa yokuba bakha amanzi amdaka. Okunganiki themba kukuba uMasipala waseAmathole akasiniki nkqubo ecace gca yokuqubisana nale ngxaki,” utshilo uNdlodaka. 
Umhlali waseDutywa uSanele Maqongqo, uthi xa ungenamali yokuthenga amanzi asezimbombozini evenkileni, usemngciphekweni wezifo eDutywa.  
“Nalo manzi aza nomasipala waseAmathole ngeetrakhi, xa bethandile, asikwazi ukuwathemba kuba asiwazi ukuba athathwa phi. Kunzima kumntu ongenamali kule dolophu, kufuneka uyokukha loo manzi amdaka uthanda ungathandi.” 
Kwimbalelwano lo masipala uthi ingxaki yembalela eAmathole iza kufuna imali engangeR944 million ukuze isonjululwe.  
Lo masipala ukwabhengeze ukuba uxakekile efuna inkxasomali kwikomishini kaMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa (Presidential Infrastructure Coordinating Commission), ukuze kwenziwe isiza samanzi eNgqamakhwe.  
La manzi waseNgqamakhwe aza kuthathwa kumlambo iTsomo kwaye aza kunceda uMasipala waseMnquma. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za

headline: #MARIKANA: ULilitha noStoan eMonti ngokuhlwanje
text:
UMARIKANA, Ntabentsizwa ukuya kutsho kwiingoma zikaMiriam Makeba, zezinye zeengoma azakutsholoza ngazo uLilitha Bidla xa esungula ngokusesikweni icwecwe lakhe eMonti namhlanje. 
 Eli cwecwe libizwa “Ndim Lho’’, nelikhutshwe ebutsheni balo nyaka, lineengoma ezichukumisayo ezifana noMarikana, ngoma leyo izoba inxeba elisaviwa ziintsapho ezalahlekelwa ngamalungu azo kwimpalalo-gazi yaseMarikana.  
Namhlanje, abaninzi bazakufumana inyoba yokubona okokuqala iVideo yale ngoma eMiriam Makeba ECAVC.  
UManejala kaLilitha nokwangumvelisi weli cwecwe uLuyolo Beku, uthi abantu baseMonti ngokuhlwanje bazakunikwa ithuba lokungcamla kwimbiza yabo.  
“Besele siqale eBhayi ngenyanga ka-Epreli nokusungula eli cwecwe , ngoku abahlali baseMonti lityeli labo,” utshilo. UBeku uthi uStoan Seete, ongumbhexeshi we-Afro Cafe’ nelungu leBongo Maffin, nokwasebenze noLilitha kweli cwecwe, uzakube engumphathi walo mcimbi.  
ULilitha uzakube ekhatshwa yiNkevestan. Baleka uye eMusic Mix eVincent kungenjalo uzifumanele itikiti lakho emnyango nge-R50 kuphela.  
UBeku ulumkise ngelithi amatikiti aqingqekile nanjengoko i-ECAVC ingekho nkulu.  
Ungaphoswa! Umcimbi uyaqala ngeyesithandathu malanga. 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za

headline: Bakhwijana ngodaka lwezopolitiko e-O.R. Tambo
text:
Iguquke yali dabi lezopolitiko lase-O.R Tambo inyewe yokubanjwa kukaThandekile Sabisa noLawrence Mambila, abatyholwa ngokupheka iyelenqe lokubulala usihlalo we-ANC kule ngingqi uXolile Nkompela .  
Abaxhasi bakaSabisa ebebenxibe izikipa, baxulube ngamatye iqela ebelixhasa uXolile Nkompela, kunyanzeleke amapolisa anganelele ukuthibaza imeko.  
Abarhanelwa babanjwe kwiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo, besoyanyaniswa nohlaselo lukaNkompela ongusihlalo we-ANC kwingingqi ye-O.R.Tambo ngoDisemba. Kolu dubulo kwabulawa unogada kaNkompela uZukile Nyontso. Bebonke abarhanelwa asele bebanjwe bavalelwa bane, kodwa omnye sele ejike walingqina lombuso. 
UBaxolile Kulu othethela iqela labahlobo bakaSabisa noMambila (Friends of Sabisa and Mambila) uthe: “Amaqabane ethu (Sabisa noMambila) asesesibhedlele. Sikholelwa ukuba into yokubanjwa kwabo ayikho semthethweni, futhi iphenjelelwa zezopolitiko. Wonke umntu unelungelo lokuphathwa kakuhle xa ebanjiwe.” 
“Asonelisekanga konke konke yindlela ewusingathe ngayo lo mba iANC e-O.R Tambo. Izenzo zabo azibonakalisi ubumbano, koko zibonakalisa iyantlukwano,” utshiilo uKulu. 
UMambila noSabisa bebengekho enkundleni ngethuba kuxoxwa ityala labo ngoLwesibini. Ingxelo zithi basagcinwe kwisibhedlele sabucala eMthatha. Igqwetha labo uPhillip Zilwa uxelele inkundla ukuba ukugcinwa kukaSabisa noMambila, kususela ngomhla wamashumi amabini kule nyanga, emveni kokuba umbuso ungakwazanga ukubazisa enkundlleni, wacela inkundla ikhuphe isigunyaziso sokukhululwa kwabo. Eli gqwetha liyaziphika iingxelo zomtshutshisi weli tyala uMashilo Betty ezithi, abarhanelwa abasebenzisani namapolisa. UBetty uthe: “Abarhanelwa ababini uMambila noSabisa abavumi kuthathwe imizila yeminwe yabo nto leyo ilibazisa eli tyala nangakumbi.”  
Eli tyala limiselwe umhla weshumi elinanye kwinyanga ezayo.

headline: Khorona: Kuphunyezwe iR50 million yokulungisa izibhedlele
text:
Urhulumente waseMpuma Koloni uphumeze izigidi ezingamashumi amahlanu eerandi ukulungisa izibhedlele ezintandathu ukuze zikwazi ukumelana nomthamo wabagula yintsholongwane yeKhorona. 
Ezi zibhedlele yiGrey eQonce, iNompumelelo eNgqushwa, Isilimela eSajonisi, iSt Elizabeth eLusikisiki, Mthatha General kwakunye neDora Nginza eBhayi. 
Ukulungiswa kwezi zibhedlele sele kuqalile, utshilo urhulumente waseMpuma Koloni. 
INkulubaphathiswa uOscar Mabuyane uthi ukuchithwa kwale mali yokulungiswa kwezi zibhedlele kuza kushiya umqela oncomekayo nanjengoko imigangatho yazo ibisele iwohloka. 
Kusenjalo, uMabuyane uthi amanani wabo bosuleleke yintsholongwane yeKhorona aseza kunyuka ngenxa yesicwangciso abanaso sokuhlola abantu. 
“Sisesenyeleni, umcimbi uza kuba shushu njengoko ziqengqeleka iinyanga. Hlala endlini, ukhusele usapho lwakho,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
INkulubaphathiswa ithi abantu abazimasa imingcwabo mababeke ukhuseleko lwabo phambili. 
“Enye into ekufuneka iqondiwe kukuba nokuba inani labo bazimase isingcwabo lingakanani, abantu baza kosuleleka yile ntsholongwane yeKhorona xa bengabeki phambili imiqathango yokuzikhusela. 
“Nokuba abantu balishumi basenokosulelana xa bengabeki phambili imiqathango yokuzikhusela. Into ebalulekileyo kukuba ubani angayi esingcwabeni xa kungekho mfuneko. 
“Masizame ukunqanda ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane ngaphandle kokuba side sibekwe iliso ngabezomthetho. Ukhuseleko lwethu lubaluleke kakhulu,” kutsho uMabuyane. 
“Hlala endlini uphume kuphela xa kunyanzelekile, ngokuya kuthenga ukutya okanye usiya kwiinkonzo zempilo. Masihlambe izandla rhoqo futhi sizikhwebule kwiindibano zasezidlangalaleni.”

headline: UPitso uncoma uTeko Modise
text:
Iqela loMzantsi Afrika, iMamelodi Sundowns, lingene zwabha kwisigaba esiphambi kwamagqibela kankqoyi eCaf Champions League emva kokubetha iZamalek yaseYiphutha ngo’1-0 kumdlalo obubanjelwe eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoLwesithathu ebusuku. 
 Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uPitso Mosimane, wonelisekile kakhulu ngumqela owenziwe liqela lakhe, ngakumbi emva kokuphumelela imidlalo emithathu ilandelelana kolu khuphiswano. Ngoku icekwa lilele kwi-Enyimba neZamalek ngoba yona iDowns ihleli phezulu kuGroup B ngethoba lamanqaku.  
Izamile iZamalek ukuxhathisa kulo mdlalo kodwa iqela likaPitso lilo ebelinamathuba okuphumelela umdlalo. Nangona uJingles onelisekile ngumsebenzi owenziwe ngabadlali bakh, kodwa uphume noTeko Modise, omnye wabadlali ababenomdlalo omhle kakhulu ngoLwesithathu. Igowuli lalo mdlalo lifakwe ngumdlali weZamalek, * -Ali Gabr, obezama ukuchitha ibhola entle ebigotywe nguPercy Tau ongene kwisiqingatha sesibini emdlalweni.  
“Bekufanele ukuba sifake amagowuli aliqela, endaweni yoko, sisuke sonwabela umdlalo ngaphezulu kokufaka amagowuli. Akukho nto imbi apho ngoba umdlalo besiwulawula. UPercy uwutshintshile umdlalo. kodwa ndiphume noModise. Ebezityala kakuhle kakhulu iibhola. Siyifumene into ebesiyifuna kulo mdlalo, amanqaku. Ungalibali ukuba sibethe iZamalek,” utshilo. uJingles ebobetheka luncumo.

headline: UJele ufuna itshayele iindebe iPirates!
text:
“Sifuna kwanto kule sizini”. Lawo ngamazwi kaKapteni weOrlando Pirates emva kokuba ithelekiswe neHighlands Park kwiMTN 8 emsithweni obubanjelwe eHyde Park, eGoli, kwiveki ephelileyo.  
UHappy Jele unethemba lokuba iPirates iza kuphakamisa iindebe kule sizini emva kokuba iphose amathuba amaninzi okuziphumelela kwisizini edlulileyo.  
Ezimnyama zineminyaka emihlanu yonke zingacholi naphantsi kodwa nangona kunjalo, uJele unethemba lokuba izinto ziza kuguquka kule sizini.  
UJele ngoyena mdlali omdala nowayekhona ngethuba iPirates iphakamisa indebe yayo yokugqibela kwiminyaka edlulileyo.  
“Umsebenzi wam kukukhuthaza oogxa bam ukuze siqinisekise okokuba kule sizini kukho into eliyifumanayo iqela.  
Bakhona abadlali abadala abandincedisayo,” utshilo uJele. 
Umqeqeshi wePirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, uxelele iintatheli kutshanje into ethi abalandeli mabathobe amaphaphu ngoba iindebe sezivele ngeempondo kwaye okuseleyo kukuqinisa nje indlela iqela elidlala ngayo ukuze lifumane iindebe. Ukuthethe oku uSredojevic emva kokuba iPirates ibethe iBloemfontein Celtic ngo’3-1 emdlalweni evule ngawo isizini. IBucs ityikitye iziqwayi zabadlali abanokuyinceda kule sizini, phakathi kwazo ekukho uGabadinho Mhango noFortune Makaringe.  
“Umqeqeshi uyakwazi ukubadlalisa abadlali ngokwahlukana kwemidlalo. Sinabadlali abaninzi abaza kusinceda njengokuba sinemidlalo emininzi ekulindeleke siyidlale.  
Abaqeqeshi bethu bayabazi abadlali abalungele ukudlala.  
Kuyandonwabisa ukubona bedlala kakuhle emidlalweni abadlali abafikayo,” utshilo uJele. 
Kuza kufuneka abadlali bePirates baye kwiHighlands Park bezimisele emdlalweni oseOrlando Stadium emalanga ngoMgqibelo ngoba inomkhwa ombi wokuwasokolisa amaqela amakhulu.  
Nangona iHighlands Park ingayivulanga kakuhle isizini  kodwa umqeqeshi wayo, uOwen da Gama, ugoduke enethemba emva kokuba ikwazile ukubuya nenqaku elinye emdlalweni ewudlale neMaritzburg United kwiveki ephelileyo.  
“Kusekutsha kakhulu.  
Nayo iRoma zange yakhiwa ngosuku olunye. Kuthatha ithuba ukwakha iqela, nathi kufuneka siziphe ithuba ukuze sigqithe kuzo zonke izigaba njengeqela elisakhulayo,” utshilo uDa Gama emva komdlalo.

headline: UJudith Sephuma utsholoza kwiqonga laseMonti!
text:
IMVUMI engusaziwayo kumculo woMngqungqo, uJudith Sephuma, uza kutsholoza kwiqonga laseMonti kule veki. 
Oku kukuthuthuzela uluntu obe lujonge ngabomvu uMnyhadala wesibini kulo nyaka woMngqungqo obanjelwa eMonti. 
Ngenxa yeCovid-19, lo mnyhadala weEastern Cape Jazz Festival (ECJF) oqale kunyaka ophelileyo, awuyi kwamkela uluntu olungaphaya kwamashumi amahlanu, kodwa uluntu lakonwatyiswa kwikhasi likaFacebook le-ECJF, oku kudizwe nguSihlalo we-ECJF uMlindi Ntloko kwiphephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Lo mnyhadala walo nyaka uza kuqala ngoLwesine uphele ngokuhlwa ngoLwesihlanu. 
“Ngenxa yeCOVID-19 ethwaxe ihlabathi lonke, lo mcimbi weentsuku ezimbini uza kubanjwa online kwikhasi lethu likaFacebook,” kuvakalisa uNtloko. 
UNtloko uthi kuqala bebegqibe kwelokuba lo mnyhadala uhlehliswe kwaphela kulo nyaka. 
“Siphantse sawunqumamisa ngenxa yeCOVID-19, kodwa sabuya sahlala phantsi sacinga ngeqhinga esinokuza nalo. 
“Kulo nyaka asijonganganga ngeniso, kodwa sicingele uluntu oluthanda iJazz neemvumi zeJazz ezisakhulayo ezizifuna kumaqonga amakhulu, ” kutsho uNtloko. 
Lo mnyhadala walo nyaka uza kuqala ngoLwesine, umhla weNkcubeko, nalapho igqala lemidlalo yeqonga uGqr John Kani aza kube esenza isifundo sonyaka. 
Oku kulindeleke kwenziwe ngonxibelelwano lwale mihla. 
” EMpuma Koloni asizingci ngokubalikhaya lamagqala nje kuphela, kodwa sikholelwa ekubhiyozeni loo magqala ngelixa esadla amazimba ukuze sifunxe ulwazi nobulumko,” kutsho uNtloko. 
Kusuku lwesibini lwalo mnyhadala, uJudith Sephuma ekhatshwa nguSylvester Mazinyane baza kukhwela eqongeni. 
Umxholo walo nyaka uthi “Celebrating South Africa’s Living Human Treasures” 
Isifundo sikaKani siqala ngentsimbi yesibhozo ngokuhlwa kwikhasi leFacebook elithi: @EasternCapeJazzFest, yena uJudith Sephuma atsholoze ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngoLwesihlanu eICC, nalapho ubani eza kubukela kweli khasi leFacebook. 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za

headline: Ukhuphiswano lokoja isoseji
text:
Libuyile kwakhona ukhuphiswano lakwaShoprite neCheckers lweyona ntshatsheli yokoja isoseji (boerewors).  
Amangenelo avuliwe kolu khuphiswano kude kube ngumhla wesibini kweyeSilimela. 
Lowo uphumeleleyo uzakuthi azifumanele umgrugra omtsha kraca weToyota Hilux.  
Olu khuphiswano luvuleleke nakubani na, kwaye sele kuqaliwe ukungenelwa de kube ngumhla wesibini kwinyanga yeSilimela. 
Emveni kokuba kuye kwaveliswa indlela entsha yolu khuphiswano kunyaka ophelileyo, apho uluntu beluye luvotele ezona bazithandayo iiresipi zabaphambili abathathu, kanti neli lalo nyaka ukhuphiswano lunomdla nangakumbi, kwaye lunika ithuba lokuba nabani na azivavanye kulo. 
Kulindeleke nemijikelo emithandathu ezakubanjelwa kwiidolophu ezithile ukusukela ngomhla wesibini ukuya kowesithoba. 
 Kwishumi elinesibhozo kwabo bangeneleyo, abathathu kule misitho bazokuchongwa babenethuba lokugqibela umjikelo wokugqibela eKapa kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni kumhla wamashumi amabini anesithathu kwinyanga yeKhala. Kulapho ke kuzakube kungamagqibela kankqoyi kuzakukhethwa abathathu abagqwesileyo ngokubanee- resipi ezingcamlisayo. 
Ezo zintathu ziphumeleleyo iiresipi zizakufumaneka nasezivenkileni zeli, ukuze abathengi bakwazi ukuzifumana bazisebenzise, kwaye bakwazi nokuvota. Ukuvota bazakuqalisa ngomhla weshumi elinesithoba (19) kweyeThupha ukuya ngomhla wesithoba (9) kwinyanga elandelayo eyoMsintsi.  
Ukanti emveni koko kuzakuhlelwa iivoti ezo kukwazi ukukhethwa lowo mnye uye wagqwesa neyakhe iresipi ozokuba yi2016 Championship Boerewors. Ngolo suku izakube ingumhla weshumi elinesihlanu (15) kwakuleyo yoMsintsi. 
UJC Smit ojongene nolu khuphiswano eNtshona Koloni ubongoza eluntwini ukuba nobani na ozithembileyo ekuxubeni iiresipi zokwenza iBoerewors nonesakhono sokuyiqala phantis iVosi yakhe uyakhuthazwa, kwaye wamkelekile angenele. 
Kumaxabiso azakuthi aphunyelelwe ngulowo ubeyi SA’s Boerewors Champion yiToyota Hilux 2.8 GD-6 Double Cab Raider, ukuthengiswa kwereipi yalowo ugqwesileyo kwiivenkile zeli.  
Ukanti nabathathe inxaxheba abangenele kolu khuphiswano bazakuxhanyuliswa ngabakwa Coca-Cola, All Gold kwakunye noSimba. 
Iqumrhu leentshatsheli zabaphekayo iSouth African Chefs Association (SACA), izakube ingabo abachongayo kolu khuphiswano. 
Uhlobo othi ungenele ngalo kolu khuphiswano wena unomdla ungangenela kulo mnatha ukwazi ukufumana ulwazi oluthe vetshe kwakunye neenkcukacha: www.championshipboerewors.co.za 
Ukanti nakuFacebook ungangena ujonge olu khuphiswano.

headline: Alikho elifune ukoyiswa phakathi kwaBafana Bafana neGhana!
text:
Emva kokudlala amashumi alithoba emizuzu emdlalweni obubaluleke macala, aBafana Bafana neGhana badlale ntanganye ngo’1-1 ngorhatya lwanamhlanje eFNB Stadium. Omabini amazwe, uMzantsi Afrika neGhana, aye emdlalweni wanamhlanje ephantsi koxinizelelo emva kokuba iSudan ibethe iSao Tome Principe ngo’2-0 emdlalweni wayizolo ngoba omathathu amazwe aye alingana onke ngamanqaku alithoba. 
Nangona iGhana noMzantsi Afrika zinamanqaku alishumi emva kokwahlulelana ngamanqaku namhlanje – kodwa iSudan, eza kudibana noMzantsi Afrika ngeCawe isenalo ithuba ukuba iyakwazi ukuphumelela. UMolefi Ntseki uye emdlalweni ejingxela emva kokuphazanyiswa kwamalungiselelo weqela lakhe kukungafumaneki kwabadlali abaseYurophu nabanye abonzakeleyo. 
Kwangoko emdlalweni, bekufanele uMzantsi Afrika uhambe phambili – kodwa akubanga njalo emva kokuba uThapelo Morena engakwazanga ukusebenzisa ithuba elihle. Emva koko kulandele uS’fiso Hlanti okhabe imbumbulu yebhola ethintelwe nguRazak Abalora ngesandla ezipalini zakhe. Kuye kwancameka xa uMorena ephosa elinye ithuba emva kwebhola ebilungiswe nguPercy Tau. AmaGhana awohlwayile uMzantsi Afrika odlale ngamathuba ngegowuli elifakwe nguMohammed Kudus. 
Emva kwemizuzu embalwa, uPercy Tau ufake igowuli lokulinganisa. Waba uphela kanjalo umdlalo phakathi kwaBafana Bafana neGhana eyababetha ngo’2-0 emdlalweni wokuqala. Kulindele kuphume amaqela amabini kuGroup C. Ukuze iGhana iye kwi-Afcon, kufuneka ibethe iSao Tome – wona uMzantsi Afrika kufuneka ubethe iSudana kowayo ngeCawe. Nangona kucaca okokuba kuza kuba nzima – kodwa lona ithuba laBafana Bafana lokuya eCameroon lisekhona. 
Bafana Bafana: Williams, Hlatshwayo, Xulu, Maela, Hlanti, Coetzee, Jali, Morena, Zwane, Tau, Gamildien. 
Amalalela: Khune, Lebusa, Phete, Martin, Pule, Nodada, Mbule, Motshwari, Monare, Foster, Singh, Maboe. 
Ghana: Abalora, Anang, Baba Abdul Rahman, Opoku, Ganiyu Ismail, Acquah, Poku, Wakaso, Ekuban, Mohammed Kudus, Gyasi.

headline: Baxhwithana ngevoti yolutsha
text:
Ukusatyelwa kwekhwelo lokuba makubhaliselwe ukuvota ngabantu abatsha ngelixa iKhomishini Yolonyulo ibibekele bucala iimpelaveki ezimbini ngoFebhuwari nangoEpreli ukubhalisa abavoti yinto encomekayo nekhuthazayo njengoko ilizwe lijonge elonyulweni loomasipala ngomhla we- 3 Agasti. 
Kodwa amaqela ezopolitiko kuza- kufuneka azibalule ngokuqaqambisa ubutsha bawo ukuze afumane inkxaso yabantu abatsha ngomhla wolonyulo. Kungoko isaqhuba imizamo yokukhuthaza bonke abemi beli ukuba babhalise yaye bayokuvota ngomhla wolonyulo. Injongo yokubhalisa kukuba umntu avote kwindawo ahlala kuyo. 
Into engathandabuzekiyo ngohlobo lokuziphatha kwamaqela ezopolitiko kukuba asoloko esenza nantoni na ukufumana inkxaso yesininzi. Yaye ulutsha oluzakube luvota okokuqala kulo nyanka lusenganomdla wokuvota xa lungafumana amaqela ezopolitiko anezicwangciso ezihambelana neemfuno zalo, kuquka ukuxhamla amalungelo ezentlalo nezoqoqosho akhuselweyo kuMqaqo-Siseko welizwe. 
Akukacaci okokuba ingaba izithembiso ezikwimiqulu yolonyulo ezithiwe thaca phambi kwabavoti kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo zinganika ulutsha izizathu eziphathekayo zokuyokuvota kusini na. Ukutshona-evela kwamaqela ezopolitiko ngokuphathelele kwizithembiso ezingundoqo kulutsha kusengakhokelela ekubeni uninzi lungabinamdla wokukhetha iqela emalilivotele okanye wokulandela ekhondweni labazali balo xa luvota, okanye wokuvota ngohlobo olufanayo nolweetshomi. 
Mhlawumbi ukuvota kunganomtsalane xa kunokwenziwa ngohlobo olufanayo naxa kuvulwa ipalamente nolupapashwa koomabonakude ngokuthi iintlanganiso ezinkulu zokugaya inkxaso ngamaqela ezopilitiko zivezwe kwiinkqubo ezithandwayo lulutsha ezinjenge Kulcha Kwest, Zaziwa, JikaMajika, kunye ne Expresso. Kulapho ke iintetho zabezopolitiko zingaqala ngemibuliso ethi “Zikhiphani? Holla holla kwabazakuvota okokuqala!” Kaloku ulutsha luphila impilo eyoyame kakhulu kwitechnology, luqhele ukufumana ulwazi ngokukhawuleza, loo nto ithethe ukuba abezopolitiko kufuneka banquphe xa bethetha yaye basebenzise intetho evakalayo. 
Ukweleka apho, ukuqinisekisa umdla nenkxaso yolutsha, abezopolitiko kufuneka bangapheleli ukwazi uhlobo oluthile lokuthetha nje kuphela, koko bengeze ngokugxininisa kwizithembiso ezingqamene ngqo nolutsha. Ukunikezwa kweenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zezempilo nokucwangcisa inzala, imfundo esemgangathweni, iinkonzo zezothutho lwabafundi abahlala kude nezikolo, ukulwisana nobundlobongela nokusetyenziswa gwenxa kweziyobisi, ukunyanzeliswa kwemithetho eqingqa iminyaka yokuselwa kotywala nokutshaywa kwecuba, ukufikeleleka kweenkonzo zokufundiswa nokufumana iincwadi zokuqhuba izithuthi, njalo-njalo. 
Ukuze le miyalezo ifikelele kulutsha, makusetyenziswe amaqonga ezonxibelelwano anamhlanje asebenza ngobuxhakaxhaka be- internet. Kwakhona kunyazeliswe ukuphuculwa kohlobo lokunxiba olunento yokwenza nenkangeleko yabezopolitiko emehlweni olutsha. Kaloku abezopolitoko basengakhangeleka beqelelelene nolutsha nangesinxibo sabo, ngoko ke abo bazamayo ukunganxibi zisuti namaqhina basengaphumelela ukudlulisa umyalezo onkentezayo ezindlebeni zolutsha. Kangangohlobo ulutsha oluyixabise ngalo inkangeleko yesinxibo, lusebenzisa yona ukukhetha nkqu ootshomi. 
Abezopolitiko kufuneka baqonde ukuba nangona uhlalo-lwabiwo mali kunye nemo yezoqoqosho enkenenkene zichaphazela ulutsha ngohlobo olunomahluko, iinkcukacha nengcombolo ephathelele koku ikhangeleka ikude le nempilo yemihla ngemihla yolutsha. Ulutsha luyaluva ulwamvila lokudodobala kwezoqoqosho, kodwa akululanga kulo ukukhomba owona mgaqo-nkqubo wezoqoqosho ongunobangela ngaphandle kokokuba ingxoxo ikumgangatho othetha ngexabiso le airtime, ukufumaneka koqhakamshelwano nge internet, ixabiso lamalaphu abasetyhini abasexesheni, nokunye okuhlafunekayo kwiingxoxo ngolonyulo. Ulutsha lunembali yokuzoyamanisa nezobulungisa, yaye nakwesi sihlandlo izithembiso zokuzisa ubulingisa, ukulingana kwabantu kunye noxolo zinganomtsalane kulutsha. 
Okokugqibela, phambi komhla wolonyulo, kufuneka sibone uMalema noMaimane, kunye nezinye iinkokheli zezopolitiko zisenza ukhuphiswano lomculo we rap oneendawo ezithi “yobi yo’ yobi yo’ momma”. Ngalo ndlela abazakuvota okokuqala basengakhuthazeka baphume ngobuninzi ngokusesikweni nangokuzimisela ukuyokunikeza ngevoti yabo yamazibulo. Ucingo luwile, kutsiba nezimithiyo!

headline: ‘Asothukanga zezi ziphumo’
text:
EKAPA: UDE wabe uyehliswa uPatricia de Lille njengoSodolophu waseKapa ngumbutho weDA ngoLwesithathu emva kokuba ooceba abangama97 bevotele ukuba makathotywe esikhundleni ngelixa abangama41 bemxhasile. 
 
Kungokunje unikwe ithuba de kube ngoLwesibini ukuba afake izizathu zokuba kutheni kufuneka abuyiselwe esikhundleni sakhe. 
 
Ibilityeli lesibini kulo nyaka kuvotelwa ukwehliswa kwakhe. Wasindiswa yivoti enye kuphela apho wancedwa yiANC kweyoMdumba ngelixa ooceba abangama109 bavotela ukuba makathotywe, baze abangama110 bamxhasa. NgoLwesithathu, kuvote amalungu eDA kuphela.  
 
UDe Lille uthe kwisibhengezo sakhe: “Uninzi looceba beDA bavotele ukungathembeki kwam. Le voti isuka kwiinkalo ezininzi, nkalo ezo endiziphikisayo, ndade ndacela ooceba ukuba beze nobungqina bokuba ndiyophule phi na imithetho nanjengoko besitsho.” 
 
Uthe ooceba abakwazanga  ukuveza ubungqina atyholwa ngabo obuquka, ukophula umthetho wokuziphatha kooceba, umgaqosiseko weDA, nokophula imiqathango yokurhoxiswa kwakhe. 
 
IDA ityhola lo kaDe Lille  ngokungenelela ekonyulweni komphathi wesixeko uAchmat Ebrahim ngokuthi anyanzele iqumrhu elonyulayo ukuba limnike amanqaku amaninzi kunawabo babefuna esi sikhundla. 
 
Utyholwa nangokusebenzisa igunya lakhe ekonyulweni kukaLimia Essop kwibhodi elawula ibala lezemidlalo laseKapa, ngokungawenzi kakuhle umsebenzi wakhe njengoSodolophu malunga nokuphazamisa uphando lokusebenza gwenxa kaMelissa Whitehead ongumkhomishinala wezothutho. 
 
Ukwatyholwa nangokuxhaphaza amandla wakhe ngokugrogrisa okanye athuke ooceba abanguvumelaniyo nezigqibo zakhe nokwala ukwamkela isigqibo esisemthethweni ngokungavumi ukusebenzisana noJP Smith emva kokuba wonyulwa njengesekela lebhunga. 
 
“Ndiye ndacela ukuba kuziwe nemizekelo apho ndenze intetho ethoba isidima seDA emva kokuba ndichazile ukuba yonke into endiyithethileyo ndiyithethe emva kokuba iDA indityhola. Ndiyicacisile into yokuba akulunganga ukwehliswa kwesidima nokuthembeka kwam ze ndingazikhuseli,” utshilo uDe Lille. 
 
Uthe ufumene imiyalezo emininzi yenkxaso kubahlali-nto leyo ebonakalisa ukuba ukwehliswa kwakhe esikhundleni kuphenjelelwa ngabantu abathile kwiDA. 
 
Ebuzwa ukuba uza kuthini ngoLwesibini, uDe Lille uthe: “Ndiza kuya kwiqumrhu elilawulayo nanjengoko ndisazi ukuba libakala elilandelayo elo kule nyewe.” 
 
Isekela lebhunga leDA uJP Smith nobonwa njengomgqatswa ophambili kwesi sikhundla sikaDe Lille, uthe iqumrhu elilawulayo liza kuva izizathu zikaDe Lille kuqala. 
 
Uceba weDA nongafunanga ukuchazwa uthe: “Asothukanga ziziphumo zovoto. Bebenenani elininzi abo bachasene nolawulo lwakhe. Ezi ziphumo zibonakalisa umsantsa okhoyo kwiDA. Le nto isibeka ebunzimeni singumbutho ngoba izimvo zebhunga ayizozimvo zabavoti ngoba ooceba abamelanga izimvo zabo. UDe Lille unenkxaso engumangaliso ebahlalini kwaye iyakhula ngakumbi ngoku. Kodwa wona umbutho uyabethakala kakhulu ngulo mbandela kasodolophu.” 
michael.nkalane@inl.co.za

headline: Umboniso womdaniso kumnyhadala waseRhini!
text:
UPurple Rain ngumdaniso obalisa ibali lentwazana kunye nomfana osisithulu,  abazibhaqa beseluthandweni nangona nje behlangabezana neminqantsa ebathintelayo.  
Nanjengokuba okuqulethwe yile nkqubo kuchaza imvula isetyenziswe njengesikweko ngenxa yobudlelwane bayo nomhlaba, neza nobomi emva kwembalela.  
Le nkqubo yomdaniso, neyinxalenye yenkqubo yeGrahamstown National Arts Festival, ingumzekelo wobuhle, ubumbeje-mbeje, ubukhazi-khazi nomdaniso otsala umdla.  
Iqela le-MDG Perfoming Arts Academy yaseBloemfontein, neliquka abadanisi abaphambili, uWarren Randell, nokwangumdanisi nomenzi walo msebenzi uPalesa Moletsane. 
 Esi sibini sabelana ngamaxesha abuhlungu kunye, bezixuba nomdaniso weqela lonke. Komnye wale midaniso, kanye phakathi kulo mboniso, umtshini womsi uyasetyenziswa okokuqala baze abadanisi batyityimbele isingqi samagubu atsho kabukhali nanjengoko isithatha esiluhlaza sikhazimla kulo msi.  
Kwesinye isiqendu, abadanisi badanisa bephethe ii-amburela. Nangona ezinye izinto kulo mboniso zibukeka zintle kwaye zikhazimla, kuye kubenzima xa abadanisi befumana kunzima ukungena nokuphuma kwindawo ababuthelene kuyo nalapho bazogqume ngee-amburela. 
 Mhlawumbi eyona ndawo inzima ukuyibukela kulo mboniso kulapho uRandell ebonakala engakwazi kusebenzisa ulwimi lwezandla, nalapho achitha ixesha elininzi eyedwa eqongeni, esilwa neminwe yakhe eqinileyo, engasebenziyo.  
Emva kwale ndawo, esi sibini sithandanayo sityhalelwa bucala amatyeli amaninzi ngabanye abadanisi, kodwa lo mboniso uphela ngesiquphe kwaye ngokungalindelelanga esi sibini sisezingalweni zomnye.

headline: UBlack Coffee no-Enhle balizwe ngomntwana
text:
Iyathontelana kumakhasi onxibelelwano imiyalezo yokuvuyisana noDJ Black Coffe nowakwakhe, uEnhle Mbali, emva kokulizwa ngomntwana.  Bamamkele kweli lizwe ngentsasa yangomgqibelo kwisibhedle i-Lenox Hill Hospital esithe zukuva kuhle eManhattan kwisixeko saseNew York.  
Bazibhengeze ezi ndaba  kumakhasi onxibelelwano apho uluntu lulandelise umyalezo emva komnye luvuyisana nabo.  
Ukanti babezizaqhaga malunga nesini somntwana , kodwa ke masithembe ukuba yinkwenkwe ukuzalisekisa umnqweno wonyana wabo wokuqala. 
UBlack Coffe nowakwakhe bajoyina uluhlu loosaziwayo abasanda kwamkela iintsana kweli abaquka uKabelo Mabalane noGail,  
Simphiwe Tshabalala noBokang, Lungile Radu noBobo.  
Ukanti ekusalindeleke ukuba balizwe ngomntwana kungekudala ngu-AKA noDJ Zinhle.

headline: IRhini izakubona italente yaseQonce
text:
AKAPHELELANGA nje ukuba lilizwi elimnandi emva komboko, kodwa uAbongile Manka akasongi zandla angenzinto xa ebona italente iyabula kwizitalato zaseQonce.  
UManka, nongumsasazi wesikhululo sosasazo iTruFM, ukholelwa ukuba ifele italente kweli phondo leMpuma Koloni. Eli gqiyazana, likhethe ukuvula inkampani yokuphuhlisa loo talente, iCentre Stage Arts Academy and Agency. 
 UManka ucacisele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngale nkampani yakhe. “Yinkampani yezobugcisa neqeqesha abo banetalente kweli candelo eMpuma Koloni, ize ibanike ithuba yokuyibonisa kwaye bafezekise amaphupha abo.”  
Uthi bakhangele phantse zonke iitalente zobugcisa, kodwa begxile ingakumbi kwisakhono sokudlala eqongeni okanye idrama.  
“Siyazijonga zonke izakhono zobugcisa, kodwa ngenxa yekhono endalilandelayo, sijonge icala le-drama ubukhulu becala,” utshilo. UManka,nonkaba iseBhisho, unesidanga seBachelor of Dramatic Arts Degree awasithwala kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli ngo2011. 
 I-Centre Stage iqale ukuphefumla kunyaka ophelileyo, kwaye uManka ukholelwa kwelokuba akukhonto yogqithe ukuzilungiselela kunye namava xa kubunjwa isakhono sobugcisa emntwini.  
“IMpuma Koloni ifele yitalente, kodwa akukhonto yenziwayo ukuyiphuhlisa njengaseRhawutini naseKapa,” utshilo.  
“Wonke umntu ocinga ukuba unobizo kwicandelo lobugcisa wamkelekile kwiCentre Stage.”  
Uthi bakhangele abantu abanephupha nomdla kweli candelo, hayi abo babizwa kukufuna udumo nemali. Umdlalo weqonga othi Women thou art Loosed, obhalwe, walawulwa waze waveliswa nguManka, uzakube ukwiGrahamstown Arts Festival kwiveki ezayo.  
Lo mboniso unabadlali abahlanu abaphakathi kwesithoba nama-25 eminyaka, nabahlala eQonce.  
“Ngumdlalo ongamanina amane anemvelaphi ezohlukeneyo neminyaka eyohlukeneyo. Ngumdlalo ongemanyano noxolelwano.”  
“Ubonisa ukuba nokuba sibangakanani okanye sisukaphi, siyamdinga omnye nomnye kuba sinemingeni efanayo,” utshilo uManka.  
UManka uthi izaba kokokuqala bethabatha inxaxheba kulo mnyhadala wobugcisa, besenza umdlalo wabo wokuqala abawuvelisileyo kwaye udlalwa ngabadlali abasaqalayo.  
Lo mdlalo uboniswa kwiGrahamstown National Arts Festival ngowe-4 ukuya kowe-9 kuJulayi eDicks Venue, kodwa phambi koko base-Steve Biko Centre eQonce namhlanje (01.07.2016) ngo-18h00.  
Ngeenkcukacha eziphangaleleyo, ndwendwela ikhasi likaFACEBOOK: Centre Stage Arts Academy and Agency.

headline: Imbasa kumdlalo okhalimela iGBV
text:
UMNYHADALA wezobuGcisa kaZwelonke uqwelwe nge2020 Standard Bank Ovation Awards, ubhiyozela loo magcis’ azijul’ ijacu, ekhwela eqongeni elingaqhelekanga lobuxhakaxhaka bale mihla (virtual).  
Lo mnyhadala (vNAF2020) , oqhube ukuqala ngowe25 kweyeSilimela de yangumhla wokugqibela kweyeKhala, ubonise ukunyamezela nokuzinikela kwamagcisa kweli xesha linzima leCovid-19 – equlunqa imisebenzi enika ulwazi neyonwabisayo kwihlabathi jikelele.  
Umdlalo weqonga kaXabiso Zweni, oveliswe yiMasifunde Learner Development kwilokishi yaseWalmer eBhayi, ube phakathi kwemisebenzi yobugcisa ethiwe jize ngeembasa.  
UZweni, ozibiza njenge-Son of Theatre, onkaba iseSomerset East kweli leMpuma Koloni, nosele ezinze eBhayi kungoku nje, ngumbhali nomlawuli walo mdlalo weqonga othi ‘The Beast in Him.’ Lo mdlalo uwongwe ngembasa yesilivere kulo msitho weveki ephelileyo.  
Encokola nephephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uZweni uthi kumothusile ukuqwalaselwa komsebenzi wakhe ngabavelisi balo mnyhadala.  
Kwiminyaka eli12 uZweni etsholoza kwiqonga lalo mnyhadala wobugcisa oqhele ukubanjelwa eMakhanda, eli ibe lityeli lokuqala ehlonitshwa.  
“Kundothusile, kuba kuye kwafuneka ndiqulunqe into enokubukeleka kumaqonga e-online, ndakhetha ukufaka uThe Beast in Him ocatshulwe kumdlalo wam othi ‘Bhuti is the Beast’ ukulungiselela uvirtual,” kuphawula uZweni.  
Lo mdlali weqonga ophum’ izandla sele eqokelele iqela leembasa egameni lakhe.  
Kunyaka ka2006 ngethuba esekunyaka wokuqala wemfundo eStage World Theatre eBhayi, apho wayeqeqeshelwa khona esi sakhono sokudlala eqongeni, wawongwa ngembasa yoyena uthembisayo kwezeqonga (Most Promising Perfomer) kumawonga weHerald Showtime. Ngo2015 nango2016, wawongwa liSebe lezobuGcisa neNkcubeko, ngo2018 wanikwa iwonga kwiStars of the Eastern Cape.  
“Le mbasa yeyokuwonga umdlalo wam weqonga okhumbula abo bathe babhubha kule minyaka, bebhubhela ezandleni zabo babaziyo kwanabo bangabaziyo (gender based violence),” kutsho uZweni.  
Ezi mbasa bezisasazwa ngqo kwiFacebook kwaye bezibukelwe ngabathandi bezobugcisa kuzwelonke.  
Abaphumeleleyo bebewongwa ngeBronze, iSilivere neGolide.  
Phakathi kwabo baphumeleleyo bekukho imvumi uSimbone noXolisile Bongwana ozakhele igama kwezomdaniso  
Abaphumelele ibronze bagoduke neR3000 emnye, abaphumelele isilivere bafumana iR6000, ze abemke nembasa yegolide bafumana iR10 000.

headline: Wathenjiswa ngemfumba yemali, ngelishwa ikamva lakhe liyaphasalaka ngoku
text:
Izinto azihambeli kakuhle konke konke umdlali webhola ekhatywayo owayefudula edlalela iKaizer Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns. Lowo mdlali nguGeorge Lebese osukela iinyanga ezintandathu engasayikhabi ibhola ngenxa yokudinga iqela anokulidlalela. ULebese ukhululwe yiSundowns phambi kokuqala kwesizini yePremier Soccer League ka-2019/20 emva kokungadlaliswa kwakhe nguPitso Mosimane. Kutshanje, uLebese uphalaze imbilini yakhe kwiMarawa TV ngokwenzekileyo kwiSundowns nangokusokola kwakhe ukufumana iqela anokulidlalela eMzantsi Afrika. ULebese wathathwa yiDowns kunyaka ophelileyo kwiChiefs emva kokuthenjiswa kwakhe ngemfumba yemali. Ngelishwa lakhe, izinto zange zimhambele kakuhle. Kwaye kwabolekiswa ngaye kwiSuperSport United eye yambuyisela kwiSundowns ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2018/19 nangona kwakukho ithemba lokumthatha ngokupheleleyo. 
Iingxelo ezijikeleze kumajelo endaba kule veki zithi AmaZulu, ebekucingeleka okokuba angamathatha, agqibe kwelokuba angabisamthatha. Isizathu sawo asikacaci kakuhle okwangoku. Kwiinyanga edlulileyo, AmaZulu atyikitye abadlali ababini abebefudula bedlalela Amakhosi: uTsepo Masilela noMario Booysen. ULebese uxelele iMarawa TV okokuba waye kwiSundowns emva kokuthenjiswa ngemfumba yemali kwaye ngoku akalifumani iqela ngoba kukho abantu abahambe besithi ufuna imali eninzi. ULebese ngomnye wabadlali bebhola ekhatywayo abanesiphiwo sokudlala ibhola esingummangaliso. Ukudinga kwakhe iqela yilahleko kwikhola yaseMzantsi Afrika. Kwiinyanga ezigqithileyo, bekukhe kwakho amahum-hum athi u-Itumeleng Khune nabalandeli bafuna uLebese abuyele kwiChiefs – kodwa uBobby Motaung wayikhaba lo nto njengento engasoze yenzeke.

headline: IDowns ihleli phezulu emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka
text:
IBaroka FC ibokoboko macala emva kokuba ivuthululwe yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo’4-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuvutha bhe eLucas Moripe Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. Umqeqeshi weDowns, uPitso Mosimane, uthe ufuna iqela lakhe ufuna liphumelele ngamagowuli amaninzi namhlanje – abadlali bakhe benze kanye le nto ebeyifuna. Le mpumelelo yaMasandawana iwathathe yawabeka phezulu kwiPSL. Emva kwemidlalo elishumi ngoku iDowns inamanqaku alishumi elinethoba phantsi kwegama layo, ishiya iBaroka ehleli ixesha elide phezulu ngegowuli. Umdlalo okwinqanaba eliphezulu oveliswe liqela likaPitso kuthetha ukuthi ubunganga balo bubuyele kulo. Kulindekele le mpumelelo ibuyise ukuzithemba kubadlali beSundowns egqwidizileyo ekuqaleni kwale sizini ngenxa yokudinwa kwabadlali yimidlalo yeChampions League. 
Motjeka Madisha ungcangcazelise umnatha ngepenela emva kokuwiswa kukaSibusiso Vilakazi kumzuzu wesithathu kwisiqingatha sokuqala. Emva koko uThemba Zwane ufake igowuli lesibini emva kokufumana ibhola entle egotywe kwicala lasekhohlo. Abadlali beBaroka FC khange banikezele ngoba baqhubele phambili nokudlala umdlalo wabo wesiqhelo – kodwa ingxaki abathe bayifumana namhlanje kukuba iSundowns ayibanikanga ithuba lokuhlanganisa iibhola. Lo nto ibangele bangakwazi ukungena kumhlaba weDowns. UPercy Tau uvalelise ngamagowuli amabini – wavalwa umkhusane. Ngoku iSundowns ihleli phezulu kwiPSL emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka engadlala kakuhle namhlanje. Iya kumdlalo wayo olandelayo inamandla emva kokufumana inkuthazo kumdlalo wanamhlanje. 
Mamelodi Sundowns: Onyango, Langerman, Soumahoro (Arendse 35′), Morena, Madisha, Billiat, Kekana, Mabunda, Vilakazi, Zwane, Tau. 
Amalalela: Brimah, Zwane, Arendse, Ngcongca, Manyisa, Lebese, Zakri. 
Baroka FC: Vries, Shaku, Masenamela, Chawapihwa, Banda, Mosele, Kgoetyane, Macha, Madubanya, Mdantsane, Ngalande. 
Amalalela: Masuluke, Motupa, Matloga, Kgaswane, Rethabile, Ntshangase, Mahashe.

headline: Iqale ngamagingxiginxgi ikomishoni ephanda uPhiyega
text:
IQALE ngamagingxigingxi ikomishoni yophando echotshelwe nguJaji Neels Claassen nephanda ngekamva likaRiah Phiyega njengomkomishinala wamapolisa kweli.  
Le komishoni isekwe ngumongameli weli, uJacob Zuma emva kweziphakamiso ezenziwe nguJaji Ian Farlam obechophele ikomishoni yaseMarikana.  
Ikomishoni kaFarlam yayiphanda ngokukhokelele kwinyhikitya yokufa kwabantu abayi 44 kugwayimbo lomgodi iLonmin lango 2012.  
Amashumi amathathu anesine abulawa ngamapolisa ngomhla we16 ka-Agasti ngo2012, nto leyo eyakhokelela umongameli Zuma ukuba atyumbe ikomishoni eyayichotshelwe nguFarlam.  
Izolo kubekho impikiswano phakathi kwegqwetha likaPhiyega uAdvocate William Mokhari kwakunye negqwetha elikhokele ubungqina uIsmail Jamie.  
UJamie uphakamise ukuba ikomishoni kaClaassen izokwamkela ubungqina obutsha ngaphandle kobo buvele kwikomishoni kaFarlam.  
UMokhari uthe, oko kutshintsha isiseko sale komishoni, kwaye le komishoni ayikwazi ukwenza utshintsho kwindlela ebisekwe ngayo ngumongameli Zuma, nguye kuphela onokwenza iinguqu.  
Emva kwengxoxo mpikiswano ethathe ixesha elide,  uJaji Claassen ugwebe ngelithi, abo bakhokele ubungqina banelungelo lokubiza nabani  na onganika ubungqina, le komishoni ayiphelelanga kuphela kubungqina bekomishoni kaFarlam. emva kwale ngxoxo mpikiswano kuvele ukuba le komishoni ayinakuqhubeka njengoko ingqina lokuqala lidinga itoliki ethetha isiTswana.  
Le komishoni iyaqhubeka namhlanje.

headline: Imvumikazi ibhiyozela uthando olutsha ngengoma
text:
UNALEDI Boltina ubhiyozela uthando olufumaneka kwamanye amazwe kwingoma yakhe entsha ethi African King. 
UBoltina, inzalelwane yaseBhayi eMpuma Koloni, oncokolele I’solezwe lesiXhosa eseNigeria, wenze le ngoma no-Ice Prince. 
“UAfrican King yingoma yothando. Ithetha ngenenekazi elifumana uthando kwilizwe elohlukileyo. Le ngoma ingokubhiyozela uthando lobuAfrika,” kutsho uBoltina ebalisa ngale ngoma. 
Eli gqiyazana laziwa ngeengoma ezifana noYise KaThamsanqa, Indoda, Believe, Enkosi, Golden City noXola Ntliziyo. 
UBoltina udize ukuba kumchulumancisile ukubhala le ngoma. 
“ Ndakhe ndaxelelwa ukuba angekhe ndifikelele eNigeria, ndidibane nesithandwa sam,” kutsho uBoltina, othi kuninzi emakulindelwe kuye. 
“Ndifuna ukumanyanisa ilizwekazi leAfrika ngomculo. Kwaye ndidlala kwifilim entsha yeNollywood, ngoko abantu mabahlale bevule amehlo,” kutsho le mvumikazi. 
Uthi kwiimvumi zaseAfrika angathanda ukusebenza noMaster KG, Fireboy, Burna Boy, Rema, Davido kwakunye noTiwa Savage. 
UBoltina waqala ukuzibandakanya neqonga lolonwabo kwiminyaka elishumi eyadlulayo. 
Wayeneminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe ngethuba edlala indima ephambili kaRaso kwiThe Lilies. 
“Lo mdlalo wawudlala kwiSABC, wawenzelwe eMakhanda. Emva koko ndineshumi elinesithoba leminyaka ndatyikitywa yinkampani yoshicilelo lomculo iBit Box. 
Le ngoma ifumaneka kuzo zonke iivenkile zomculo kwi-intanethi.

headline: Iyantlukwano kumasipala ngemeko yebala laseGlenmore
text:
INGQUMBO yabahlali baseGlenmore eNgqushwa malunga nento abayichaza njengokutyiwa kwemali eyayabelwe ukwakhiwa kwebala lezemidlalo kule lali, ibangele uqhekeko kumagosa omasipala waseNgqushwa. 
Yimali ekwizigidi ezithathu zeerandi eyachithwa ngethuba kuphuculwa ibala lezemidlalo laseGlenmore, kodwa ibala lashiyeka linenkunzana nengca eyenza kubenzima ukudlala.  
Ngaphambi kokulungiswa kweli bala kweyoMqungu ngo2016, abahlali baseGlenmore babebamba itumente rhoqo ngePasika kugcwala kuthi qhu ebaleni.  
Kodwa ngoku iphelile lo nto, kuba umasipala umoshe ibala endaweni yokulilungisa.  
Umsebenzi wokuphuculwa kweli bala wawunikwe inkampani kanondyebo weANC eAmathole uOnke Mgunculu, ebizwa njengeMgunculu Trading. 
Igosa lezonxibelelwano kumasipala waseNgqushwa uNcumisa Cakwe, wathi ibala ligqityiwe noxa nje abantu baseGlenmore bengakwazi ukulisebenzisa ngenxa yemeko embi. 
Kodwa kwiveki ephelileyo, uSomlomo waseNgqushwa uNombuyiselo Magingxa uthe imeko yeli bala ibangela umasipala abeyintlekisa. Oku kuza emva koqhankqalazo lwabahlali baseGlenmore neziphaluka abathi bafuna ingcaciso malunga nemeko yeli bala. 
“Siza kuziqwalasela izikhalazo zenu bahlali. Noko imeko yebala laseGlenmore iyasihlebisa singumasipala,” utshilo uMagingxa.  
Ngokwemigqaliselo yomsebenzi wokuphuculwa kweli bala, iMgunculu Trading kwakufanele yenze ezi zinto zilandelayo: Isango elitsha, izindlu zangasese zamadoda namakhosikazi, izindlu zokutshintsha zabadlali, ibala elitsha lebhola yomnyazi, ibala elitsha leBasket Ball, izitulo zokubukela, ibala leembaleki, ukufakela ingca yala maxesha, ukufakela izixhobo zokunkcenkceshela kwanokufakela imijelo yamanzi.  
Kodwa utyelelo lwephephandaba I’solezwe kule lali, lubonisa mfanekiso wumbi. Kutyelelo lwethu, sagangwa libala elingenamfaneleko wazigidi ezithathu. Abahlali banike lo masipala iiveki ezimbini ukuze aphendule kwizikhalazo zabo. Ngethuba esenza udliwanondlebe nephephandaba I’solezwe, uMgunculu wathi: “Umsebenzi ndawugqiba, ze ndanikeza ngesiqinisekiso (isatifiketi) esingqina ukuba umsebenzi ndiwugqibile ngo2016. Akunakugxekwa mna ngemeko yela bala elimoshwe ngabantu futhi liphinde lingakhathalelwa.” 
ULindokuhle Vellem, oligosa lakwaAfesis-corplan kwicandelo lokuhlolwa kwendlela azisa ngayo iinkonzo eluntwini urhulumente, uthi le ntshukumo yabahlali ifanele ukuba sisilumkiso kumasipala waseNgqushwa. “Into esivuyisayo kukuba abahlali baseNgqushwa, hayi eGlenmore kuphela, banolwazi oluphangeleleyo malunga namalungelo abo.”

headline: Matanzima: Ayingobelungu bodwa abamoshayo ngexesha lengcinezelo
text:
Obesakuba nguSihlalo weNdlu yeeNkokeli zeMveli eMpuma Koloni, uNkosi Ngangomhlaba Matanzima, uthi ayingobelungu kuphela abamoshayo ngexesha lengcinezelo. 
 
“Nathi njengabantu abantsundu sinezinto esazimoshayo. Umzekelo, abanye abantu babulawa sithi sibatshisa ngamatayari, abanye sabatshisela imizi logama abanye sathengisa ngabo ezintshabeni ngeli xesha bezabalaza kodwa sabangunobangela wokuba babhubhe kuba sabathengisa kwiintshaba,” utshilo uMatanzima. 
 
“Akunakuba ngathi asizange sone thina bantu bantsundu ngexesha lengcinezelo. Ngoko ke masizimise phambi koThixo, sicele uxolo ngezinto ezimbi esazenzayo,” kutsho uMatanzima, owayenguMphathiswa wezoLimo ze waphinda wanguSekela Mphathiswa wezoKhuselo kwiphandle elalisaya kwaziwa njengeTranskei. 
 
Namhlanje (ngoLwesihlanu) uninzi lwabantu lubhiyozela usuku lwenkululeko olwaza ngenxa yosuku lwembali lomhla wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kweyeSilimela ngo1994, apho abantu boMzantsi Afrika bathabatha inxaxheba okokuqala kunyulo lwentando yesininzi. 
Sithetha nje uMatanzima ukhokela iphulo lokuvuselelwa kozathuzo nezimilo eluntwini iMoral Regeneration Movement kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni.

headline: ITornado ivuthulule iBuffalo ngamathandathu!
text:
North End – ITornado FC ivuthulule abakhaya bayo iFC Buffalo ngo’6-1 kumdlalo we-ABC Motsepe League obutshisa eNorth End Stadium ngale njikalanga yanamhlanje. Umdlalo ubunika umdlalo ngeyona ndlela ingathethekiyo ngoba xa kudibene la maqela kubangathi kudibene iNgwe neNgonyama – kwaye lo mdlalo utsale abalandeli abangaphaya kwekhulu. 
Amagowuli weTornado afakwe nguSherwin Smith amathathu, uGeneral Ntobongwana, uCharles Gallagher noMandilakhe Mlota. Elokubika ekhaya kwiBuffalo lifakwe nguMzwandile Cisiea. Isiqalo somdlalo besisihle kakhulu, omabini amaqela abonisile ukuba adlalela ukufumana amanqaku apheleleyo ekupheleni komdlalo. 
YiTornado kodwa enkqonkqoze kuqala kwade kakabini – ngelishwa layo abadlali beBuffalo bakwazi ukuzinqanda ezobhola bezize kakubi. Abadlali beTornado abafana noSmith, uThobile Mkhize, u-Anda Linose noKaleho Motloung nenze umsebenzi oncomekayo kulo mdlalo ngokuthi bawulawule umdlalo esiswini futhi bebehlasela xa kuvela amathuba besebenzisa amacala onke. 
Iyisebenzele ke lo nto iTornado ngoba ikwazile ukufumana igowuli kwangoko kulo mdlalo. Ibingadlali kakubi konke konke nayo iBuffalo, ithe yakufumana igqowuli lokulinganisa elifakwe nguMzwandile obekhathazakakhulu ngomzuzu we-29 yabonakala ibuyela emdlalweni. Iwulawule umdlalo – kodwa iye yohlwaywa yiTornando kanye phambi kokuya kwixesha lokuphumla ekuyiwe kulo ihamba phambili ngo’2-1.  
Kwisiqingatha sesibini, iTornado FC, yiyo elawule umdlalo kwade kwasekuqgibeleni. Umdlalo wayo ubumhle ngoba ubukhatshwa yimvula yamagowuli. IBuffalo ibethwe kukungakwazi ukudlala into ecacileyo xa ingena kumdlalo weTornado. Amatyeli aliqela abadlali bayo bakhabele iibhola phezulu phambi kweempondo zeTornado. 
Umqeqeshi weTornado uyivuyele impumelelo ezuzwe liqela lakhe – kodwa ngoba iqela lakhe belidlala neqela ebelivuma – uthi bekufaneluba babuye namagowuli amaninzi ngaphezulu kweliwafumeneyo. Le mpumelelo izakuyinceda iTornado kwiinzame zayo zokufumana indawo yayo phaya phezulu kwiMotsepe League nangona ukhuphiswano phakamaqela aphambili afana neFuture Tigers ne-EC Bees lunzima kakhulu kule isizini. 
Komnye umdlalo kwakweli bala linye, iSwaraji izibethele iPrides ngo’3-1 kumdlalo obumhle kakhulu kulo ngqatsini yelanga laseMonti namhlanje.

headline: IDowns iya kumdlalo weCaf ingciphuza
text:
Umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, nabadlali bakhe babuyela kwimidlalo yeCaf ngokusesikweni kule veki.  
Nangona iDowns isiya kulo mdlalo inokuzithemba okukhulu emva kokuphumelela iCaf Champions League ngo2016 neCaf Super Cup kwinyanga ephelileyo – kodwa kukho ukungciphuza okuyikhathazayo ngenxa yokwenzakala kwabadlali.  
AmaSandawana amkela iKampala City Council kumdlalo weCaf Champions League ozakube useLucas Moripe Stadium ngo 19:00 ngoLwesihlanu. UMosimane unethemba lokufumana amagowuli nokuba mathathu kulo mdlalo – eyona nto ibalulekileyo kwiqela elidlalela ekhaya. 
 “Baliqela elinzima, izakuba ngumdlalo omkhulu lo. Kufuneka sifake amagowuli ekhaya ngokuba kuba nzima xa singaphandle. Ndilibonile eli qela liphumelela umdlalo ngo 7-0, linomdlali odlala ekunxele ofaka amagowuli. Bayingozi enkundleni yabo, kufuneka sifake amagowuli apha ekhaya,” utshilo uPitso kwiSolezwe. 
“UTiyani Mabunda wenzakele, uHlompho Kekana akakwazanga ukugqiba umdlalo eKapa ngenxa yokwenzakala. Akakayibambi ncakasana indlela esidlala ngayo uLucky Mohomi. Kuye kwanyanzeleka ndonge uBangaly Soumahoro ukuze adlale kulo umdlalo, kanti uWayne Arendse unamakhadi – kodwa sifuna ingcaciso ngawo kwiCaf,” utshilo uJingles. 
IiBrazilians ziyahlonitshwa ngokupheleleyo ngoku kwizwekazi le-Afrika emva komsebenzi omhle kunyaka ophelileyo. Lo nto isanconywa kakhulu nalapha eMzantsi Afrika. Njengokuba emane amaqela eli lizwe adlala imidlalo yeCaf, kukho ithemba lokuba ayakulandela ekhondweni leSundowns namanye. IBidvest Wits ityelela i-Al Ahly kumdlalo ose-Al Slam Stadium ngo 18:00 ngoMgqibelo.  
Lo ngumdlalo omkhulu futhi obalulekileyo kuwo omabini la maqela. KwiCaf Confederation Cup, iPlatinum Stars iya kwiVipers kumdlalo ongoMgqibelo. Kuze kuthi ngeCawe iSuperSport United idlale ne-Al Ahly Shendi kumdlalo oseShendi ngo 18:30.

headline: Amavarara anethemba lokuhle kwiMotsepe League
text:
Umqeqeshi oyiNtloko waMavarara, uArchie Dyeli, unethemba lokuba impumelelo ezuzwe liqela lakhe ngempelaveki edlulileyo iza kukhuthaza abadlali xa bebuyela kwiABC Motsepe League.  
Amavarara enze imbali ebholeni ekhatywayo ngokuzibekela indawo kumjikelo wesibini weNedbank Cup emva kokubetha iSuper Eagles emdlalweni obumhle eSisa Dukashe Stadium. 
 Emidlalweni elishumi elinesihlanu kwiMotsepe League, eli qela laseKomani liphumelele imidlalo esixhenxe, labethwa kwemine laze ladlala ntanganye kwemine.  
Amavarara anamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesihlanu, kwindawo yokuqala kuthe ngcu iBush Bucks enamashumi amathathu anesine amanqaku kwiMotsepe League yaseMpuma Koloni.  
Akukonakali nto, kodwa kunyanzelekile iqela likaMzunani Mgwigwi lizame ukuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo phantse kuyo yonke imidlalo yalo elandelayo. 
Omabini amaqela waseMpuma Koloni, Amavarara neChippa United, akwazile ukuzibekala iindawo kumjikelo olandelayo weNedbank Cup.  
Ukuphumelela kweqela laseKomani yinto enkulu kubaphathi balo nakubathandi bebhola baseChris Hani ngokubanzi.  
“Ndivuya kakhulu,” utshilo uArchie Dyeli, iNtloko yezoQeqesho yaMavarara.  
“Kwenzeke into ekudala eyinqwenela usihlalo iqela lakhe lisadlala kwinqanaba elisezantsi. Ndiqinisekile uchulumance kakhulu apho akhoyo,” utshilo uDyeli emva komdlalo. 
Nangona iqela lakhe uDyeli evumile okokuba likhe laphazanyiswa ziingxaki zangaphakathi ezibangele ukubethwa kwalo, kodwa uthe iyabonakala indima eyenziwe nguMgwigwi onikwe uxanduva lokuqeqesha ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. 
Ngoku Amavarara aza kudibana neBlack Leopards, yona iChippa United ithelekiswe neBidvest Wits.  
“Ndiqinisekile, impumelelo esiyizuzileyo iza kusinceda emidlalweni yethu yeMotsepe League. Emva kokungena kwiNedbank Cup, iqela zange liqhube kakuhle kwade kwatshintshwa nomqeqeshi. Uyabonakala umahluko oko efikile umqeqeshi kwezi veki zine zigqithileyo kwaye abadlali bayabonakala ukuba bayibambile indlela afuna badlale ngayo,” utshilo uDyeli. Amavarara adibana neSpear of the Nation emdlalweni weMotsepe League oza kubanjelwa eKomani ngo15:00 ngoMgqibelo. 
Imidlalo yeMotsepe League: 
Lwesihlanu: Swartkops Valley United vs Sibanye United 
Mgqibelo: Yaka United vs PE Stars; Birmingham City vs Mthatha Bucks; Bisho Stars vs Matta Milan; Bizana Pondo Chiefs vs Highbury FC; Bush Bucks vs Bush Pirates

headline: Kuyafiwa kwiMTN 8 kule veki!
text:
Kuzakuqhawuka kuhlangana kule mpelaveki kwimidlalo yeMTN 8 ephakathi kwamaqela amane alwela ukudlala kumdlalo wokugqibela ozakuwanika ithuba lokuthatha indebe. Iqela eliphumeleleyo lizakufumana indebe ekhatshwa zizigidi ezisibhozo zeerandi.  
NgoMgqibelo ngo’20:15 iBidvest Wits ebethe iCape Town City ngo’3-0 kiveki ephelileyo iya eCape Town Stadium kumlenze wesibini – apho kulindeleke ukuba ikhusele amagowuli wayo.  
Lona iqela lika-Eric Tinkler kuya nyanzeleka ukuba lisebenze nzima kakhulu ukuba lifuna ukuguqula iziphumo zeveki ephelileyo. Kanti komnye umdlalo obalulekileyo iChippa United ityelela iMamelodi Sundowns, eLoftus Stadium, ngoLwesithathu weveki ezayo emva kokuba la maqela edlale ntanganye ngeqanda macala eBhayi kwiveki ephelileyo.

headline: UPoqo uth’ umqolo wakhe usithwe ngoonolali
text:
Ama-Afrika Poqo, iPAC ngamanye, isamile kwelokuba iza kuba naye ummeli eBhisho emva kolu lonyulo nangona nje iziphumo, ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, zingathethi lo nto. 
 
Ngentsimbi yokuqala emini ngoLwesine, emva kokubalwa kweevoti ezikwi-56.2%, iPAC eMpuma Koloni ibineevoti ezikuma-3 528 (okanye u-0.35% weevoti zephondo). 
 
Usihlalo wePAC ephondweni uSandla Goqwana uthe: “Iivoti zethu zisezilalini kwaye sinethemba lokuba siza kuqhuba kakuhle kakhulu. Kodwa ke masiyithethe eyokuba asonelisekanga yindlela esiqhube ngayo ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.” 
 
“Silindele lukhulu kunoku ngenxa yomsebenzi esiwenzileyo kwanendlela abathe basabela ngayo abantu kwinkqubo yethu yokugaya inkxaso. Sisenalo ithemba lokuba siza kuba nabammeli kwiNdlu yoWiso Mthetho eBhisho,” utshilo uGoqwana. 
 
Kusenjalo, uninzi lwamaqela ezopolitiko aseMpuma Koloni aphakamise ukungayithembi inkqubo ye-IEC. 
 
UNqaba Bhanga weDA uthe: “Amagosa akwa-IEC aqinisekisile kuthi ukuba abavoti bayakwazi ukujikeleza izitishi bavote kangangoko banako.” 
 
“Mna lo buqu kwenzekile ukuba ndivote kwisikhululo endingabhalisanga kuso, andatyikityiswa xwebhu. Kuthe nje ukuba kwenzeke njalo safaka isikhalazo nekuthiwa siyaqwalaselwa kuzwelonke,” utshilo uBhanga. 
 
Yena uChris Swepu onguNobhala weAzapo eMpuma Koloni uthe: “Asonelisekanga yindlela i-IEC elusingathe ngayo unyulo.” 
“Abantu bavote kangangoko banako kwaye nendlela yokujonga abavoti ayonelisi kuba ayikwazi ukujonga kwangoku ukuba ubani sele evotile kusini na. Sikuphakamisile oku ne-IEC kodwa ngendlela esibona ngayo akukho kwanto abakwaziyo ukuyithetha ngokuphandle ngelithi iyakwazi ukuthintela,” kutsho uSwepu. 
 
UZama Ntshona weATM uthi i-IEC ayinandlela yokunqanda ubuqhetseba. 
“Eyona nto emandla yinkqubo yokuqinisekisa ukuba umntu uvota kwindawo enye. Inkqubo yokuqinisekisa ukuba umntu akavoti kabini, akanayo u-IEC,” utshilo uNtshona.

headline: IChippa United iya emfazweni enzima ePolokwane
text:
Emva kwesizini ebenamagingxigingxi aliqela, iChippa United iya kumdlalo wayo wokugqibela kule sizini iqinisekile ngokuhlala kwayo kwiPSL.  
Ubalulekile ke kambe umdlalo wayo wale mpelaveki ngoba ukuba iyaphumelela, lo nto iyakuthetha ukuthi iyangena kwiTop 8.  
Ukungena kwayo kumaqela asibhozo aphambili kuya kuthetha ukuthi yenze umsebenzi omhle xa kuthelekiswa nesizini ka2016/17 ephantse yangena engxakini kuyo.  
Kule mpelaveki iiChilli Boys zijongisa imibombo kwiphondo laseLimpopo – apho kulindeleke kubekho imfazwe xa zisilwela amanqaku amathathu kumdlalo obalulekileyo ophakathi kwazo nePolokwane City ngentsimbi yesithathu eOld Peter Mokaba Stadium. 
Omnye wabadlali ekulindeleke ixhathise ngabo iChippa emdlalweni ngumdlali wasesiswini, uAbel Mabaso.  
Le ndedeba yaseThekwini yenze umsebenzi oncomekayo kwiChippa ukusukela ekuqaleni kwesizini.  
Kubekho iinguqu eziliqela kwicala labaqeqeshi, kodwa uMabaso ukwazile ukusetyenziswa ngabo bonke.  
“Sisebenze nabaqeqeshi abathathu kule sizini. Kwicala lam, ndingatsho ukuba indincedile lo nto ngoba ndiye ndakwazi ukunxulumana neendlela abasebenza ngazo ezahlukeneyo.  
Indawo endidlaliswa kuyo ngoku indikhulisile emdlalweni wam kwaye ndikwazile nokulincedisa kakhulu iqela kwicala lamagowuli nokudala amathuba,” utshilo uMabaso kwelo phephandaba. 
IiChilli Boys ziya kwiPolokwane zikhululekile kwaye belulamile nabadlali abafana noMark Mayambela obekhonkxwe ngumonzakalo. Nangona umqeqeshi weChippa, uVladislav Herci, ebengayithanda into yokungadlalwa kwemidlalo kwiPSL kwiveki ephelileyo – kodwa uncedakele ngoba abadlali bakhe baya kumdlalo wokugqibela iingqondo zabo zihlaziyekile.  
Amanqaku amathathu ngawo kuphela aya kuqinisekisa ukuba iChippa ingena kwiTop 8 ityeli lesibini ukusukela ngo2010. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoMgqibelo: Maritzburg United vs Golden Arrows @Harry Gwala Stadium, 15:00; Ajax Cape Town vs Kaizer Chiefs @Cape Town Stadium, 15:00; Orlando Pirates vs Free State Stars @Orlando Stadium, 15:00; SuperSport United vs Baroka FC @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 15:00; Platinum Stars vs Bidvest Wits @Royal Bafokeng Stadium, 15:00; Bloemfontein Celtic vs Mamelodi Sundowns @Dr Molemela Stadium, 15:00; AmaZulu FC vs Cape Town City @King Zwelithini Stadium, 15:00

headline: IiChilli Boys zabelene ngamanqaku neSundowns
text:
IMamelodi Sundowns ikhalela amathuba engawasebenzisanga emva kokubambana ngo 1 – 1 neChippa United kumdlalo wePSL obudlalelwa eSisa Dukashe Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. 
Ingqele nemvula khange ibathintele abalandeli bebhola abazalise ibala kuba befuna ukubeka umdlalo, onqabileyo kubo, okwizinga eliphezu, phakathi kwawona maqela adlala umdlalo ophucukileyo kule sizini. 
Isiqalo somdlalo besingaqaqambanga nanjengoko bekulindelwe, iindwendwe zizo ebezisukele kuqala emdlalweni. UZakri Yannick, obehlasela kwicala lasekholo, ebethande kuba yinkathazo kwimizuzu yokuqala. ULucky Mohomi, uTeko Modise noTiyani Mabunda ngabo abalawule umdlalo esazulwini, bebane ukutyala iibhola kuLeonardo Castro obegadwe kakhulu nguKristopher Bergman emva. 
UThamsanqa Sangweni, obelikhonkco phakathi kweefolosi nabadlali basemva, uzamile ukuhlanganisa izinto noSandile Zuke. Ithe isadlala kakuhle iChippa United wasuka wenza idemesha uWayne Arendse ngomzuzu weshumi elinesibhozo kwisigaba sokuqala. Kuye kwanyanzeleka iiChilli Boys zenyuse umxakatho ngoba ezikaPitso Mosimane bezifuna ukuzigubungela kuphele ngazo. 
Igowuli liyinike amavili iDowns, abadlali bayo babuye bephindelela kumhlaba weChippa – kodwa yazinceda ngokungaxhamazeli. Izinto zijikile xa kanye kushiyeke ishumi elinesihlanu lemizuzu. Amakhwenkwe kaDan Malesela awuthathele kuwo umdlalo ade avuzwa ngomzuzu wamashumi amathathu anesihlanu ngethuba uRhulani Manzini afaka ipenela. 
Athathe apho ebeyeke khona kwesesibini isiqingatha, ilelo nelo lizama igowuli lesibini. UThemba Zwane, obengakhathazi kakhulu kulo mdlalo uphantse wenza ingxaki emva kokugoba ibhola kamnandi ekhohlo – ngelishwa lakhe ifike kuYannick sele tshibilika ngenxa yobumanzi. Uhlanganise iibhola ezintle uMenzi noThopola eziphantse zayonzakalisa iDowns emva. Macala omabini ebekhona amathuba wokuphumelela umdlalo – kodwa bekunzima ukudlala eSisa Dukashe Stadium ngenxa yobumanzi. Abaqeqeshi bala maqela bonelisekile yindlela amaqela wabo adlale ngayo phantsi kweemeko ezinzima.

headline: Bayanyhilana abaxhasi bakaMabuyane noMasualle
text:
ABAXHASI bakaNobhala weANC eMpuma Koloni, uOscar Mabuyane, bathi ukulityaziswa kwenkomfa yalo mbutho ephondweni ziinzame nje zabantu abachasene noMabuyane abafuna ukumbona ephulukana nogqatso lokuba nguSihlalo weANC ephondweni.  
Oku kuza emva kokuba inkomfa ebihlelelwe ukuba izakubanjwa eMonti iintsuku ezine ukusukela ngomhla wamashumi amathathu kule nyanga, ithe yanqunyanyiselwa umhla wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kweyoMsintsi.  
Kule nkomfa, uMabuyane uzakube equbisana noSihlalo weANC kweli phondo uPhumulo Masualle, okwayiNkulumbuso.  
Isizathu sokunqunyanyiswa kwale nkomfa, ngokokutsho kwembalelwano ekhutshwe nguMabuyane, kukuba amasebe aliqela athe avakalisa ukungaxoli ngemigaqo ethile yeenkqubo zale nkomfa. 
Kodwa omnye weenkokeli eziphezulu kwiANC, ongumxhasi kaMabuyane, uthi ukunqunyanyiswa kwale nkomfa ziinzame zeqela elixhasa uMasualle zokuba kubekho ulibaziseko lwangabom. “Into embi kuyo yonke le nto, kukuba iqela likaMasualle lisebenzisa izixhobo zikarhulumente ukulwa uMabuyane.  
Ngokokubona kwethu amasebe aliqela sele evakalisile ukuba axhasa uMabuyane. “Iqela likaMasualle lithe lakubona oku, laqonda ukuba malenze konke okusemandleni kulo ukulibazisa le nkomfa,” utshilo ongumxhasi kaMabuyane.  
Kodwa enye inkokeli yeANC, exhasa uMasualle, ithi iqela likaMabuyane lenza nje ingxokolo kumaqonga ezonxibelelwano afana noTwitter noFacebook.  
“Bayayazi ukuba izinto azibahambeli kakuhle emasebeni. Kaloku masikhumbule ukuba kwinkomfa, abona bantu babalulekileyo ngabathunywa aba bavotayo. Abanye aba benza ingxokolo bathetha nje.  
“Thina sithe gqolo ukugayela inkxaso uPhumulo kuba sifuna kubekho ubunye kweli phondo,” utshilo umxhasi kaMasualle. Amalungu ekomiti embaxa yeANC (NEC) alapha eMpuma Koloni ukumamela izikhalazo zamasebe. Amasebe angekazibambi iindibano zawo (BGM) anikwe de kube ngomhla wokugqibela kweyeThupha.

headline: UMotaung ukhumbula intlekele yase-Orkney!
text:
Usihlawe weKaizer Chiefs, uKaizer Motaung, uthe abantu abangamashumi amane anesibini ababhubhela e-Orkney Stadium, bayakuhlala bekhunjulwa. 
Namhlanje kuphele amashumi amabini anesithandathu eminyaka ukusukela ngala mhla kwathi kwehla le ntlekele emva kokunyathelana kwabantu ababefuna ukungena ebaleni ekwakudlalwa kulo umdlalo owawuphakathi kweKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates 
Le ngozi yenzeka kanye emva kokufakwa kwegowuli lokulinganisa yifolosi yaMakhosi eyayisoyikwa kakhulu ngalo mihla, uFani Madida. 
“Bonke abaswelekayo sakuhlala sibakhumbula,” utshilo uMotaung kwikhasi lomnatha leChiefs. 
“Apha kwiChiefs, sinendlela yethu esenza ngayo izinto – sithi sikhumbule izinto ezintle nezo zimbi eziyinxalenye yembali yethu. Intlekele yase-Orkney yinto embi kuthi. Unyaka nonyaka, senza isikhumbuzo sabo bawayo ngalo mhla. Yiyo lo nto sagqiba kwelokuba sidlale umdlalo wamagqala egameni labo ngo’2015. Sileli qela, sifuna ukudlulisa amazwi ovelwano kwiintsapho nezalamane zabo bonke abaswelekayo,” utshilo uMotaung. 
Umdlali weChiefs ngalo mihla, u-Ace Khuse, uthe uyasikhumbula esosithwakumbe esanyanzela ukumiswa komdlalo. “Seva sikwigumbi lokunxibela ukuba umdlalo awuzukuqhubela phambili. Sabona xa siphuma ebaleni ukuba kwenzeke into embi ebaleni. Uninzi lwabadlali bakhala kakhulu bakuva ezi ndaba ngala mhla,” utshilo uKhuse.

headline: Urhulumente uceba izindlu neebhasari kwabenyhikityha yaseBhisho yango1992
text:
INKULUBAPHATHISWA uOscar Mabuyane uthi urhulumente ukwinkqubo yokunceda ngeenkonzo iintsapho zamaxhoba kwakunye nabo basinda kwinyhikityha yokubulawa kwabaqhankqalazi eBhisho ngo1992. 
Ngomhla wesixhenxe kweyoMsintsi 1992, amajoni karhulumente wephandle elalisaziwa njengeCiskei athulula iimbumbulu kubaqhankqalazi ababefuna kupheliswe inkqubo kazimelegeqe wela phandle. Oko kwabangela ukuba kubhubhe abantu abangamashumi amabini anesibhozo ze konzakala abangaphaya kwamakhulu amabini. 
NgoLwesibini urhulumente wephondo kuquka neentsapho zamaxhoba, kuquka nabo bathi basinda kule nyhikityha, bebekwisiza saseBhisho apho badutyulelwa khona abaqhankqalazi. 
“Kulo nyaka sikunyaka wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kwidemokhrasi yethu kwaneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithoba wenyhikityha yokubulawa kwabantu eBhisho,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
“Noxa nje sizenzile ezinye zezinto zokukhumbula abo babhubhela kule nyhikityha ngomhla wesixhenxe kweyoMsintsi [1992], sisenendlela ende ekufanele siyayihamba ukuze sixhamlise ngobomi obungcono kumntu wonke. 
“Singabokuqala ukuvuma ukuba bekufanele ukuba senze lukhulu ukunika imbeko egameni [labo badutyulwa kule nyhikityha],” kutsho uMabuyane. 
UMabuyane uthi “njengorhulumente okhathalayo, siyayiqonda eyokuba uninzi lwamaqhawe namaqhawekazi [la athi abhubha kule nyhikityha] ashiya ngasemva izalamane zilambatha”. 
“Siyalele urhulumente wephondo ukuba anike ingqwalasela abasindayo kwakunye neentsapho zamaxhoba ale nyhikityha mayelana neenkonzo ezifana nezindlu. Isebe lezobulungisa lixakekile yinkqubo yokunikeza iibhasari kubantwana bamaxhoba  kwanabo bathi bonzakala kule nyhikityha,” utshilo uMabuyane.
