headline: UDlamini noBici bagqugqisile kwiTsomo Race
text:
IimbaleKi ezimbini, uAnele Dlamini noXoliswa Bici, baziintshatsheli ezintsha zeTsomo Race.  
Ezi mbaleki ziqhube kakuhle kakhulu kwisiqendu sonyaka wesihlanu somdyarho waseTsomo obumkhulu kakhulu.  
UDlamini (35) waseThekwini ubambe indawo ephambili kumgama obuyi 21km emadodeni, kanti indawo yokuqala ibanjwe ngokaBici waseNgqamakhwe kumanenekazi kumdyarho obuseTsomo ekuseni ngeCawe edlulileyo. 
Le tumente ibiququzelelwe nguNksz. uNomakhwezi Manqaba ebambisene nenkampani ekuthiwa yi-ELCB eqinisekise ukuba iimbaleki zigoduka zinento esandleni.  
Wona umdyarho ubuququzelelwe kakuhle futhi nenani labantu abadala nabancinane abathathe inxaxheba belingaphaya kwamakhulu amahlanu.  
Umgangatho ubuxhomile kwaye lo nto ibonakele ngokugxalathelana kweembaleki ngethuba zifika entanjeni ngokohlukana kwemidyarho yosuku. 
Nakubeni bekukho umdyarho omkhulu eBhayi – kodwa iTsomo Race ikwazile ukugcina umgangatho eyaziwa ngawo uphezulu.  
Oku kungqinwe nanguDlamini ophumeleleyo nakubeni ebeqala ukubaleka eTsomo. Ukuphumelela kwakhe uDlamini kumchulumancisile nakubeni iyinto ayiqhelileyo. 
 “Ndiyakuvuyela ukuphumelela kwam apha. Umgangatho womdyarho ubumhle kakhulu. Bekungekho nzima kwaphela ukubaleka lo mdyarho. Ndiyavuya noxa ukuphumelela iyinto esendiyiqhelile. Akukho nto imbi endiyibonileyo. Ukhuseleko; eyona nto ibalulekileyo – belukhona. Sixhaswe kakhulu endleleni, amanzi siwafumene futhi nemozulu ibintle kakhulu,” utshilo uDlamini kweli phephandaba. 
UBici, ophuma kusapho olwaziwa ngokubaleka, uvuyile naye watsho ebalula ukuzilungiselela kakuhle njengeyona nto emncedileyo.  
“Ndonwabe kakhulu ngoba kudala ndibaleka kulo mdyarho – kodwa ndingangeni emalini. Into ebi ndibetha kukungazilolongi kakuhle. Ngoku ndiye ndaqonda ukuba mandiziphuthume. Ndikuthanda kakhulu ukubaleka. Umgangatho uqhele ukubaphezulu kakhulu ngoba kuqhele ukubakho iimbaleki eziphezulu eMzantsi Afrika – kodwa namhlanje khange zibe khona ngenxa yomdyarho obuseBhayi,” utshilo uBici.

headline: Umdlalo ongena endaweni kaZabalaza
text:
UDE waziwa umdlalo ozakungena kwindawo kaZabalaza. Kwizitalato zaseLimpopo, kulapho zizakuqala khona izinto ngoMvulo, umhla we-2 kuCanzibe.  
Lo mdlalo ungentshatsheli yamanqindi eshiya iLimpopo ukuyokukhangela amathuba okuphuhlisa isakhono sayo eRhawutini.  
Lo mdlalo kuqala ububizwa iThe Contender, kodwa waphinda wanikwa igama eliyi Ring of Lies, nalapho sibona uMpho Sebeng (esimbone kwiZ’bondiwe, Zero Tolerance) odlala uNeo, oyintshatsheli yamanqindi nokhangelwa yimanejala eyaziwayo, uMandla (odlalwa nguMasoja Msiza). Abazali bakaNeo bayalikhaba iphupha lakhe lokuba yimbethi-manqindi, ngoko uyabaleka ngobunye ubusuku ukuze alandele iphupha lakhe eRhawutini.  
Apha udibana nentombi kaMandla uSli (odlalwa nguDineo Nchabeleng), nabaphela bethandana. Kwakweli bali, sibona unina kaNaledi (odlalwa nguFlorence Masebe) nonembali engekho ntle noMandla, kwaye kubonakala ngathi uneenjongo ezingezinye uMandla kunoko kubonwayo. Konke oku kufaka uNeo kwilizwe leemfihlo, ukubhukuqana kunye nobuxoki. UNeo kunye noKabelo ngabalinganiswa abaphambili kulo mdlalo, kwaye baxhaswa ngabadlali abaziwayo abafana noBaby Cele kunye noTessa Twala.  
UBaby udlala indawo yenkosikazi kaMandla, uRuth aze uTessa adlale uGugu. Sikwabona noSlindile Nodangala (uMam’ Ruby Dikobe kwiGenerations) nonguThando, nonamabibi akhe naye. Idlala ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesine, ngexesha leZabalaza ngo21h00.

headline: Umngcwabo waseburhulumenteni kwigqala lomzabalazo
text:
SOTHULELWE umnqwazi isigqibo sikarhulumente weli sokunika igqala loMkhonto Wesizwe uDumisani Mafu umngcwabo waseburhulumenteni wephondo.  
UMafu usutywe kukufa ngomhla weshumi kule nyanga emva kwengulo yexeshana. Ngolwesihlanu umongameli weli uJacob Zuma umemelele ukuba makanikwe umngcwabo waseburhulumenteni. Uzakungcwatywa ngomgqibelo esikhangele kuye.  
UZuma uyalele ukuba iiflegi zinyuswe zimiswe esiqingatheni ngemini yomngcwabo kaMafu. Obethethela oogxa bakhe uMike Hala uthe, “Yeyona ndlela ifanelekileyo yokukhapha uMazola leyo, emva komsebenzi ongaka esilwela inkululeko yeli lizwe.” Ukwathe, “Sivuya kakhulu singoogxa bakhe, ngowokuqala kwabo sithe sasebenza nabo ukunikwa le mbeko.” OkaHala uthe, uMafu bayohlala bemkhumbula njengejoni, nenkokeli asebenze nayo ukususela ngo1982 eAngola, nobehleli engugxa wakhe de wasutywa kukufa.  
“Wayeyinkokeli yenkampu ukudibana kwam naye eAngola, la nkampu sasiyibiza ukuba yiYunivesithi kuba kulapho sasifunda khona ngeendlela zokulwa singumkhosi.” Uqhube wathi, “Ngo1983 wasishiya wayofumana uqeqesho kwilizwe elalisakuba yiSoviet Union, esele liyiRashiya ngoku, emva kokuba ebuyile nam ndayofumana uqeqesho kwiMpuma yeJamani, yayililizwe elizimeleyo ngoko.”  
Ukwamchaze njengendoda ebiqhula kakhulu xa konwatyiwe kodwa ekwangumntu onoluleko. “Ukuba ebenokuthetha, ngesiyalela ukuba sikhankase ngokusweleka kwakhe, njengoko ilixesha lonyulo,” uthethe watsho okaHala. UMafu ubengusihlalo weANC wokuqala eMpuma Koloni, ngo1994, emva kokuba lo mbutho uvulwe umlomo. 
 Lo mbutho uzakubamba isikhumbuzo seli gqala ngolwesibini eBhiso. UMafu uzakubekwa kwikhaya lakhe lokugqibela kwikhaya lakhe eliseFort Malan kuGatyana.

headline: UGoba uthath’ ikhefu kwiiSATMA!
text:
UMSUNGULI weeSATMA, uGqirha Dumisani Goba, uza kukhe athi gu bucala ukuba phambili ekuququzeleni imisitho yeSouth African Traditional Music Achievements Awards (SATMAs) ukuze anike ithuba ulutsha luze neembono ezintsha. 
UGqr Goba ukuthethe oku kwimibhiyozo yeeSATMA yokugqiba iminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu ebibanjelwe eIngwenyama Conference and Sports Resort, eWhite River kwiphondo laseMpumalanga. 
Iimvumi ezifana noDr Nothembi Mkhwebane, iBlaq Diamonds noVhudie wodumo lweeIdols kuquka amaqela emixhentso neekwayala, bebetshintshiselana ngeqonga kule mibhiyozo. 
Bekukho noosaziwayo abanjengoSimphiwe Ngema noPhindile Gwala abakwabubuso beSupa Vite engumxhasi weeSATMA, phakathi kwabo kukho nezitatanyiswa eziphuma kurhulumente waseMpumalanga. 
UGoba wazise iqaqobana labantu belizimase le mibhiyozo phantsi kwemiqathango yeCOVID-19 ukuba isigqibo sokuthatha ikhefu kwiiSATMA kudala wasithabatha. 
“Ndathatha isigqibo kudala sokuba, xa sifika kwiminyaka eyi15, ndithatha ikhefu ukuze ulutsha luyiqhube ngokwalo le projekthi. 
Kulo nyaka, ngunyaka wam wokugqibela, kodwa andiyithengisi le projekthi, iza kuqhuba ikhula,” kwazise uGoba ngokuhlwa kwangoMgqibelo ophelileyo. 
Uthi ukuze iSATMAs zikhule ziza kufuna ulutsha oluneembono ezisentsha. 
UGoba uphinde wadiza ukuba ukususela kunyaka ozayo uza kugxila kwizifundo zakhe. 
“ Kunyaka ozayo ndigqibe ukuqhuba nezifundo zam. Ndathatha isigqibo sokuba phambi kokuba ndifince iminyaka eyi55 kufuneka ndibe ndine-PhD,” kubhengeza uGoba, esithi oko engakwenzeli kuphangela nemali, koko ekwenzela umzila wakhe. 
Amawonga alo nyaka aza kubanjelwa okokuqala eMpumalanga ngomhla wesihlanu kweyoMnga, emva kokuhlala kwiphondo laseMntla Ntshona iminyaka emithathu.

headline: Oosomashishini eMthatha bagxothe omnye osolwa ngokubulala
text:
Oosomashishini abasebenzela kwindawo yaseTransido kwilokishi yaseNgangelizwe eMthatha, bathathele umthetho ezandleni zabo ngoLwesibini kule veki ngexesha befudukisa ngenkani omnye usomashishini obekade esebenzela apha kwezi zakhiwo zoshishino bemtyhola ngelithi uyabandakanyeka ekubulaleni omnye usomashishini obeqashe apha kulo nyaka uphelileyo uMicheal Ncheane, ngomhla we2 kwinyanga yeNkanga. 
UNobhala wesigqeba esi salapha eTransido uNomthandazo Sethathi, 48, uthi bawathathe onke amanyathelo afanelekileyo ukuzama ukwenza oku kufuduka kubesemthethweni. 
“Emva kokuba ityala kuthwe liyakhutshwa kwiqumrhu lamatyala eenkundla, siye saya kwaMantyi nasemapoliseni kodwa sabuya nelize, besithi abanokwazi ukusinceda ngoba lo mba ubufanele bona bengabasebenzi kule ndawo,” utshilo uSethathi. 
Uthi ngenxa yoloyiko abanalo bengoosomashishini babize intlanganiso bebonke bathatha isigqibo esithi mabazithuthe ngokwabo iimpahla zabo bazise kwakhe ngoba abanokwazi ukuzilahla ngaphandle. 
“Siyayazi ukuba unaso isibham awasifihlayo emapoliseni ngokuya wayebanjwa ngoba azange asikhuphe kwade kwaphela. Ngoku sihleli ngoloyiko ukuba angayenza nalapha kuthi *  ento imasikizi kangaka ayenze kuMicheal,” wongezile uSethathi. 
Aba somashishini bathi bakwenza oku ngemvume yesigqeba sale ndawo iTransido Forum neyaseka ikomiti yabantu abayi9 nabanoxanduva lokuba baqinisekise ukuba umgaqosiseko wendawo le uyalandelwa ngabo bebonke aba somashishini abayi84 abasebenzela kule ndawo. 
Usekela-sihlalo wesigqeba seTransido Forum uNobuntu Sibotoboto, 35, uthi baye kwilali yaseJecweni eNgqeleni nalapho azinze khona umsolwa lo. 
“Sifike sacela ukuthetha neNkosi yendawo leyo, nalapho iye yathi yona ayiboni nto igwenxa ngesenzo sethu sisisigqeba esi,” utshilo uSibotoboto. 
Uthi baye baya nasemapoliseni edolophu le. 
“Xa sifika eNgqeleni emapoliseni sifike kusithiwa unamtyala amane awaxoxa phaya kula dolophu kwaye uyaziwa ukuba unguye umophulimthetho, saqonda ke nathi asinohlala naye esi sikrelemnqa,” wongezile uSibotoboto. 
Omnye usomashishini osebenzela apha eTransido nokule komiti uthi umrhanelwa lo uJoseph Maqungela Dlamini waye wafika ngosuku olulandelayo umhla we3 kweyeNkanga inyanga, wambizela ecaleni ebuzisa ngokufa kukaNcheane. 
“Wafika ekuseni esenza ngathi akazi kwanto ebuza kum ukuba ndivile ukuba kuthiwa kwenzekeni na?” 
Uthi wamxelela ukuba kuzokucaca icala kungekudala ngoba umfi uthathwe ngumtshana wakhe endlini yakhe eBhongweni. 
“Ngomhla we6 ngale mini abanjwa ngayo uDlamini wafika umtshana kaNcheane esithi uzocacisa ukuba yena waye wathunywa nguDlamini lo ukuba ayobiza umfi kwakhe ngoba imoto kaDlamini inengxaki efuna uncedo,” utshilo lo kaNtayi. 
Uthi kwaye kwacaca ngoku bequqa ematyaleni ukuba uDlamini lo wamhlabela kwibhulorho yaseTyumbu umfi embulala ngamanxeba emela ayi28 ogqiba wayomlahla kwilali yaseQokolweni. 
“Simnikile ithuba lokuba aze kuthi azokuthetha elakhe icala ngexa ephuma eziseleni ngebheyile kodwa khange ayenze lo nto. Umntu omosha omnye apha uyagxothwa!”

headline: ULakay uyinkankathe ngenduku iGolden Arrows ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje
text:
Iphulukene nomdlalo wayo wesibini iGolden Arrows emva kokucanjalaliswa kabuhlungu ngamagowuli amane kwelinye (4-1) yiCape Town City ekelemileyo emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje e-Emirates Airline Park. UFagrie Lakay wenze idemesha engasoze ilityalwe ngokubhakuzelisa umnatha kathathu eyedwa emdlalweni wanamhlanje eqinisekisa okokuba iCape Town City iqhubela phambili nomsebenzi omhle ukusukela oko kuthe kwabuyelwa emabaleni ngamaqela abekhe ahlala phantsi ixesha elide ngenxa yekhorona eswantsulisa ihlabathi. Umdlalo ubumhle, omabini amaqela ebedlala umdlalo omhle okhawulezayo. Kuyiwe ekhefini iCape Town City ihamba phambili ngamagowuli amabini afakwe yifolosi eyingozi, uLakay. 
Omabini amaqela akhuphe abadlali bawo abaphambili ngenxa yokonzakala. UKermit Erasmus uphumile, endaweni yakhe kwafakwa uTashreeq Morris endaweni yakhe yiCape Town City. Yona iGolden Arrows ikhuphe uSiboniso Conco, yafaka uSiyabonga Dube. UMorris ufake igowuli leCity – kodwa amakhwenke kaSteve Komphela alifumene igowuli lokubika elifakwe nguKnox Mutizwa emshiye uLeeuwenburgh engazi nokuba makathini ezipalini. Ukuphumelela kweCity kuthetha ukuthi iza kuhlala kwindawo yesixhenxe – kanti yona iGolden Arrows iye kwindawo yeshumi elinanye. Emini namhlanje, i-Orlando Pirates ibethe iSuperSport United ngo’2-1, iHighlands Park ibambene neMaritzburg United, wona AmaZulu abetha iLeopards ngo’1-0.

headline: Ufunwa ngapha nangapha ochithwe yiPirates!
text:
Obefudula edlala kwi-Orlando Pirates ufunwa ngamaqela aliqela emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. Ekuqaleni kwale veki iPirates ibhengeze ukuba yohlukene noPatrick Phungwayo emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. UPhungwayo, 29, ukhululekile ukuba azibandakanye nokuba leliphina iqela phambi kokuvalwa kwenyoba yokutyikitywa kwabadlali (kwiPSL) namhlanje. Lo mdlali waya kwiBucs esuka kwiBidvest Wits kwisithuba seminyaka emihlanu edlulileyo. 
“Isivumelwano sokohlukana phakathi kweqela noPatrick Phungwa kufikelelwe kuso ngesihle kwintlanganiso ebikhona. Sinqwenelela lo mdlali okuhle kodwa emva kokusebenzela thina ukusukela ngo’2012,” itshilo ingxelo ekhutshwe yiPirates aph’evekini. 
Nangona kwakulindeleke okokuba uPhungwayo agqame ekufikeni kwakhe kwiPirates – kodwa inkqubela yakhe yakhonkxwa kukumane esonzakala nokhuphiswano olukhoyo kwiPirates. Ngamashumi amahlanu anesithandathu (56) iyonke imidlalo ayidlalileyo kwiPirates ukusukela ngo’2012 – kodwa kwisizini ephelileyo ukwazile ukudlala imidlalo esondeleyo kumashumi amabini nangona ebekhuphisana namaxhwangusha afana noThabo Matlaba noMarc van Heerden. 
Uhlengahlengiso olwenziwa kwiPirates luza emva kokuba ivale isizini ka’2016/17 ikwindawo yeshumi elinanye futhi ingacholanga naphantsi kwiindebe ezidlalelweyo. Ukuhamba kukaPhungwayo kuze emva kokuhamba kuka-Oupa Manyisa othathwe yiMamelodi Sundowns phambi kokuqala kwale sizini iqhubayo. Iingxelo zithi uPhungwayo ufunwa yiSuperSport United neFree State Stars eqeqeshwa nguLuc Eymael. Ikamva lalo mdlali kulindeleke licace phambi kokuphela kosuku lwanamhlanje.

headline: Kutshiswa iibhasi kuqhankqalazo loonoteksi eKapa
text:
Kapa: Lunqunyanyanyisiwe uqhankqalazo loonoteksi. Oku kuza emva kweengxoxo nesivumelwano sokuba konyulwe ijaji edla umhlalaphantsi ukuba iqwalasela iingxaki eziphakathi kwesebe lezoThutho eNtshona Koloni kunye nemibutho yeeTeksi. Le jaji iyakuthi yenze iziphakamiso zesisombululo.  
Oku kudizwe ngusihlalo weCongress of Democratic Taxi Association (CODETA) ephondweni, uVusumzi Lenox Miselo, emva kwentlanganiso nomphathiswa wezoThutho, uDonald Grant.  
“Sivumelene ukuba isebe likhangele ijaji edla umhlalaphantsi iqwalasele lo mcimbi kwisithuba seeveki ezimbini ezizayo. Silindele ukuba le jaji isinike ingxelo. Ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu kweyeNkanga (Novemba) sifuna ukubamba inkomfa yolonyulo!” kutsho uMiselo. 
 Baqikelelwa kumashumi amahlanu (50) abantu abathe bonzakala ngethuba kubethwa izithuthi nooduladula ezindleleni kwiilokishi zeKapa xeshikweni kuqhankqalaza abaqhubi beeteksi. Isibini, esiquka nowasetyhini okhulelweyo, sonzakele kakhulu kwaye baleqiselwe esibhedlele. Izigadla eziliqela ezithutha ukutya zibe ngamaxhoba okuxulutywa ngamatye; ingakumbi kwingingqi yaseNyanga nasePhillippi. 
Abantu basokole iindlela zokuya emisebenzi ngenxa yale migushuzo ethe yenzeka nanjengoko ooduladula bakaMyCiti bebengakhwelisi bantu. UGolden Arrow naye unqumamisa abakhe emva kokutshiswa koduladula. Abo bakwazileyo ukuya emisebenzini bebenexhala lokuba bayakubuya njani. 
 Nangona kukubi kunje namhlanje uMiselo akavumanga kwaphela ukuba ubundlobongela obu boyamene noqhankqalazo lwabo. 
“Asinakuthatha uxanduva lwento esingakhange sithume bantu ukuba bayenze; thina besikhuphe isilumkiso kwangoLwesihlanu ukuba iteksi azizokukhwelisa bantu; abakhweli mabazame ezinye indlela zokuhamba. Asikhange siyalele mntu ukuba abethe okanye atshise ezinye izithuthi!” 
 Oonoteksi bakwatyhola isebe lezoThutho neMisebenzi yoLuntu ngokuba ngumqobo kwinkomfa yolonyulo yabo.

headline: Limfiliba ikamva leBerlin November!
text:
Siqhubela phambili isiqendu sesithandathu somdyarho wamahashe ekuthiwa yiBerlin November ngoMgqibelo.  
Oku kuqinisekiswe nguLuthando Bara ngethuba echubela iintatheli isikhwebu kwintlanganiso ebibanjelwe eMonti kutshanje.  
Iinkabi zamahashe zaseMpuma Koloni nezisuka kwamanye amaphondo ziza kube zisilwela ukuphumelela amakhulu amabini onke amawaka eerandi (R200 000) kulo nyaka eBerlin.  
Onke amahashe aziwayo eMpuma Koloni kulindeleke abekhona.  
Ukusukela ngonyaka eyasungulwa ngayo iBerlin November, sele ikhule kakhulu kwaye ibonwa njengeyona ndawo yolonwabo ephambili ephondweni lonke.  
Nangona kunjalo, kodwa yena uBara uthi uyasindwa ngumthwalo ngoba ukuququzelela umnyhadala ofana neBerlin November kudinga imali ebonakalayo abe engayifumani inkxaso eyaneleyo kurhulumente wephondo.  
Ukubeke kwacaca ke kambe uBara okokuba uza kunyanzeleka ayivale ekuhambeni kwexesha ukuba akayifumani inkxaso. 
“Besinokwenza ngcono ukuba besiyinikwa inkxaso eyaneleyo liphondo nangurhulumente. 
 Umnyhadala onje ungaphezu kwamandla ethu kwaye awufanelanga kuba ngumthwalo wabantu abambalwa.  
Ukuba ungathelekisa lo wethu nomdyarho ekuthiwa yiDurban July, kukho umahluko omkhulu ngoba wona ulawulwa ngurhulumente.  
Sinengxaki ke eMpuma Koloni yokungazixhasi izinto zethu.   
Eli phondo alisixhasi ngokwaneleyo. Kufike ixesha lokuba siyeke ukumane sixoka kuba sifuna ukungcwaliswa. 
 Ngeyikude kakhulu iBerlin November ukuba ibixhaswa kakuhle ngurhulumente weli phondo. Ayenzeki lo nto,” utshilo uBara oxelele iintatheli okokuba unomnqweno wokubona iMpuma Koloni iyindawo ephambili kwicala lokuvelisa amahashe nokuqeqesha idyokhi eziphalisayo.  
Ukuba bekuya ngokwakhe, bekumele urhulumente wayakha kudala indawo yokuphalisela amahashe ngoba le isetyenziswayo ngoku lidlelo lemfuyo ekufuneka lisetyenzwe phambi kokuba kuphaliswe kulo. 
“Oko kufuneka siphindele kula ndawo itya imfuyo. Asikwazi ukuyiphucula la ndawo (eBerlin) ngoba izinto zethu ziyasuswa xa sizifakile.    
Ukuba besingabantu abanebhongo ngento yabo, bekungafanelanga ukuba kunjalo. 
 Izinto ziyafa apha ngoba azixhaswa. Iyenzeka nale kuba sityhala ngesifuba. 
 Nangona singonwabanga, yona iBerlin November iqhubela phambili ngoba yinto engaphezulu kunemvakalelo yethu,” utshilo uBara.  
Enye yezinto ekuthiwe iza kuphuculwa yindlela amahashe abalekiswa ngayo ngokwahlukana kwawo emva kwezikhalazo zabanini bamahashe abakhalazele ukudityaniswa kwamashe wesiXhosa nawesilungu kwiminyaka engaphambili.

headline: Iinkcukacha ngomngcwabo kaNqontsonqa
text:
UZA kubekwa ecaleni kooyisemkhulu ngoMgqibelo umhla wesihlanu kweyeNkanga eMakhanda uSiphelo Dyongman, obedume ngelikaNqontsonqa kwezolonwabo. 
Ngokwengxelo, le mbongi kwanemvumi ibhubhele kumajikojiko aseGcuwa emin’ emaqanda ngoLwesihlanu umhla wama28 kweyeDwarha, isendleleni egodukayo isuka eMthatha nalapho ibithunywe khona liSebe lezeMisebenzi ebilisebenzela. 
Ebikela I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngemini yeshwangusha ngesi sehlo, uAkhona ‘Bhodl’ingqaka’ Mafani okwayimbongi, uthi uDyongman beyedwa esithuthini ebesiqhuba ngethuba lokwehla kwesi sehlo. Uthi le mvumi ibhubhe ngoko nangoko kwindawo yengozi. 
Udade boDyongman, uAgcobile Dyongman, uthe baxhelekile kwaye abakakwamkeli oku belusapho. 
“Asikho sesimeni esihle. Asikakholelwa. Bekukuninzi ebekucwangcisele thina silusapho kwanabantwana bakhe ababini,” kutsho uAgcobile. 
UDyongman, obekwayintatheli ngokwemfundo, wayekhe wabhalela I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngethuba lisandul’ ukuphehlelelwa phakathi ko2015 no2016. 
OnguMseki noMhleli wokuQala weli phephandaba, uUnathi Kondile, umchaze uDyongman njengomntu obe ziphilela kwilizwe lakhe kwaye enezakhono ezixandileyo. 
“Wasuka ngaphaya eMakhanda ezokufuna ukubangumbhali kwiSolezwe. Zange ibe ludliwanondlebe olude. Samthatha zisuka nangona yayingengomsebenzi osisigxina. Eyona nto ndandifuna ayenze kukuba abhale iindaba ngale ndlela awayekwazi ukudlala ngamagama esiXhosa xa esenza imibongo,” kutsho uKondile. 
UKondile uthi intlungu yolwimi lwesiXhosa kukuba baninzi  abantu abakwazi ukulusebenzisa kakuhle kodwa ingxaki ngamathuba engqesho esiXhosa. 
“Bekumele ukuba abantu abafana nooDyongman bebeqesheka lula naphi na, ingakumbi kwezonxibelelwano. Andazi ke ukuba sakuthini na xa ke ngoku italente enje iwushiya kwamsinya lo mhlaba. Nto kaDyongman, uyayazi zange ndaliqhela eli likaNqontsonqa igama, uye wangumzekelo wento entle umntu anokubayiyo ngesiXhosa sakhe. Phumla ke tata, kucacile ukuba olwakho ugqatso ulufezile,” uvale watsho uKondile. 
UDyongman ukhuphe iingoma ezininzi ezifana noNdifuna Ezi, Lekese, Camagu, Ithuba neVumba Lothando ukubalula nje kwezimbalwa. 
Kwezo ngoma zakhe usebenze  neemvumi ezifana noBerita, uSimbone, noBhodl’ ingqaka. 
Usapho luyihlelele umhla wesine kweyeNkanga inkonzo yesikhumbuzo kwindawo ebingekachazwa. 
Inkonzo yomngcwabo iza kubanjelwa kwanombolo 10399 eMajor Fuku Street, eVukani Location eMakhanda, ukuqala ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesixhenxe ekuseni. 
Lala ngoxolo Zotsho!

headline: Zixube noKhozi FM eMonti
text:
USEMONTI namhlanje? Ukuba kunjalo yiza kuzixuba nabasasazi boKhozi FM uzonwabise ngomjuxuzo.  
Kaloku esi sikhululo, sinabaphulaphuli abangaphaya kwezigidi ezisixhenxe, sikwiphulo lokuzazisa kubaphulaphuli baso kweli phondo nanjengoko ipali yaso yezosasazo ifumaneka kwimimandla ethile kweli phondo. 
Ukusuka ngentsimbi yesithandathu kusasa namhlanje, uKhozi olumaphikophiko luza- kusasazela inkqubo uVuka Mzansi kwiholo yoluntu yaseMonti, beluqhuba olu sasazo kwakunye neTru FM. Phaya emva kwentsimbi yesithoba kwakusasa nje, esi sikhululo sizakube sisungula ngokusesikweni oyena nobangela wotyelelo lwaso eMpuma Koloni. Kulo msitho ke, kuzakube kukho abaphathi beSABC, iinkokeli zemveli, oosomashishini, ooceba, isikhokelo saseBuffalo City naseMdantsane City kuquka nabantu bakwaNTT VW. 
Ngentsimbi yesithoba kusasa namhlanje, uKhozi luzakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo e-Oh Mi Lounge eMonti. Emin’ emaqanda uKhozi luzakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo eMdantsane City.  
Ngokuhlwa, ngentsimbi yesithandathu, iqela leendaba lizakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo olumalunga nezolonyulo kwiholo yoluntu eMonti, kuze phaya ngentsimbi yesixhenxe malanga amaqhula akuhlekise kubebuhlungu isisu kwi99% Zulu Comedy eOrient Theatre.

headline: Kusungulwe iphulo lokuphuhlisa ulimo
text:
Ngosuku obe lugqatse ubhobhoyi kwiMpuma Koloni iphela kuvakale intsholo emyoli kumathafa ebala laseMfundisweni Mission ngethuba amafama ahlala kufutshane aye achongelwa inkqubo yophuhliso lwezolimo ngabakwaBoxer beqhogene neW&R Seta Agri-Project. 
Le projekti ithembisa ngokuguqula ubomi bamafama angaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu aseMpuma Koloni kwaye iphehlelelwe embindini wenyanga yoMdumba. 
Le ngqokelela yamafama iphuma kwiindawo ezikufuphi nakwiidolophana ezithe bhazalala ngokuthi ichongwe kwiphulo lokuphuhlisa izakhono nolwazi lwawo obe lusetyenziswa nguBoxer neW&R Agri-Project. Inxalenye yolu qeqesho ibandakanya ibakala lokuba la mafama aza kuthi avelise iziqhamo nemifuno eza kuthengiswa koobhazabhaza beevenkile zakwaBoxer kuzwelonke. 
Kungoku nje la mafama abila ibunzi exhinkxwa ngesilabhasi elungiselelwe wona ukuze akwazi ukusebenzisa imali,  ukwandisa amathuba awo wokungenela kwizivumelwano, ingakumbi zorhwebo nonaniselwano nevenkile yakwaBoxer kuphela. 
“Kulo nyaka ka2022 ivenkile yakwaBoxer ifinca iminyaka engama45 sinikela inkonzo eluntwini, ngoko ke ukuba yinxalenye yamaphulo afana nala kusivuyisa kakhulu. Sichonge amafama angama300 ukuba abe yinxalenye yolu qeqesho ukuze akwazi ukusithengisela imveliso esemgangathweni. Ininzi indingeko yokuba aqeqeshwe azimiseleyo ukuze akwazi ukusebenza ngempumelelo. UBoxer ukholelwa kwelokwenza umahluko eluntwini,” utshilo oyinqokonqoko kwaBoxer uNtombi Dludla. 
AbakwaW&R Seta baqalise uqeqesho kule mishini yodumo kwaye baza kutyelela iidolophu ezifana  neFlagstaff, Bizana, Lusikisiki, Port St Johns neNtabankulu bekwaqhuba olu qeqesho, beqinisekisa ukuba bashiya umgangatho ophezulu wolwazi apho. Ukanti uqhubeka enika la mafama umrholo wethutyana logama  esamfimfitha ulwazi kwiingcali zolimo. 
“UBoxer uneqela eliphaphe kakhulu kwezolimo neliza kunika iingcebiso kula mafama malunga nendlela yokubiza amaxabiso nokuvelisa ngokomgangatho ofunwa zivenkile zethu. Baza kuncedwa yimanajela yakwaW&R Seta uDeclan Lawson oyingcali,” uqukumbela atsho uDludla. 
Ukanti le nkqubo itsale ingqwalasela yoMasipala iAlfred Nzo District Municipality nethe yavakalisa inkxaso kwisikhokelo saseMfundisweni Mission namafama alapho. 
Le projekti iya kuqukunjelwa ngomsitho wokunikezelwa kwezatifiketi phakathi enyakeni ku2022, ngethemba lokuba phambi koko isivuno sokuqala somhlaba otyebileyo waseMpuma Kapa sakube kukudala sachongwayo sanambithwa kumakhaya ngamakhaya angabaxhasi bakwaBoxer.

headline: Uyahamba naye uNorman Mapeza kwiChippa United?
text:
Abasemfuthweni wolwazi bathi ingathi iChippa United iza kulahlekelwa ngomnye umqeqeshi lungaphelanga usuku lwanamhlanje. Iigxelo zithi uNorman Mapeza ucele intlanganiso nosihlalo weChippa United, uMnu. Siviwe Mpengesi, ekulindeleke acele ukushenxa kuyo. I’solezwe lesiXhosa lizamile ukuqhakamshelana nabasemagunyeni – kodwa libuye nelize. UMapeza wafika kwiChippa United kunyaka ophelileyo kunzima kakhulu emva kwesiqalo esibi sesizini eqhubekayo. Wangena endaweni kaClinton Larsen owakhonjwa emnyango emva kwemidlalo emihlanu qha. Emva kwethuba, uMapeza waye wayonyula engxakini iChippa yade yaphakathi kwamaqela asibhozo aphambili kwiPSL. 
Umyalelo awawunikwayo yaba kukusindisa iqela ezembeni. Nangona iqela likwazile ukuqokelela amanqaku emidlalweni eliqela ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka – kodwa liye labethwa kweminye imidlalo. Kwiveki ephelileyo, iChippa United ibethe AmaZulu ngegowuli elinye eqandeni yatsho yabhekela kancinci ezembeni. Nakubeni kukho loo qabu – kodwa ayikaphumi ngokupheleleyo engxakini. UMpengesi uyaziwa jikelele ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika ngokugxotha abaqeqeshi. Kunokwenzeka ukuhamba kukaMapeza kuphenjelelwe lixhala lokulwela izembe njengokuba kusongwa isizini. IChippa ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinambini emva kokubetha AmaZulu asekugqibeleni.

headline: Yintlungu into yokuvalwa kweFitness Joint
text:
Umbutho wabaququzeleli bamanqindi eMpuma Koloni, i-Eastern Cape Promoters Boxing Association, ubambe inkomfa noonondabe kwihotele iMdantsane Sun izolo. 
Phakathi kwezinto ebeziphambili kumgomo wale nkomfa ngumba wotshintsho kumalungu alawula lo mbutho. 
Le nkomfa ibilandelela kwintlanganiso kawonke wonke ibibanjwe ngulo mbutho ebutsheni bale nyanga.  
Usihlalo walo mbutho * -Ayanda Matiti uyicacise nje ngentlungu into yokuvalwa komzi wokuziqeqesha iMdantsane Fitness Joint kutsha nje 
. “Ukuvalwa kwela ziko yinto ebuhlungu kuthi nje ngabaququzeleli bamanqindi. Sele kukho inqwaba yeentshatsheli eziphuma kula ndawo, kwaye nabantu abaninzi baseMdantsane izakubabuyisela emva lento kuba ibilikhaya labo eliya,” utshilo uMatiti. 
“Abantu bazakusokola kuba kufuneka babuyele eVirgin Active, eMonti, loonto izakuzisa iindleko nangakumbi kubo. Lento siyafuna ukuba urhulumente ayiqwalasele naye asincedise.” 
Kwintlanganiso ibibanjwe kutsha nje eCintsa, kwangezwe amalungu amatsha kulo mbutho ngokubanzi. UPhindile Mbhele, Sibongile Matiti, Ntsikayezwe Sigcawu, Xolani Jamani noMbulelo Mfama ngamalungu amatsha kulo mbutho. 
UMatiti ugxininisile ukuba ukukhula kwamanqindi yinto yomntu wonke kuba lo mdlalo uchaphazela iimpilo zabantu abaninzi. “Amashishini abucala, oonondaba kunye neminye imibutho banoxanduva loku 
Umntu ongengomququzeleli wamanqindi uza kusokola ukwenza imilo ngoku, kuba aba bantu batsha batyunjiweyo baza kuqinisekisa ukuba akusebenzi nabani na, ubethelele lo mcimbi lo mbutho.

headline: Kuliwa ubuqhophololo eBhayi
text:
UMASIPALA waseNelson Mandela Bay sele ufumene inqwaba yeminxeba ebika ubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo kulandela ukusungulwa komnxeba osekezelwe ekusombululeni imiba emalunga nobuqhetseba nobuqhophololo. 
Lo mnxeba usungulwe ekuthambekeni kwenyanga ephelileyo nguSodolophu uAthol Trollip. 
NgoLwesine, lo masipala ubhengeze ukuba uphanda amatyala obuqhetseba nobuqhopholo angamashumi amathathu anesibhozo ngenxa yalo mnxeba. 
Lo masipala ukwathe ubhenele enkundleni ngeenjongo zokuzama ukubuyisela kwinxili yawo imali ebalelwa kwizigidi ezingamakhulu amathathu eerandi kwiinkampani ezimbini iAccess Facilities and Leisure Management neAfrisec Strategic Solutions. Lo masipala ukholelwa ukuba ezi nkampani zibhunyule le mali zisebenzisana namagosa athile kulo masipala. 
Inkampani iAccess Facilities and Leisure Management yiyo elawula iNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. 
Onomdla ekubikeni ubuqhetseba nobuqhophololo eNelson Mandela Bay, angatsela kwinombolo engu: 0800 007 086 okanye athumele i-imeyili ku: fraud.nmb@kpmg.co.za

headline: Izigulana zikhweliswe inqwelomafutha ephez’ kwenye
text:
Kule veki iphelileyo, ngomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kule imiyo, izigulana ebezinedinga noogqirha azifikanga kwisibhedlele saseFrere eMonti ngenxa yenqwelomafutha ethe yafa endleleni.  
Le nqwelomafutha ibikhwelise izigulana ezisuka kwisibhedlele saseLady Frere, eHewu, kwakunye naseFrontier.  
Omnye wezigulana ebezikhwele kule nqwelomafutha, uChwayita Mrubata, uthi bathe xa beseCumakala yafa inqwelomafutha.  
“Silinde iiyure ezintathu apho bekuzanyanwa nale nqwelomafutha. Ithe yakungalungi kwabizwa inqwelomafutha ekhwelisa iinqwelomafutha ezophukileyo. Le nqwelomafutha ibikhwelise thina iye yakhweliswa phezu kwenye, sabe nathi singaphakathi kuyo. Andifuni kuxoka bendisoyika ukukhwela kule nqwelomafutha xeshikweni iphezu kwenye inqwelomafutha. Qha ke amagosa eSebe lezeMpilo ebesihamba nawo athe akukho ndlelambini, masikhwele kule nqwelomafutha sigoduke. Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba sibuyele emva emakhaya kuba inqwelomafutha ifile. Ngoku ixhala lam kukuba siphose umhla wedinga ebesinalo noogqirha.  
Isithethi seSebe lezeMpilo eMpuma Koloni, uLwandile Sicwetsha, uvakale enomsindo xa ephendula malunga nale nyewe.  
“Madoda khanikhangele iindaba ezizizo! Andiyiboni ingxaki kule nto kuba le nqwelomafutha ibikhwelise abantu abanedinga noogqirha. Akunokude ibe ngathi bebekhwele i-ambulensi yona ileqisa abantu abakwimeko exhalabisayo. Mhlawumbi abantu baye bazithandela ukuba bakhwele kule nqwelomafutha xeshikweni ikhweliswe kwenye,” utshilo uSicwetsha.

headline: Isilumkiso eluntwini ngobungozi beswekile
text:
LIBEKWA kwindawo yesibini eloMzantsi Afrika ngokwamanani abantu ababulawa zizifo ezinento yokwenza neswekile. 
Oku kutshiwo ngu- Ettiene Retief ongusihlalo weenkonzo zerhafu kuzwelonke nakwi- komiti yequmrhu leenkozo zerhafu kweli iSARS.  
OkaRetief uthe, “Irhafu yeswekile yinto eyayike yathethwa kunyaka ophelileyo kodwa zange kude kuthathwe sigqibo ngayo.” Ubuze umbuzo ongenampendulo esithi, “Ingaba singakwazi na kweli lizwe ukumelana nerhafu yeswekile?” Isifo seswekile, esentliziyo, nomhlaza zezinye zezigulo ezayanyaniswa neswekile. Umbutho weli iSouth African Institute of Professional Accountants uthi, irhafu yeswekile kufanele ukuba ithathelwe ingqalelo kweli ngenxa yoxanduva elidalwa zizifo ezayanyaniswa neswekile. Lo mbutho uthi, ilizwe laseMexico lisungule irhafu eyodwa kwiziselo ezibandayo ezineswekile kunyaka ka 2013, ngelixa elaseNorway lisungule irhafu kwiswekile ecoliweyo. Amazwe afana nebritane nawo aneentetho malunga nerhafu yeswekile.  
URitief uthe, “Irhafu yeswekile kwamanye amazwe ibonakalise iziphumo ezihle, kwaye ingadlala indima nakweli loMzantsi Afrika.”  
Ukwathe iswekile ibonakala njengento eyamkelekileyo kunecuba kodwa xa kusaziwa kakuhle iingozi zayo empilweni nakumaxabiso amachiza kungathathwa amanyathelo afanelekileyo.  
“Izifo ezibangwa kukusetyenziswa kweswekile ngaphezu komlinganiselo zinobuzaza kuqoqosho lweli,” utshilo okaRitief. 
Ukwathe angekhe sikwazi ukufanisa irhafu ebizwa ngokuba yeyesono, nequka icuba notywala, “Ngeke sinyuse irhafu yeswekile kuba sifuna ukunciphisa imveliso yeswekile, kufuneka sifundise uluntu banzi ngezinye zezinto abanokuzisebenzisa endaweni yeswekile.” OkaRitief ukwathe kuzakuba nzima kwiminyaka ezayo kuba uluntu luyaphela ngenxa yokusebenzisa iswekile ngaphezulu komlinganiselo. 
Ukwathe kufanele  kubekho umthetho olawula intengiso yeswekile, kwanemibhalo ekwiipakethe zayo.

headline: Igowuli likaNdoro lizibulele iiChilli Boys
text:
Phantsi kuka-Augusto Palacios, i-Orlando Pirates, iphumelele umdlalo wayo wesithathu emva kokubetha iChippa United ngo’1-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League kwisithuba seyure edlulileyo eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.   Igowuli lePirates lifakwe yifolosi etshisa bhe kwezintsuku – uTendai Ndoro. Ngoku lo mdlali waseZimbabwe unamagowuli alithoba emva kwemidlalo yePSL elithoba yeBucs kule sizini.  Ukufaka kwakhe amagowuli ngolu hlobo kumnika ithuba elihle lokuba abengoyena mdlali onamagowuli amaninzi ekupheleni kwesizini. Ngaphezulu koko kubonakala ngathi angafaka amagowuli athe kratya kunalawo afakwe kwiisizini ezidlulileyo.   Umdlalo ubumhle macala omabini kuba omabini la maqela ayibeka phantsi ibhola xa edlala. Ibhola ibisoloko ibanjwe yiChippa – kodwa into engakwazanga ukuyenza kukudlula kubadlali basemva beBhakaniya abafana noThemba Sikhakhane no-Edwin Gyinah – abakhusele unozinti kwade kwasekugqibeleni.    Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iqela elindwendweleyo lihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye. Kwisigaba sesibini abadlali abafana noDavid Zulu noThembinkosi Lorch bazamile ukukhangela iindlela zokufumana igowuli – kodwa amatyeli aliqela bebefika uJakson Mabokgwane ethe qwa.    UMpho Makola, uLuvuyo Memela bagcine abadlali beChippa emva bexakekile – logama u-Oupa Manyisa no-Issa Sarr baqinisekise ukuba onke amacandelo afumana inkxaso efanelekileyo.  Kwimizuzu yokugqibela, iChippa United, ikhalele ithuba lokufumana ipenela eyivinjwe ngusompempe emva kokuwiswa kukaKatlego Mashego ebhokisini nguPatrick Phungwayo.  Naye uBuyani Sali ulifumene ithuba lokufaka igowuli lokulinganisa – kodwa yachithwa ibhola yakhe nguJackson – obenomdlalo omhle kakhulu namhlanje. Komnye umdlalo i-Ajax cape Town izuze impumelelo yayo yokuqala ngethuba ibetha iPlatinum Stars ngo’3-2 namhlanje ebusuku.  Nayo iCape Town City ibethe iMaritzburg United ngo’3-2 yatsho yayokuthi ngcu phezulu kwiPSL.     Chippa:  Akpeyi, Thopola, Kama, Okwuosa, Mako, Ngubane, Zuke, Mbenyane, Lorch, Mncube, Mashego   Pirates:  Mabokgwane, Manyisa, Chabalala, Gyimah, Makola, Memela, Ndoro, Phungwayo, Rakhale, Sarr, Sikhakhane  
Phantsi kuka-Augusto Palacios, i-Orlando Pirates, iphumelele umdlalo wayo wesithathu emva kokubetha iChippa United ngo’1-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League kwisithuba seyure edlulileyo eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.

headline: Uswelekile umdlali weMuvhango neGenerations!
text:
USWELEKILE umdlali kamabonakude uMutodi Neshehe. 
UNeshehe ebeneminyaka ingama46 ubudala. 
Okwangoku akukabikho nkcukacha zikhutshiweyo ngokubhubha kwakhe. 
“Kulusizi ukuvakalisa ukuba uMutodi Neshehe usishiyile ngalo mhla wokuqala kuJuly 2021. Ebengumntakwe, umalume, utata, umluleki, umzekelo nomdlali kamabonakude. Uza kukhunjulwa lusapho nezihlobo,” kubhala usapho kwingxelo oluyikhuphileyo. 
Phakathi kwemidlalo adlale kuyo emininzi, uNeshehe ukhe wadlala njengoNdalamo Mukwevho kuMuvhango, waphinda wanguZola Radebe kwiGenerations. 
Ushiya ngasemva abantwana abangamantombazana ababini.

headline: UNzawumbi utyelele abafundi eWSU
text:
USiphiwo Nzawumbi, ityendyana elineminyaka engamashumi mabini anesixhenxe (27), neliyinzalelwane yaseMpuma Koloni, eMtata.  
Owayesakuba ngomnye wabafundi beziko lezemfundo ephakamileyo iWalter Sisulu, esenza izifundo kwicandelo lezosasazo nobuntatheli. 
UNzawumbi ngumsasazi wenkqubo ethi Yilungelo Lakho kwiSABC 1, edlala rhoqo ngoLwesihlanu, esaziwa nakwiinkqubo azisasazileyo ezinje ngeQuestion Time, nanjengomfundi weendaba zikanomathotholo kwiRadio 2000. Wayethe waphumelela imbasa njengomnye owaqala usasazo eselula “Young Communicator Achievement.’’ 
Eli tyendyana lityelele abafundi bezosasazo beYunivesithi iWalter Sisulu, ebakhuthaza, ebaxhobisa nangeenzima abazakuthi badibane nazo ebomini, kodwa ebaqinisekisa ukuba bangapheli mandla sekunjalo, bomelele. 
“Eli lizwe siphila kulo alifuni matyefelele, koko lifuna umntu ozimiseleyo oyaziyo into ayifunayo, sekunjalo imfundo ibengundoqo, kubalulekile ukuziqoqosha, ucakace ubomi bakho, uyazi into oyifunayo,” utshilo uNzawumbi. 
USanelisiwe Dyasi onamashumi amabini anesine (24), ongummeli wabafundi kwicandelo lezosasazo, uthe ukuva kwakhe ngokuza kukaNzawumbi, ebengenamdla kuba engamazi ncakasana, engayibukeli nenkqubo yakhe, kodwa enalo ulwazi oluncinci ngaye, kodwa emva kwentetho yakhe uzive ekhuthazekile, enomdla wokuqhubekeka nezifundo zakhe zobuntatheli kulo nyaka uzayo. 
UNzawumbi ubaxelele abafundi nangokusokola kwakhe ukufumana umsebenzi, engalali eshicilela ethumelela abantu abasele bephambili, ehamba enkqonkqoza kumagumbi abaphathi beSABC ecela itorho, engatyhafi, kodwa sekunjalo engafumani, ehamba zi-Odishini, ekugqibeleni wafumana eSABC. 
Umququzeleli nokwangumhlohli kwicandelo lezosasazo kwiYunivesithi yaseWalter Sisulu, uTina Gebe, uthi ubonile ukuba abafundi bafuna inkuthazo kumntu obekhe wakweli nqanaba bakulo, oziqondayo iinzima abakuzo. 
“Ndityumbe uNzawumbi kuba ndimazi, ndiyazi intlupheko aphumele phantsi kwayo ukuze abe ukule ndawo akuyo,” utshilo uGebe. 
UGebe ukwaqinisekisile ukuba le nkuthazo izakuqhubekeka nakwiminyaka ezayo, basebenzise ngakumbi amagqala aphuma kweli ziko laseWalter Sisulu, abasele bephumelele. Abantu abanje ngoLulu Haarmans ongumsasazi kuMhlobo Wenene fm, uBlaq Maci, uCriselda Lewis, Lisakhanya Pepe, uVelile Mbuli nabanye abaninzi. Ekwathemba ukuba abafundi bakhuthazekile yintetho kaNzawumbi.

headline: UGqirha uzokugevezelisa amadolo kaImani
text: USIYA Sepotokele uza kudlala kumdlalo weSABC2 iMuvhango ukuqala ngokuhlwanje.

headline: UBen Motshwari unethemba lesizini eneziphumo ezibethele kwiPirates!
text:
Umdlali oyinjini kwi-Orlando Pirates, uBen Motshwari, uthi abalandeli mabalindele isizini entle emva kokufika kwabadlali abatsha. OkaMotshwari ukuthethe oku emva komdlalo weCarling Black Label Cup obuse-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto – apho iPirates ibethwe khona yiKaizer Chiefs ngo’4-3 kumapenela emva kokubambana ngeqanda emdlalweni. Nangona iPirates idlale kakuhle isebenzisa abadlali bayo abaqhelekileyo – kodwa nabo abadlali abatsha bakwazile ukubonisa ukulungela kwabo isizini entsha. Kwisizini egqithileyo, iBucs ivale isizini ikwindawo yesithathu kwiDStv Premiership futhi inendebe yeMTN 8 eza kuyikhusela kwiveki ezayo. Njengokuba kulungiselelwa ukuqalwa kwesizini entsha, uMotshwari unethemba lokuba iPirates iya kuthatha apho iyeke khona kwisizini ka-2020/21. 
“Abadlali abaninzi bagciniwe yiPirates. Lo nto ithi sineqela elizinzileyo. Abadlali abatsha abafana noKwanda Mngonyama bazama ukuziqhelanisa nendlela yethu yokudlala. Uza kusinceda ngoba besingenaye umdlali oyintsika emva kwisizini egqithileyo ngenxa yokonzakala kwabadlali,” utshilo uMotshwari emva komdlalo. “Abadlali abatsha bebefuneka ukuze balinike amandla iqela. Jonga iSundowns, inabadlali abaninzi futhi iyakwazi ukumelana nemidlalo yalapha neyeCAF. Ndicinga ukuba izinto ziza kusihambela kakuhle kwisizini entsha. Sidlale imidlalo emininzi yeCAF kwisizini egqithileyo. Kubekhona ukudinwa ngenxa yokuhamba kakhulu. Sinabadlali abanamava ngoku, okufanele sikwenze kukusebenza ngokuzimisela siziphathe njengabadlali abakwinqanaba eliphezulu,” utshilo uMotshwari. 
Umqeqeshi weBucs, uJosef Zinnbauer, ukhala ngabadlali abonzakeleyo nangona kwaye akumkhathazi ukubethwa yiChiefs kwiveki ephelileyo. UGabadinho Mhango noThembinkosi Lorch bebekhona emdlalweni – kodwa kusekho abadlali abafana noZakhele Lepa noTshegofatso Mabasa abangekaphili. “Kunzima ukutyikitya abadlali ube usazi unabadlali ekungathiwa baphilile. Sinaye uMhango ekufuneka siqinisekise ukuba usebenza kakuhle. UMabasa angabuyela eqeleni naye – kodwa ngeke sithi ukulungele ukudlala. Sinabo abadlali abatsha abaza kudibana nabanamava. Sifuna iifolosi zethu ebaleni,” utshilo uZinnbauer.

headline: USodolophu ubanjiwe
text:
UBANJWE libutho lamapolisa elibizwa ngokuba ngooKhetshe usodolophu womasipala wengingqi yase-Amathole uNomasikizi Khonza izolo.  
UKhonza kuvakala ukuba ujongene nezityholo zobuqhophololo bemali efikelela kwizigidi ngezigidi zeerandi.  
Ngokwengxelo efunyenwe leliphephandaba uKhonza uvele enkundleni kamantyi eMonti ngethuba amagqqwetha esenza iinzame zokuba akhululwe kwayizolo, angalali eziseleni.  
Bekungekacaci ukuba uyaphuma kusini na ngethuba sishicilela elinqaku. -Johnnie Isaac

headline: OodadeboZahara bakhuphe icwecwe!
text:
MKUTUKANA Sisters, Oodade abathathu abacula umculo wegospile. Mhlawumbi komnye umntu ifani yakwaMkutukana uyakuyiqhelela kwimvumikazi yasePhumlani, uZahara.  
UZahara yintombi encinane kwesi sithathu ndithetha ngaso esinguBandezwa, uNomonde kunye noLumka abazibiza iMkutukana Sisters.  
Ukungena kukaZahara emculweni nokufumana kwakhe udumo, akuthethi ukuba sasingekho isingqi sengoma kusapho lwakhe, oku kuvezwe yiMkutukana Sisters ngethuba incokolela ne-I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngobhaza-bhaza wabo omtsha wegospile. 
IMkutukana Sisters zithi, kudala zabakho kwiqonga lomculo, udade wabo (Zahara) esemncinane. “Sikhule sicula, sicula ekwayaleni yasecaweni nalapho udade wethu uZahara waye wangena kwikwayala leyo yecawa,” bathethe batsho.  
IMkutukana Sisters yakhe yazama ukushicilela icwecwe ngeminyaka yee-90s eBhisho, kodwa zange liphumelele. Ngaphambili babezibiza iBorn Again Sisters.  
“Saye sabona ukuba masizibize iMkutukana Sisters kuba saqaphela ukuba le nto yalo mculo yivangeli kwiMkutukana Sisters, sagqiba kwelokuba sizibize olo hlobo,” batshilo.  
Ngethuba uZahara egqama, evela esithatheni ngonyaka ka2011, babephi oodade wabo? “Besihamba naye ela xesha, simxhasa, kodwa wayengasaculi igospile ngoku, sabona sele ecula umculo we-AfroSoul.  
IMkutukana Sisters ithi, omnye wabo (Lumka) waya esikolweni eBloemfontein, ngelo xesha wasishiya isiginci awayesithengelwe ngutata wabo, kukulo nyaka apho uZahara wafunda ukubetha eso siginci, nanjengoko kwakungekho mali yokuba angene kwimfundo enomsila.  
“Wayetyiwa sisithukuthezi uZahara kula nyaka, wafunda ukudlala isiginci endlini. Kunyaka olandelayo, waya esikolweni uZahara ehamba nesiginci eso.  
La magqiyazana athi othuka uZahara akulandela umculo we-AfroSoul. “Kanti sothuka akukhetha ukutshintsha, kodwa sawuthanda umculo lowo kuba awubhekelanga kakhulu kwigospile nendlela awubhala ngayo,” utshilo.  
Bathi soze batshintshe ekuculeni igospile ngokuba bakholelwa ukuba luhlobo lomculo olutshintsha izimilo. IMkutukana Sisters iza- iphethe icwecwe layo elithi “EBenezer  
Usigcinile”. “Luhlobo esibona sigcinwe ngalo nguBawo emva kwezinto ezibuhlungu ezisehleleyo, kuquka ukushiywa ngumntakwethu phakathi kwazo,” batsho.  
Eli cwecwe lineengoma ezilishumi elinesibini ezifana no-Hallelujah Amen, Ebenezer Usigcinile, Great Is Your Name (feat Zahara), Asilwi thina nabantu, Yaweh is your name (feat.Zahara) nezinye. Eli cwecwe lishicelwe eCut ‘*  Edit Studios eRhawutini, nalapho uZahara edlale indima njengomvelisi walo.  
Esi sithathu sithi sesifundile kudade wabo ngobunzima obuza neqonga lomculo. Bathi bekubanzima kubo kuqala xa befunda iindaba ezimbi ngodade wabo kumaphephandaba.  
Icwecwe leMkutukana Sisters liyafumaneka kwiivenkile zomculo ngexabiso le-R70.  
Eli qela linezicwangciso zokutyelela eKapa naseRhawutini kungekudala.

headline: UPauw usakholelwa kwiBanyana yakhe
text:
Into yokungakwazi ukulawula umdlalo usaqala yiyo ebethise iBanyana Banyana kumdlalo wokuqala kwemibini yobuhlobo phakathi kwayo ne-Netherlands, ngoMgqibelo. 
 IBanyana nexhaswa yinkampani yakwaSasol isebenzisa le midlalo ukulungiselela imidlalo yeOlimpiki ezakubanjelwa eRio kwinyanga yeThupha kulo nyaka. 
UMzantsi Afrika wenze impazamo ngokudlala kakubi umdlali weNertherlands ebhokisini, bafumana ibhola yasimahla ukuze bafumane igowuli lokunkqenkqeza phambili. 
 Umqeqeshi weBanyana uVera Pauw ukholelwa ukuba iqela lakhe khange limphoxe nangona libethiwe. 
 “Ekuqaleni abadlali bam bebebonakalisa ukoyika, becinga ukuba iNetherlands lilizwe eliphezulu kakhulu. Bendibona ukuba babahloniphe kakhulu, kodwa ngokuhamba komdlalo baye bazibona ukuba bangakwazi ukukhuphisana nabo. 
 “Senze utshintsho labadlali abambalwa xa singena kwisiqingatha sesibini, le nto isincede kakhulu kuba sikwazile ukunqanda eli qela lingakwazi ukubheka phambili. Bebengakwazi ukugqobhoza kubadlali bethu bangemva, kwaye siphele sikwazi ukwakha amathuba abhethele. Ngesikwazile ukufumana nokuba ngamagowuli amabini,” utshilo uPauw. 
 La mazwe mabini azakuphinda angquzulane kumdlalo wobuhlobo wesibini ngomso kwibala elinye. Umdlalo uzakuqala ngentsimbi yesixhenxe. UPaul uqinisekile ukuba lo umdlalo uzakuba yinto eyahlukileyo. 
“Kufuneka sinyaniseke kuba eli qela laseDutch khange libasebenzise bonke abadlali balo abaphezulu, ngoLwesibini izinto zizakuba nzima. Loo nto ithetha lukhulu kuthi kuba lithuba lokuba sibonakalise ukuba siyakwazi ukuwuphakamisa umdlalo wethu,” uvale ngokutsho uPauw.

headline: Unzinyelwe kukudlala uBen 10 kuZalo
text:
UMdlali kamabonakude womdlalo Uzalo, uSimphiwe Majozi, uthi kuye kwanzima kakhulu ukudlala indawo yegatyana lomfana (Ben 10)  othandana nomama omdala ngenxa yemali.  
Lo mdlali ongowaseMthwalume, kwindawo eKwaZulu-Natal, odlala indawo kaSbu kulo mdlalo, uthi nakuba sele eyiqhelile le ndawo, kodwa usebenze nzima.  
“Ndike ndatsala nzima ngexesha iqala le ndawo, kuba bekufuneka ndiphuze umntu olingana nomzali wam. Kwakufanele ukuba ndizikhumbuze ukuba apha ndiyalingisa, ndisemsebenzini kumele ndikwenze oku,” utshilo uSimphiwe.  
Lo mdlali kamabonakude udlala le ndawo noNtombifuthi Dlamini, odlala indawo yomhlolokazi uNkosikazi Madlala, nophunyelwe yimali yelifa yomyeni wakhe eyiR10 million. 
 Le mali yiyo eyenze uSbu ancamathele kuye, qhinga elo aliqulunqe nancuma naye othanda izinto zemali yexabiso.  
Lo mdlali uthi ufumana ubunzima ukulingisa le ndawo, aphinde ajongane nengxaki yokunika ingcaciso kubantu abasondeleyo kuye. Uthi bakhona abaye bambuze ukuba umncamisa njani umama omdala kunaye.  
“Ndichaza ntsuku zonke, sele kude kwayivesi yemihla ngemihla kuba nabasemakhaya bafike bakhuze bangayilibali into abayibone ndiyenza kumdlalo kamabonakude. Ukanti usisi wam wayendibuza ukuba kunjani ukuncamisa umntu omdala,” utshilo lo mdlali efile yintsini.  
Uthe ngaphandle kokulingisa sele eqale ukusebenza njengomvelisi wemidlalo, ukuze abenayo enye into ayenzayo angaxhomekeki entweni enye.  
“Xa ulingisa kukhe kuphele iinyanga ezintathu ungabizwanga ndawo, uze ngolo hlobo ugqibele sele ulamba. Kuye kube ngcono xa ikhona enye into oyenzayo ecaleni uzame ukuziphilisa, nto leyo mna ndiyenzayo.”

headline: Ababonakalisi mdla kumboniso wezoshishino eNyandeni
text:
Ubonakalise ukwehla nangakumbi kulo nyaka umboniso wemveliso zookopolotyeni obanjwa minyaka le ngumasipala waseNyandeni nangona umasipala enikezela ngenkxaso engagungqiyo ukuhlumisa uqoqosho kule ndawo.  
Umboniso walo nyaka obubanjelwe eLibode ngoLwesihlanu wothuse amagosa kamasipala ngenxa yegcuntswana loo kopolotyeni nabantu abebezimase lo mboniso. 
Imanejala kwicandelo lophuhliso loqoqosho lwasekuhlaleni kulo masipala uNazo Cekwana uthi badanile kukungaphumeleli kookopolotyeni phantsi komasipala nangona befaka inkxaso evakalayo ngeenjongo zokuba uluntu lubonise imveliso yalo.  
“Sidanile kakhulu kumele ukuba silungise apho konakele khona. Kuzakufuneka ukuba ngaphambi kokubanjwa kwalo mboniso kunyaka ozayo sixelele abantu kakuhle ngokubaluleka kwawo, singapheleli apho siphinde sincedise ngezithuthi ngomhla walo msitho ukuthintela ukungaphumeleli kwabantu,” utsho uCekwana. 
Ngokwengxelo umasipala waseNyandeni ubekela bucala imali eyiR200 000 ukulungiselela lo msitho ozinyaswa ngamasebe karhulumente noluntu ngokubanzi kwaye kunyaka ophelileyo ububanjelwe eNgqeleni.  
UThandikhaya Mdawuhluthi wombutho ojongene nookopolotyeni eO R Tambo uthi olu suku lomboniso luyabanceda bengoosomashishini abasahlumayo eNyandeni bafumana ithuba lokubonwa ngoosomashishini abakhulu.  
UMdawuhluthi uthe “Nangona umasipala esinika inkxaso mali kodwa ukungabikho kwamanzi kulo mmandla kusichana ngendlela embi. Ookopolotyeni abakwicala lezolimo babonisa ukukhula phantsi kwezo meko zinzima.” 
Amaqumrhu aphantsi kukarhulumente aquka iarhente yophuhliso lwamaphandle eMpuma Koloni, isebe lophuhliso loqoqosho nokhenketho namanye, afundise abantu ngeendlela zokunyusa ookopolotyeni.  
UNoncedo Mbatha wakwa-ECRDA uthi bayawaxhasa amashishini asahlumayo ngokuwanika imali-mboleko enenzala ephantsi, uthi sele bexhase iiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwesihlanu.  
Ukwathi indawo yokuthengisa imveliso isengumqobo kuhlumo lookopolotyeni kwindawo yaseNyandeni. 
Ukanti namanye amaqumrhu amemelele ekuba umasipala waseNyandeni abekele bucala isixa-mali sokuncedisa ookopolotyeni bazobonisa izinto abazithengisayo kumboniso wonyaka ozayo.  
Kulindeleke ukuba kukhwetywe nabanye abantu abasuka koomasipala abohlukeneyo kunyaka ozayo. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za

headline: Ukhatshwe ngenkonzo yasekhusini uPrince!
text:
Iintsalela zemvumi yaseMelika, uPrince , zitshisiwe. Oku kudizwe ngumpapashi wale mvumi yomculo wePop ngoMgqibelo. 
UYvette Noel-Schure akazidizanga iinkcukacha zokuba le nkonzo iqhutyelwe phi, okanye xesha liphi na, kwaye iintsalela ezo zizakubekwa phi na. Inkonzo yabucala yesikhumbuzo sikaPrince ibibanjwe ngoMgqibelo ePaisley Park, eseChanhassen, eMinnesota, nalapho le mvumi ibihlala, kwaye ixelenga khona. 
Ugxudululu lwabalandeli bakhe bebezalise ngaphandle kothango, bambi begaxele izinxibo ezisobo (purple), mbala lowo ubuthandwa yile mvumi. 
Kwingxelo, uNoel-Schure uthe, Kwiiyure ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo, uPrince ubhiyozelwe liqelana labo bebemthanda. Usapho, izihlobo kunye neemvumi zakhe, kumsitho wabucala omhle bezokuthi ndlela-ntle. 
“Iintsalela zikaPrince zitshisiwe, kwaye indawo yokugqibela yokuzigcina izakuhlala isekhusini. Sicela imithandazo yentuthuzelo ngakusapho nezalamane kweli xesha.“Unobangela wokubhubha kwakhe awukaziwa, kwaye kwakubanjalo ubuncinane bento engangeeveki ezine phambi kokuba sifumane iziphumo zoqhaqho lwesidumbu.” 
UPrince Rogers Nelson, 57, usweleke ngoLwesine ePaisley Park ngezizathu ezingekaziwa. Uhlolo lwesidumbu lwenziwe ngoLwesihlanu eMidwest Medical Examiner’ s Office eRamsey, eMinnesota, kodwa ingayiveki phambi kokuba iziphumo ziqukunjelwe. 
Abalandeli bakhe bashiye iintyatyambo, iibhaloni kunye namaphawu phambi kwale ndawo. Iintsapho nezihlobo zikaPrince, zikhuphe iibhokisi ezimfusa ezilishumi elinesihlanu eziqulethe izinto zikaPrince ezinjengeeCD, izikipa kunye neencwadi kubathandi bale mvumi abebegxalathelene apho ngoMgqibelo. 
Iibhaloni kunye neentyatyambo nazo bezibekwe eFirst Avenue, kwindawo yolonwabo yaseMinneapolis, neyabayindawo ethandwayo emva kokuba uPrince wayisebenzisa kumboniso bhanya-bhanya iPurple Rain ngo1984. Iimvumi, noosaziwayo kunye nabanye, bakhuphe amazwi okugxwal’ emswaneni kususela ukubhubha kwale mvumi. ELondon, uMongameli waseMelika uBarack Obama ukhahlele kweli qhawe lomculo esithi, yena noogxa bakhe bebephulaphule uPurple Rain phambi kwentlanganiso nenkulumbuso yaseBritane ngoLwesihlanu. 
AbakwaCarver Country Sheriff Jim Olson bathe, akukho mpawu zokungxwelerheka emzimbeni kaPrince ngethuba efunyanwa engaphefumli kwinqwanqwa elonyusa lisehlisa abantu (elevator) ePaisley Park. 
Abeenkonzo ezingxamisekileyo bazamile ukumncedisa ukuphefumla (CPR), kodwa bohluleka, batshilo abasemagunyeni. Uye wachazwa njengongasekhoyo ngo10:07 kusasa.

headline: Zimile izifundo eVuwani
text:
Ukufunda kwakunye nokuhlohla kootitshala kume ngxi eVuwani kwiphondo laseLimpupo ngenxa yoqhankqalazo olwenziwa ngabahlali kula mmandla.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba abahlali bala mmandla bengoneliseki sisigqibo esithathiweyo sokuba ezinye iindawo zaseVuwani kwakunye neMalamulele zizakwenza umasipala omnye omtsha. 
Abahlali batshise nezikolo ezingama-23 zala mimandla besonakalisa kwazixhobo zilulutho kubo.  
Usihlalo wale bhodi, uJane Thupana izolo kumabonakude uthe, ibhodi ibagqibele abahlali ngaphambili. “sicinga ukuba ibizakwenza izinto zibembi mpela ukuba sasizamile ukuthetha nabo kuqala. 
 Ngoku sele kukubi akusekho kubuyela kubo.”utshilo uThupana

headline: Abasasazi basinde ngezikasibi engozini!
text:
ABASASAZI ababini bakanomathotholo weSABC eMpuma Koloni, iTruFM, basinde ngokulambisa engozini emasikizi ngeCawa. 
Aba basasazi babini, uSilulami ‘Slujah’ Bunu, uSiphamandla ‘Silk’ Damoyi kwakunye nomqulunqi weenkqubo zeli ziko uAsive Sotashe, bebesendleleni esuka ngaseMonti besingise ngaseGqeberha ngethuba begagana neli shwangusha kufutshane neMakhanda. 
UDamoyi uchacha ngcono esibhedlele ngelixa uBunu kwakunye nomqulunqi wakhe bechacha ekhaya emva kokukhululwa emva konyango. 
UDamoyi khange angene kwinkqubo yakhe ethi Upskill ngeCawa, nebekulindeleke ibe yinkqubo yakhe yesibini nanjengoko eqeshwe yiTruFM kule nyanga. Kuvakala ukuba ibinguye umqhubi wesi sithuthi nekwanguye ochaphazeleke ngamandla kule ngozi. 
“Asiyazi kwenzeke ntoni kodwa esikwaziyo siphantse safa kula ngozi. Umsasazi obeqhuba nguye owonzakele kakhulu, kuye kwafuneka ancediswe ukuphuma kobo bugoxo,” omnye wabo uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Kuvakala ukuba uDamoyi wophuke izihlandlo eziliqela engalweni ngelixa uBunu noSotashe befumene umonzakalo ongephi. 
UBunu noSotashe bebengekho emsebenzini ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
Imoto bebehamba ngayo, nekuvakala ukuba ngekaBunu ibubugoxo sithetha nje.

headline: Uzalo luzakulwa neSibaya eThekwini
text:
Imfazwe phakathi kwemidlalo kamabonakude engu Uzalo kunye neSibaya izakudlulela nakubadlali beqonga bale midlalo njengokuba uninzi labo lukhethwe kumawonga eSimon Mabhunu Sabela Awards (SMSA) azakubanjelwa eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, eThekwini, ngomhla we-18 kuJuni.  
Uzalo ludlala ngentsimbi ye-20h30 ebusuku ngoMvulo ukuya kuLwesithathu kuSABC 1. Isibaya sidlala ngexesha elifanayo phakathi evekini, Mvulo ukuyokutsho kuLwesihlanu kuMzantsi Magic.  
Abachongiweyo kula mawonga esihlanu kulo nyaka bamenywe kumcimbi obuseCoastlands Hotel eMhlanga ekuqaleni kwale veki.  
Ukhuphiswano luqatsele ngakumbi kubadlali boZalo neSibaya, ingakumbi xa sijonga uluhlu lwamawonga afana noBest Newcomer Actress (TV) apho kujongene uSamukele Mkhize odlala indawo kaMabuyi kuSibaya noThandeka Zulu owayedlala indawo kaNombuso kuZalo.  
Abanye nguBonga Dlamini owayenguMkhonto kuZalo noNcibijana Madlala odlala indawo kaSiyabonga Mabuza kuZalo noBheki Mkhwane onguSamson Ndlovu kuSibaya.  
Uluhlu lwabo bakhethiweyo bebonke lume kanje:  
■  Best Newcomer Actress (TV) Mayuri – High Rollers Samukele Mkhize – Isibaya 3 Thandeka Zulu – Uzalo  
■  Best Supportng Actor (TV) Bonga Dlamini – Uzalo Ncibijana Madlala – Uzalo Bheki Mkhwane – Isibaya 3  
■  Best Actress (TV) Nomzamo Mbatha – Isibaya 3 Jessica Nkosi – Isibaya 3 Nompilo Maphumulo – Uzalo Dawn Thandeka King – Uzalo  
■ BEST ACTOR (TV) Siyabonga Thwala – Isibaya 3 Vusi Kunene – Isibaya 3 Don Mlangeni Nawa – Uzalo  
■  Best Director Philani Sithebe – iLungelo Boni Sithebe – Luthando 2 Mlingane Dube & Shannyn Zorabo – Brothers 
■  Best Documentary Full Length Triangle of Faith – Jayan Moodley Archbishop Dennis Hurley “Lead Kindly Light” – Jayan Moodley The Flawed – Neville & Sandra Herrington  
■ Best Documentary Short Anton Herrington – The Mystical Powers of Water Sandra Herrington – Legends of the Elephant Whisperer Sandra Herrington – The Legacy of Ian  
■ Best Screenplay Simphiwe Blessing Mkhize – Uk’shizila Philani Sithebe – Ilungelo  
■  Best IsiZulu Film Lerato Isihlangu Somntanami Luthando Ilungelo Izwi Legazi  
■ Best Supporting Actress Film Virginia Lindy Mnikathi Bongekile Mpisane Ncamsile Ngcobo  
■ Best Actor (Film) Lucky Hadebe Scelo Gasa Mte Ngema  
■  Best Use of KZN as a Location Imbulu Intombi Emnyama 2 Ilungelo  
■ Best Student Film David Winter Svaha I Nation  
■ Best New-comer Actor (Film) Sphamandla Maxundla Xolo Songca Wandile Cele Ntokozi Sibisi  
■ Best New-comer Actress (Film) Nokulunga Ngcobo Nomfundo Ndlovu Lungi Ngubane Nomasonto  
■ Best Micro-budget Ilungelo Luthando Lerato Iminjunju Yafuthi  
■  Best Actress (Film) Nomfundo Ndlovu Ncamsile Ngcobo Mandisa Nduna  
■  Best Feature Film Nomcebo Cele – Lerato Bonie Sithebe – Ilungelo Bonie Sithebe – Luthando 2

headline: Ganga nyoko, inzima nyoko!
text:
UMSITHO wokuwonga abadlali beqonga iFleur du Cap Theatre Awards uphinde wabuya. 
Owalo nyaka iza kuba ngowama57 kwaye abaququzeleli bavuyiswa kukubuyela esidlangalaleni emva kokuqhuba imisitho emibini besebenzisa unxibelelwano lwala maxesha ngenxa yeCovid-19. 
Abaququzeleli bathi bakhethe ukuwonga la mayolisa eqonga ngomhla obekelwe ukubhiyozela umsebenzi wawo iWorld Theatre Day engomhla wama27 kweyoKwindla. 
USibuyiselo “Sbuja” Dywili waseKraaifontein ngomnye wabadlali beqonga abachongelwe ukuwongwa ngembasa ngolu suku. 
UDywili, ongumbhali, umlungiseleli nomdlali weqonga, uchongwe izihlandlo eziliqela kwezi mbasa ngomdlalo wakhe awubhalileyo othi Ganga Nyoko! Inzima Nyoko! 
Uchongelwe kwiBest New South African Script, Best New Director neBest Perfomance by an Ensemble. 
Lo mdlalo uqale ukuboniswa kwiqonga laseKraaifontein elibizwa ngokuba yiKraai4Theatre ngo2020. 
Kunyaka ophelileyo, lo mdlalo weqonga uye wachongwa kumabakala amane kwiimbasa zoMnyhadala weZabalaza eBaxter Theatre Centre eKapa. 
UDywili uthi apho babuya neembasa ezimbini, eyoMdlali oBalaseleyo (Best Actor) neyoMdlalo weQonga oPhambili (Best Production) ngalo mdlalo wakhe othi Ganga Nyoko! Inzima Nyoko!. 
“Kuluvuyo ukuphinda sibone sichongiwe kwakhona phantse kumabakala afanayo nawaseBaxter,  kodwa sibe sichongelwa iimbasa ezinkulu kangaka. Ndiziva ndichulumancile,  ndinombulelo ongazenzisiyo,” kuphawula uDywili ngethuba encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Lo mdlalo udlalwa nguSiyamthanda Bangani ekunye noSbuja Dywili eqongeni,  elungiselelwe iqonga nguSiphenathi Siqwayi kunye noUyanda Kiva. 
“Lo mdlalo udlalwa ngabantu ababini eqongeni bebalisa amagingxingxi ngobuhlobo babo,  phofu besandula ukuphinda badibane emveni kokuba bagqibelana kwiminyaka esixhenxe eyadlulayo.  Bazikhumbuza ke ngezakudala, ngaxeshanye bekwancokola ngeenkxwaleko zanamhlanje,” uDywili usikrobisa kulo mdlalo. 
UGanga Nyoko ngumdlalo wesiXhosa, obhalwe ngesiXhosa kodwa ekwanazo iindawana eziguqulelwe esiNgesini. 
Nangona uDywili esithi unemidlalo emininzi ayibhalileyo, kodwa lo ngowokuqala ukuwukhupha. 
“Yonke eminye endiyibhalileyo andikayishicileli ukuze iye eluntwini.” 
UDywili ukhe wadlala kumdlalo weqonga owawuboniswa eArts Cape obizwa Comfort. 
Lo yayingumdlalo weOpera owawulungiselelwe iqonga nguRobert Lehmeir, uCatherine Milikken, Shirley Apthorp baseGermany bekunye noFatima Dike. 
“Lona elo bali labhalwa ngokuthi lithathwe kumabali aselokishini awayebaliswa ngabafundi baseBloekombos High School ababe kwikwayara yakweso sikolo, neyayikhokhelwa nguMnu. Siyabulela Sulelo ngaloo nyaka. 
UDywili ukhe wachongwa ukuba adlale indawo katsotsi kwibali likaAthol Fugard elithi Tsotsi, bali elo laguqulelwa kumdlalo weqonga othi Tsotsi: The Musical nguMkhululi Mabijana, Neil Coppen, Dom Gumede kunye noZwai Bala. 
Kwakhona, uDywili ukhe wadlala kwibali likaThoko Ntshinga elithi Buzani KuBawo. 
Abanye abachongiweyo kwezi mbasa baquka uBuhle Qinga, Qondiswa James, Mava Silumko, Siphenathi Siqwayi, Wendy Mbali, Lukhanyo Moyakhe, Siphokazi Molteno, Siya Mayola, uNana Bulabula nabanye abaninzi.

headline: UMalangoane ebeliqhawe leChippa, eMonti
text:
Chris Gilili 
Ukuzimisela kwisiqingatha sesibini, kuncede iChippa ukuba itywatyushe i-Ajax Cape Town ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye. 
Umdlalo wangeCawa phakathi kweChippa ne-Ajax, ulibaziseke ngemizuzu elishumi elinesihlanu. Oku kubangelwe kukuba bekulindwe abathandi bebhola ekhatywayo bahlale phantsi, eBuffalo City Stadium, eMonti. 
Abalandeli bebhola baye balifumana ixabiso lemali yabo, ingakumbi kwisiqingatha sesibini, nalapho iChippa idlale ngendlela emangalisayo. 
Kwimizuzu emibini uqalile umdlalo, uPrince Nxumalo, ufake igowuli lokuqala le-Ajax. Ifolosi yeBafana Bafana, uDavid Zulu ufake elokulinganisa leChippa kusandula kuqala isiqingatha sesibini. 
Isiquququ, nomdlali oye wabalasela ngeCawa, uJoseph Malangoane ufake igowuli lesibini leChilli Boys. UXola Mlambo ongene kwisiqingatha sesibini, uye waqinisekisa ukuba amanqaku amathathu azakuya kulala eBhayi, ngelixa efaka ingcwenga yegowuli lesithathu leChippa. 
Umqeqeshi we-Ajax, uRoger de Sa, ukuvumile ukubethwa kweqela lakhe. Wabe esitsho nokuba iqela lakhe liwenzile umsebenzi: “ Sidlale ngokuzimisela kakhulu, kodwa khange sikwazi ukusebenzisa amathuba ethu,” utshilo uDe Sa. 
“Bezikhona nezigqibo ebezikekelele kwiChippa, kodwa leyo yinto elindelekileyo xa udlala kude nekhaya.” 
UDan Malesela, nongumqeqeshi weChippa, uthe ukudlalela kweli bala, nelalikade libizwa ngokuba yi-Absa Stadium, kubuyise iinkumbulo zakudala. 
“ Ndakhe ndadlala, kweli bala umdlalo wam wokugqibela ndandisadlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns. Ndiyithandile iinkxaso esiyinkwe ngabantu baseMonti, kwaye yeyonanto ivuselele abadlali bethu, balwela impumelelo,” utshilo uMalesela. Umphathi weChippa, uthe: “ Aba badlali benze into engaphezulu kwaleyo besiyilindele, asinakulindela ngaphezulu kunoku. Sinethemba lokuba abantu baseMpuma Koloni, bazakwenza iChippa United, iqela labo lesibini.”

headline: Impendulo kwiinzingo zaseJeffreys Bay
text:
Basandula ukubhiyozela ukugqiba iminyaka elishumi elinanye ukusukela oko baqala iMpendulo Savings eJeffreys Bay, kwaye sele benze ingeniso emalunga nezigidi ezilishumi elinesithoba zeerandi (R19 million).  
IMpendulo Savings yasungulwa nguJill Thompson kwaye umsebenzi wayo kukunceda iintsapho ezingathathi ntweni eJBay ukuze zikwazi ukuqubisana nemingeni yendlala.  
Le ndibanisela yokonga inamalungu angamawaka amabini kwaye ukwaqhuba nombandela wokufundisa ngezimali kwanoqeqesho lwezoshishino, isebenzisa inkqubo kanomathotholo ebizwa ‘Be Money Wise or Go Mad’.  
Le nkqubo idlalwa kwiOasis FM yala mmandla rhoqo ngentsimbi yeshumi kusasa ngooLwezine.  
“Saphehlelela [eli nyathelo] ngethemba lokuba liza kuncedisa ekulweni indlala, neyayingunozala wolwaphulomthetho, udandatheko lwabantwana kwaneentsapho ezingazinzanga. Sasifuna ukwenza umahluko omncinane, kodwa asizange sicinge ukuba iminyaka yethu yokuqala yeshumi elinanye iyakuba nje,” utshilo uThompson, umlawuli weMpendulo Savings.  
UHlengiwe Radebe ongumlawuli wophuhliso lwezoqoqosho kwiFama yoPhehlombane ngoMoya yaseJeffreys Bay uthi bayazingca ngokuxhasa iMpendulo Savings ukusukela ngo2013. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za

headline: Bazenzele unomgogwana wombane abahlali
text:
Baphila ngokuzithathela umbane ngokungekho semthethweni kwinjini yamanzi abahlali abathile baseGasela eCumakala emva kokulinda ixesha elide bengancedwa kwiingxaki yabo yokungabi nambane.  
Ingxelo ithi zizindlu ezingaphezu kwamashumi asixhenxe kula lali ezidinga umbane ukusukela kwiminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabini.  
Omnye wabahlali othe wazitsalela lo mbane ngelizama ukuphucula impilo yakhe uMathew Gelem uthi kudala belindele ukuncedwa ngombane ngurhulumente. 
 “Kudala sithenjiswa apha ngumasipala ukusukela ngonyaka ka2012 ngoDisemba besithi azizukuphela iveki ezintathu umbane ungafakwanga, ngoku side sazincama sazitsalela umbane kule njini,” utshilo uGelem. 
 Ezo zindlu zingakwazanga ukutsala umbane kule lali sele zikuqhelile ukuhlala ebumnyaneni. 
Le lali isungulwe ngeminyaka yo1960 kudityaniswa abantu abaphuma kwifama ezahlukeneyo ezingqonge le ndawo ngelizama ukubenzela amakhaya angcono. 
 “Abazali bethu bafike apha kudala kakhulu singekabikho thina, inye into esele siyifumene ngamanzi apha, umbane siwutsale kuba sidikiwe kukulinda, kothulwa iipali apha ezibonisa ukuba uzakuqaliswa umbane kodwa kwagqityelwa ngoko,”uhambise watsho umhlali.  
Uninzi labahlali bale ndawo baphila ubomi bendlala engumangaliso ngenxa yokungabikho kwemisebenzi, okubangela lizinga lemfundo ephantsi kule ndawo.  
Lo kaGelem ufumene izoyikiso ezisuka kumagosa kamasipala wase -Amahlathi emva kokuncokola nephephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngalo mcimbi. 
 “Bandifikele ndivela emsebenzini bendibuza ukuba kutheni le nto ndithetha namaphepha ngale meko yalapha kuba ibinokuhlalelwa phantsi, ndibaxelele ke ukuba ndithethile nangoku namajelo eendaba,” ucacise watsho uGelem. 
Kwintetho yakhe yobume besizwe ngonyaka ka2013 umongameli Jacob Zuma wadiza ukuba zizindlu ezikumashumi asibhozo anesihlanu eepesenti ekhulwini ezisele zifakwe umbane kweli.  
Ukanti i-ofisi ejongene nezonxibelelwano kwi-ofisi kamasipala wase-Amahlathi ngomlomo ka-Anathi Nyoka iqinisekise ukuba iyifumene imbalelwano esuka kwiphepha-ndaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa malunga nalo mcimbi.

headline: Yamkelwe ngesibhaxu iPanama kwindebe yehlabathi
text:
Ilizwe elitsha kwindebe yehlabathi, iPanama, lamkelwe ngesibhaxu ngumdlali waseBelgium oyingozi. URomelu Lukaku, odume ngokufaka amagowuli ngokungenambaliso, ubhakuzelise umnatha amatyeli amabini kumdlalo ophunyelelwe yiBelgium ngo’3-0 omhle eFisht Stadium ngale ntlwa kwi-2018 FIFA World Cup ebanjelwe eRussia. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla kungekho gowuli ebhodini emva kokuxhathisa kwayo iPanama. Nakubeni ililizwe elitsha kwindebe yehlabathi futhi kungalindelekanga nto ingako – kodwa iPanama idlale kakuhle kakhulu kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Bekunzima nokufumana ibhola kuLukaka 
Izinto zijike kwisigaba sesibini ngethuba iPanama iyeka abadlali beBelgium abayingozi bedlala ibhola endaweni eyingozi. UDries Mertens ufake ibhola entle kumzuzu wesibini kwisigaba sesibini umdlalo uqalile kwatshintsha yonke into emdlalweni. Emva koko amandla wePanama aye ehla. ULukaku ufake amagowuli amabini emva koko abe zizikhonkwane eziyitsho ayakwazi nokushukuma iPanama. Umdlalo weBelgium, ongancumisanga kwisigaba sokuqala, uye watshintsha kwesesibini. Ngoku iBelgium ihleli phezulu kuGroup G emva kokuqokelela amanqaku amathathu. 
Belgium: Courtois, Alderweireld, Vertonghen, Witsel (Chadli 90’), De Bruyne, Lukaku, Hazard, Carrasco (Dembele 74’), Mertens (T. Hazard 83’), Meunier, Boyata. 
Panama: Penedo, Murillo, Escobar, Torres, Gomez, Perez (Tejada 73’), Barcenas (G. Torres 63’), Cooper, Davis, Godoy, Rodriguez (Diaz 63’).

headline: Ubomi ejele kwababulala umbhexeshi weANC eCala
text:
Ubomi entolongweni kuThembisile Sixakana (32), Mnoneleli Mpusu (44) kwakunye noMawande Dlephu (32) abadubula, babulala emini emaqanda umbhexeshi weANC kumasipala iSakhisizwe nomasipala iKhowa uThanduxolo Nobhongoza. 
Esi sithathu sigwetywe yinkundla yamatyala ephakamileyo yaseMthatha ebichotshelwe eCacadu kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kwiNPA, uNobhongoza wadutyulwa emini ngakowabo eCala Extension ngeyeNkanga ka2018. 
Owayengungqondongqondo kweli tyala ngowayeligosa lezendlela eSakhisizwe uLoyiso Nyembe, nowayeqeshe la madoda mathathu ekubeni abulale uNobhongoza waye wabanjwa naye. Nangona nje waye wabanjwa, waye wabhubha xa kusaqhuba ityala emva kwengulo emfutshane. 
Isithethi seNPA uLuxolo Tyali uthi uNyembe wayesoloko etyholwa ngokuba nobuqhophololo kumatyala ayamene neelayisenisi zokuqhuba azithengisayo. Ezo zityholo zamenza angavisisani noNobhongoza, wagqiba ekubeni ambulale. 
UNyembe wafuna aba bafana benza lo msebenzi kowabo kuQumbu. 
Ngethuba kuqhuba ityala, bonke bathi abanatyala phambi kwenkundla, besithi kodwa ngosuku lokubulawa kukaNobhongoza bayavuma babeseCala beyokulanda imoto kuNyembe. 
Esi sithathu siye sanikwa ubomi ngaphakathi. Ngaphezulu bongezelwa iminyaka esixhenxe yokuba nemipu engekho semthethweni.

headline: Sikhosana: Andonwabanga ngenxa yePirates
text:
Amagqala webhola ekhatywayo ayefudula edlalela i-Orlando Pirates anxunguphele ngenxa yendlela iqela lawo eliqhube ngayo kwezi sizini ezidluleyo. 
 Omnye walo magqala nguJerry Sikhosana ocele usihlalo weBucs, uGqirha Irvin Khoza, ukuba azame ukuchitha ixesha elininzi kuyo ngoku.  
USikhosana uwachaze amagqala wePirates njengabantu abanomsindo yinto eyenzeke kwisizini edlulileyo. AmaBhakaniya afince isizini ethe finini kwindawo yeshumi elinanye kwiPSL – into aqalayo ukuyifumana ukusukela mhla kwasungulwa iPremier Soocer League.  
UKjell Jonevret oqeshwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka akakwazanga ukuyihlangula iPirates emva kokuphasalaka kwayo kwangethuba kusekho uMuhsin Ertugral no-Augusto Palacios.  
Bekukho ithemba lokuba iPirates ingafumana iNedbank Cup – kodwa yabethwa kuyo yiSuperSport United kwakubi ngakumbi. 
“Ndiyamcela usihlalo aqinise izinto ngoku. Ewe, kunokwenzeka ukuba uya ebemdala ngoku – kodwa isenguye xa ethetha aba badlali kufuneka bamamele njengathi kudala,” utshilo uSikhosana. 
“Ndisakhumbula ngeentsuku zethu, wayengena kwigumbi lokuphumla. Ilizwi lakhe lalivakala kwaye kwakungekho umntu ofuna aphinde athethe. Lo nto yayisiqhuba ukuba senze umsebenzi. Andonwabanga konke ngenxa yendlela eqhube ngayo iPirates. Kwezi ndawo sihamba kuzo abantu bayasibuza ukuba kutheni kunje nangona singabandakanyeki kwiqela,” utshilo uSikhosana. 
Lo kaSikhosana ukugxekile ukuyekelela umxakatho kwabadlali bePirates nokungabikho kukaTeboho Moloi kwiqela labaqeqeshi bayo athe izinto zazingcono esekhona. Eli gqala alikhathalelanga nokuba ngubani umdlali othengwe yiBucs; into eliyifunayo ngumsebenzi ebaleni qha. 
 “Andikhathali nokuba ngubani othengiweyo; okubalulekileyo ngumahluko owenziwa ebaleni – hayi iziqu,” utshilo uSikhosana. 
UHelman Mkhalele no-Edward Motale ngabanye babadlali bakudala abangonwabanga.  
Njengokuba kusondela isizini entsha, iPirates ityikile abadlali abaliqela abaquka uThamsanqa Sangweni noWayne Sandilands. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za

headline: Lakuxoxwa kunyaka ozayo ityala laseBCM
text:
Limiselwe umhla weshumi elinanye, kwinyanga ka-Epreli, kunyaka ozayo ityala lamalungu ombutho we-ANC eBCM, nalandelwa zizityholo zokusebenzisa gwenxa imali eyayabelwe ukwenza amalungiselelo omngcwabo kabawo uNelson Mandela.  
Eli tyala belixoxwa eMonti izolo. Limiswe logama kusaqwalaselwe umongo wezityholo ezambethe abatyholwa yinkundla ephakamileyo eRhini. UPhumlani Mkolo, Zukiswa Ncitha, Themba Tinta, Luleka Simon-Ndzele no-Ondela Mahlangu, baphakathi kwabatyholwa abaphambili kweli tyala ngezityholo zokusebenzisa gwenxa imali eyayilungiselelwe umngcwabo kaMandela eQunu, ngoDisemba ka2013.  
Ingxelo ithi, kulindeleke ukuba kwenziwe uphando oluthile ukuze ngalo mhla uchaziweyo liqhubele phambili ityala. Eli tyala ligqibele ukuvela enkundleni kwinyanga kaNovemba walo nyaka. 
Yimali ekwizigidi ezithandathu zeerandi eyathi yahamba ngondlela-mnyama, amagosa kamasipala esabelana ngayo endaweni yokwenza amalungiselelo. Enye yemali yayiphuma kwiqumrhu elijongene nophuhliso eMpuma Koloni (ECDC) nekwabangela ukuba kugxothwe amagosa aphezulu.Ukuvela kweli bholo kwabangela ukuba amanye wala magosa abanjwe ngelixa amanye athi ayibuyisa imali nje emva kokwanda kwezindaba. Owayengusodolophu womasipala waseBCM ngelo xesha uZukiswa Ncitha, washiya esikhundleni sakhe emva kokukhula kwezityholo zokuchaphazeleka kwakhe kwelibholo.

headline: Kuphelile ngoonkqiyoyo kwindebe yehlabathi
text:
Ekugqibeli, oonqiyoyo banikezele emva kwamashumi alithoba nexesha elongezelelweyo emdlalweni. ICroatia lilizwe lokugqibela elithe lazibekela indawo kumjikelo olandelayo wendebe yehlabathi emva kokubetha iRussia ngo’4-3 kumapenela kumdlalo obunzima kakhulu ophele ebambene ngo’2-2, eSochi Stadium, namhlanje. AmaRashiya ancedwe ehamba emva yibhola efakwe ngentloko nguMario Fernandes – ngelishwa ongakwazanga ukuyifaka ipenela yakhe. UDomagoj Vida noDenis Cheryshev ngabona badlali bafake amagowuli weCroatia emdlalweni. Ilizwe laseCroatia liya phambili kufanelekile emva kokudlala umdlalo ophucukileyo ukusukela ekuqaleni kwendebe yehlabathi. Ngoku iCroatia ibonakala njengelinye lamazwe elinokuthi lithathe indebe yehlabathi kwiveki ezayo. IBelgium, iNgilane, iFrance neCroatia ngawona mazwe azakuthi alwele indawo kumdlalo wokugqibela kwiveki ezayo. 
   
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iyinkwa nenkwa kungekho ibanakala ingathi ifuna ukugoba iphondo. Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu, kanye ngendlela obulindeleke ngayo umdlalo. Ixheshiwe iRussia ngabadlali beRussia – kodwa abadlali beyo basemva baye baxhathisa nakubeni iCroatia ibizama ukuyivikiva amacala. Bekubonakala kodwa ukuba iRussia izimisele ukubhakuzelisa umnatha kwangoko emdlalweni. Umdlali oyifolosi, u-Artem Dzyuba, ezibalule ngokufaka amagowli kwindebe yehlabathi, ugcine abadlali beCroatia bexakekile emva. UDenis Cheryshev ufake igowuli elihle kakhulu elimshiye unozinti weCroatia, uDenjel Subasic, eme bhungxe emva kokufumana ibhola kuDzyuba kumzuzu wamashumi amathathu. Igowuli liyothusile iCroatia engakwazanga ukugqobhola kwiRussia izihlandlo eziliqela. Kwimizuzu elithoba emva koko, u-Andrej Kramaric, ufake igowuli lokulinganisa ngentloko. 
   
Abuye axhwithana la mazwe kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Uphantse wachitheka umphothulo ngethuba u-Ivan Perisic ekhaba imbumbulu yebhola ethintelwe yipali kumzuzu wamashumi amahlanu anesibhozo. Kwelinye icala uDzyuba weRussia unyanzele uDanjel Subasic ukuba asebenze ngethuba engquba ibhola ngentloko ebisuka  ekunene iphezulu. ULuka Modric uzibonakalisile kwakhona nanamhlanje ukuba ungumdlali ophezulu ngokuyibamba iCroatia iphantsi kohlaselo. Ebekwaluncedo kekambe naxa ihlasela iCroatia. Idlale kakuhle kakhulu iRussia phantsi koxinizelelo obelufakwa ngabadlali beCroatia. Iphelile imizuzu engashumi alithoba kungekho eliphumeleleyo. Amathuba ebekhona macala okuwuphetha umdlalo – kodwa akasetyenziswanga. Kumzuzu wekhulu uDomagoj Vida ifake igowuli lesibini ngentloko – yatsho yahamba phambili iCroatia. Mario Fernandes uphendule ngentloko kumzuzu wekhulu nesihlanu elinesihlanu. ICroatia iphumelele ngamapenela. 
Croatia: Danjel Subasic, Ivan Strinic, Domagoj Vida, Dejan Lovren, Sime Vrsaljko, Ivan Perisic, Luka Modric, Andrej Kramaric, Ivan Rakitic, Ante Rebic, Mario Mandzukic. 
Russia: Igor Akinfeev, Fedor Kudriashow, Sergey Ignashevich, Iya Kutepov, Mario Fernandes, Denis Cheryshev, Daler Kuziaev, Aleksandr Golovin, Roman Zobnin, Alexander Samedov, Artem Dzyuba.

headline: Ayakhula amanani ababukeli bomdllaloISIDINGO
text:
ISIDINGO sibonakalise ukumimitheka ngokwamanani kwezi veki siphuma kuzo, oku kukhutshwe ngu-TV SA.  
Oku kukhula kuqhutywe kukugaleleka kukaRichard Lukunku odlala indima kaJean-Marc kwiSidingo. Kubusuku bokuqala (Mvulo, 9 Novemba), umthamo wababukeli balo mdlalo wonyuka ngomyinge ka30 % ekhulwini kwakobo busuku bunye. Ababukeli bonyuke ukusuka kwi-774 000 ukuya kwi 1,009,000.  
Kubusuku obulandelayo (Lwesibini, 10 Novemba) lo mdlalo wonyuke nge-57% kunolu suku lunye lweveki ephelileyo ( yonyuke ukusuka kwi-706 000 ukuya 1, 110, 000 yababukeli).  
Isidingo besiqikelelwa kumthamo we-807, 000 wababukeli kwiveki ye-45, nokuthe oko kwenyuka ukuya kwi-1,009, 000 kule veki iphelayo. Lo mdlalo khange uqabele ngaphaya kwesigidi sababukeli ukususela kwinyanga kaJulayi walo nyaka.

headline: ‘I-DA kudala ilinde izenzo zoozungul’ ichele’
text: Ayothukanga iDA eBhayi ziinzame zokuqethulwa kolawulo lorhulumente womdibaniselwano okhokelwe ngulo mbutho kulo masipala.

headline: UNcikazi uzingomba isifuba ngomsebenzi weGolden Arrows emva kokuphumelela iQ2 Innovation
text:
Umqeqeshi weGolden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, uthi uzingoba isifuba ngomsebenzi omhle owenziwe liqela lakhe ukusukela oko kuthe kwaqala  isizini. Oku kuthethwe nguNcikazi emva kokuba Abafana Bes’thende benze imbali ngokuphumelela iQ2 Innovation okokuqala kwimbali yebhola ekhatywayo. Isibhengezo ngewonga elikhatshwe sisigidi esinesiqingatha serandi (R1.5-million) senziwe yiPSL ngoMvulo, ekuqaleni kwale veki. Ngumsebenzi omkhulu lo owenziwe nguNcikazi – othathe iintambo ezishiywa uSteve Komphela owasabela ubizo kwiMamelodi Sundowns emva kokuhamba kukaPitso Mosimane ekuqaleni kwesizini. 
Abafana Bes’thende boyise iSundowns ebiqhube kakuhle nayo kwiQ2 Innovation – eyasungulwa kwiminyaka edlulileyo ngelizama ukukhuthaza amaqela adlala kwiPSL. “Okubalulekileyo kuko konke kukubulela abadlali bethu nabaqeqeshi ngefuthe labo elithe lasinceda ukuze sikwazi ukuqokelela amanqaku amaninzi ngaphezulu kwamanye amaqela (akhe aphumelela iQI) emidlalweni esixhenxe,” utshilo uNcikazi ngovuyo olukhulu. 
“Ngenxa yomfutho senze imbali ngokuba liqela lokuqala KwaZulu-Natal eliphumelele into enjena. Ngaphezulu kwalo nto, amanqaku alishumi elinesithandathu esiwazuzileyo nemidlalo esiyiphumeleleyo mininzi ngaphezulu kunamaqela awakhe aphumelela iQ Innovation ngaphezulu. Andiqondi ukuba akhona amazwi anokucacisa indlela endizingomva isifuba ngayo ukuba yinxalenye yeGolden Arrows,” Impempe.com, imcaphule ngaloo mazwi uNcikazi. Umqeqeshi unethemba lokuba Abafana bes’thende baza kuloleka liwonga abalifumeneyo. 
“Endikuthandazelayo ngoku kukuba impumelelo yethu isilole ukuze sihlale sikulambele ukufumana iQ Innovation elandelayo. Lo nto singayenza ngokuqokelela amanqaku alishumi elinambini emaqeleni aseLimpopo aza kudlala nathi ebaleni lethu, iSugar Ray Xulu Stadium,” utshilo uNcikazi, onexhala kuba amaqela eza kuyijonga ngenye iGolden Arrows ukusukela ngoku. “Kufuneka sibambelele kwindlela esenza ngayo izinto ngoba okulindelwe kuthi kukhulu ngoku. Kumnandi kodwa ngoba iingqondo zethu beziphilile ngoba besingadlali neqela sibe sijonge indawo elikuyo,” utshilo uNcekazi.wabo.

headline: Unyulo lovalozikhewu eMpuma Koloni
text:
Iziphumo zonyulo lovalozikhewu eBuffalo City ziphumile, apho iANC imkhusele ngempumelelo uWadi 21 ze neDA yenza njalo kwaWadi 18. 
 
KwaWadi 18, owenziwa yiVincent, Bunkers Hill, Nahoon Beach, Bonnie Doon neWoodleigh – uJason Scott McDowell weDA ebe qubisana noAndrew Michael Sokolich weANC kuquka noLiveni Quisto Sani weCOPE kwanoNosiphiwo Runqu weEFF.  
 
Le Wadi ivuleke isikhewu emva kokulahla esikhundleni koceba weDA uDavid P. Viaene. 
Ngokweziphumo iDA iyiphumelele ngo-95.92 weepesenti le Wadi. 
 
KwaWadi 21, equka i-N.U. 12 ne-N.U.13 Mdantsane, Mdantsane West kwaneRiverine, kuphumelele uEdwin Owen Mpumelelo Fini weANC ngo- 89.98 weepesenti. Le Wadi ivuleke emva kokubhubha kukaceba weANC uMlandeli Ngabayena. 
 
KwaWadi 21 iDA ayikhange ifake mgqatswa, nto leyo ethe yabangela ukuba uFini aqubisane noBeauty Nozibele Nongqele weCOPE kwanoLuyanda Vetyeka weEFF. 
 
Kusenjalo, iANC iluphumelele ugqatso kwaWadi 9 eNgquza Hill emva kokufumana iivoti eziku-61.21 weepesenti. Umgqatswa weANC uKholiswa Vava nguye ophumeleleyo ebetha uTony Ntshangase weAPC, Mandla Gogo weDA kwanoThandokazi Xhobiso weEFF. Le Wadi ivuleke isikhewu emva kokubhubha koceba weANC. 
 
Iphefumla ngezi ziphumo, iANC eMpuma Koloni ithe: “Ezi ziphumo zibonakalisa mhlophe ukuba iANC ngumbutho wabantu. Sibulela wonke umntu obonakalise intembeko kwiANC.” 
Yena uNqaba Bhanga weDA uthe: “Ndibulela  wonke umntu obe phumile izolo (ngoLwesithathu) ukuya kuqinisekisa ngotshintsho oluziswa yiDA eMpuma Koloni.”

headline: UKomphela ukhalela ukuhamba kukaLebese
text:
Emva kwexesha elide kukho amahum-hum ngokuhamba kukaGeorge Lebese kwiKaizer Chiefs, ude wahamba kwiveki ephelileyo. Uthathwe yiMamelodi Sundowns eneminyaka imgacele.  
Ukuhamba kwalo mdlali akumphathanga kakuhle uSteve Komphela – kodwa uye wanyamezela ngoba yinto efunwe ngumdlali. ULebese wawubeka wacaca kuTwitter umnqweno wakhe wokuya kwiqela elizakumdlalisa kwisizini entsha.  
Amasandawana akhawuleze enza umtsi kwakucaca okokuba uLebese akasakufuni ukudlalela Amakhosi. Kwezi sizini zimbini uLebese akasetyenziswanga kakhulu nguKomphela, kubonakala ukuba yiyo lonto ebangele ukuhamba kwakhe.  
“Akululanga ukuphulukana nomdlali onjengoLebese. Wafika emncinci kwiChiefs, wachitha iminyaka esithoba yonke. Ziyenzeka ezi zinto ebholeni, simnqwenelela okuhle,” utshilo uKomphela. 
Ukufika kukaLebese ziindaba ezimnandi kakhulu kuPitso Mosimane ngoba ngomnye wabadlali awamfuna efika kwiSundowns kwiminyaka eyadlulayo. Kwiveki ephelileyo uLebese udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala kwiDowns ebethwe kuwo yiMaritzburg United ngo’1-0 eLucas Moripe Stadium kwaye noPitso uye woneliseka.  
“Saqala iingxoxo ngoLebese neqela ebelidlalela kwiminyaka emine eyadlulayo – kodwa izinto zange zihlangane ngoko. Kufezeke iphupha likaPitso ngokufumana kwakhe uLebese no-Oupa Manyisa,” utshilo uThulani Thuswa. 
Iingxelo zithi iDowns ikhuphe imali engaphaya kwezigidi ezintathu  (R3.5 Million), ukanti iindaba  ebezisithi uMzikayise Mashaba angaya kwiChiefs ziphelele emoyeni.  
“Simthengile uLebese, akukho sivumelwano esithi iChiefs izakufumana abadlali. Akekho futhi nomdlali ozakuya kwi-Orlando Pirates,” uyibethelele lo nto uThuswa. 
ULebese noManyisa sebebhalisiwe nakwiCaf kwaye kubonakala ngathi bazakuba yinxalenye yeqela likaPitso athembele ngalo kulo nyaka.  
IDowns izakuvula isizini entsha yePSL neSuperSport United kumdlalo ozakube useLucas Moripe Stadium ngo’15:00 ngoMgqibelo.

headline: UPitso uxhalabile kukonzakala kwabadlali
text:
IMamelodi Sundowns igalelekile kweli loMzantsi Afrika izolo emva kohambo lwaseKinshasa, apho ibethwe khona yi-AS Vita, ngegowuli elinye eqandeni kumdlalo womlenze wokuqala weCAF Champions League.
